sentences.c: Those who did well on the memory test had an increase in levels of immunoglobulin A, an antibody that's the body's first line of defense against germs.
sentences.cn: 那些在记忆测试中表现良好的人，其体内的免疫球蛋白 A 水平会升高。免疫球蛋白 A 是一种抗体，是人体抵御细菌的第一道防线。

sentences.c: Capitalize all proper nouns but not the articles (a, an) that precede them.
sentences.cn: 把所有的专有名词大写，它们之前的冠词(a, an)则不用。

sentences.c: A: An information type describes a category of topics, such as concepts, tasks, or reference.
sentences.cn: 答：信息类型描述主题的类别，例如概念、任务或引用。

sentences.c: Some people prefer not to use the feminine form 'actress' and use the word 'actor' for both sexes.
sentences.cn: 有些人不喜欢使用actress这一阴性形式，而用actor一词代表两个性别。

sentences.c: Recreating a deceased famous actor or actress may violate their legitimate rights.
sentences.cn: 再现已故的著名演员可能会侵犯他们的合法权利。

sentences.c: You could then, for any actor or actress, compute the most connected one.
sentences.cn: 你也可以…,拿任何一个演员来作中心，算出连接性最强的一个。

sentences.c: Almost every modern web browser USES a popup-blocker to prevent pop-ups, AD blocks and further site content recognized as advertisement.
sentences.cn: 现在几乎每一个新式网页浏览器都使用弹出框阻止程序来过滤掉弹出框、广告框和被认为是广告的网站深一层的内容。

sentences.c: Amusing Fedex AD that features UPS inside the Fedex truck. The words on the UPS truck are German. Competitive advertisement at its best. [link].
sentences.cn: 这则有趣的联邦快递广告中，UPS快递装在联邦快递的卡车内。UPS卡车上的文字是德国。最佳竞争广告。

sentences.c: One in seven consumers reported buying a product or visiting a store as a result of seeing a mobile advertisement; for iPhone users, more than one in four bought something as a result of seeing an AD.
sentences.cn: 调查中，有七分之一的消费者会因为看到手机广告而购买某样商品，或者光临某家门店；对于iPhone用户来说，有超过四分之一的人会因为看到广告而购买产品。

sentences.c: Today the rapid growth of artificial intelligence (AI) raises fundamental questions: "What is intelligence, identity, or consciousness?"
sentences.cn: 如今人工智能的快速发展带来了一些基本问题:“智能是指什么，指身份还是意识？”

sentences.c: AI is often called artificial general intelligence.
sentences.cn: “AI”，通常也被称作 “通用人工智能（artificial general intelligence）”。

sentences.c: Can artificial intelligence (AI) machines act ethically, meaning can they be honest and fair?
sentences.cn: 人工智能机器能依据道德行事吗？也就是说，它们能做到诚实和公平吗？

sentences.c: Anyone following thousands of people who only updates via the web is not actually following anybody.
sentences.cn: 那些动辄跟随上千人并且仅通过网页发布消息的人实际上是没有跟随任何人。

sentences.c: So in truth, you're absolutely right, but in practice you've got to be careful with it because we don't want to slow anybody down or bust anyone either.
sentences.cn: 因此在事实上，你完全正确，但是与它在练习时你必须小心，因为我们不想要也使任何人减慢或者损坏任何人。

sentences.c: And we announced t need anybody else and we knew better than anyone else.
sentences.cn: 我们宣布，我们不需要任何人的帮助，that, we, didn，别人知道的我们都知道。

sentences.c: He often gets money at an ATM (automatic teller machine), and he has done so far two years.
sentences.cn: 他经常从自动取款机(atm)取款，他这样做已经有两年了。

sentences.c: Honda's auto assembly lines run by its Chinese joint venture Guangqi Honda Automobile have been stalled several times in recent weeks because of Labour disputes at its parts manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 与中方广汽-本田汽车联营的本田汽车装配生产线，由于部件制造厂的劳资纠纷，在最近几个星期里已经停产过好几次。

sentences.c: General manager at the Japan Automobile Dealers Association says it can't say the number has hit bottom, as many auto makers are producing at only 50 percent of initial plans.
sentences.cn: 日本汽车经销商协会总经理说这个数字达到最低点，因为许多汽车制造商制造的汽车只是原本计划的50%。

sentences.c: But under the strictest etymology - the Greek auto means "self" and the Latin mobilis means "mobile" - the riding car was the first automobile.
sentences.cn: 但是如果按照严格的词源学——希腊语中‘auto’意为“自己”，拉丁语的“mobilis”意为“移动的”，那么骑式双轮车可算是第一辆自动车。

sentences.c: Leaves fall down from trees in autumn.
sentences.cn: 在秋天，很多叶子都从树上飘落。

sentences.c: During autumn, the leaves change color and fall down from the trees.
sentences.cn: 在秋天，树叶变了颜色，从树上掉下来。

sentences.c: In autumn the leaves wither and fall off the trees.
sentences.cn: 秋天，树叶枯萎并从树上落下来。

sentences.c: Christian Farrell of Waterfront Bicycle Shop, on West St. just north of Christopher St., said initially he was concerned about bike-share, though, he admitted, "I was happy to see people on bikes."
sentences.cn: 来自克里斯托弗大街北边的西大街上海滨自行车店的克里斯蒂安·法雷尔，说他起初对共享单车很是担忧，但他承认，“我很开心看到人们骑自行车。”

sentences.c: When I get to school, I lock my bike in the bicycle park.
sentences.cn: 当我到达学校，我把自行车锁在自行车停放处。

sentences.c: So far in the "Bicycle Test", no woman has stolen a bike.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，这个自行车测试中还没有女士偷车。

sentences.c: She was then a plump and shy bride, and I was a strong and happy bridegroom.
sentences.cn: 她那时是一位丰韵又害羞的新娘，而我是一位强壮又快乐的新郎。

sentences.c: All of us drank a toast to the bride and bridegroom.
sentences.cn: 大伙向新娘新郎敬酒。

sentences.c: At the wedding party, the bride and the bridegroom expressed that they would live in harmony and mutual respect and grow old together.
sentences.cn: 婚礼上，新娘和新郎表示要互敬互爱，白头偕老。

sentences.c: "What does your father do?"—"Well, he's a civil servant."
sentences.cn: “你父亲是做什么工作的？”— “哦，他是个公务员。”

sentences.c: What does she want to do when she leaves school?
sentences.cn: 她毕业后想干什么？

sentences.c: That does not do much to brighten the prospects of kids in the city.
sentences.cn: 那并没怎么改善城里孩子们的前途。

sentences.c: Anyone with night sweats plus other symptoms should be seen by a doctor, Dr. Boutin-Foster said, especially people with a known chronic medical condition.
sentences.cn: 她说，如果夜间盗汗并伴有其他症状，就应该去看医生，尤其是那些确认患有慢性病的人。

sentences.c: So she did go to a doctor, but it was Dr. Mendez, their general practitioner, not Susan Steiner.
sentences.cn: 因此她必须得去看医生，但是给她看病的是门德兹大夫，是平时给他们看病的全科医生，而不是苏珊-斯坦纳。

sentences.c: The doctor had called Dr Gler frequently over the past year. He was not alone.
sentences.cn: 这位医生病人在过去的一年中常打电话找Gler，他并不孤单，许多电话都是求救的。

sentences.c: Women's Dormitory turns the camera on a group of temporary workers sharing a cheap dorm.
sentences.cn: 《女子宿舍》一片将镜头对准了一群暂栖于廉价旅馆的女人。

sentences.c: I think in Japan there was a collective identity as a society where everyone is middle class, everybody shares the same fate, there are not huge, wide disparities of income.
sentences.cn: 我认为，日本是一个有集体意识的社会，所有人都是中产阶级，大家的命运休戚相关，收入没有巨大的差距。

sentences.c: He blamed everyone... He blamed everybody but himself.
sentences.cn: 他责怪每一个人……他责怪每个人唯独没有他自己。

sentences.c: Everyone / Everybody knows how to do it well if he wants to try.
sentences.cn: 每个人/ 任何人想要试一试的话，都知道怎么做好这件事。

sentences.c: The frequency of errors in grammar and punctuation has become a serious concern, the State Examination Commission said in a report after reviewing last year's exam performance by 15-year-olds.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰国家考试委员会在针对去年15岁学生考试成绩的评论报告中称，语法和标点错误频频出现，已成为一个严重的问题。

sentences.c: Teachers themselves are often judged by examination results and instead of teaching their subjects, they are reduced to training their students in exam techniques which they despise.
sentences.cn: 对老师本人教学水平的评判通常就是看学生的考试成绩。老师们不去教授他们的课，而是简化教学，对学生进行他们嗤之以鼻的考试技巧培训。

sentences.c: We should adjust good face and use good exam skills. Grasp the examination method that first easy then difficult. Take basic points, and win a high score.
sentences.cn: 我们要调整好临场心态，运用好考试技巧，掌握先易后难，先熟后生的考试方法。拿足基本分，争取得高分。

sentences.c: If you've got the fridge or freezer space, they'll last for months in the refrigerator and up to a year in the freezer.
sentences.cn: 如果你有电冰箱或者冷冻室，坚果可以在电冰箱里存放好几个月，在冷冻室就可以存放到一年之久。

sentences.c: Remove refrigerator odors with ease. Dab lemon juice on a cotton ball or sponge and leave it in the fridge for several hours.
sentences.cn: 用棉球或者海绵蘸满柠檬汁放在冰箱里面几个小时。

sentences.c: Refrigerator: a commercial refrigerated unit or even domestic 'fridge is ideal if set at a very low temperature yet above freezing point.
sentences.cn: 冰箱：商业冷藏设备，甚至国内'冰箱是理想的，如果定在一个非常低的温度点尚未冰点以上。

trans.cn: 祖父/爷爷/外公/外婆/奶奶

sentences.c: I never swam but I passed my gym work anyway, by having another student give my gymnasium number (978) and swim across the pool in my place.
sentences.cn: 我从未游过泳，却又终究通过了体育课，那时让另一位学生用我的体育课号码(978)，代替我又过了游泳池。

sentences.c: The glazing used in certain areas around the gymnasium and the climbing gym certainly helps enhance the perception of unencumbered space and increased natural daylight.
sentences.cn: 在健身房和攀援壁周围的某些区域所配的玻璃窗，显然有助于提高那种空间没有阻碍的感觉，和增加自然日光。

sentences.c: Gather in the playground / gymnasium (gym) / basketball court / soccer field.
sentences.cn: 在操场， 体育馆， 篮球场， 足球场集合。

sentences.c: X-rays have confirmed that he has not broken any bones.
sentences.cn: X光片已经证实他没有骨折。

sentences.c: Boston, you have to admit, has style.
sentences.cn: 你得承认波士顿很有格调。

sentences.c: He always has to have the last word in any argument.
sentences.cn: 在任何争论中总是得他最后说了算。

sentences.c: Duties: Act as a genial host/hostess; Earnestness, good humor and enthusiasm is needed. Act as a mini-trainer to share or show some speaking skills.
sentences.cn: 职责：您是一位亲切的主人；您真诚、幽默和热情。针对与会者演讲的平均水平，不时地分享或展示一些演讲技巧。

sentences.c: The host or hostess of the party will, however, probably give all the guests a tour of their new home.
sentences.cn: 不过，聚会的主人可能会带所有的客人参观他们的新家。

sentences.c: We talked of ourselves, of our prospects, of the journey, of the weather, of each other -- of everything but our host and hostess.
sentences.cn: 我们谈到自己，谈到前途，谈到旅程，谈到天气，谈到彼此的情况——谈到一切，只是不谈我们的男女主人。

sentences.c: The acquisition complements Intel's leading-edge product portfolio and enables new classes of products in the high-growth data center and Internet of Things (IoT) market segments.
sentences.cn: 此次收购完善了英特尔具有领先优势的产品组合，并为高速增长的数据中心以及物联网细分市场提供了新类别的产品。

sentences.c: The research and application of IOT (Internet of things) are popular day by day, which include hardware of electronic label reader, IOT software and e-business, etc.
sentences.cn: 物联网的研究和应用日趋广泛，包含有电子标签识读器硬件、物联网软件、电子商务相关研究等众多方面。

sentences.c: For now, though, the real-world applications for the Internet of things (IoT) have been somewhat limited, at least for consumers.
sentences.cn: 不过至今为止，物联网在真实世界的应用仍旧受到了某些限制，至少对消费者而言是如此。

sentences.c: Being an information technology, or IT, worker is not a job I envy.
sentences.cn: 我并不向往成为一名信息技术工作者。

sentences.c: Define the gap between your current and planned information technology (IT) environments.
sentences.cn: 定义当前的和计划的信息技术(IT)环境之间差距。

sentences.c: Testing the information technology (it) architecture is all-inclusive.
sentences.cn: 测试信息技术(IT)架构应该面面俱到。

sentences.c: Stocked with traditional equipment and an astonishing array of gear more suited for a laboratory, the Cooking lab became the site of unprecedented research into the physics of cuisine.
sentences.cn: 储备有传统的设备以及一套令人惊叹的更像是实验室设备的机械产品，烹饪实验室成为了研究难以预料的烹饪的物理学的宝地。

sentences.c: Most intriguingly, perhaps, the laboratory animals showed more pronounced gains than those living outside a lab.
sentences.cn: 或许最有趣的是，实验室动物比非实验室动物表现出更为明显的体重增加。

sentences.c: A South Korean laboratory that produced the world's first cloned dogs is looking to get into the business of cloning canines, first by cloning drug-sniffing dogs, a lab official said on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 韩国的一个实验室曾制造了世界上第一只克隆狗。本周二，实验室官员称目前他们正在为克隆犬类寻找商机，而第一站是：克隆缉毒犬。

sentences.c: In July Sir Peter Williams, who was recently appointed by the government to review primary mathematics teaching, said it was a "testable fact" that A-level maths and physics were getting easier.
sentences.cn: 七月，最近刚刚被任命去测评现在小学数学教学体系的彼得·威廉爵士声称，目前A类的数学和物理学课程已经“显而易见”地变得简单了。

sentences.c: It's basically mathematics and I am not really good at maths.
sentences.cn: 这基本上是数学，我并不是真正的数学好。

sentences.c: From the course of "Circuit and Signal", it can be noticed that the needs of the users of mathematical tools and maths itself to mathematics are different.
sentences.cn: 文章从《电路与信号》课程着眼，注意到数学工具的用户和数学本身对数学要求的不同。

sentences.c: Her mother, Solio, is a first-time mum and she is doing a fantastic job.
sentences.cn: 她的母亲索利奥是第一次当妈妈，她做得非常好。

sentences.c: You might be able to help your mother by doing something nice for her, like bringing water to drink for mum while she is thirsty.
sentences.cn: 你可以做点对妈妈好的事情帮助她，比如当她渴的时候给她倒水喝。

sentences.c: Its mum has become a first-time mother at the age of 90 but will play no role in its up-bringing.
sentences.cn: 龟妈妈已经90岁了，这是她第一次当妈妈，她将不会对小象龟承担抚养责任。

sentences.c: Remember to include titles (e.g., Dr., Judge, etc.) and name prefix (e.g., Mr., Mrs. Ms.).
sentences.cn: 介绍的时候记得加上头衔(如，博士，法官等)以及称呼语(如，先生，太太，夫人)。

sentences.c: They usually don't use Mr., Mrs., Ms., or Miss in an introduction because they feel that these titles are very formal.
sentences.cn: 但他们不常使用Mr .，Mrs .，Ms .或者Miss，因为他们觉得这些称呼太正式了。

sentences.c: When people in Western countries need to be formal, they say Mr., Miss, Ms. Or Mrs. With the person's family name.
sentences.cn: 当西方国家的人们在正式场合的时候，他们在姓氏前面加上先生、小姐、女士或夫人。

sentences.c: Have you tried to replace a personal computer in your daily life with a post PC device?
sentences.cn: 大家有没有尝试用非pc设备去取代日常生活中个人电脑的工作？

sentences.c: WHEN the personal computer (PC) turned 25 last year, many anniversary articles read like obituaries.
sentences.cn: 去年，也是个人电脑(PC)诞生25周年之际，许多周年纪念文章读起来却像讣告。

sentences.c: At the emergence of the computer age, the company got a head start by developing the operating system (OS) for IBM's personal computer (PC) in 1981.
sentences.cn: 随着电脑时代的来临，1981年，这家刚起步的小公司开始为IBM的个人电脑开发操作系统。

sentences.c: Physical education (PE) is historically an important part of education and suited for social requirement at different stages, forming PE thoughts and spirits with different epoch characteristics.
sentences.cn: 体育历来是教育的重要组成部分，它适应着不同历史阶段的社会需要，形成了各具特色的时代体育思想和体育精神。

sentences.c: Objective To explore the energy expenditure of the pupils in physical education(PE) course in winter, and to provide basis for their health education.
sentences.cn: 目的了解小学生冬季体育课运动能量消耗情况，以便为小学生营养健康教育提供科学依据。

sentences.c: Yes, I have PE (physical education) at school.
sentences.cn: 是，我有体育(体育教育在学校)。

sentences.c: My telephone was disconnected by the phone company.
sentences.cn: 我的电话被电话公司切断了。

sentences.c: If you are making a long distance call on a public telephone and run out of money, give the number on your phone to the person you're talking to. Then hang up the receiver and he can call you back.
sentences.cn: 如果你用公共电话打长途，钱花光了，把你的电话号码给你正在通话的人，然后挂上电话，他会给你回电话的。

sentences.c: And in the Philippines, there are now more mobile phone subscribers than fixed telephone subscribers.
sentences.cn: 在菲律宾，移动电话用户目前已经超过了固线电话用户。

sentences.c: Using the analytical relationship, many boundaries namely scissors sketed, could be drawn on the parameter plane of horizontal tail area and aeroplane center of gravity.
sentences.cn: 利用这种解析关系，可以在平尾相对面积和飞机重心位置的参数平面上，绘制出各种限制边界，形成所谓“剪刀图”。

sentences.c: In experiments, the bird body launched by a big air gun impacts the full scale windshield of the aeroplane to simulate striking between a flying bird and a flying plane.
sentences.cn: 在实验中，利用空气炮发射鸟弹，撞击飞机全尺寸风挡，以模拟飞鸟和飞机的相互撞击。

sentences.c: If someone is treated kindly, it can make their day brighter and encourage that person to be kind to somebody else.
sentences.cn: 如果有人被友善地对待，这可以让他们的生活更美好，鼓励他们善待他人。

sentences.c: She told me all this as if it were not her life but somebody else's, someone she didn't know well and who wasn't important to her.
sentences.cn: 她跟我说这些，就好像说的是别人的生活，而不是她的生活，别的人不很清楚，对她也并不重要似的。

sentences.c: During one of the periods when I was off cigarettes, I went to the pub. Somebody bought a round, then someone passed round a packet of fags.
sentences.cn: 在一次戒烟期中，我去了酒吧，有人请所有人喝酒，然后有人传着一包烟。

sentences.c: At best, watching television can be educational as well as entertaining, but nobody wishes to raise literacy levels by simply sitting in front of a TV box.
sentences.cn: 电视至多有教育和娱乐功能，但没人指望简单地通过看电视来提高读写水平。

sentences.c: The other big difference is that pay-TV operators view television as a social experience.
sentences.cn: 另一个巨大的不同是，付费电视运营商将电视看做一种社交经验。

sentences.c: The Ultraman television series first appeared on TV in 1966.
sentences.cn: 奥特曼电视系列剧于1966年首播。

sentences.c: His mother didn't leave until/till he was asleep.
sentences.cn: 直到他睡着了，他母亲才离开。

sentences.c: They worked until / till six o”clock.
sentences.cn: 他们一直工作到六点钟。

sentences.c: Father often reads until (till) late at night.
sentences.cn: 爸爸经常看书到深夜。

sentences.c: Most plays are written in dialog ue.
sentences.cn: 大多数戏剧都是用对话体写的。

sentences.c: At last there can be a reasonable dialog ue between our two governments.
sentences.cn: 我们两国最后终于能理智地进行对话了。

sentences.c: He writes dialog ue by cut monologue in two.
sentences.cn: 他把独白切成两截来写对白。

sentences.c: A few twentieths of a gram can be critical.
sentences.cn: 二十分之几克可能是关键的。

sentences.c: Extracting information about the large-scale composition of a planet from a sample weighing a millionth of a gram was a fascinating example of scientific endeavour.
sentences.cn: 从重量为百万分之一克的样品中提取有关行星宏观组成的信息是一个极为有趣的科学尝试实例。

sentences.c: Women there presented her with a gram of radium for her campaign.
sentences.cn: 那里的妇女为了支持她的活动赠送给她一克镭。

trans.cn: （商）承兑后日（Days after Acceptance） 存款帐目（Deposit Account） 数字-模拟（Digital-to-Analog） 附凭单（Documents Attached） 承兑交单（Documents against acceptance）
（商）承兑后...日（Days after Acceptance） 存款帐目（Deposit Account） 数字-模拟（Digital-to-Analog） 附凭单（Documents Attached） 承兑交单（Documents against acceptance）

sentences.c: An importer in Sweden asks us to send him a trial delivery for sales on D/A terms.
sentences.cn: 瑞典的进口商要求我们按照承兑交单条款向他发送试交货的产品。

sentences.c: D — A digit (from 0 to 9).
sentences.cn: d—数字(0到9)。

sentences.c: The F. D. A. announced in 2007 that it was aware of that problem, but it has taken no action.
sentences.cn: 食品和药物管理局在2007年宣布它认识到了那个问题，但它没有采取行动。

trans.cn: 汇票（bill of exchange）；报税单（bill of entry）
汇票（bill of exchange）；报税单（bill of entry）

sentences.c: The highest revenue estimate among analysts polled Thomson Reuters I/B/E/S fell $900 million short of Apple's total, while the top earnings-per-share estimate undershot by 61 cents.
sentences.cn: 这是分析师对苹果最高的收入预测，而Thomson Reuters I/B/E/S的预测则比苹果总收入要少9亿美元，其中预测的每股收益比实际少61%。

sentences.c: I graduated from College of Engineering Guindy, Chennai with a B. e. in Computer Science.
sentences.cn: 我毕业于钦奈库因帝工程学院，在那里获得了计算机科学工学学士。

sentences.c: Satisfy single element requirements for [b,e) ranges such that b+1=e.
sentences.cn: 满足 [b,e) 区间内 b+1=e 条件的单个元素需求。

trans.cn: 停工时间：指由于故障等原因，工厂或机器等不工作的一段时间。
休息时间：指工作或计划活动之外的一段时间。

sentences.c: How can we slow down time?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能让时间慢下来？

sentences.c: It's possible for us to slow down time by expanding our experience of time.
sentences.cn: 我们有可能通过扩展我们对时间的体验来使时间慢下来。

sentences.c: I right down time.
sentences.cn: 我正好赶上上班时间。

synos.cn: [电][劳经]停机时间；故障时间；停工时间

trans.cn: 产地证明书（certificate of origin）；由……转交（care of）

sentences.c: I will very appreciate if the C/O can be offered.
sentences.cn: 如能提供原产地证明，我将十分感谢。

sentences.c: C/O SHOWING INCONSISTENT NAME OF EXPORTER (I.E. LTD AND CORP LTD.).
sentences.cn: 产地证显示不正确的出口商名称(亦即有限公司和合作有限公司).

sentences.c: It's www dot C-O-M-P-4-S-S dotcom.
sentences.cn: 网址是 www.comp4ss.com。

trans.cn: 染上（疾病）：开始患上或遭受（疾病）。

sentences.c: Brigida, did the uncle really come down with the child?
sentences.cn: 布丽吉特，真的是奥西姆大叔带着孩子来的吗？

sentences.c: It seems like whenever I get into a really good running groove, I come down with a cold that forces me to slow down my training.
sentences.cn: 似乎每当我进入一个非常好的跑步状态时，我就会因为感冒而不得不放慢速度。

sentences.c: What if I come down with some strange tropical disease?
sentences.cn: 倘若我染上罕见的热带疾病怎么办？

trans.cn: 喘不过气来，上气不接下气

sentences.c: She was slightly out of breath from running.
sentences.cn: 她跑过后有点上气不接下气。

sentences.c: "It's impossible." said the boy, out of breath.
sentences.cn: “这不可能。”男孩上气不接下气地说。

sentences.c: A young boy ran up to me, out of breath.
sentences.cn: 一个小男孩向我跑来，上气不接下气。

trans.cn: 使某人感到非常紧张和担忧：指让某人感到极度紧张、焦虑和担心的状态。
失去食欲：不再感到饥饿。

sentences.c: No need to suppress one's appetite insgroupsto lose weight. I think you are slim enough.
sentences.cn: 没有必要为减肥而减少口福，我觉得你很苗条了！

trans.cn: 突破：成功克服或解决一个难题或障碍，实现重要进展。

sentences.c: Scientists think they are beginning to break through in the fight against cancer.
sentences.cn: 科学家认为他们在对抗癌症的研究中开始有所突破。

sentences.c: If you have been avoiding the decision-making process, why not break through that barrier right here and now?
sentences.cn: 如果一直以来你总是想要避开做决策的过程，那为何不此时此刻就突破那个障碍呢？

sentences.c: Protesters tried to break through a police cordon.
sentences.cn: 抗议者们试图冲破警察的封锁线。

trans.cn: 复习课程：一种培训课程，帮助人们复习信息或学习他们工作所需的新技能。

sentences.c: We're gonna assume that you understand reactor physics, and this is basically a refresher course.
sentences.cn: 我们假设你们理解了反应堆物理，这主要是一门复习课程。

sentences.c: I am taking a refresher course to improve my driving.
sentences.cn: 我正在参加补习训练以提高自己的驾驶技术。

sentences.c: I have taken a refresher course to improve my driving.
sentences.cn: 我参加了补习训练以提高自己的驾驶技术。

sentences.c: If our self respect is based on the praise of others then our self respect will be very tenuous.
sentences.cn: 如果我们的自我尊重建立在他人的表扬之上，那么这种自我尊重将是非常脆弱的。

sentences.c: The way to self respect is not through a bloated sense of pride; this is a false type of self respect.
sentences.cn: 获得自我尊重的方式不是通过一种膨胀的骄傲的感觉，这是自我尊重的错误形式。

sentences.c: They have lost not only their jobs, but their homes, their self-respect and even their reason for living.
sentences.cn: 他们不仅失去了工作，还失去了家园、自尊心，甚至活下去的理由。

trans.cn: 与工作表现挂钩的工资

sentences.c: Another answer may be performance-related pay for teachers.
sentences.cn: 另外一个解决办法可能是给发老师绩效工资。

sentences.c: And I dare not even ask for any vacation time, as this would reduce my performance-related pay.
sentences.cn: 我甚至都不敢请假休息，因为这样会减少我的绩效工资。

sentences.c: In the 1990s, shares and share options became a regular feature of performance-related pay, particularly in the United States.
sentences.cn: 90年代，股份和认股权成为绩效工资的常规特征，尤其是在美国。

trans.cn: 不同意，违背：不同意某事物；违背某事物。
反对，抵制：反对某人或某事物；抵制某人或某事物。
对抗，竞争：在比赛或游戏中与某人或某队对抗；竞争。
不利于，不符合：对某人不利；不符合某人的期望。

sentences.c: These kinds of price controls go against all the financial principles of the free market liberals.
sentences.cn: 这些价格控制违反了支持自由市场的自由主义者的所有金融原则。

sentences.c: I don't want to go against your will.
sentences.cn: 我不想违背您的意愿。

sentences.c: He would not go against his parents' wishes.
sentences.cn: 他不愿违背父母的意愿。

trans.cn: 要求，需要：指要求或需要某人的出现、行动或参与。
呼叫，打电话：指通过电话与某人进行交流或尝试与某人联系。
预示，预测：指准确地预测或预示某事的发生或结果。

sentences.c: I'll call for you at 7 o'clock.
sentences.cn: 我7点钟去接你。

sentences.c: I'll call for you at seven o'clock.
sentences.cn: 我7点钟去接你。

sentences.c: I book a wake-up call for 4:45 a.m.
sentences.cn: 我预订了凌晨4点45分的叫醒电话。

synos.cn: 要求；需要；提倡；邀请；为…叫喊

trans.cn: 记住：保持在脑海中；牢记；注意。

sentences.c: Bear in mind that gas stations are scarce in the more remote areas.
sentences.cn: 记住，加油站在那些比较偏远的地区是很稀少的。

sentences.c: Please bear in mind that the price includes moving all the furniture, and the whole task would take 2 days.
sentences.cn: 请记住，这个价格包括搬运所有的家具，而且完成整个工作需要2天的时间。

sentences.c: Do bear in mind, though, that at this time of year the weather is very changeable and if the cloud suddenly descends, it's all too easy to wander off the track.
sentences.cn: 但是要记住，每年的这个时候天气变化无常，如果乌云突然降落，就很容易偏离轨道。

trans.cn: 利弊：对某事物的赞成和反对的论点。
优点和缺点：某事物的好处和坏处。

sentences.c: Anne Holker looks at the pros and cons of making changes to your property.
sentences.cn: 安妮·霍尔卡会研究对你的财产进行变更的利与弊。

sentences.c: You explain the pros and cons of various attitudes or opinions, but you don't side definitely with any one of them.
sentences.cn: 你解释各种态度或观点的利与弊，但你没有明确地站在其中任何一方。

sentences.c: We weighed up the pros and cons.
sentences.cn: 我们权衡了利弊得失。

trans.cn: 利用：使用某物或某人以达到特定目的。
运用：使用某种技能、知识或方法。
充分利用：最大程度地使用或发挥某物的潜力。
与（某人）会面：与某人一起来到某个地方；与某人见面。
与（某人）碰面：与某人不期而遇；与某人偶然相遇。

sentences.c: Use your lunch and coffee breaks to meet up with colleagues you don't always see.
sentences.cn: 利用午餐和茶歇时间去和你不经常见到的同事们碰碰面。

sentences.c: I meet up with Simon to play basketball.
sentences.cn: 我约好西蒙去打篮球。

sentences.c: They meet up with their mother-Anjelica Huston.
sentences.cn: 他们偶然遇到了母亲安杰利卡·休斯顿。

trans.cn: 停止支持或对某人或某事友好；导致某人停止对某人友好；使用某物以伤害或败坏某人形象

sentences.c: Instead, I agree with Oxford University philosopher Nick Bostrom, who believes that the heaviest risks from AGI do not come from a decision to turn against mankind but rather from a dogged pursuit of set objectives at the expense of everything else.
sentences.cn: 相反，我同意牛津大学哲学家尼克·博斯特罗姆的观点。他认为，AGI 最大的风险并非源自它违反人类的决定，而是源自其不惜一切代价对既定目标的执着追求。

sentences.c: Just don't ignite his wrath or he could turn against you.
sentences.cn: 只是不要激起他的愤怒，否则他会与你为敌。

sentences.c: In the Superman epics, the public often turn against their hero.
sentences.cn: 在超人的传奇故事里，公众经常反对他们的超人英雄。

synos.cn: 反对；背叛；（使）变成和…敌对

trans.cn: 紧随其后：指紧接在某个事件或行动之后发生或进行。

sentences.c: Unfortunately, bad news has come hard on the heels of good.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，坏消息紧接着好消息而来。

sentences.c: Further successes came hot on the heels of her first best-selling novel.
sentences.cn: 她的第一部畅销小说之后是接二连三的成功。

sentences.c: News of rising unemployment followed hard on the heels of falling export figures.
sentences.cn: 出口数字下降之后紧接着就是失业率上升的消息。

trans.cn: 副作用：药物等的次要且通常不良的影响，也被称为“副反应”。

sentences.c: Dreams might be a side effect of memory making.
sentences.cn: 梦可能是记忆产生的副作用。

sentences.c: After that the doctors told him he couldn't play sports any more, but there was one good side effect: his new-found skill.
sentences.cn: 在那之后，医生告诉他，他不能再参加运动了，但有一个很好的副作用：他的新技能。

sentences.c: Sometimes when you take a common drug, you may have a side effect.
sentences.cn: 有时当你服用一种普通药物时，可能会有副作用。

trans.cn: 真实的、真正的、真诚的：没有虚假或欺骗的。

sentences.c: Is it a bona fide, reputable organization?
sentences.cn: 这是不是个合法的、值得信赖的机构？

sentences.c: We are happy to donate to bona fide charitable causes.
sentences.cn: 我们很乐意向真正的慈善事业捐赠。

sentences.c: Derived from the principle of "hand muss hand wahren", bona fide gaining has been incorporated into civil laws of all the countries.
sentences.cn: 善意取得制度起源于“以手护手”原则，现已纳入各国民法中。

etymology.d: 拉丁短语。bona, 好，非常，见bonus. fide, 真诚，见confide, 信任。

trans.cn: 除了，除外：表示除了某个人或某个事物之外，其他都不包括在内。
除了……以外：表示除了某个特定情况之外。

sentences.c: I don't know any French people other than you.
sentences.cn: 除了你，我不认识别的法国人。

sentences.c: Other than blowing up a tyre I hadn't done any car maintenance.
sentences.cn: 除了给一个轮胎充气外，我没有做过任何汽车保养。

sentences.c: Men are more inhibited about touching each other than women are.
sentences.cn: 触摸同性时男人比女人要更加拘谨。

trans.cn: 放弃，交出：指放弃对某物的拥有或控制。

sentences.c: He acted the part with consummate skill.
sentences.cn: 他以精湛的演技饰演了这个角色。

sentences.c: He feels reluctant to part with the traditional wallet.
sentences.cn: 他不愿意舍弃传统的钱包。

sentences.c: I could never part with this ring.
sentences.cn: 我永远也不摘掉这枚戒指。

sentences.c: As for Jo, she's doing fine.
sentences.cn: 至于乔，她现在日子过得不错。

sentences.c: As for his job – well, he was very mysterious about it.
sentences.cn: 至于他的工作–嘿，他对此十分诡秘。

sentences.c: As for food for the party, that's all being taken care of.
sentences.cn: 关于聚会要用的食物，都在置办当中。

trans.cn: 飞碟：各种未被识别的飞行物体，通常被描述为盘形或圆盘形。

sentences.c: Want to see a flying saucer?
sentences.cn: 想看飞碟吗？

sentences.c: So it's too bad the flying saucer landed on April 14, 1956.
sentences.cn: 那个飞碟在1956年4月14日这一天登陆真是大错特错。

sentences.c: It opened and the two men from the flying saucer stepped in.
sentences.cn: 门开了，飞碟上的那两个人走了进来。

trans.cn: 希思罗机场：位于英国伦敦西部的国际机场，是世界上最繁忙的机场之一，也是英国最大的机场。

sentences.c: This man works for an airline at Heathrow airport.
sentences.cn: 这位男士在伦敦希斯罗国际机场为一家航空公司工作。

sentences.c: The plane touched down at 17:45 at Heathrow Airport.
sentences.cn: 飞机于17点45分在希斯罗机场降落。

sentences.c: Flying into London's Heathrow Airport, Team Great Britain was greeted with cheers.
sentences.cn: 英国队在飞抵伦敦希斯罗机场时受到热烈的欢迎。

trans.cn: 脐带：连接胎儿和胎盘的带状物，通过该带状物，呼吸气体、营养物质和废物可以传递。

sentences.c: There's a lot of interests in obtaining stem cells from the blood of the umbilical cord on birth.
sentences.cn: 人们对从出生时的脐带血液中获取干细胞很感兴趣。

sentences.c: MSCs were easily obtained from Wharton's jelly of human umbilical cord.
sentences.cn: 很容易从人脐带中的华通氏胶中获得间充质干细胞。

sentences.c: Your baby may have discovered his first toy by now — the umbilical cord.
sentences.cn: 婴儿可能已经发现了他的第一个玩具——脐带。

trans.cn: 逃学：未经允许缺席学校。

sentences.c: How dared you to play truant!
sentences.cn: 你竟敢逃学。

sentences.c: We are not allowed to play truant.
sentences.cn: 我们不被允许逃学。

sentences.c: Children who play truant from school are unimaginative.
sentences.cn: 逃学的孩子们都缺乏想像力。

sentences.c: You have to spit out any food leftover.
sentences.cn: 你不得不将任何食物吃剩的部分吐出来。

sentences.c: "They are like little factories that spit out biofuel molecules without the need for starch or cellulose, " explains Gibbons.
sentences.cn: 吉本斯解释：“这就像一个不需要淀粉或者纤维素就能生产出生物燃料分子的小型工厂。”

sentences.c: Any food leftover, you would have to spit out.
sentences.cn: 你不得不将任何食物吃剩的部分吐了出来。

trans.cn: 在某事物的开始阶段的短时间内。通常用于短语'in the short term'，表示在短期内不会有任何影响，或者某些变化可能会在短期内提高利润，但在长期内会花费更多的钱

sentences.c: In the short term, perhaps they are right.
sentences.cn: 从短期来看，他们或许是对的。

sentences.c: I see a dangerous trap here: what if you experience something that feels very good in the short term but is actually harmful in the long term?
sentences.cn: 在这里我看到了一个危险的陷阱：如果你经历某事在短期内感觉很好，但从长期来看实际上是有害的，那该怎么办？

sentences.c: A bestseller Willpower: Rediscovering Our Greatest Strength, suggests that willpower (意志力) is the ability to make decisions that are better for us in the long term, rather than in the short term.
sentences.cn: 《意志力：重新发现人类最伟大的力量》这本畅销书表明意志力是做决定的能力，从长远而非短期来看对我们更有益。

trans.cn: 在长期来看：指的是某个事物或决策在未来较长的时间内的影响和结果。

sentences.c: This measure inevitably means higher taxes in the long run.
sentences.cn: 从长远来看这项举措的结果就是要多纳税。

sentences.c: Sometimes expensive drugs or other treatments can be economical in the long run.
sentences.cn: 有时昂贵的药物或其他疗法从长远来看是省钱的。

sentences.c: If the government clamps down on the movement, that will only serve to strengthen it in the long run.
sentences.cn: 如果政府要压制该运动，从长远来说那只会加强其力量。

trans.cn: 难怪：表示某事情并不令人惊讶。

sentences.c: No wonder my brother wasn't feeling well.
sentences.cn: 难怪我兄弟当时感觉不舒服。

sentences.c: No wonder Josef was feeling a bit flummoxed.
sentences.cn: 难怪约瑟夫觉得有点糊涂了。

sentences.c: No wonder you're tired, you've been walking for hours.
sentences.cn: 难怪你累了呢，你一直走了好几个小时。

trans.cn: 厚颜无耻地面对或面对（自己的不当行为或欺骗）：指在面对自己的不当行为或欺骗时，毫不羞耻地坚持下去或继续面对。

sentences.c: Now that everyone knew the truth, the only thing to do was to brazen it out.
sentences.cn: 既然大家都知道真相了，只好硬着头皮撑过去。

sentences.c: She prefers to brazen it out rather than admit defeat.
sentences.cn: 她宁可厚着脸皮赖下去，也不愿承认失败。

sentences.c: When the brazen James Watson had his genome sequenced, he declined to find out whether he carried a gene variant that would increase his risk for Alzheimer's disease.
sentences.cn: 当厚颜无耻的詹姆斯·沃特森让人将他的基因组测序，他拒不找出自己是否携带一个变异基因，这种变异有可能会增加他罹患阿兹·海默症的风险。

trans.cn: 脱口秀：一种广播或电视节目，通常是知名人士进行讨论或接受采访的节目。

sentences.c: He turned on the radio and fiddled with the knob until he got a talk show.
sentences.cn: 他打开收音机，调动旋钮，直到他收到了一个谈话节目。

sentences.c: Why not watch a talk show?
sentences.cn: 为什么不看脱口秀节目呢？

sentences.c: I was watching an interesting talk show at that time.
sentences.cn: 那时我正在看一个有趣的脱口秀节目。

etymology.d: 还可拼写为 talk-show，来自 talk（说）+ show（展示、显示），进入汉语被音译为“脱口秀”，算是一个音意合译词，既表音又表意。

trans.cn: 突然爆炸或发出巨响：指突然爆炸或发出巨响。
离开，离去：指离开或离去。
变坏，变质：指变坏或变质。
按预期或期望进行，进行下去：指按照预期或期望进行，进行下去。
发出特定的声音：指发出特定的声音。

sentences.c: What time do you go off duty?
sentences.cn: 你什么时候下班？

sentences.c: He heard the alarm go off.
sentences.cn: 他听见警报器响了。

sentences.c: He was priming the bomb to go off in an hour's time.
sentences.cn: 他在事先准备炸弹在一小时后爆炸。

trans.cn: 充满，装满：指某物或某地充满了某种物质、情感或思想。
被……填满：指某物被填满了某种物质或液体。

sentences.c: When children are regarded as vessels to be filled with facts, creativity does not prosper; nor does it when teachers' sole objective is coaching children towards exams.
sentences.cn: 当孩子们被当作装满事实的容器时，创造力就不会蓬勃发展；而当教师的唯一目标是指导学生考试时亦是如此。

sentences.c: It would be filled with your special memories.
sentences.cn: 它将充满你特别的回忆。

sentences.c: It doesn't necessarily follow from findings like these that a world without work would be filled with unease.
sentences.cn: 失业的世界并不一定就会像研究发现的那样让人充满不安。

sentences.c: Business is looking shaky at the moment.
sentences.cn: 从目前看，业务举步维艰。

sentences.c: I am really enjoying myself at the moment.
sentences.cn: 我此刻很是自得其乐。

sentences.c: I'm off coffee at the moment.
sentences.cn: 我暂时不再喜欢咖啡。

trans.cn: 多年来：在几年/一些年/多年期间。

sentences.c: We've had a lot of fun over the years.
sentences.cn: 这些年来我们过得很开心。

sentences.c: Over the years, Rosie and I had drifted apart.
sentences.cn: 多年以来，我和罗西早已疏远。

sentences.c: That one mistake has cost him dear over the years.
sentences.cn: 那一个差错使他多年来付出了沉重的代价。

trans.cn: 功夫：各种中国武术和相关学科，特别是为了自卫、锻炼和精神成长而练习的。

sentences.c: He is a Chinese kung fu superstar.
sentences.cn: 他是中国功夫巨星。

sentences.c: Are you taught Chinese kung fu by your PE teacher?
sentences.cn: 你的体育老师教过你中国功夫吗？

sentences.c: My grandfather does Chinese Kung Fu every day though he is over eighty.
sentences.cn: 我爷爷每天练中国功夫，尽管他80多岁了。

trans.cn: (第二次大战后成立的)联合国

sentences.c: He was working under the flag of the United Nations.
sentences.cn: 他在联合国工作。

sentences.c: The United Nations has pleaded for a halt to the bombing.
sentences.cn: 联合国已呼吁停止轰炸。

sentences.c: It is grossly unfair to impute blame to the United Nations.
sentences.cn: 把责任归咎于联合国是极不公平的。

trans.cn: 灯泡：一个圆形的玻璃容器，内部有一根细金属丝，当电流通过时会产生光。

sentences.c: It took scientists nearly eighty years to invent a light bulb.
sentences.cn: 科学家花了将近80年的时间才发明电灯泡。

sentences.c: A muffin serving size is the size of a light bulb.
sentences.cn: 一份松饼是灯泡这么大。

sentences.c: Edison's most well-known inventions included the electric light bulb.
sentences.cn: 爱迪生最著名的发明包括电灯泡。

trans.cn: 独立地，自己一个人地：指某人独自、独立地完成某事，没有他人的帮助或陪伴。

sentences.c: It is usually easier to follow rules of social behaviour than to depend on one's own taste.
sentences.cn: 遵循社会行为准则通常比依靠自己的品味更容易。

sentences.c: Asking others' advice instead of getting everything done on one's own promotes democracy and communication too.
sentences.cn: 征求别人的意见而不是自己完成所有的事情，也能促进民主和交流。

sentences.c: He chose to lift the stone to drop it on one's own feet.
sentences.cn: 他选择了搬起石头砸自己的脚。

trans.cn: 放弃：指放弃对某物的控制或拥有，尤其是被迫放弃工作。
放弃，抛弃：指停止做某事或尝试某事，特别是作为失败的承认。
沉溺于某种感觉、影响或活动：指全身心地投入到某种感觉、影响或活动中。
对……绝望：指对看到某人/某物的希望感到绝望。

sentences.c: I give up—tell me the answer.
sentences.cn: 我放弃了，把答案告诉我吧。

sentences.c: Did he give up or keep on trying?
sentences.cn: 他是放弃了，还是在继续努力？

sentences.c: There comes a point where you give up.
sentences.cn: 现在你该放弃了。

trans.cn: 来做某事：表示某人前来做某事或某事情发生了。

sentences.c: Han realized that the time had come to do something about his son.
sentences.cn: 汉意识到是时候教训一下自己的儿子了。

sentences.c: If you're stuck for something to do tonight, come out with us.
sentences.cn: 你要是正愁今晚没事做，就跟我们一块儿出去吧。

sentences.c: But something in my mind kept nagging me to do "more" with my time... even when I could not come up with something to do.
sentences.cn: 然而一直有什么在头脑里念叨着让我抓紧时间做“更多”的事，即便我说不清该做什么。

trans.cn: 渡过困境：指在危险或困难的情况下幸存下来。
帮助渡过困境：指帮助他人在危险或困难的情况下幸存下来。

sentences.c: Everyone was very concerned whether he would pull through or not.
sentences.cn: 每个人都很关心他是否能恢复健康。

sentences.c: Houses have been split and collapsed, but we can build them again. So long as people are alive, we can still pull through and conquer the major natural disaster.
sentences.cn: 房屋已经倒塌，但我们可以重建它们。只要人活着，我们就一定能够渡过难关，并战胜这场重大的自然灾害。

sentences.c: The doctors think she will pull through.
sentences.cn: 医生相信她将康复。

trans.cn: 获得知识或理解：指获得知识或理解某事物。
与某人相处融洽：指与某人相处融洽或与某人合作。

sentences.c: Can we just get on with it, huh?
sentences.cn: 我们能继续干下去吗，啊？

sentences.c: Where do we get on the bus?
sentences.cn: 我们在哪儿上公共汽车？

sentences.c: How did you get on at the interview?
sentences.cn: 你面试的情况怎么样？

trans.cn: 过于：表示某事物超出了正常或合理的程度。

sentences.c: You're getting far too cheeky!
sentences.cn: 你太放肆了！

sentences.c: I've got far too much to do.
sentences.cn: 我要做的事情太多了。

sentences.c: I drank far too much last night.
sentences.cn: 我昨天晚上喝得酩酊大醉。

trans.cn: 别开玩笑了：表示不相信或不同意对方的说法，要求对方停止说谎或夸大其词。

sentences.c: Come off it! We don't have a chance.
sentences.cn: 别胡扯了！我们没机会。

sentences.c: "Come off it. Your lot get ineffable mercy," said Crowley sourly.
sentences.cn: “别逗了，至少你们还有那种不可言说的慈悲，”克鲁利酸溜溜地说。

sentences.c: With a tilt of the head and an ironic smile he could give a friendly tease or a devastating "Come off it."
sentences.cn: 带着嘲讽的微笑歪一歪脑袋，他可能友好的戏弄他们或者来一句极具杀伤力的“您就歇歇吧”。

sentences.c: You're dead right!
sentences.cn: 你完全正确！

sentences.c: The man was huffing and puffing and gasping so that I thought, if I continued to force him to run at that speed, my tormenter would drop dead right then and there.
sentences.cn: 那个男的呼吸开始变得急促、气喘不断，所以，我想，如果我继续迫使他以那种速度追跑的话，这个折磨我的人就会倒地而亡。

sentences.c: I'm dead right now as you're speaking to me.
sentences.cn: 其实此时同你说话的我是死人。

sentences.c: You've got a point there.
sentences.cn: 你找到要点了。

sentences.c: Angel: You've got a point there, Ralph. Katie?
sentences.cn: 我理解你的观点，拉尔夫。凯蒂，请你接着讲吧。

sentences.c: There's not much point in finding a magic ring that lets you into other worlds if you're afraid to look at them when you've got there.
sentences.cn: 要是你来了都不敢看，那么，找一枚有魔法的戒指把你带到‘另外的世界’有什么意义呢？

sentences.c: We will celebrate the Mid Autumn Festival.
sentences.cn: 我们将庆祝中秋节。

sentences.c: The Mid-Autumn Festival is a good occasion for family reunion.
sentences.cn: 中秋节是家庭团圆的好时机。

sentences.c: Let's eat moon cakes and celebrate the Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.cn: 我们一起吃月饼，庆中秋。

trans.cn: 豆腐脑：一种中国传统的食品，由豆浆制成，口感柔软，味道鲜美。
豆沙：一种由糯米和红豆制成的甜点馅料，常用于制作月饼、汤圆等传统食品。

sentences.c: It is made of sticky rice and red bean paste, and is famous for its softness, freshness and sweetness.
sentences.cn: 它由糯米和红豆沙做成，因其柔软、新鲜和香甜而闻名。

sentences.c: Tofu is cut into small cubes and eaten in bean paste soup.
sentences.cn: 豆腐被切成细条，盛在酱汤碗里。

sentences.c: Like to eat salty people can also add a little bean paste, or a little Laogan Ma.
sentences.cn: 喜欢吃咸辣的人还可以再加上些许豆瓣酱，或者一点老干妈。

trans.cn: 被火烧毁：指建筑物或其他结构被火灾摧毁。
逐渐熄灭：指火焰逐渐变小，逐渐产生越来越少的火焰。
用火烧毁：指用火焚烧摧毁某物。

sentences.c: Light up the stove and you could burn down the house.
sentences.cn: 点燃炉子，你可能会把房子烧掉。

sentences.c: If you forgot to turn it off when you went away, you might burn down the house.
sentences.cn: 如果你走的时候忘记关掉它，可能会把房子给烧了。

sentences.c: They threatened to burn down our house.
sentences.cn: 他们威胁要烧毁我们的房子。

trans.cn: 甜饺子：一种传统的中国小吃，通常由面粉制成的皮包裹着甜馅料，如红豆沙、芝麻糊等。

sentences.c: The Lantern Festival is coming. Lots of people are now buying sweet dumpling from the supermarket. Sometimes I make sweet dumpling myself at home.
sentences.cn: 元宵节快到了，大家都到超市买汤圆呢，不过有时候我也在家自己做。

sentences.c: Sweet dumpling is small dumpling balls made of glutinous rice flour with rose petals, sesame, walnut meat, dried fruit, sugar.
sentences.cn: 汤圆是用糯米粉做皮，由玫瑰花瓣、芝麻、豆酱、枣泥、胡桃肉、干果、糖和食用油做馅，做成的小面球团。

sentences.c: The special food for the Lantern Festival is the sweet dumpling.
sentences.cn: 元宵节的特殊食品是元宵。

trans.cn: 积极参与某事与其他人一起：指主动参与某项活动或事件，与其他人一同参与。

sentences.c: I was quite sulky, so I didn't take part in much.
sentences.cn: 我相当闷闷不乐，所以没有怎么参与。

sentences.c: The officer refused to let his men take part in the operation.
sentences.cn: 这军官拒绝让他的士兵参加这项军事行动。

sentences.c: Mrs. Kerr was too upset to take part in a reconstruction of her ordeal.
sentences.cn: 克尔夫人过于悲痛以至不能参加对她受折磨场面的再现。

trans.cn: 火锅：指由肉类和蔬菜炖煮而成的一道菜。
火盆：指用于取暖或烹饪的火盆。

sentences.c: Let me see, how about hot pot?
sentences.cn: 我想想，吃火锅怎么样？

sentences.c: I think it's time for hot pot!
sentences.cn: 我想现在是吃火锅的时间了！

sentences.c: Is it the chocolate hot pot?
sentences.cn: 这是巧克力火锅吗？

trans.cn: 依赖于：需要某人或某物的支持、帮助等。
取决于：由某种因素决定或决策。
信任、依靠：对某人或某物有信心。

sentences.c: Wage rates depend on levels of productivity.
sentences.cn: 工资水平取决于生产量的多寡。

sentences.c: He was the sort of person you could depend on.
sentences.cn: 他这个人你是可以信赖的。

sentences.c: Can you depend on her version of what happened?
sentences.cn: 你能相信她对所发生事情的描述吗？

trans.cn: 准时：按照预定的时间进行；不延误或提前。
按时：在规定的时间内完成；不延迟。

sentences.c: Don't worry, she'll be on time.
sentences.cn: 别担心，她会准时的。

sentences.c: You're bang on time, as usual.
sentences.cn: 你像往常一样，非常准时。

sentences.c: The bus came right on time.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车正好准时到达。

trans.cn: 伴郎：指新郎的男性朋友或亲戚，在婚礼仪式上与新郎站在一起并帮助他。

sentences.c: He's the best man for the job.
sentences.cn: 他是担任这项工作的最佳人选。

sentences.c: They've assigned their best man to the job.
sentences.cn: 他们指派了最优秀的人担任这项工作。

sentences.c: They made me their best man.
sentences.cn: 他们让我做男傧相！

trans.cn: 即使，尽管：表示在某种条件下，即使这种条件发生，也不会影响到另一个事实或结果。

sentences.c: Even if the amendment is passed it can be defeated judicially.
sentences.cn: 即使这项修正案获得了通过，它也有可能通过司法程序被否决。

sentences.c: Even if you have dark skin, you still need protection from the sun.
sentences.cn: 即使你皮肤黝黑，仍需要防晒。

sentences.c: Even if I had the talent to play tennis I couldn't stand the pressure.
sentences.cn: 即使我有打网球的天资，我也承受不了那种压力。

trans.cn: 放置，储存：将物品放置在容器或储藏室中；准备好以便以后使用。
忍受，容忍：在没有抱怨或报复的情况下忍受或容忍。
提名，推举：提名某人参选；推举某人担任职务。
提供，供应：使某物可用；尤指公开出售。
提供食宿：为某人提供食物和住所。
建造，竖立：建造或竖立某物。
展示，表现：展示某种特质或行为；尤指表现出勇敢的一面。
贡献，支付：提供某物作为贡献或支付。
增加，提高：增加某物的数量或程度；尤指增加赌注。
取得，达到：取得或达到某种成绩或目标。

sentences.c: Can anyone put up bail for you?
sentences.cn: 有人保释你吗？

sentences.c: She put up with it all stoically.
sentences.cn: 她坚忍地承受了这一切。

sentences.c: He put up a stout defence in court.
sentences.cn: 他在法庭上进行了顽强的辩护。

synos.cn: 提供；建造；举起；推举，提名；供给…住宿

trans.cn: 继续做，从事：指继续进行某项活动、追求或运营。
坚持，不顾困难或挫折：指尽管有阻碍或打击，仍然继续进行。
行为或言谈愚蠢、兴奋或不当：指表现出愚蠢、兴奋或不适当的行为或言谈。

sentences.c: That's it, carry on!
sentences.cn: 对啦！继续！

sentences.c: I hope to carry on for an indeterminate period.
sentences.cn: 我希望在一段不确定的时间内这样继续下去。

sentences.c: Carry on until you get to the junction, then turn left.
sentences.cn: 继续往前走到交叉路口，然后向左转。

sentences.c: Are they coming as well?
sentences.cn: 他们也来吗？

sentences.c: Then they actually beat her up as well.
sentences.cn: 然后他们事实上也毒打了她一顿。

sentences.c: We might as well finish up the cake.
sentences.cn: 我们倒不如把蛋糕吃完。

trans.cn: 好像，仿佛：用于表示某事物或行为看起来像是另一种情况，但实际上并非如此。

sentences.c: I don't feel as if I belong here.
sentences.cn: 我在这里感觉格格不入。

sentences.c: I felt as if my heart had stopped.
sentences.cn: 我觉得好像我的心都不跳了。

sentences.c: I ate as if there was no tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我狼吞虎咽地吃着。

sentences.c: A group of people made a circle around the Pentagon.
sentences.cn: 一群人绕五角大楼围成了一个圈。

sentences.c: The Pentagon has expressed surprise at these allegations.
sentences.cn: 五角大楼对这些指控表示了惊讶。

sentences.c: The Pentagon has said it will give preference to companies with which it can do business electronically.
sentences.cn: 五角大楼已经宣布它将优先考虑能与之进行电子交易的公司。

sentences.c: I'm definitely going to get in touch with these people.
sentences.cn: 我一定要联系上这些人。

sentences.c: I'm trying to get in touch with Jane. Do you have her number?
sentences.cn: 我正在设法和简取得联系。你有她的电话号码吗？

sentences.c: How can a student get in touch with the speaker?
sentences.cn: 学生如何与演讲人取得联系？

trans.cn: 紧紧抓住，坚持：指紧紧抓住或坚持某物或某种状态。
稍等，别挂断：指在电话或对话中稍等一下，不要挂断。

sentences.c: Hang on—I'm not quite ready.
sentences.cn: 请稍候—我还没准备好呢。

sentences.c: Can you just hang on a sec?
sentences.cn: 您能稍等一下吗？

sentences.c: Hang on a minute—I'm lost.
sentences.cn: 等一下，我没弄明白。

synos.cn: 坚持下去；不挂断；握住不放

trans.cn: 和，以及，还有：用于连接两个或更多的事物，表示它们都是同等重要的或同样存在的。

sentences.c: He's got plenty of brains as well as brawn.
sentences.cn: 他四肢发达，头脑也不简单。

sentences.c: He plays classical music, as well as pop and jazz.
sentences.cn: 他演奏流行音乐和爵士乐，同时也演奏古典音乐。

sentences.c: She doesn't play as well as her sister.
sentences.cn: 她演奏得不如她姐姐。

trans.cn: 被称为：作为某个名称或称号而被广泛认知或接受。

sentences.c: This design came to be known as the Oriental style.
sentences.cn: 这种设计后来被称为东方风格。

sentences.c: It will be known as the sedan car at the time.
sentences.cn: 当时，它将被称为轿车。

sentences.c: This day came to be known as the Day of Silence.
sentences.cn: 这一天被称为是“沉默日”。

synos.cn: 被称为；被认为是；以…著称

trans.cn: 摇滚乐：一种起源于20世纪50年代的美国流行音乐风格，融合了布鲁斯、乡村音乐和节奏布鲁斯等元素，具有强烈的节奏感和激情四溢的表演风格。

sentences.c: Rock 'n' roll had entered a period of stasis.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐已经进入了一个停滞期。

sentences.c: I am thinking back now to when I first started listening to rock 'n' roll and I remember my father saying it was a bad influence on us.
sentences.cn: 我现在回想第一次听摇滚乐的时候，还记得父亲说它对我们有不好的影响。

sentences.c: Good, because the point I was going to make is that the sound of rock 'n' roll changed over the years.
sentences.cn: 这很好，因为我想说的是，摇滚的声音自近些年来已经改变了。

trans.cn: 习惯于：适应某种情况或行为方式。

sentences.c: This type of surgery could even be used to extract cancerous growths.
sentences.cn: 这类外科手术甚至可以用来摘除恶性肿瘤。

sentences.c: It cannot be used to bond wood to metal.
sentences.cn: 这不能把木料粘贴在金属上。

sentences.c: The money will be used to repair faulty equipment.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱将被用来修理出故障的设备。

trans.cn: 换句话说：用于引出一个陈述，以不同的方式重复已经说过的内容，通常是以更简单或更准确的方式。

sentences.c: In other words, is sleep learning possible?
sentences.cn: 换句话说，睡眠学习是有可能的吗？

sentences.c: In other words, the rich get richer.
sentences.cn: 换句话说，富人越来越富。

sentences.c: In other words, keep your brain busy and working.
sentences.cn: 换句话说，让你的大脑保持忙碌和运作。

trans.cn: 有时候：偶尔发生的情况或行为。

sentences.c: Their pranks are amusing at times.
sentences.cn: 他们的恶作剧有时很逗。

sentences.c: It has exported inflation at times.
sentences.cn: 它有时将通货膨胀引入他国。

sentences.c: Her attitude is imperious at times.
sentences.cn: 她的态度有时很专横。

trans.cn: 在某些方面：表示在某些方面存在相似或相同之处。

sentences.c: In some ways, the official opening is a formality.
sentences.cn: 从某些方面来说，官方开幕仪式是个形式而已。

sentences.c: Tom was in some ways a younger clone of his handsome father.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在某些方面是他英俊父亲年轻时的翻版。

sentences.c: In some ways, I am quite different from my sister.
sentences.cn: 在某些方面，我和我妹妹很不一样。

synos.cn: 在某些方面；在某种程度上

trans.cn: 天鹅湖：一部由彼得·伊里奇·柴可夫斯基创作的古典芭蕾舞剧，讲述了一个关于爱情和魔法的故事。

sentences.c: 'Swan Lake' is one of the great classical ballets.
sentences.cn: 《天鹅湖》是一部伟大的古典芭蕾舞剧。

sentences.c: He was famous for writing the music for the ballet Swan Lake in 1876.
sentences.cn: 他因1876年为芭蕾舞剧《天鹅湖》谱写了音乐而闻名。

sentences.c: One of the most beloved ballets is “Swan Lake.”
sentences.cn: 最为人们喜爱的芭蕾舞剧是“天鹅湖”。

trans.cn: 来回地，来来回回地，反复地：指来回移动或反复进行某种活动。

sentences.c: He paced back and forth.
sentences.cn: 他来回踱步。

sentences.c: In Taipei buildings rocked back and forth.
sentences.cn: 在台北，建筑物前后摇晃着。

sentences.c: The windshield wipers clacked back and forth.
sentences.cn: 挡风玻璃上的刮雨器来回刮着，发出咔嚓声。

trans.cn: 踢踏舞：通过带有硬底或带有踏板的鞋子发出清晰的敲击声来进行的一种舞蹈，可以表达节奏和音乐。

sentences.c: The other one, Cameron 's movie [Elizabethtown], she starts tap dancing.
sentences.cn: 另一部影片，卡梅隆的(《伊丽莎白镇》)，主角开始跳踢踏舞。

sentences.c: I'm envisaging a combination of comedy tap dancing and baby giggling (perhaps recorded using an auto-tune device).
sentences.cn: 我正在设想喜剧演员的踢踏舞和婴儿咯咯的笑声(或者是通过自动调音设备录制的)的组合。

sentences.c: And we talked nutrition (cut back on sweet drinks, fast food, eating in front of the TV), and we talked exercise (how about tap dancing, soccer, swimming lessons?)
sentences.cn: 然后我们谈到了营养饮食(少喝含糖过多的饮料，少吃快餐，不要在电视机前吃东西)，然后我们谈到了锻炼(舞蹈、美式足球、以及游泳课怎么样？)

trans.cn: 盯着看：持续地看或凝视某物。

sentences.c: One cannot fix one's eyes on the commonest natural production without finding food for a rambling fancy.
sentences.cn: 一个人注视一个最普通的自然产品不会不发现一种不著边际想像的食物。

trans.cn: 有点儿：表示程度上的某种程度，有点儿。

sentences.c: It's a funky sort of rhythm.
sentences.cn: 这是一种音低节奏强的旋律。

sentences.c: She's a sensible sort of person.
sentences.cn: 她属于那种通情达理的人。

sentences.c: He's a reasonable sort of person.
sentences.cn: 他是那种通情达理的人。

trans.cn: 追溯到：指某事物的起源或制作时间可以追溯到过去的某个时间。

sentences.c: The tradition could date back to 300 BC.
sentences.cn: 这一传统可追溯到公元前300年。

sentences.c: Wiktionary tells us that the origin of the expression "no strings attached" may date back to ancient times.
sentences.cn: 维基词典指出，“无附加条件”这一说法的起源可以追溯到古代。

sentences.c: The origins of glass date back to 3,500 BC but it wasn't until the Roman Empire, 2,000 years ago, that the art of glass-blowing and the practical uses of glass became more widespread.
sentences.cn: 玻璃的起源可以追溯到公元前3500年，但直到2000年前的罗马帝国，吹制玻璃的艺术和玻璃的实际使用才变得更加广泛。

trans.cn: 试用：测试某物以查看其工作情况或是否合适，或者参加试镜以获得某个角色或职位。

sentences.c: He got to try out all the new software.
sentences.cn: 他得以试用了所有的新软件。

sentences.c: I'm always pleased to try out a new variety.
sentences.cn: 我一直乐于尝试新的品种。

sentences.c: Some owners wish they could try out the car in a race track.
sentences.cn: 一些车主希望他们能在一条跑道上试一下那辆车。

trans.cn: 屏息以待：急切期待某事的发生，但通常带有一定的不确定性或怀疑。
空调：一种用于调节空气湿度和温度的设备，通常用于给建筑物或车辆提供洗涤空气的装置。

sentences.c: The air conditioner was just what the Brooklyn printer needed.
sentences.cn: 这种空调设备正好是布鲁克林印刷机所需要的。

sentences.c: There's no denying that a good air conditioner can beat the heat.
sentences.cn: 不可否认的是一台好的空调设备可以抵御炎热。

sentences.c: Which one costs me more gas? Using an Air conditioner or open windows?
sentences.cn: 哪个更费油？开空调还是开车窗？

synos.cn: 空调设备；[建]空气调节机

trans.cn: 增加体重：指增加体重，使身体变得丰满。

sentences.c: Nadja had to fill out forms surrendering all rights to her property.
sentences.cn: 纳贾不得不填写表格，放弃对她财产的所有权利。

sentences.c: If you want to join the Music Club, fill out the form, please.
sentences.cn: 如果你想加入音乐俱乐部，请填写这张表格。

sentences.c: Will you please go to the New Accounts counter to open your account while I fill out your receipt?
sentences.cn: 请您到新开帐户柜台去开立您的帐户，同时，我在这里为您填写收据，好吗？

trans.cn: 水上滑雪：一项在被摩托艇拖曳的情况下，乘坐水上滑雪板进行的运动。

sentences.c: Water skiing is an exciting sport.
sentences.cn: 滑水是一项很刺激的运动。

sentences.c: One night, Gates walked through the door in a leg cast -- he had snapped his leg water skiing.
sentences.cn: 一天晚上，艾伦发现同住一间宿舍的盖茨进门时腿上竟打了石膏——原来他在滑水远动中弄折了脚。

sentences.c: He waved desperately to his companion, who had been water skiing for the last fifteen minutes.
sentences.cn: 他绝望地向他的伙伴挥手，他的伙伴在过去的15分钟里一直在滑水。

sentences.c: They set sail with the first fair wind.
sentences.cn: 顺风一起他们就扬帆出航了。

sentences.c: He loaded his vessel with another cargo and set sail.
sentences.cn: 他又往他的船上装了一件货就启航了。

sentences.c: After the College Entrance Examination, we will bid farewell to each other and set sail for an unknown future.
sentences.cn: 高考结束后，我们将告别彼此并启航驶向未知的未来。

trans.cn: 陷入麻烦或受到惩罚：指因某种行为或情况而陷入困境或受到不良后果。

sentences.c: A body's bound to get into trouble with 'em, sure.
sentences.cn: 肯定会遇上麻烦的。

sentences.c: Perhaps I shouldn't say that – I might get into trouble.
sentences.cn: 也许我不该说那些–我可能会遇到麻烦。

sentences.c: If you don't want to get into trouble, please don't leave out any small mistakes.
sentences.cn: 如果你不想惹麻烦，请不要漏掉任何小错误。

trans.cn: 朝着一个地方或物体的方向前进：指朝着某个地方或物体的方向前进。

sentences.c: So you did make it to America, after all.
sentences.cn: 这样你终究成功到达了美国。

sentences.c: He hadn't been able to make it to our dinner.
sentences.cn: 他没能如约参加我们的晚宴。

sentences.c: "I will make it to the top today," I thought to myself.
sentences.cn: “今天我一定要登上山顶。”我心想。

synos.cn: 赶上，找到；到达；及时赶到；（时间上）赶得及

sentences.c: Refugees run hither and thither in search of safety.
sentences.cn: 难民为寻找安全四处逃奔。

sentences.c: He ranges far and wide in search of inspiration for his paintings.
sentences.cn: 他四处漫步，寻找绘画的灵感。

sentences.c: They trekked from shop to shop in search of white knee-high socks.
sentences.cn: 他们疲惫地奔波于一家又一家商店，寻找高到膝盖的白色长筒袜。

sentences.c: King penguins in the Antarctic will be on the verge of dying out.
sentences.cn: 南极的帝企鹅将濒临灭绝。

sentences.c: Krill fishing in the Antarctic has worsened the pollution of the pristine waters.
sentences.cn: 南极的磷虾捕捞加剧了对原始水域的污染。

sentences.c: The Antarctic is the world's last great wilderness.
sentences.cn: 南极洲是世界上最後一個大荒原。

etymology.d: 前缀anti-, 相对。Arctic, 北极。

trans.cn: 谋生：赚取生活所需的钱。

sentences.c: It's not a very secure way to make a living.
sentences.cn: 以此谋生终非长久之计。

sentences.c: Many farmers have to depend on subsidies to make a living wage.
sentences.cn: 许多农民不得不依靠补助来维持基本的生活需要。

sentences.c: If I can't make a living at painting, at least I can teach someone else to paint.
sentences.cn: 如果我不能以画画谋生的话，至少我能教别人画画。

trans.cn: 小心，当心：保持警惕或警觉，保持警戒状态。

sentences.c: Watch out! There's a car coming!
sentences.cn: 小心！汽车来了！

sentences.c: "Watch out!" he hollered.
sentences.cn: “小心！”他大喊一声。

sentences.c: You have to watch out because there are land mines all over the place.
sentences.cn: 你必须要小心，因为这里到处都是地雷。

sentences.c: All at once she lost her temper.
sentences.cn: 她突然大发脾气。

sentences.c: All at once there was someone knocking on the door.
sentences.cn: 突然有人敲门。

sentences.c: She wanted to laugh and weep all at once.
sentences.cn: 她哭笑不得。

trans.cn: 抬起，拾起：指从地面或其他位置抬起或拾起物体。
收拾，整理：指整理、清理或收拾物品或空间。
学会，掌握：指通过学习或实践获得新的知识、技能或能力。
接人，搭载：指去接人或搭载乘客。
增加，提高：指增加数量、水平或程度。
恢复，改善：指情况、状况或状态的恢复或改善。

sentences.c: Will you pick up all your toys?
sentences.cn: 把你的玩具都收起来好不好？

sentences.c: We can pick up Mexican television.
sentences.cn: 我们可以接收到墨西哥电视。

sentences.c: She bent down to pick up her glove.
sentences.cn: 她俯身去捡手套。

trans.cn: 突然大受欢迎，迅速流行
脱下：指将衣物或鞋子从身上或脚上取下。
起飞：指飞机离开地面开始飞行。
脱离：指从某个地方或状态中解脱出来。
扣除：指以折扣的方式减去一部分。
模仿：指模仿某人或某物的行为或风格。

sentences.c: You can watch aircraft take off or land at close quarters.
sentences.cn: 你可以近距离地观看飞机起飞或降落。

sentences.c: How many days did you take off ?
sentences.cn: 你休了几天假？

sentences.c: The hairdresser asked me how much she should take off.
sentences.cn: 理发师问我头发剪多少。

trans.cn: 目前：表示现在，当前的状态。

sentences.c: I'm short of cash right now.
sentences.cn: 我眼下正缺钱。

sentences.c: He's not in the office right now.
sentences.cn: 他现在不在办公室。

sentences.c: I have a client with me right now.
sentences.cn: 我现在有个客户。

trans.cn: 弹跳：使用弹性绳索绑着身体从高处跳下的一种极限运动。

sentences.c: Adventurous travelers can go heli-skiing, paragliding and bungee jumping.
sentences.cn: 喜欢冒险的旅行者可以去高山滑雪、滑翔跳伞和蹦极跳。

sentences.c: If you're looking for the adventure of a lifetime, how about going bungee jumping off a helicopter into the crater of a live volcano?
sentences.cn: 如果你正在寻找一次一生难忘的冒险经历，那么来一场蹦极，从直升机上跳到活火山口怎么样？

sentences.c: You're going bungee jumping? Whatever next ?
sentences.cn: 你要去蹦极？还想干什么？

trans.cn: 为了做某事：表示为了达到某个目的或实现某个目标而采取的行动。

sentences.c: And that's why we wanted to come again but not only as travelers but in order to do something.
sentences.cn: 那也正是为什么我们还想再来的原因。 不过不仅仅是作为旅行者，而是为了做些身什么。

sentences.c: Try to figure out--try to imagine a historical context in which a human author is writing the story this way in order to do something socially in his own early community.
sentences.cn: 试着想像一个历史背景,那儿有一个作家如此讲故事,为了在他的早期团体中有社会性作为。

sentences.c: "The early bird catches the worm" means that you have to do something before others in order to be successful.
sentences.cn: “早起的鸟儿有虫吃”的意思是为了成功，你必须比别人早做一些事情。

trans.cn: 颠倒的：通常在上面的部分被翻转到下面。

sentences.c: The painting was hung upside down.
sentences.cn: 这幅画挂颠倒了。

sentences.c: The canoe floated upside down on the lake.
sentences.cn: 独木舟底朝天漂浮在湖面上。

sentences.c: Every pill made my insides turn upside down.
sentences.cn: 每片药都使我的胃翻江倒海。

trans.cn: 找到，发现：指通过查找或发现某物或某人。
增加，提高：指通过调节控制器来提高音量或强度。
查找，参考：指在书籍中查找或参考某个词语或事实。
翻开，翻过来：指将卡片或纸张翻到正面朝上。
出现，显露：指突然或意外地出现或被发现。
到达，露面：指按照约定或预期的时间或地点到达或出现。
发生，出现：指意外地或突然发生或出现。
改变航向：指船只改变航向。

sentences.c: It wouldn't be quite the thing to turn up in running gear.
sentences.cn: 穿着跑步的运动服出现在这场合可不大成体统。

sentences.c: Can you turn up the TV?
sentences.cn: 你能把电视机的声音调大点吗？

sentences.c: It's a fair bet that they won't turn up.
sentences.cn: 我敢打赌，他们不会出席。

synos.cn: 出现；发生；开大；发现；卷起；使仰卧

sentences.c: I stood in the driveway and watched him back out and pull away.
sentences.cn: 我站在车道上，看他把车倒出来然后开走了。

sentences.c: Gallo's message asked that whoever got her bottle should put their own message inside with hers and send it back out to sea.
sentences.cn: 加洛的漂流瓶里写着，无论谁捡到她的瓶子，都要把自己的留言和她的留言都放在里面，然后把它送回大海。

sentences.c: In the afternoon, they go back out, hoping for that buck.
sentences.cn: 下午，他们又回去了，渴望着那只雄鹿。

trans.cn: 传达，使理解：指使信息变得清晰或令人信服。
通过，穿过：指通过障碍物或困难。

sentences.c: Each play has a theme or central idea which the playwright hopes to get across through dialogue and action.
sentences.cn: 每个剧目都有一个主题或中心思想，剧作家希望通过对话和行为让人们理解这些主题或思想。

sentences.c: Your meaning didn't really get across.
sentences.cn: 你的意思并未真正为别人理解。

sentences.c: The bridge was destroyed so we couldn't get across the river.
sentences.cn: 大桥已经毁坏，我们无法过河了。

trans.cn: 相应地，类似地：与刚提到的事物有顺序上的关系。

sentences.c: There were cheers for each of the women as they spoke in turn.
sentences.cn: 女士们依次发言时，每一位都得到了喝彩。

sentences.c: Feeding each other in turn.
sentences.cn: 相互轮流喂食。

sentences.c: We look after him in turn.
sentences.cn: 我们依次照顾他。

trans.cn: 出现，爆发：指突然或猛烈地发生或出现。
逃脱，越狱：指从限制条件或困境中突破出来。
准备使用，拿出：指为行动或使用做准备。
展示，展开：指展示或展开某物。
分离，拆分：指从大量数据中分离出来。
发疹：指皮肤上突然出现疹子。

sentences.c: Every morning I would break out in a sweat.
sentences.cn: 每天早上我都会突然满身大汗。

sentences.c: The authorities have urged people to stock up on fuel in case hostilities break out.
sentences.cn: 当局已敦促人们储备燃料以防战争爆发。

sentences.c: A person who is allergic to cashews may break out in a rash when he consumes these nuts.
sentences.cn: 对腰果过敏的人吃了这些坚果可能会出疹子。

sentences.c: The thieves stole many things from the supermarket and were put into prison.
sentences.cn: 小偷们从超市偷了很多东西，被关进了监狱。

sentences.c: The giant did not kill Dick but put him into a prison which he had prepared for him.
sentences.cn: 巨人没有杀死迪克，而是把他关进了他为他准备的监狱。

sentences.c: Her husband was put into prison three days ago.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫三天前被抓进监狱了。

trans.cn: 在场，保持距离：指在某地出现；或者指保持距离或独立。
准备行动：指准备行动或做好准备。
忠诚，支持：指保持忠诚或支持某人/某事。

sentences.c: He mistakenly believed that his family would stand by him.
sentences.cn: 他误以为他的家人会支持他。

sentences.c: He would not stand by and let his pet project be killed off.
sentences.cn: 他不会袖手旁观，任由自己钟爱的项目被否决。

sentences.c: How can you stand by and see him accused of something he didn't do?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能眼睁睁看着他遭人诬陷而袖手旁观呢？

phrases.cn: 待命；待命状态；严阵以待

synos.cn: 支持；袖手旁观；准备；站在旁边

trans.cn: 在路上：在直接前往的路线上。

sentences.c: On one's way (to s. p. )
sentences.cn: 在去…的路上。

sentences.c: On one's way back on her way back Jane said nothing.
sentences.cn: 在回来的路上珍妮一句话也没有说。

sentences.c: There is a way of encountering error while on one's way to the truth.
sentences.cn: 在追求真理的道路上出错的机会原是常有的。

trans.cn: 使倒塌或破碎：将物体引起倒塌或破碎。
分解：将化合物分解为更简单的物质。
拆开：为了存储或运输而拆开，以便以后重新组装。
停止运行：因为损坏或磨损而停止运行。
力量或活力衰竭：力量或活力减弱或消失。
精神或情绪崩溃：因为心理或情绪压力而崩溃。
放弃抵抗：失去决心或放弃抵抗。
（马匹）严重受伤：马匹的蹄关节的支持韧带或骨骼严重受伤。
分析或细分：进行分析或细分。

sentences.c: It also means there are no moving parts to break down.
sentences.cn: 这也意味着没有活动零部件可拆卸。

sentences.c: Many people were expecting (that) the peace talks would break down.
sentences.cn: 许多人预料和平谈判会破裂。

sentences.c: She made numerous efforts to break down colour lines in public places.
sentences.cn: 她为打破公共场所的种族界限做出过许多努力。

synos.cn: 分解；发生故障；失败；毁掉；制服

trans.cn: 用完，耗尽：指某物完全被使用或消耗殆尽。
耗尽，用尽：指某种资源或能力被完全消耗或用尽。
失去，丧失：指某种特质、品质或能力的丧失。

sentences.c: We've nearly run out of paper. Do you think there's enough for today?
sentences.cn: 我们的纸差不多已用完了。你看今天够用吗？

sentences.c: I've run out of matches.
sentences.cn: 我的火柴用完了。

sentences.c: They have run out of ideas.
sentences.cn: 他们已经想不出办法了。

trans.cn: 交通堵塞：道路上长时间停滞或缓慢行驶的车辆排队现象。

sentences.c: We were stuck in a traffic jam.
sentences.cn: 我们遇上了交通阻塞。

sentences.c: She sat in the car, silently fuming at the traffic jam.
sentences.cn: 她坐在汽车里，心中对交通堵塞感到十分恼火。

sentences.c: The traffic jam soon cleared once the offending vehicle had been removed.
sentences.cn: 肇事车辆一经移走，交通拥堵现象很快就消除了。

trans.cn: 厌烦的：指对某事物感到无聊、恼怒或失望，尤其是因为经历了太长时间。

sentences.c: I'm so fed up I could scream!
sentences.cn: 我烦透了，非大喊大叫不可！

sentences.c: I'm fed up with waiting for her.
sentences.cn: 我等她等烦了。

sentences.c: Jenny was fed up. She wanted out.
sentences.cn: 珍妮厌倦了。她想要退出。

sentences.c: My first job didn't work out.
sentences.cn: 我的第一份工作干得不好。

sentences.c: What if this doesn't work out?
sentences.cn: 如果这行不通怎么办呢？

sentences.c: I work out at the gym most days.
sentences.cn: 我多数日子都在健身俱乐部锻炼身体。

synos.cn: 解决；算出；实现；制定出；消耗完；弄懂

trans.cn: 依赖：指信任、相信或期望某人或某物能提供所需的支持、帮助或资源。
依靠：指依赖某人或某物来实现目标、解决问题或取得成功。
信任：指对某人或某物有信心，相信其能够做出正确的判断或行为。

sentences.c: It would be rash to rely on such evidence.
sentences.cn: 依靠这样的证据太轻率了。

sentences.c: Lions rely on stealth when hunting.
sentences.cn: 狮子捕食全凭偷袭。

sentences.c: I rely on you to set a good example.
sentences.cn: 我指望你来树立一个好榜样。

sentences.c: An air hostess came by and explained the situation.
sentences.cn: 一位空中小姐过来解释了情况。

sentences.c: An air hostess was arrested and charged with drug smuggling.
sentences.cn: 一位空姐被抓了起来，并被指控走私毒品。

sentences.c: The air hostess said, "The girl needs help."
sentences.cn: 空姐说：“这个女孩需要帮助。”

trans.cn: 停下来，停车：将车辆停下来或停车。
制止，斥责：制止某人的行为或斥责某人。
停止，中断：突然停止或中断某事物的进行。
迎头赶上，赶上：在比赛中迎头赶上其他人。

sentences.c: The hook reached the water, and the man tried to pull up the hook .
sentences.cn: 吊钩到了水里，那人就试着去把它拉上来。

sentences.c: It's a long pull up to the summit.
sentences.cn: 登上山顶要攀爬很久。

sentences.c: He waited several minutes for a car to pull up alongside.
sentences.cn: 他等了几分钟等一辆车停靠在旁边。

trans.cn: 拔(撤离, 折叠的大张插页, 飞机进场重新飞起)
撤退或退出：从某个地方、组织或活动中撤退或退出。
拔出或取出：从某个位置或容器中拔出或取出某物。
停止参与或退出：停止参与某个计划、项目或活动，或退出某个组织或协议。

sentences.c: I like the pop you get when you pull out a cork.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢你拔出瓶塞时弄出的那“砰”的一声。

sentences.c: France was going to pull out of NATO.
sentences.cn: 法国准备退出北大西洋公约组织。

sentences.c: The World Bank should pull out of the project.
sentences.cn: 世界银行应该退出这个项目。

synos.cn: 离开，撤离；拔出；渡过难关；恢复健康；折叠的大张插页；飞机进场重新飞起

trans.cn: 到目前为止：表示某个特定时间点之前的情况或范围。

sentences.c: What have you found so far?
sentences.cn: 迄今为止，你发现了什么？

sentences.c: It's been quiet so far.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止还是安静的。

sentences.c: So far eight workers have been killed.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止已有8名员工遇难。

etymology.d: 组合于[[so]] + [[far]]. 参见荷兰语[[zover|zo ver]].

trans.cn: 发生、举行：指某件事情发生或某个活动举行。

sentences.c: She wanted Randy's wedding to take place quickly.
sentences.cn: 她想让兰迪的婚礼马上举行。

sentences.c: The meeting should take place on the fifth of May.
sentences.cn: 会议应于5月5日举行。

sentences.c: Elections take place every year.
sentences.cn: 每年都进行各项选举。

trans.cn: 一氧化碳：一种无色、无味、非常有毒的气体，化学式为CO，它是由碳或碳化合物不完全燃烧的产物之一。

sentences.c: CO is the formula for carbon monoxide.
sentences.cn: CO是一氧化碳的分子式。

sentences.c: The limit for carbon monoxide is 4.5 per cent of the exhaust gas.
sentences.cn: 尾气中一氧化碳的排放量限制在4.5% 以下。

sentences.c: Both nicotine and carbon monoxide inhaled with cigarette smoking have been incriminated as causative factors.
sentences.cn: 与香烟一起吸入的尼古丁和一氧化碳已经被指控为诱发性因素。

trans.cn: 烟消云散：被烧毁或消失。

sentences.c: The pressure in the cylinders would go up in proportion to the boiler pressure.
sentences.cn: 汽缸内的压力会与锅炉的压力成比例上升。

sentences.c: Prices will go up, I suppose.
sentences.cn: 我觉得物价将会上涨。

sentences.c: The slope increases as you go up the curve.
sentences.cn: 你顺着那条弯路往上走，坡度越来越大。

trans.cn: 通常情况下的：指在通常情况下的表现或平均水平。

sentences.c: Shares rose, on average, by 38%.
sentences.cn: 股值平均上涨了38%。

sentences.c: 400 people a year die of this disease on average.
sentences.cn: 平均每年有400人死于这种疾病。

sentences.c: On average each report requires 1,000 hours to prepare.
sentences.cn: 平均每份报告需要1000个小时来准备。

trans.cn: 推迟：将某事推迟到以后的时间。
使困惑或不安：使某人感到困惑或不安。
使厌恶或排斥：使某人感到厌恶或排斥。
摆脱或脱掉：摆脱或脱掉某物。
欺骗或欺诈：通过欺骗或欺诈手段。

sentences.c: We've had to put off our wedding until September.
sentences.cn: 我们只得把婚期推迟到九月。

sentences.c: Mr. Bint has a propensity to put off decisions to the last minute.
sentences.cn: 宾特先生有一种将决定拖到最后一分钟的倾向。

sentences.c: Some believe this level of compensation is essentially a poison pill to put off any rival bidders.
sentences.cn: 一些人相信这种程度的补偿本质上是一个毒丸策略，旨在阻止一切竞标对手。

sentences.c: We're not taking on any new clients at present.
sentences.cn: 目前我们不接收新客户。

sentences.c: As things stand at present, he seems certain to win.
sentences.cn: 据目前情况看，他似乎胜券在握。

sentences.c: At present we're gleaning information from all sources.
sentences.cn: 目前我们正从所有渠道慢慢收集信息。

sentences.c: I was out of work at the time.
sentences.cn: 那时我失业了。

sentences.c: Many young people are out of work.
sentences.cn: 很多年轻人失业。

sentences.c: He's been out of work for six months.
sentences.cn: 他已经失业六个月了。

sentences.c: Be careful not to give away personal information like your ID numbers.
sentences.cn: 注意不要泄露你的身份证号码等个人信息。

sentences.c: We must decide what to keep and what to give away.
sentences.cn: 我们必须决定哪些该留、哪些该扔。

sentences.c: Give away any food you have on hand, or lock it up and give the key to the neighbours.
sentences.cn: 把你手头的食物分发送人，或锁藏起来，把钥匙交给邻居们。

trans.cn: 退出，退学：指从参与或成员资格中退出；尤指退出传统社会。

sentences.c: Her parents worried about her health and advised her to drop out of school, but Xu's answer was no.
sentences.cn: 她的父母担心她的健康，建议她退学，但她的回答是否定的。

sentences.c: Many students drop out of online courses because of the lack of teaching support.
sentences.cn: 许多学生因为缺乏教学支持而退出了在线课程。

sentences.c: Research suggests that children whose parents split up are more likely to drop out of high school.
sentences.cn: 研究显示父母离异的孩子更有可能在中学辍学。

trans.cn: 手机号码；行动电话；手提电话

sentences.c: My mobile phone is extremely useful.
sentences.cn: 我的手机极为有用。

sentences.c: He forgot the charger for his mobile phone.
sentences.cn: 他忘了带手机充电器。

sentences.c: We managed to raise him on his mobile phone.
sentences.cn: 我们打他的移动电话，总算找到了他。

trans.cn: 代表，象征：表示某事物代表或象征另一事物。
支持，拥护：表示对某人或某事物的支持或拥护。
忍受，容忍：表示能够忍受或容忍某事物。

sentences.c: What do two "ninths" meeting together stand for?
sentences.cn: 两个“九”聚在一起代表什么？

sentences.c: The new teacher won't stand for any nonsense.
sentences.cn: 这位新教师不会容忍任何无礼行为。

sentences.c: I was sitting in the stand for the first game.
sentences.cn: 我当时正坐在看台上观看首场比赛。

synos.cn: 代表；支持；象征；担任…的候选人

trans.cn: 由……组成：指由指定的事物或人组成。

sentences.c: The development will consist of 66 dwellings and a number of offices.
sentences.cn: 新建楼区将由66栋住房和一些办公用房组成。

sentences.c: The lungs consist of millions of tiny air sacs.
sentences.cn: 肺包含数百万个小肺泡。

sentences.c: The division will consist of two tank companies and one infantry company.
sentences.cn: 该师将由两个坦克连和一个步兵连组成。

trans.cn: 显眼，突出：以与周围不同的方式引人注目或突出。
脱颖而出：在某个群体或环境中表现出色，引起注意。
突出，凸出：以凸出的方式出现，与周围形成对比。
坚持立场，抵抗：坚定地保持自己的立场或抵抗外界的压力。

sentences.c: You think no one can stand out against you—that's what you think.
sentences.cn: 你以为没有人能站出来反对你——你就是这么想的。

sentences.c: Four points stand out as being more important than the rest.
sentences.cn: 有四点比其余各点更为重要。

sentences.c: They took no notice of him, he did not stand out, he was in no way remarkable.
sentences.cn: 他们对他不予理会，他不出众，一点也不优秀。

synos.cn: 突出；站出来；坚持到底；坚决反对

sentences.c: We'll go as long as the weather is good.
sentences.cn: 只要天气好我们就去。

sentences.c: There's a list of repairs as long as your arm.
sentences.cn: 有一份长得要命的修理单。

sentences.c: As long as you're happy, that's all that matters.
sentences.cn: 只要你幸福，这就是最重要的事情。

trans.cn: 逐渐习惯于，适应：指逐渐适应某种新的环境、情况或习惯。

sentences.c: You quickly get used to using the brakes.
sentences.cn: 你很快会习惯用刹车。

sentences.c: You'll soon get used to the climate here.
sentences.cn: 你会很快习惯这儿的气候的。

sentences.c: You soon get used to the little difficulties.
sentences.cn: 你很快就会习惯这些小小的不便了。

trans.cn: 列队部署：将（一支军队）列队部署。
挺直（自己）到直立的姿势：作为尊严或愤怒的表达，挺直（自己）到直立的姿势。

sentences.c: You should draw up a plan or outline for the essay.
sentences.cn: 你应该为文章草拟个计划或提纲。

sentences.c: They agreed to establish a working party to draw up a formal agreement.
sentences.cn: 他们同意成立一个工作组来起草一份正式协议。

sentences.c: Draw up a list of the efficiencies to be promised.
sentences.cn: 列出一份承诺的效率清单。

trans.cn: 忍不住做某事：无法控制自己不去做某事，不由自主地去做某事。

sentences.c: "Can I help you?" a shop assistant asked.
sentences.cn: “我能帮你吗？”一个店员问道。

sentences.c: The shop assistant is going back to find the right size shoe.
sentences.cn: 店员回去寻找合适尺码的鞋。

sentences.c: What does your mother do? She's a shop assistant. What does your father do?
sentences.cn: 你的母亲是做什么的？她是一个店员。你的父亲是做什么的？

trans.cn: 承担责任并掌控某事：指在某个事务或项目中承担责任并掌控全局。

sentences.c: Dr. Smith is assigned to take charge of the department.
sentences.cn: 史密斯大夫受命负责这个部门。

sentences.c: Challenge yourself and take charge of your own growth in your career.
sentences.cn: 挑战自己，为自己的职业发展负责。

sentences.c: At first she tried to take charge of the meeting but I soon put her in her place.
sentences.cn: 起初她很想主持会议，但我很快就把她轰下来了。

trans.cn: 组成，构成：将不同的部分组合在一起形成整体。
弥补，弥合：补偿或弥补某种缺陷或遗漏。
化妆，打扮：为了角色或特定场合而进行外貌的准备。
编造，虚构：创造或编写一个故事或情节。
和解，言归于好：结束争吵或冲突，恢复友好关系。

sentences.c: Muslims make up 55% of the population.
sentences.cn: 穆斯林占人口的55%。

sentences.c: Everyone gets a chance to make up tests.
sentences.cn: 每个人都有一次补考的机会。

sentences.c: Women make up 56% of the student numbers.
sentences.cn: 女生占学生人数的56%。

trans.cn: 填写（表格等）：指通过提供所需信息来完成（如填写支票）。
理解，弄清：指找到或理解某事的含义。
形成观点或想法：指对某事形成观点或想法。
把……描绘成：指将某人/某物描述成某种状态。
假装是真的：指假装某事是真实的。
详细描述：指详细地描述某事。
辨认，看清：指费力地辨认或看清某事。
进展，处境：指在某种情况或环境中的进展或处境。
发生性行为：指进行性行为。

sentences.c: I can't make out what she wants.
sentences.cn: 我不明白她想要什么。

sentences.c: She's not as rich as people make out.
sentences.cn: 她并不像人们说的那样富有。

sentences.c: I couldn't make out what she was saying.
sentences.cn: 我听不清她在说什么。

synos.cn: 理解；辨认出；说明；填写；设法应付

trans.cn: 大声说话；自由表达意见

sentences.c: I'm quite deaf – you'll have to speak up.
sentences.cn: 我很聋–你得大声点说。

sentences.c: Please speak up—we can't hear you at the back.
sentences.cn: 请大点声讲—我们在后面听不见。

sentences.c: Speak up--just a trifle louder.
sentences.cn: 大点声——再大点声。

trans.cn: 起身坐起：从躺着的姿势转为坐着的姿势。
坐得笔直：保持坐姿时背部挺直。
注意，警觉：表现出兴趣、警觉或惊讶。
熬夜：在通常的睡觉时间之后仍然保持清醒。

sentences.c: Even the most apathetic students are beginning to sit up and listen.
sentences.cn: 即使最漠不关心的学生都开始坐直身子听了。

sentences.c: She started to sit up, grimaced, and sank back weakly against the pillow.
sentences.cn: 她开始坐起来，痛苦地皱着脸，又虚弱地靠回到枕头上。

sentences.c: The patient was but poorly able to sit up.
sentences.cn: 病人仅能勉强坐起来。

trans.cn: 相信……的存在：对某事物的存在有信心或信任。
相信……的价值或好处：对某事物的价值或好处有信任。
相信某人的善良或能力：对某人的善良或能力有信任。

sentences.c: They don't believe in marriage.
sentences.cn: 他们不相信婚姻。

sentences.c: I don't believe in ghosts.
sentences.cn: 我不相信有鬼。

sentences.c: Do you believe in magic?
sentences.cn: 你相信巫术吗？

trans.cn: 把…翻过来；翻阅；发动；移交给；营业额达到；反复考虑
翻转：将物体从一个位置转到另一个位置。
交接：将某物交给他人负责。
翻倒：使物体从正立位置变为倒立位置。
翻动：翻动或翻转物体的一部分。

sentences.c: The scandal took a new turn over the weekend.
sentences.cn: 这一丑闻在周末时发生了新的变化。

sentences.c: A supermarket will turn over its stock very rapidly.
sentences.cn: 超级市场的货物周转得很快。

sentences.c: The government did an about-turn over nuclear energy.
sentences.cn: 政府对核能的态度来了个180度的大转变。

phrases.cn: 年营业额，年成交量；年总生物量

synos.cn: 移交给；翻阅；把…翻过来；发动；营业额达到；反复考虑

trans.cn: 以金钱或其他方式回报；报答

sentences.c: I need to pay off all my debts before I leave the country.
sentences.cn: 我得在离开该国前偿清所有债务。

sentences.c: It would take him the rest of his life to pay off that loan.
sentences.cn: 还清那笔贷款将花费他的余生。

sentences.c: The firm will be able to pay off its debts and still turn a modest profit.
sentences.cn: 该公司将能够还清其债务，而且还会稍有赢利。

synos.cn: 付清；取得成功；贿赂；报复

trans.cn: 跟上：与他人保持相同的进度或水平，在比赛、竞争等中与他人保持平衡。
跟进：持续了解最新信息。
保持联系：继续与某人保持交流。

sentences.c: I can't keep up with all the changes.
sentences.cn: 我并非所有的变化都能跟得上。

sentences.c: She did not bother to keep up with the news.
sentences.cn: 她不愿操心去了解新闻。

sentences.c: She likes to keep up with the latest fashions.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢赶时髦。

trans.cn: 以防万一：作为预防措施，以防某种事件发生。
如果：表示假设情况下的条件。

sentences.c: In case you should need any help, here's my number.
sentences.cn: 万一你需要帮助的话，这是我的电话号码。

sentences.c: I'll stay around in case you need me.
sentences.cn: 我就待在这儿，也许你用得着我。

sentences.c: You'd better take the keys in case I'm out.
sentences.cn: 你最好带上钥匙以防我不在家。

trans.cn: 个人简历：一份个人的职业生涯和资历简介，通常由求职者准备，用于申请职位。

sentences.c: However, if you are a very experienced professional writing a curriculum vitae, it can be 2 to 3 pages.
sentences.cn: 但是如果你有相当丰富的专业经验，那就要另当别论了，你的简历可以有2至3页；

sentences.c: His curriculum vitae counts 20 books and 130 articles, plus another 19 volumes that he edited or co-authored.
sentences.cn: 他的履历囊括了20本书、130篇文章，19册编辑合著的作品。

sentences.c: The proposal response document includes this resource model along with names of candidates and their curriculum vitae.
sentences.cn: 提案响应文档中包含有资源模型，并附有候选者的姓名和他们的简历。

etymology.d: curriculum, 流动。vitae, 生命，词源同vital.

trans.cn: 由于，因为：表示某事发生的原因或原因结果关系。

sentences.c: The mare is due to foal today.
sentences.cn: 母马今天要下崽了。

sentences.c: The accident was due to excessive speed.
sentences.cn: 事故的原因在于速度过快。

sentences.c: They arrived late due to a motorway holdup.
sentences.cn: 因为高速公路上堵车，他们迟到了。

trans.cn: 此外，另外：表示除了已经提到的事物之外，还有其他事物。

sentences.c: There is, in addition, one further point to make.
sentences.cn: 此外，还有一点要说。

sentences.c: In addition to headaches, you may develop stomach ulcers as well.
sentences.cn: 除了头痛，你还可能患上胃溃疡。

sentences.c: In addition to being a bagger, he's worked at a fast-food restaurant.
sentences.cn: 除了装袋的工作外，他还在一家速食店打工。

sentences.c: The company is to lay off 1,520 workers as part of a restructuring.
sentences.cn: 作为改组的一部分，这家公司将解雇1520名工人。

sentences.c: Lay off me will you—it's nothing to do with me.
sentences.cn: 别找我好不好—这事与我无关。

sentences.c: I think you'd better lay off fatty foods for a while.
sentences.cn: 我认为你最好暂时别吃高脂食物。

trans.cn: 在一定程度上：表示某种情况或观点在一定程度上是正确的或有效的。

sentences.c: That's true, to a certain extent.
sentences.cn: 在一定程度上的确如此。

sentences.c: To a certain extent , we are all responsible for this tragic situation.
sentences.cn: 我们都在一定程度上对这悲惨的局面负有责任。

sentences.c: Mayor Anderson said those feelings were justified to a certain extent.
sentences.cn: 安德森市长说，这些感觉在一定程度上是合理的。

synos.cn: 在一定程度上；在某种程度上

trans.cn: 突出，凸显：通过对比使某物显得突出或凸显。
补偿，抵消：用于抵消或补偿某种不利或不平衡的情况。
出发，启程：开始进行一段旅程或行程。

sentences.c: We finished loading and set off.
sentences.cn: 我们装完货物就出发了。

sentences.c: We set off at a smart pace.
sentences.cn: 我们快步出发了。

sentences.c: They set off at a leisurely pace.
sentences.cn: 他们步态悠闲地出发了。

synos.cn: 出发；引起；动身；使爆炸；抵销；分开

trans.cn: 习惯于：适应某种环境、情况或习惯，使自己变得熟悉或适应于某种事物。

sentences.c: The staff in the company can help new members be accustomed to the life there.
sentences.cn: 公司的工作人员会帮助新进成员习惯那里的生活。

sentences.c: Web authors might be accustomed to specifying target="_new" to specify that a link opens in a new window.
sentences.cn: Web 程序开发员可能已经习惯了用 target="_new" 规定链接打开新的窗口。

sentences.c: This search results page is also different than what you may be accustomed to from the other support pages.
sentences.cn: 搜索结果页面也不同于您所熟悉的其他支持页面。

trans.cn: 倾向于：指某人或某事有偏向或倾向于做某事或具有某种特征。
照顾，处理：指照顾或照料某人或某物。

sentences.c: I tend to work in bursts.
sentences.cn: 我的工作劲头往往是一阵一阵的。

sentences.c: Morals tend to be deeply ingrained.
sentences.cn: 道德观念往往是根深蒂固的。

sentences.c: Women tend to live longer than men.
sentences.cn: 女人往往比男人长寿。

synos.cn: 趋向；注意；易于；有…的倾向

trans.cn: 作为一个整体：表示涉及某事物的所有部分的陈述。

sentences.c: His abilities are not reflective of the team as a whole.
sentences.cn: 他的能力并不代表整个队的水平。

sentences.c: "As a whole," she muses, "the `organized church' turns me off."
sentences.cn: “总的来说，”她若有所思地说，“‘组织严密的教会’让我厌烦。”

sentences.c: The rich benefited from the reforms, not the country as a whole.
sentences.cn: 富人而不是全体国民得益于这些改革。

trans.cn: 显现出来：指某物或某人从远处逐渐变得可见或清晰可辨。

sentences.c: And the last of the hidden kingdom will come into view.
sentences.cn: 然后，最后一个秘密王国将被尽收眼底了。

sentences.c: When the car goes around the corner, our house will come into view.
sentences.cn: 车绕过拐角时，我们的房子就在眼前了。

sentences.c: People instinctively notice other people right away when they come into view.
sentences.cn: 当别人进入到视野的时候，人们本能的会立马注意到他们。

trans.cn: 从前；很久很久以前；古时候
从前，很久以前：在过去的某个时候。

sentences.c: Once upon a time there was a princess...
sentences.cn: 从前有一位公主…

sentences.c: Once upon a time there was a beautiful princess.
sentences.cn: 从前，有一位美丽的公主。

sentences.c: Traditional stories make use of formulaic expressions like 'Once upon a time...'.
sentences.cn: 传统故事采用“从前…”一类的套语。

sentences.c: The 1980 volcanic eruption of Mount Saint Helens, for example, sent mud and debris into several tributaries of the Columbia River.
sentences.cn: 例如，1980年圣海伦斯火山爆发，导致哥伦比亚河的几条支流产生泥石流现象。

sentences.c: Around this time, the largest of these centers, Cuicuilco, was seriously affected by a volcanic eruption, with much of its agricultural land covered by lava.
sentences.cn: 大约在这个时候，这些中心中最大的 Cuicuilco 受到了火山喷发的严重影响，它的大部分农田被熔岩覆盖。

sentences.c: Why did the recent volcanic eruption in Iceland create so much ash?
sentences.cn: 为什么近期冰岛的火山爆发制造了这么多火山灰？

trans.cn: 遮挡：隐藏或覆盖某物，使其无法被看到、感觉到或听到。
排除思考：强迫自己不去思考某事。

sentences.c: Over the years she had tried to block out that part of her life.
sentences.cn: 多年来她努力想把她生命中的那一段经历从记忆中抹去。

sentences.c: We block out those things that cause stress and make us anxious.
sentences.cn: 我们将那些引起压力、使我们焦虑的事情拒之门外。

sentences.c: Instead, coniferous trees will invade the aspen grove's borders and increasingly block out sunlight needed by the aspens.
sentences.cn: 相反，针叶树将侵入白杨树林的边界，越来越多地遮挡白杨所需的阳光。

trans.cn: 从某一角度；从某一点上看；在某种程度上
以某种方式，在某种程度上：用于描述某种观点、方法或行为，可能不完全符合预期或常规，但在某种程度上是合理或有效的。

sentences.c: Well, that's good news in a way.
sentences.cn: 嗯，在某种程度上这是个好消息。

sentences.c: In a way, I appreciated the directness.
sentences.cn: 在某种程度上，我欣赏这种直率。

sentences.c: Her cowardice began to trouble her in a way.
sentences.cn: 她的怯懦在某种程度上开始困扰她。

synos.cn: 在某种程度上；有点儿；十分激动

trans.cn: 支持、拥护某人：表示对某人的支持和拥护。
帮助某人成功：表示为某人提供帮助，使其取得成功。

sentences.c: I am on one's side.
sentences.cn: 我跟某人站在一边。

sentences.c: Resting chopsticks on the side of one's bowl or on a chopstick stand signifies one is merely taking a break from eating.
sentences.cn: 将筷子放在碗的侧面或筷子架上表示他只是休息一下。

sentences.c: She says the training module only offers ideas for developing one's spiritual side. It is not mandatory and has no effect on one's career.
sentences.cn: 她表示这个训练模块只是为个人精神方面的加强提供指导，并不是强制的，对个人职业生涯不会有影响。

trans.cn: 分手：指一对情侣或夫妻结束关系，不再在一起。
分散：指一群人停止在一起，各自离开。
分开：指将一起的事物或人分成几部分或几个组。

sentences.c: My parents split up last year.
sentences.cn: 我父母去年离婚了。

sentences.c: The word is they've split up.
sentences.cn: 据说他们离异了。

sentences.c: She's split up with her boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 她和男朋友分手了。

trans.cn: 在去……的路上：表示某人或某物正在前往某个地方的路上。

sentences.c: Her private jet landed in the republic on the way to Japan.
sentences.cn: 她的私人喷气式飞机在去日本的途中在该共和国降落。

sentences.c: It was on the way to the station.
sentences.cn: 那是在去火车站的路上。

sentences.c: She is well on the way to recovery.
sentences.cn: 她就要康复了。

sentences.c: Postal workers are getting a 5.2% pay rise, backdated to February.
sentences.cn: 邮政员工的工资将提高5.2%，追溯至二月份起算。

sentences.c: The general pay rise with a better economy.
sentences.cn: 随着经济的好转，工资普遍上涨。

sentences.c: I asked for a pay rise and she agreed.
sentences.cn: 我要求提高工资，她答应了。

trans.cn: 以……的名字给某人某物命名

sentences.c: I wrote my name after Penny's at the bottom of the page.
sentences.cn: 我把我的名字写在了这页最下面彭尼的名字之后。

sentences.c: If you need to change a name after you have started work on your schema, make sure that everyone is aware of that change.
sentences.cn: 在您开始处理一个方案之后，您需要更改一个名字，那么您要确定每个人都意识到了您所做的更改。

sentences.c: He has yet to show that he is a strong election campaigner-the main role of those with the Gandhi name, after all.
sentences.cn: 毕竟他还没有证明自己是个强劲的竞选人——在以甘地为名的那些人中起到主体作用。

trans.cn: 偶然遇见：指在不经意间遇到或发现某人或某物。
遭遇，经历：指遇到或经历某种情况或事件。
给人留下印象：指某人或某事物给人留下深刻印象。

sentences.c: This is the worst place I've come across.
sentences.cn: 这是我到过的最糟糕的地方。

sentences.c: Did he come across as a sane, rational person?
sentences.cn: 他看上去是不是一个头脑清醒而理智的人？

sentences.c: I hoped she'd come across with some more information.
sentences.cn: 我希望她能再提供更多的信息。

synos.cn: 偶遇；无意中发现；讲得清楚明白；给人…印象

trans.cn: 举起,提出,抓举,支持住,阻挡
· Hold up the table while I slide this underneath.
我把这个东西塞进去的时候，你扶着桌子。
· Sorry to hold you up – my train was late.
不好意思耽搁了你，我的火车晚点了。
· Hold up a minute. I want to check something.
· The guy tried to hold up a bank.
· The real estate market held up despite a lack of consumer confidence.
尽管缺乏消费者信心，房地产市场还是经受住了考验。

sentences.c: I will say a colour and you must hold up that colour pen.
sentences.cn: 我会说一种颜色，然后你必须举起那种颜色的笔。

sentences.c: Democrats say arguments against the bill won't hold up.
sentences.cn: 民主党人说，反对这项议案的论点站不住脚。

sentences.c: They cannot even hold up their own heads without some help from grown-ups.
sentences.cn: 如果没有大人的帮助，他们甚至连自己的头都抬不起来。

trans.cn: 依靠，指望：指对某人或某事有信心，相信他/它会提供帮助或支持。
指望，期待：指对某事有期望或希望，相信它会发生或实现。

sentences.c: Can I count on your loyalty?
sentences.cn: 我能指望你对我忠诚吗？

sentences.c: We can't count on the good weather lasting.
sentences.cn: 我们不能指望这样好的天气会持久。

sentences.c: We can't count on this warm weather lasting.
sentences.cn: 我们不能指望这暖和的天气会持久。

trans.cn: 最终成为：达到或陷入一个未计划或预期的地方、状态或情况。
最后成为：成为某种身份或状态。
最后落得：以某种不希望或不预期的方式结束。

sentences.c: You could end up none the wiser about managing your finances.
sentences.cn: 你最终可能一点儿也不会比以前更会理财。

sentences.c: Damming the river may end up benefiting those who need it the least.
sentences.cn: 在河上建大坝最终可能有利于那些最不需要大坝的人。

sentences.c: He'll end up in the nick.
sentences.cn: 他早晚得进局子。

trans.cn: 忍受：指在不愉快或困难的情况下，勉强忍耐或容忍。
容忍：指接受或容忍某人的行为、态度或观点，尽管它们可能令人不快。

sentences.c: I can put up with minor inconveniences.
sentences.cn: 我能忍受些小的不便。

sentences.c: She was in no mood to put up with Blanche's carping.
sentences.cn: 她当时没有心情容忍布兰奇的吹毛求疵。

sentences.c: I'm not going to put up with their smoking any longer.
sentences.cn: 我再也不能容忍他们抽烟了。

trans.cn: 悬索桥：一座桥梁，其道路悬挂在两个或更多的电缆上，通常经过塔，并在两端牢固地固定。
