sentences.c: The suspension bridge extends across the whole valley.
sentences.cn: 这座吊桥横跨了整个山谷

sentences.c: This is the famous suspension bridge on the Tagus.
sentences.cn: 这是塔古斯河上有名的吊桥。

sentences.c: Think parachute cords and suspension bridge cables.
sentences.cn: 试想一下另外如降落伞绳索和吊桥上的绳索。

trans.cn: 特别地、个别地或具体地

sentences.c: He loves science fiction in particular.
sentences.cn: 他特别喜爱科幻小说。

sentences.c: Why should he notice her car in particular?
sentences.cn: 他为什么要特别注意她的轿车呢？

sentences.c: One player in particular deserves a mention.
sentences.cn: 有一名运动员特别值得表扬。

sentences.c: How do you fill your day now that you've retired?
sentences.cn: 现在你已退休了，怎样打发你的日子？

sentences.c: I only wish he were here now that things are getting better for me.
sentences.cn: 既然我的情况正在好转，我真希望他在这儿。

sentences.c: They are hoping for a return to normality now that the war is over.
sentences.cn: 既然战争结束了，他们希望一切都恢复常态。

trans.cn: 突然大笑：指突然开始大笑。

sentences.c: The class burst out laughing.
sentences.cn: 全班爆发出笑声。

sentences.c: Karen burst out laughing.
sentences.cn: 卡伦突然大笑起来。

sentences.c: Toad burst out laughing.
sentences.cn: 蟾蜍托德哈哈大笑。

trans.cn: 我的天：用于表达惊讶、震惊或惊奇之情的英语感叹词。

sentences.c: My goodness, I wish I was out of this!
sentences.cn: 我的天哪，我真希望我不在这里！

sentences.c: My goodness, you crossed the double yellow line!
sentences.cn: 我的天啊，你越过了双黄线！

sentences.c: Tom turned a short curve, by-and-by, and exclaimed: "My goodness, Huck, lookyhere!"
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，汤姆进了一段弧形通道，大声喊道：“我的天哪，哈克，你看！”

trans.cn: 兑现支票：将支票兑换成现金的行为。

sentences.c: There are similar charges if you want to cash a cheque or withdraw money at a branch other than your own.
sentences.cn: 如果你在其他银行兑现支票或支取现金，将会产生差不多的手续费。

sentences.c: I'd like to know whether I can cash a cheque here.
sentences.cn: 这儿能兑换支票吗？

sentences.c: I'd like to know whether I can cash a cheque here?
sentences.cn: 我想知道我是否能在这兑换支票？

trans.cn: 排队等候：指在队伍中等待，按照先来后到的顺序进行排队等候。

sentences.c: If we don't want to wait in line before the checkout counters, we can use Toshiba's new object recognition scanner.
sentences.cn: 如果我们不想在收银台前排队，我们可以使用东芝新的物体识别扫描仪。

sentences.c: Is that you again? When will you learn to wait in line?
sentences.cn: 又是你吗？你什么时候才能学会排队？

sentences.c: Susan never gets upset when she has to wait in line.
sentences.cn: 苏珊在要排队的时候从不生气。

trans.cn: 眼周皮肤因挫伤而出现的皮肤变色。失败，挫折；坏名声

sentences.c: He punched her in the face, giving her a black eye.
sentences.cn: 他朝她脸上就是一拳，打得她眼眶都青了。

sentences.c: You look like you've been in the wars—who gave you that black eye?
sentences.cn: 看样子你打架受伤了，是谁把你打得鼻青眼肿？

sentences.c: As in black eye, bloody nose, hair ripped out, scratches, bruises and cuts.
sentences.cn: 我现在眼睛被打肿，鼻子留着血，头发被揪下来好几缕，全身都是抓伤、淤青和（酒瓶碎片造成的）伤口。

trans.cn: 摆脱：采取行动以消除或不再受到（不需要的事物或人）的影响或困扰。

sentences.c: I began to suspect (that) they were trying to get rid of me.
sentences.cn: 我开始觉察出，他们试图摆脱掉我。

sentences.c: I can't get rid of this headache.
sentences.cn: 我这头疼老也不好。

sentences.c: There is a manual pump to get rid of the water.
sentences.cn: 有一台手动水泵用来排水。

trans.cn: 闲逛；胡闹：指在没有明确目的的情况下闲逛或进行无意义的活动。

sentences.c: Tom, I don't like to fool around much where there's dead people.
sentences.cn: 汤姆，我不喜欢在有死人的地方闲荡。

sentences.c: Say--let's not fool around here.
sentences.cn: 喂——咱们别傻呆在这儿了。

sentences.c: That taught him not to fool around in high trees.
sentences.cn: 这教育他千万不要在大树上玩耍。

synos.cn: 闲荡；游手好闲；干无用的事

trans.cn: 时不时地：偶尔，不经常地，在某个时间点或时间段内发生。
有时候：表示某种情况或行为在某些时候发生，但不是经常性的。

sentences.c: From time to time he passed on confidential information to him.
sentences.cn: 他不时地传送机密情报给他。

sentences.c: Her daughters visited him from time to time when he was bedridden.
sentences.cn: 他卧床不起时她的女儿们不时地来探望他。

sentences.c: The baby cries from time to time.
sentences.cn: 这个宝宝时不时地哭。

trans.cn: 产生：作为结果产生某事物。

sentences.c: Damage may result in stunted growth and sometimes death of the plant.
sentences.cn: 损害会导致植物生长受阻，有时还会导致死亡。

sentences.c: Such a war could result in the use of chemical and biological weapons.
sentences.cn: 这样一场战争可能导致生化武器的使用。

sentences.c: Food allergies can result in an enormous variety of different symptoms.
sentences.cn: 食物过敏会导致大量不同种类的症状。

trans.cn: 冲进；(河)注入(海)；撞上；到达
撞上，碰上：意指偶然遇到或不期而遇。
遇到困难，遭遇：指遇到问题、困境或挑战。
偶然发现，碰巧看到：表示无意中发现或看到某事物。

sentences.c: Let me know if you run into any snags.
sentences.cn: 要是遇到什么麻烦就告诉我。

sentences.c: We had the misfortune to run into a violent storm.
sentences.cn: 我们不幸遭遇了猛烈的暴风雨。

sentences.c: The pilot told the control tower that he'd run into technical trouble.
sentences.cn: 该飞行员告诉航空站说他遇到了技术问题。

synos.cn: 遭遇，陷入；撞上，撞到；偶然遇见

trans.cn: 穿上：指将衣物穿在身上。
假装：指故意表现出某种外貌或行为。
增加：指增加体重或数量。
上演：指进行表演或演出。
戏弄：指故意误导或开玩笑。

sentences.c: She put on the brakes suddenly.
sentences.cn: 她突然踩了刹车。

sentences.c: He put on an American accent.
sentences.cn: 他假操着一口美国腔。

sentences.c: She was put on a respirator.
sentences.cn: 给她戴上了人工呼吸器。

synos.cn: 穿上；上演；增加；假装；使…上场

trans.cn: 使某人不再感兴趣或不喜欢：使某人对某事失去兴趣或热情。
不管，不顾：指不考虑或不顾及某事物，不受其影响。

sentences.c: She always travels first-class regardless of expense.
sentences.cn: 无论费用多高她总是乘头等舱。

sentences.c: It takes in anybody regardless of religion, colour, or creed.
sentences.cn: 这个组织接纳任何人，不管其宗教、肤色或信仰。

sentences.c: Everyone has the right to good medical care regardless of their ability to pay.
sentences.cn: 无论支付能力如何，每个人都有权得到良好的医疗。

trans.cn: 生牛肉酱：一种高度调味的生牛肉末，通常作为开胃菜食用。

sentences.c: Mr. Redzepi among his cooks in the densely staffed Noma kitchen. The two cooks in the foreground are preparing a steak tartare dish.
sentences.cn: 雷哲毕和他的厨师们在诺玛餐厅的厨房里忙碌着，位于照片前景的两位厨师正在准备鞑靼牛排

sentences.c: High performance:Less than 2 minutes are needed to make a bowl of mayonnaise, a steak tartare, a carrot puree or a fruit compote. ;
sentences.cn: 高效、快捷：2分钟即可搞定一大盆肉酱、蛋黄酱、胡萝卜汤或果菜拼盆；

sentences.c: He was bundled off to boarding school.
sentences.cn: 他被匆匆送到了寄宿学校。

sentences.c: The children were shipped off to a boarding school at an early age.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在幼年时就送到了一所寄宿学校。

sentences.c: I was sent to boarding school, where I spent six years of unremitting misery.
sentences.cn: 我被送到寄宿学校去，在那里度过了无尽痛苦的六年。

trans.cn: 玩弄感情：与非配偶、非婚姻伴侣或非固定伴侣发生性关系。
不认真对待：不认真对待或处理某事物。
不认真使用或做某事：非常不认真地使用或做某事。
尝试不同方法：移动或改变某物，或以不同的方式思考某事物，通常是为了找到最好的解决方法。

sentences.c: I can play around with the pictures in all sorts of ways to make them more eye-catching.
sentences.cn: 我可以试着用各种不同的方式来摆放这些图片，使它们更引人注目。

sentences.c: Don't let him play around the deep-water area.
sentences.cn: 不要让他在深水区域玩耍。

sentences.c: Go ahead and put in some Numbers and play around.
sentences.cn: 继续并输入一些数字，然后做一些测试。

trans.cn: 做鬼脸：做出异常的面部表情，尤其是为了娱乐或嘲笑他人。

sentences.c: The sheets, now with their faces, collect in a hopper in the printing presses, and a Bureau employee prepares to pull them out.
sentences.cn: 床单，现在与他们的面孔，收集在印刷机料斗，和一局的员工准备将它们拉出来。

sentences.c: The most distinguished areas are toilets with engraved smiling faces at the door which pull into the world of bright colorful tiles and sanitary.
sentences.cn: 最著名的地方是门上的笑脸，带人进入明亮多彩的瓷砖世界和卫生间。

sentences.c: On someone pull a face of the translation, to make faces interpretation pull a face means …
sentences.cn: 对某人做鬼脸的翻译，做鬼脸的解释，做鬼脸的意思…

trans.cn: 由于；因为：表示某事发生或某人取得成功是由于某种帮助或原因。

sentences.c: I would like to propose a vote of thanks to our host.
sentences.cn: 我提议向我们的主人表示感谢。

sentences.c: It was all a great success—thanks to a lot of hard work.
sentences.cn: 由于尽心竭力，这才大获成功。

sentences.c: Thanks to a new directive, food labelling will be more specific.
sentences.cn: 由于官方的一项新指令，食品标签将会更明确具体。

trans.cn: 灭绝：指某种物种完全消失或减少到极少的数量。

sentences.c: Without bees visiting flowers in this way, many plants would die out.
sentences.cn: 如果没有蜜蜂以这种方式采花，许多植物将会灭绝。

sentences.c: It was until about 30 years ago, the shoes began to die out.
sentences.cn: 直到大约30年前，这种鞋才开始消失。

sentences.c: If we don't protect nature, some wildlife may die out in the future.
sentences.cn: 如果我们不保护自然，一些野生动物可能会在未来灭绝。

sentences.c: Hang on a second. Am I shitting you?
sentences.cn: 等一下，我让你不高兴了？

sentences.c: Hang on a second, Mr Brown. The phone is just ringing.
sentences.cn: 请稍等，布朗先生。电话铃响了。

sentences.c: Leonard: Hang on a second. I could have the fruit platter.
sentences.cn: 莱纳德：等等，我可以要一份水果拼盘啊。

trans.cn: 零散的东西：不同种类的事物或物体。

sentences.c: Bits and pieces of things he'd read and heard were coming together, and he began to understand.
sentences.cn: 他把读到和听到的片段综合起来，便逐渐明白了。

sentences.c: The drawers are full of bits and pieces of armour.
sentences.cn: 抽屉里满是零零碎碎的盔甲片。

sentences.c: She stuffed all her bits and pieces into a bag and left.
sentences.cn: 她把她零零碎碎的东西都塞进了一只包里就走了。

sentences.c: His mother tongue was German and at school he learned French and English, but he felt his English was poor.
sentences.cn: 他的母语是德语，在学校学了法语和英语，但他觉得自己的英语很差。

sentences.c: Hoping to discover what language a child would speak if he heard no mother tongue, he told the nurses to keep silent.
sentences.cn: 他希望发现一个没有听到母语的孩子会说什么语言，他让护士们保持沉默。

sentences.c: In different countries around the globe, English is acquired as the mother tongue; in others it is used as a second language.
sentences.cn: 在世界各地的不同国家，英语作为母语被习得；在其他地方，它被用作第二语言。

trans.cn: 变得流行：指某个想法或事物变得受欢迎或流行起来。
理解，领会：指逐渐理解或领会某个概念、观念或情况。

sentences.c: He is very quick to catch on to things.
sentences.cn: 他领悟能力很强。

sentences.c: Eddie slipped the safety catch on his automatic back into place.
sentences.cn: 艾迪把自动步枪的保险拉到了位。

sentences.c: So it took both plants quite a while to catch on in Europe.
sentences.cn: 因此，这两家工厂都花了相当长的时间才在欧洲流行起来。

trans.cn: 很长时间：表示某事物已经持续了很长时间，通常用于形容等待、烦恼等情况。

sentences.c: My gloves have been missing for ages.
sentences.cn: 我的手套已经丢了很久了。

sentences.c: They've been onto me for ages to get a job.
sentences.cn: 很久以来，他们一直催促我找份工作。

sentences.c: I haven't played the piano for ages—I may be a little rusty.
sentences.cn: 我很久没有弹钢琴，可能会有点生疏。

trans.cn: 故意地：有意地、刻意地做某事。

sentences.c: Emily drops the water on purpose.
sentences.cn: 艾米丽是故意洒水的。

sentences.c: I'm sure you didn't do it on purpose and it can't be helped.
sentences.cn: 我肯定你不是故意这样做的，这也是没办法的事。

sentences.c: He did it on purpose, knowing it would annoy her.
sentences.cn: 他明知会激怒她，却故意那么做。

trans.cn: 另一方面：用于引出与前述相对或不同观点的陈述。
相反地：用于引出与前述相反的观点或情况。

sentences.c: On the other hand, the idea appealed to him.
sentences.cn: 另一方面，这个主意对他有吸引力。

sentences.c: The film lost money; reviews, on the other hand, were by and large favourable.
sentences.cn: 这部电影赔了钱；但从另一方面来看，评论大体上是积极的。

sentences.c: On the one hand, if the body doesn't have enough cholesterol, we would not be able to survive. On the other hand, if the body has too much cholesterol, the excess begins to line the arteries.
sentences.cn: 一方面，如果身体没有足够的胆固醇，我们将无法生存；另一方面，如果体内胆固醇过多，多余的胆固醇就开始让动脉变厚。

trans.cn: 如果，只要：指在满足某个条件的情况下。

sentences.c: The other banks are going to be very eager to help, provided that they see that he has a specific plan.
sentences.cn: 如果他有一个具体的计划，其他的银行才会非常渴望提供资助。

sentences.c: We'll hold the concert on next Monday provided that the weather is good.
sentences.cn: 如果天气好的话，我们将在下周一举行音乐会。

sentences.c: In fact, going beyond compliance saves cost at the same time that it generates cash, provided that management adopts the new lean and green model.
sentences.cn: 事实上，如果管理层采用新的精益和绿色管理模式，超越合规性可以在产生现金的同时节约成本。

trans.cn: 提前，预先：在某个事件或活动发生之前做某事。

sentences.c: A 10% deposit is payable in advance.
sentences.cn: 须预付10%的押金。

sentences.c: Football games often sell out well in advance.
sentences.cn: 足球比赛的门票常常提前销售一空。

sentences.c: You have to fix visits up in advance with the museum.
sentences.cn: 你得预先和博物馆联系安排好参观事宜。

trans.cn: 接管：指承担控制、占有或责任的权力。
接手：指接替他人的职位、责任或任务。
接收：指接收或接纳某人或某物。

sentences.c: I'm going to take over the company one day.
sentences.cn: 我总有一天会接管这家公司。

sentences.c: She decided that I was the ideal person to take over the job.
sentences.cn: 她认定我是接管这项工作的最佳人选。

sentences.c: The eldest son is being groomed to take over when his father dies.
sentences.cn: 长子正在接受培养，以在父亲过世后接手父业。

phrases.cn: 收购行动；收购竞争；购并出价

sentences.c: The United States won most of the track and field events. Similarly, in swimming, the top three places went to Americans.
sentences.cn: 美国队赢得了田径比赛大多数项目的胜利。同样，在游泳方面，美国人也囊括了前三名。

sentences.c: The longest track and field event at the Summer Olympics is the 50-kilometer race walk, which is about five miles longer than the marathon.
sentences.cn: 夏季奥运会最长的田径项目是50公里竞走，比马拉松距离还长大约5英里。

sentences.c: A: Yes, I prefer gymnastics to track and field.
sentences.cn: 是的，比起田径项目来我更喜欢体操。

etymology.d: track,跑道，field,场地，引申词义田径运动。

trans.cn: 徒劳无功：没有成功或结果。

sentences.c: All our efforts were in vain.
sentences.cn: 我们的所有努力都付诸东流了。

sentences.c: She searched in vain for her passport.
sentences.cn: 她翻找自己的护照，但没找着。

sentences.c: They tried in vain to persuade her to go.
sentences.cn: 他们极力劝说她去，但枉费了一番口舌。

trans.cn: 随机地：没有明确计划、目的或模式地。

sentences.c: The terrorists fired into the crowd at random.
sentences.cn: 恐怖分子胡乱地向人群开枪。

sentences.c: Three African-Americans were killed by shots fired at random from a minibus.
sentences.cn: 3名非洲裔美国人被从一辆小型公共汽车中胡乱射出的子弹打死了。

sentences.c: It is better to read a few books carefully than to read many at random.
sentences.cn: 随便读许多书不如细细地读几本书。

trans.cn: 不管多大代价，无论如何
无论如何，不惜任何代价

sentences.c: You must stop the press from finding out at all costs.
sentences.cn: 你必须不惜一切代价阻止媒体查明真相。

sentences.c: They told Jacques Delors a disastrous world trade war must be avoided at all costs.
sentences.cn: 他们告诉雅克·得洛斯，必须不惜一切代价避免灾难性的世界贸易大战。

sentences.c: We will win at all costs!
sentences.cn: 我们会不惜一切代价争取胜利！

synos.cn: 无论如何，不惜任何代价

sentences.c: I'll do it straight away.
sentences.cn: 这件事我马上就做。

sentences.c: Surprisingly, he agreed straight away.
sentences.cn: 真想不到，他马上同意了。

sentences.c: I'll telephone him straight away.
sentences.cn: 我马上就打电话给他。

trans.cn: 彻底摧毁：完全摧毁，使彻底消失。
失控坠毁：由于失去控制而坠毁或撞毁。

sentences.c: You can never wipe out the past.
sentences.cn: 你永远不能把过去一笔勾销。

sentences.c: One dose of penicillin can wipe out the infection.
sentences.cn: 一剂青霉素即可消除感染。

sentences.c: The disease threatens to wipe out the entire population.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病有可能毁灭整个种群。

synos.cn: 消灭，彻底摧毁；垮台；（滑雪等时的）翻倒；封闭

trans.cn: 温室效应：太阳辐射转化为热能导致行星表面和下层大气层升温的现象。

sentences.c: The specific impact of the greenhouse effect is unknowable.
sentences.cn: 温室效应的具体影响尚不可知。

sentences.c: The question offers another way of looking at the "Greenhouse Effect".
sentences.cn: 这一问题提供了研究“温室效应”的另一种方法。

sentences.c: What gas do you think was the first suspect in causing the greenhouse effect?
sentences.cn: 你认为导致温室效应的第一个嫌疑是什么气体？

trans.cn: 若干，一些：表示不确定但超过两个的数量，介于"两个"和"很多"之间。
许多，不少：表示相当数量的人或事物，强调数量不少但又不至于特别多。
展望：思考未来将会发生的事情。

sentences.c: Look ahead while driving.
sentences.cn: 开车时要看前方。

sentences.c: When they look ahead, they see roadblocks to their success.
sentences.cn: 当他们展望未来时，他们看到了通往成功道路上的重重障碍。

sentences.c: But when they look ahead, they see roadblocks to their success.
sentences.cn: 但当他们展望未来时，他们看到了通往成功的路上障碍重重。

trans.cn: 查阅：指为了获取信息而查看或查找某物。
指代：指与某物有直接联系或关系。
提及：指在演讲或写作中简要地提到或谈论某人或某事。

sentences.c: Writers often refer to a dictionary.
sentences.cn: 作家时常参考字典。

sentences.c: You may refer to your notes if you want.
sentences.cn: 如果需要，可以查阅笔记。

sentences.c: I promised not to refer to the matter again.
sentences.cn: 我答应过再不提这事了。

synos.cn: 参考；涉及；指的是；适用于

trans.cn: 导致：指导致某种结果或情况发生。

sentences.c: A poor diet will ultimately lead to illness.
sentences.cn: 糟糕的饮食终将导致疾病。

sentences.c: Insults can lead to the incitement of violence.
sentences.cn: 侮辱会导致对暴力的煽动。

sentences.c: He pulled away, extending his lead to 15 seconds.
sentences.cn: 他甩开了对手，领先优势扩大到了15秒。

trans.cn: 采取行动：为了达到特定的结果而行动。

sentences.c: We need more time to see how things develop before we take action.
sentences.cn: 我们采取行动以前需要有更多时间观察情况的发展。

sentences.c: Muslim and Jewish leaders have issued statements deploring the violence and urging the United Nations to take action.
sentences.cn: 伊斯兰教和犹太教领袖已经发表声明谴责该暴力行为，并敦促联合国采取行动。

sentences.c: You should take action first.
sentences.cn: 你应该首先采取行动。

trans.cn: 在某人或某物前面：在某人或某物的前面位置；比某人或某物更靠前。
领先于：在竞赛、选举等中比某人或某物得分、票数等更高；比某人或某物进展更快。
在或进入未来：指在或进入未来的时间；比某人或某物更早。
早于或在某人或某物之前：在某人或某物之前的时间；比某人或某物更早。

sentences.c: We finished 15 minutes ahead of time.
sentences.cn: 我们提前15分钟完成。

sentences.c: Trading was very light ahead of yesterday's auction.
sentences.cn: 昨天的拍卖之前交易很少。

sentences.c: Two boys were ahead of us.
sentences.cn: 有两个男孩在我们前面。

trans.cn: 冠鹮：一种几乎濒临灭绝的鹮，曾经分布在东亚的许多地区，现在正在从圈养种群中恢复到野外。

sentences.c: Some effective solutions to strengthen the Crested Ibis protection were put forward.
sentences.cn: 并且提出了加强朱鹮保护的对策。

sentences.c: Crested Ibis protection has gained great achievements that the number of the species has exceeded 200.
sentences.cn: 朱鹮保护工作已经取得了显著的成绩，野生种群达200多只。

sentences.c: The above-mentioned results indicate that Ningshan county is suitable for reintroduction test of the Crested Ibis.
sentences.cn: 以上结果表明，宁陕县适于开展朱鹮再引入试验。

trans.cn: 除了……之外：表示除了某个人或物体之外的其他选项或情况。

sentences.c: I like all sports apart from football.
sentences.cn: 除足球外我喜欢所有的运动。

sentences.c: Apart from anything else I was starving.
sentences.cn: 别的不说，我快饿死了。

sentences.c: She keeps herself apart from other people.
sentences.cn: 她与其他人保持距离。

synos.cn: 远离，除…之外；且不说；缺少

trans.cn: (对已产生的不良后果)负责任
因……而受罚，对……负责：指因为某个行为或决定而承担责任或受到惩罚。

sentences.c: I can answer for her honesty.
sentences.cn: 我可以担保她为人诚实。

sentences.c: I didn't have a ready answer for this dilemma.
sentences.cn: 我没有现成的答案来解决这个进退两难的问题。

sentences.c: I agree, but I can't answer for my colleagues.
sentences.cn: 我同意，但是我不能代表我同事们的意见。

word: call for an end to sth

sentences.c: Hurry up or else you'll be late.
sentences.cn: 快点，否则你就要迟到了。

sentences.c: You are either a total genius or else you must be totally crazy.
sentences.cn: 你要么是个纯粹的天才，要不然你准是完全疯了。

sentences.c: This time we really need to succeed or else people will start giving us funny looks.
sentences.cn: 这次我们真地得要成功，否则人们会开始用奇怪的眼光看我们。

trans.cn: 总结，概括：将事物或信息归纳、总结起来。
结束，完成：将事情或活动圆满地结束。

sentences.c: Wrap up warm before you go outside!
sentences.cn: 穿得暖和些再出去！

sentences.c: Diana is taking the opportunity to wrap up the family presents.
sentences.cn: 戴安娜正在利用这个机会包装给家人的礼物。

sentences.c: NATO defense ministers wrap up their meeting in Brussels today.
sentences.cn: 北约国防部长们今天在布鲁塞尔圆满结束了他们的会议。

synos.cn: 伪装；使全神贯注；穿暖和的衣服

trans.cn: 永久性地；彻底地；不可逆转地

sentences.c: She had a liking for good clothes.
sentences.cn: 她有种对好衣服的爱好。

sentences.c: He had a name for good judgement.
sentences.cn: 他以判断力强著称。

sentences.c: Is religion always a force for good?
sentences.cn: 宗教一向是诲人行善的力量吗？

trans.cn: 成功完成：指成功地完成某项任务或活动。
带走，拿走：指将某物从一个地方带走或拿走。
成功地做到，成功地实现：指成功地做到或实现某事。

sentences.c: You gentle so approach, carry off my palpitation.
sentences.cn: 你的温柔如此靠近，带走我的心跳。

sentences.c: Of course, a professional dancer can carry off a decentvogue, as long as it suits their image.
sentences.cn: 当然，只要形象适合，专业舞者可以做出美妙的折手动作。

sentences.c: Of course, a professional dancer can carry off a decent vogue, as long as it suits their image.
sentences.cn: 当然，只要形象适合，专业舞者可以做出美妙的折手动作。

synos.cn: 夺去；获得；使丧命；成功地处理

sentences.c: Summary: the mascots — cartoon renditions of a panda, fish, Tibetan antelope, swallow and the Olympic flame, each one the color of one of the Olympic rings.
sentences.cn: 福娃是五个可爱的亲密小伙伴， 他们的造型融入了鱼、大熊猫、藏羚羊、燕子以及奥林匹克圣火。

sentences.c: This article was composed of two experiments which were used to provide scientifical reference for protection and reasonable utilization of Tibetan antelope.
sentences.cn: 为保护和合理利用藏羚羊品种资源，本论文对沙图仕特性及冷季可可西里牧草-土壤中主要养分含量进行了研究。

sentences.c: Beibei is the Fish, Jingjing is the Panda, Huanhuan is the Olympic Flame, Yingying is the Tibetan Antelope and Nini is the Swallow. They are intimate friends.
sentences.cn: 贝贝是一只鱼，晶晶是一只熊猫，欢欢是奥林匹克圣火，迎迎是一只藏羚羊，妮妮是一只燕子。他们是亲密的朋友。

sentences.c: All in all, it's fantastic!
sentences.cn: 总而言之，它很棒！

sentences.c: All in all it had been a great success.
sentences.cn: 总的说来，那是个巨大的成功。

sentences.c: We both thought that all in all it might not be a bad idea.
sentences.cn: 我们俩都认为总的来说这可能不是个坏主意。

trans.cn: 谋生：通过工作或其他方式赚取生活费用。

sentences.c: Science is a wonderful thing if one does not have to earn one's living at it.
sentences.cn: 科学是好东西，只要它不跟任何人的饭碗挂钩就行。

sentences.c: Science is a wonderful thing if one does not have to earn one's living at it.
sentences.cn: 没有生活保障的科学何乐之有。这是爱因斯坦说过的一句话。

sentences.c: Science eis a wonderful thing if one does not have to earn one's living at it.
sentences.cn: 科学是好东西，只要它不跟任何人的饭碗挂钩就行。

sentences.c: All the best theatres and restaurants are situated within a few minutes' walk of each other.
sentences.cn: 所有最好的剧院和饭店相隔只有几分钟的路。

sentences.c: All the best in your new job!
sentences.cn: 祝你的新工作一切顺利！

sentences.c: Hi there, nice to meet you and wish you all the best.
sentences.cn: 你好，很高兴认识你，希望你一切顺利！

trans.cn: 总结，概括：将信息或观点归纳为简洁的形式。
总计，合计：将多个数值相加得到总和。

sentences.c: Ask yourself to sum up the text and try to work out a "big idea".
sentences.cn: 让自己去总结文本，试着想出一个“大致的想法”。

sentences.c: Which Chinese character would you choose to sum up the past year?
sentences.cn: 你会选择哪个汉字来总结过去的一年？

sentences.c: Can I just sum up what we've agreed so far?
sentences.cn: 我可否就我们目前已经达成的共识作个概括？

trans.cn: 事实上：用于引出一个事实或真相，表示对之前的陈述进行修正或补充。

sentences.c: It's a nice place. We've stayed there ourselves, as a matter of fact.
sentences.cn: 那个地方不错。其实，我们自己在那儿待过。

sentences.c: The local people saw the suffering to which these deportees were subjected. And, as a matter of fact, the local people helped the victims.
sentences.cn: 当地人目睹了这些被放逐的人遭受的苦难。而且，确切地讲，当地人帮助了这些受害者。

sentences.c: As a matter of fact, no one can win all the time.
sentences.cn: 事实上，没有人能一直赢。

trans.cn: 摆脱：从某人或某物中逃脱，尤指使用力量或努力。
分离：与较大的团体、国家等分离。

sentences.c: The company wants to break away from its downmarket image.
sentences.cn: 这个公司想摆脱它面向低消费阶层的形象。

sentences.c: These animals were able to break away from the rope whenever they wanted, but it was only because over time, they believed that it was just impossible.
sentences.cn: 这些动物可以随时挣脱绳子，但这只是因为随着时间的推移，它们认为这是不可能的。

sentences.c: To free electrons, something has to make them whirl fast enough to break away from their nuclei.
sentences.cn: 为了释放电子，必须使电子高速旋转而足以摆脱它们的原子核。

trans.cn: 交出：指放弃对某物的控制权。

sentences.c: She closed her hand over his.
sentences.cn: 她牢牢抓住他的手不放。

sentences.c: She put her hand over her mouth to stop herself from screaming.
sentences.cn: 她用手捂住嘴，以免叫出声来。

sentences.c: The present leaders have to decide whether to hand over to a younger generation.
sentences.cn: 现任领导者们必须决定是否把工作移交给较年轻的一代负责。

trans.cn: 告别：表示离别或道别的行为，通常用于正式场合或离开时。

sentences.c: Is about to bid goodbye to you.
sentences.cn: 就要跟您说再见了。

sentences.c: People also hold 'blind date'parties in an attempt to bid goodbye to their single lives。
sentences.cn: 为了脱离单身，人们也会举办相亲会，介绍单身男女认识。

sentences.c: People also hold "blind date" parties in an attempt to bid goodbye to their single lives.
sentences.cn: 为了脱离单身，人们也会举办相亲会，介绍单身男女认识。

sentences.c: The answer had come to him in a flash.
sentences.cn: 他一下子就有了答案。

sentences.c: It came to me in a flash of inspiration.
sentences.cn: 那是我灵机一动想到的。

sentences.c: Unluckily, she died in a flash flood at the age of 30 while driving back to her village in Baise.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，她在开车返回百色村庄途中，在一场山洪暴发中丧生，年仅30岁。

trans.cn: 支持，维护：捍卫某人或某事物的权利或利益。

sentences.c: You must stand up for your rights.
sentences.cn: 你必须维护自己的权利。

sentences.c: She had learnt to stand up for herself.
sentences.cn: 她学会了自我保护。

sentences.c: Girls who have always been at a mixed school know how to stand up for themselves.
sentences.cn: 一直在男女混合学校上学的女孩子们知道如何自我保护。

trans.cn: 提出：指提出观点、建议或问题等。
推荐：指推荐某人或某事物参与某项活动或担任某个职位。
提前：指提前进行某项活动或安排。

sentences.c: He has put forward new peace proposals.
sentences.cn: 他已提出了新的和平建议。

sentences.c: They put forward many valid reasons for not exporting.
sentences.cn: 他们提出了许多有根据的理由来反对出口。

sentences.c: She put forward some cogent reasons for abandoning the plan.
sentences.cn: 她为放弃这个计划提出了一些具有说服力的理由。

sentences.c: From then on he never trusted her again.
sentences.cn: 从那时起，他再也不信任她了。

sentences.c: She left in 1984 and from then on he lived alone.
sentences.cn: 她于1984年离去，从那时起他便独自一人生活。

sentences.c: I stopped pretending from then on.
sentences.cn: 从那时起，我不再装了。

sentences.c: He refused to give in to bullying and threats.
sentences.cn: 他拒不向恐吓威逼势力让步。

sentences.c: My family insisted that I should not give in, but stay and fight.
sentences.cn: 我家人坚持认为我不应该屈服，而应该留下来斗争。

sentences.c: If you always give in to others you will end up feeling like a doormat.
sentences.cn: 如果总向别人屈服，你最终会觉得自己像个门垫。

trans.cn: 派人去请：指派人去请求或邀请某人前来。
寄出：通过邮寄方式发送。
传递信息：通过某种通信媒介传递信息。

sentences.c: He must go away and leave us alone until I send for him again.
sentences.cn: 他必须离开，让我们独处，直到我再次派人去叫他。

sentences.c: Perhaps, he suggested tentatively, they should send for Dr. Esteves.
sentences.cn: 他犹犹豫豫地建议道，他们也许应该派人去请埃斯特维斯医生。

sentences.c: I think you should send for a doctor about that.
sentences.cn: 我想你应该请个医生。

synos.cn: 召唤，派人去叫；派人去拿

trans.cn: 召回：指命令返回或被返回的行为。
召集：指召唤某人的帮助或咨询。
打电话：指通过电话与某人沟通。

sentences.c: I'll take the call in my office.
sentences.cn: 我要在办公室里接这个电话。

sentences.c: We had to call in a plumber to unblock the drain.
sentences.cn: 我们只得叫个管子工来疏通下水道。

sentences.c: I'll give you a call in the morning.
sentences.cn: 我明天上午给你打电话。

trans.cn: 有……的天赋或才能：指某人在某方面具有天生的才能或特别擅长某种事情。

sentences.c: Caroline doesn't have a gift for music, but she makes up for it with hard work.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳没有音乐天赋，但她通过努力学习弥补了这一缺陷。

sentences.c: Another, advanced in the twentieth century, suggests that humans have a gift for fantasy, through which they seek to reshape reality into more satisfying forms than those encountered in daily life.
sentences.cn: 另一个在20世纪提出的观点认为，人类有幻想的天赋，通过幻想，他们试图把现实重塑成比日常生活中遇到的更令人满意的形式。

sentences.c: Have a gift for languages, want to become an interpreter.
sentences.cn: 有语言天赋，想成为一名口译员。

trans.cn: 递出东西，伸出手(或胳膊)
拒绝加入或达成协议：指拒绝与他人一起采取行动或达成协议。
提供，呈现：指将某物呈现为可实现的事物。
坚持，持续：指保持不屈服或不妥协，或继续运作或可用。

sentences.c: In this exciting event, any visitor can hold out his arms with the local people and cheer together.
sentences.cn: 在这个激动人心的活动中，任何一个游客都可以和当地人一起伸出双臂欢呼。

sentences.c: Doctors hold out little hope of her recovering.
sentences.cn: 医生对她的痊愈不抱很大的希望。

sentences.c: We can stay here for as long as our supplies hold out.
sentences.cn: 我们可以在这里一直待到我们的储备品用完。

synos.cn: 坚持；伸出；提供；维持；抵制；主张；扣留

sentences.c: By and by she met an old man with a beard.
sentences.cn: 她不久就碰到了一个大胡子老头。

sentences.c: It'll be over by and by, maybe.
sentences.cn: 它也许很快就会结束的。

sentences.c: By and by Tom shouted: "Fall!"
sentences.cn: 后来，汤姆喊道：“倒下去！”

trans.cn: 要求或请求某人做某事
号召或邀请某人参加某个活动

sentences.c: He decided to pay a call on Tommy Cummings.
sentences.cn: 他决定去拜访汤米·卡明斯。

sentences.c: The president paid a courtesy call on Emperor Akihito.
sentences.cn: 总统礼节性地拜访了明仁天皇。

sentences.c: Let's call on John.
sentences.cn: 咱们去看看约翰吧。

trans.cn: 看不起：将某人或某物视为不重要或不值得尊重。

sentences.c: Apparently, we look down on acquaintances more so than friends.
sentences.cn: 显然，比起朋友，我们更看不起熟人。

sentences.c: People may be afraid of them, look down on them or think that they are criminals.
sentences.cn: 人们可能害怕他们、看不起他们或认为他们是罪犯。

sentences.c: People may be afraid of them, look down on them, or think that they are criminals.
sentences.cn: 人们可能害怕他们、看不起他们或认为他们是罪犯。

sentences.c: So it is quiet important to keep one's word.
sentences.cn: 所以积累词汇是非常重要的。

sentences.c: It is considered a good quality to keep one's word.
sentences.cn: 守信被认为是一种良好的品质。

sentences.c: The best way to keep one's word is never to give it.
sentences.cn: 从不保存一个字的最好方法是给它。

trans.cn: 改变方向：指风向改变为北方。
改变策略：指改变为新的方针或方法。
发生：指某事情突然发生。

sentences.c: How did this unhappy state of affairs come about?
sentences.cn: 这种不幸的情况是怎么发生的呢？

sentences.c: She recommends you train yourself to pay attention to good fortune by writing down three positive things that come about each day.
sentences.cn: 她建议你每天写下三件当天发生的积极的事情，以此训练自己关注自身的好运气。

sentences.c: I've come about my book.
sentences.cn: 我来拿我的书。

trans.cn: 惊讶地：表示某人感到惊讶或意外的情感状态。

sentences.c: One dark brow rose in surprise.
sentences.cn: 一道乌黑的眉毛惊奇地挑起。

sentences.c: She looked up in surprise.
sentences.cn: 她惊讶地抬起头。

sentences.c: Sue screamed, not loudly, more in surprise than terror.
sentences.cn: 苏尖叫起来，声音不大，与其说是害怕不如说是吃惊。

trans.cn: 和平地：在安静和平静的状态下。

sentences.c: We all live in peace.
sentences.cn: 我们都生活在和平中。

sentences.c: You'll be able to read in peace.
sentences.cn: 你将可以安静地看书。

sentences.c: May she rest in peace.
sentences.cn: 愿她安息。

sentences.c: The more herbs you use, the more pungent the sauce will be.
sentences.cn: 你用的香草越多，沙司的味道就越刺鼻。

sentences.c: The more senior you become in the forces, the more likely you are to end up in a desk job.
sentences.cn: 你在军队中的级别升得越高，你就越有可能落得个坐办公室的职位。

sentences.c: The more she thought about it, the more depressed she became.
sentences.cn: 这件事她越想越感到沮丧。

trans.cn: 在特定地点相遇：在特定地点相互见面。
加入某个团体或组织：成为某个团体或组织的成员。

sentences.c: We'll join up with the other groups later.
sentences.cn: 我们以后再与其他小组会合。

sentences.c: Dwight decided to withdraw from the committee and join up with the opposition.
sentences.cn: 德怀特决定退出该委员会并和反对派联手。

sentences.c: The first stage of the operation was to join up the bones.
sentences.cn: 手术的第一步是把骨头接上。

trans.cn: 用绳子隔离（一个区域）与另一个区域

sentences.c: Then I could get the rope off my neck and jump into the river.
sentences.cn: 然后我就可以把脖子上的绳子取下来，跳进河里。

sentences.c: Mr. Hale : Well , my first thought was to get that rope off .
sentences.cn: 黑尔先生：当时，我第一个想法就是将绳子拿下来，那看上去……

sentences.c: This means that even if the car itself 5 steel rope off completely, because the one on the double insurance, the elevator will not fall.
sentences.cn: 这也就是说，即便电梯厢本身的5根钢绳全部拆除，因为有一上一下的双保险，电梯也不会发生坠落。

trans.cn: 给某人招来（不愉快的）事情
调查，研究：指仔细观察、研究某事物，以获取更多信息或了解情况。
关注，关心：指对某事物或某人表现出关注、关心的态度。
朝……看：指朝着某个方向或某个目标看。

sentences.c: The college principal promised to look into the matter.
sentences.cn: 学院院长答应研究这个问题。

sentences.c: A working party has been set up to look into the problem.
sentences.cn: 已成立一个工作小组来调查这个问题。

sentences.c: The government has set up a commission to look into those crimes.
sentences.cn: 政府已成立一个委员会调查那些罪行。

trans.cn: 理解或找到（某事物，如原因或解决办法）：通过思考理解或找到（某事物，如原因或解决办法）。
找到（某事物）的答案或解决办法：为（某事物）找到答案或解决办法。
解决（某人）的问题：解决（某人）的问题。
以强硬的方式处理（制造问题的人）：以强硬的方式处理（制造问题的人）。

sentences.c: Could you sort out the toys that can be thrown away?
sentences.cn: 你把可以扔掉的玩具挑出来，好吗？

sentences.c: Let's try to sort out the mess.
sentences.cn: 我们来收拾一下残局吧。

sentences.c: He would sort out his own problems, in time.
sentences.cn: 他迟早会解决自己的问题。

trans.cn: 预期寿命：指在特定年龄下，一个人在平均条件下预计还能活多少年。

sentences.c: Prevention of heart disease and stroke will increase life expectancy.
sentences.cn: 对心脏病和中风的预防将延长预期寿命。

sentences.c: The life expectancy for men in Harlem was less than that of men in Bangladesh.
sentences.cn: 哈莱姆区男性的预期寿命低于孟加拉国男性。

sentences.c: Scientists estimate that smoking reduces life expectancy by around 2 years on average.
sentences.cn: 科学家们估计，吸烟使预期寿命平均缩短了大约两年时间。

trans.cn: 开始存在：指开始存在或形成。

sentences.c: It will come into being soon.
sentences.cn: 很快就会产生了。

sentences.c: So how did it come into being, the Just University?
sentences.cn: 那公正的大学这门课是怎样开设的呢？

sentences.c: When Yin and Yang are unbalanced, dreams come into being.
sentences.cn: 当阴阳失衡时，便会做梦。

trans.cn: 故意惹恼(某人,尤指开玩笑）
惹恼某人：通过重复做某事或取笑某人而使其感到恼火或烦躁。（非正式用语）。
炫耀：以引人注目的行为来吸引注意力。
卖弄：故意表现出自己的能力、知识或优点。

sentences.c: All right, there's no need to show off.
sentences.cn: 好啦，没有必要炫耀了。

sentences.c: She wanted to show off her new husband at the party.
sentences.cn: 她想在聚会上炫耀自己的新婚丈夫。

sentences.c: They have a tendency to show off, to dramatize almost every situation.
sentences.cn: 他们有一种炫耀的倾向,几乎任何情况都要大肆渲染一番。

trans.cn: 敲打某人：采取行动使某人或某物达到所期望的良好状态。

synos.cn: 偶然遇到；撞到某人身上

trans.cn: 转折点：一个重要的变化发生的时刻。

sentences.c: The promotion marked a turning point in her career.
sentences.cn: 这次提升标志着她事业上的转折点。

sentences.c: The promotion proved to be a turning point in his career.
sentences.cn: 这次提升最后证明是他职业生涯的一个转折点。

sentences.c: The vote yesterday appears to mark a turning point in the war.
sentences.cn: 昨天的投票似乎标志着这场战争的一个转折点。

trans.cn: 闯入：突然或猛烈地使分离成碎片；打碎。
侵入：非法进入或进入未经许可的地方。
开始从事：开始从事某种活动或行业。

sentences.c: Break into large pieces.
sentences.cn: 撕成大片。

sentences.c: When two objects in space collide, thetwo objects break into many smaller pieces.
sentences.cn: 当两个物体在太空中相撞时，这两个物体会分裂成更小的碎片

sentences.c: I feel as if I should break into song.
sentences.cn: 我感觉我似乎应该开始歌唱。

trans.cn: 因为某人的信仰或原则

sentences.c: He would vote against it on principle.
sentences.cn: 他会依据原则投票反对它。

sentences.c: He doesn't invest in the arms industry on principle.
sentences.cn: 他根据自己的信条，不投资军火工业。

sentences.c: On principle, I had nothing against the idea.
sentences.cn: 原则上，我并不反对这个主意。

trans.cn: 出现在显著的位置或地位：指某人或某事物在某个情境中变得显著或重要。

sentences.c: The problem has come to the fore again in recent months.
sentences.cn: 近几个月来这个问题又成为热点。

sentences.c: A wicked, mordant sense of humour has come to the fore in Blur's world.
sentences.cn: 布勒的世界里已出现了一种恶意、刻薄的幽默感。

sentences.c: A new set of considerations has come to the fore as part of the debate about how we handle children.
sentences.cn: 在关于我们如何对待孩子的辩论中，一组新的考虑因素出现了。

trans.cn:
过时的：指衣服、颜色、款式等陈旧不时尚。
指信息陈旧不有用或不正确。
指食物过期不再安全可食用。
过期的：指食物过期不再安全可食用。

sentences.c: These figures are very out of date.
sentences.cn: 这些数字早已过时。

sentences.c: Suddenly she felt old and out of date.
sentences.cn: 她猛然觉得自己老了，跟不上时代了。

sentences.c: The regulations were out of date and confusing.
sentences.cn: 那些规定已经过时，而且令人费解。

trans.cn: 应用语言学：研究语言在实际生活中的应用，如教育、翻译、心理学等领域的一门学科。

sentences.c: The school offers two modules in Teaching English as a Foreign Language, viz. Principles and Methods of Language Teaching and Applied Linguistics.
sentences.cn: 该校提供两个模块用于英语作为外语的教学，即语言教学的原理方法和应用语言学。

sentences.c: She plans to take a course in applied linguistics.
sentences.cn: 她打算学习应用语言学课程。

sentences.c: The article aims to discuss recent trends in applied linguistics.
sentences.cn: 本文的目的是讨论应用语言学的新趋势。

trans.cn: 1、切断：使某物与其他物体分离，通常是通过剪切、锯断等方式。
2、中断：突然停止某事，使其无法继续。
3、隔绝：使某人或某物与外界隔离，无法与其他人或物进行交流。

sentences.c: The rebels have cut off electricity from the capital.
sentences.cn: 叛乱者已经切断了首都的电力。

sentences.c: They cut off the enemy's retreat.
sentences.cn: 他们切断了敌人的退路。

sentences.c: I was cut off in midstream.
sentences.cn: 我说到半截被打断了。

synos.cn: 切断；中断；使死亡；剥夺继承权

trans.cn: 擦去：通过擦拭去除（某物）。
擦去（眼泪等）：通过擦拭去除（眼泪等）。
消除，抹去：常用于比喻，指无法简单地消除或忽视某个国家的历史。

sentences.c: You know how to fill me with sweet joy and wipe away all my worries.
sentences.cn: 你知道怎样用甜蜜的快乐充盈我，如何扫去我心头的阴云。

sentences.c: God shall wipe away all the tears from their eyes, and there shall be no more death.
sentences.cn: 上帝擦去他们所有的眼泪。死亡不再有，也不再有悲伤和生死离别，不再有痛苦，因往事已矣。

sentences.c: It has become a stain on my life that I can never wipe away. Will God forgive me?
sentences.cn: 它已经成为我生命中无法抹去的污点，上帝会原谅我吗？

trans.cn: 渴望、向往或怀念某事物或某人

sentences.c: Elena was annoyed at having had to wait so long for him.
sentences.cn: 埃琳娜因不得不等他那么长的时间而恼火。

sentences.c: When people are too well off they always begin to long for something new.
sentences.cn: 当人们太富有时，他们总是开始渴望一些新的东西。

sentences.c: It was a soft thing with a darling silly baby face and legs rather long for its body.
sentences.cn: 这是一个软软的小东西，长着一张傻乎乎的、可爱的娃娃脸，腿相比身体来说很长。

trans.cn: 放下，使缓慢下降：逐渐降低高度或位置。
辜负，让失望：未能支持或达到期望，使某人失望。
令人失望，辜负期望：在结尾处让人失望，未能达到期望。

sentences.c: He trudged home feeling lonely and let down.
sentences.cn: 他步履艰难地往家走，感到孤独而沮丧。

sentences.c: The company now has a large number of workers who feel badly let down.
sentences.cn: 现在公司里现在有很多员工感到很失望。

sentences.c: Please let down the curtain.
sentences.cn: 请把窗帘放下来。

synos.cn: 使失望；放下；辜负；减速下降

sentences.c: The decision came out of the blue.
sentences.cn: 这个决定来得很突然。

sentences.c: "I want to talk to my wife," Donald Herbert said out of the blue.
sentences.cn: “我想和我的妻子谈谈。”唐纳德·赫伯特突然说道。

sentences.c: About 15 minutes down the motorway, out of the blue, he announced that I was heading in the wrong direction for Weymouth.
sentences.cn: 在高速公路上开了大约15分钟后，他突然宣布我往错误的方向去了韦茅斯。

trans.cn: 乞求：恳求某人给予或做某事，通常是出于需要或困境。
乞讨：向陌生人或路人请求施舍钱财或物品。

sentences.c: It may flatter you to know, Mastro Antonio, that I have come to you to beg for a favor.
sentences.cn: 您知道，安东尼奥师傅，我来是求您帮个忙的。

sentences.c: He began to tremble so with fright that he had no voice left with which to beg for his life.
sentences.cn: 他吓得浑身发抖，连求饶的声音都没有了。

sentences.c: I beg for mercy for my poor friend, Harlequin, who has never done the least harm in his life.
sentences.cn: 我为我可怜的朋友哈利昆求饶，他一生中从未做过哪怕是最轻微的伤害。

sentences.c: For sure, there is little shortage of eye-popping scenery around here.
sentences.cn: 可以肯定的是，这里不缺乏令人着迷的景象。

sentences.c: No one knows for sure what happened.
sentences.cn: 谁也不知道究竟发生了什么事。

sentences.c: We cannot say for sure what will happen.
sentences.cn: 我们说不准将会发生些什么。

trans.cn: 良好的礼仪：对他人的礼貌和彬彬有礼的待遇，以及正确的公共行为。

sentences.c: I love your good manners.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢你有礼貌。

sentences.c: He has good manners.
sentences.cn: 他很有礼貌。

sentences.c: A model of good manners, he has conquered any inward fury.
sentences.cn: 作为礼貌行为的典范，他已经克服了内心的狂怒情绪。

trans.cn: 突然拜访：意指突然或随意地拜访某人，常与“on”连用。

sentences.c: Rain played a big part in the air show's drop in attendance.
sentences.cn: 下雨是这次飞行表演观众数量下降的主要原因。

sentences.c: He was prepared to take a drop in wages.
sentences.cn: 他准备好了接受一次工资的快速下调。

sentences.c: I thought I'd drop in on you while I was passing.
sentences.cn: 我曾想路过时顺便来看看你。

trans.cn: 被期望做某事：指被期望或要求去做某事。
打算或期望成为某事：指打算或期望成为某种状态或情况。
表示对某事感到愤怒或冒犯：用于表达对某事感到愤怒或冒犯。
应该做某事：用于表示应该做某事。
被允许做某事：用于表示被允许做某事。
据说，传闻：用于表示关于某人或某事的传闻或说法。

sentences.c: Formula One motor car racing is supposed to be dangerous. "Indycar" racing is supposed to be more dangerous still.
sentences.cn: 一级方程式赛车被认为是危险的。印第赛车则被认为更加危险。

sentences.c: Geniuses are supposed to be difficult, eccentric and hopelessly impractical.
sentences.cn: 天才被认为很难相处、行为怪僻且毫无实际能力。

sentences.c: I'm not officially supposed to be here.
sentences.cn: 按公事说，我是不该到这里来的。

trans.cn: 详细讲解：对某个话题或问题进行深入、详细的阐述或讨论。

sentences.c: I can't go into details now; it would take too long.
sentences.cn: 我现在不能细说，太费工夫。

sentences.c: It was a private conversation and I don't want to go into details about what was said.
sentences.cn: 那是一段私人谈话，我不想详述所谈内容。

sentences.c: Please tell me what happened in a few words, don't go into details.
sentences.cn: 请扼要地告诉我发生了什么事情，不必讲得太详细。

trans.cn: 放下某人：停止携带某人或将某人放置在地面或其他表面上。
轻视，对……不屑一顾：指对某事物或某人不予重视或认真对待。
淡化，减轻：指对某事物或某情况进行淡化处理，不予重视或减轻其重要性。

sentences.c: Roberts attempted to make light of his discomfort.
sentences.cn: 罗伯茨试图不去在乎自己的不适。

sentences.c: As women we tend to be self-effacing and make light of what we have achieved.
sentences.cn: 作为妇女，我们往往谦逊，对自己取得的成功轻描淡写。

sentences.c: After all, what is humor but the ability to make light of real life?
sentences.cn: 说到底，有幽默感不就是能使现实生活变得更轻松愉快的能力吗？

trans.cn: 转移某人的注意力，忘掉
语音邮件：一种电子通信系统，可以录制或数字化口头留言并存储，以便稍后播放给预期的收件人。

sentences.c: He was on a call, so I left a message on his voice mail.
sentences.cn: 他正在通话，我就在他的语音信箱留了言。

sentences.c: The service includes caller ID, voice mail, and call waiting.
sentences.cn: 这项服务包括呼叫方身份识别、语音邮件和呼叫等待。

sentences.c: Did you get her pictures and voice mail?
sentences.cn: 你收到她的照片和语音邮件了吗？

trans.cn: 前两天夜里，不久前的某个夜里

sentences.c: They had a commercial on the other night for Drug Free America that was so gross I thought Dad was going to faint.
sentences.cn: 前天晚上他们为“无毒美国”播出的一则广告如此令人恶心，我想爸爸都快晕过去了。

sentences.c: You left your glass slipper at the party the other night.
sentences.cn: 你那晚把水晶鞋落在派对上了。

sentences.c: And I heard that far-off crying again, just as we heard it the other night.
sentences.cn: 我又听到了远处的哭声，就像我们那天晚上听到的一样。

trans.cn: 冷静下来：变得不那么激动、紧张或生气。

sentences.c: We will go back to normal when things calm down.
sentences.cn: 一切平息下来后，我们将恢复正常。

sentences.c: Loud voice can usually make the attacker calm down.
sentences.cn: 响亮的声音通常可以让攻击者冷静下来。

sentences.c: Look, calm down! We'll find her.
sentences.cn: 喂，镇静一点！我们会找到她的。

trans.cn: 切断供应：指切断供应来源。
蒸发、排干或切断供应而消失：指因蒸发、排干或切断供应而消失。
逐渐失去活力而枯萎或死亡：指逐渐失去活力而枯萎或死亡。

sentences.c: California could dry up and blow away.
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚会干涸掉，然后随风而去。

sentences.c: I'll wash and you can dry up.
sentences.cn: 我洗盘子，你可以擦干。

sentences.c: As she got older, offers of modelling work began to dry up.
sentences.cn: 随着她年龄渐长，邀请她做模特儿的工作已越来越少。

trans.cn: 对……不确定：对某事或某人缺乏确定性或信心。

sentences.c: Believe it or not there are still some people out there that are ignoring social media. They may be unsure of how to participate or maybe they just don't have time to get involved.
sentences.cn: 完全无视社会媒体的存在： 有人把它捧得老高，但是就是有那种不顾一屑，完全脱离社会媒体的群体，不要觉得奇怪，或许他们不知道怎么参与进来，又或许他们根本没时间。

sentences.c: There are a lot of things I'm unsure of, so it's going to be good working with you.
sentences.cn: 有很多事情我都不确定，所以和你一起工作会很好。

sentences.c: We are unsure of ourselves and we want to be liked by everyone.
sentences.cn: 我们不自信，急于获得他人的认可。

trans.cn: 情绪失控：失去对情绪的控制，变得非常生气。

sentences.c: Your boss seems to fly off the handle.
sentences.cn: 你老板似乎很生气。

sentences.c: I don't think that's any reason to fly off the handle.
sentences.cn: 我认为你也不必为了这个缘故就勃然大怒。

sentences.c: A person shouldn't fly off the handle about every little thing.
sentences.cn: 一个人不应为每件芝麻小时发火。

sentences.c: They stayed together for the sake of the children.
sentences.cn: 为了孩子，他们还待在一起。

sentences.c: For the sake of simplicity , let's divide the discussion into two parts.
sentences.cn: 为了方便起见，我们把讨论分成两部分。

sentences.c: Let's assume for the sake of argument that we manage to build a satisfactory database.
sentences.cn: 让我们为了讨论假定我们设法构建了一个令人满意的数据库。

trans.cn: 在……范围内：表示某事物的范围或限度，常用于表达“就……而言”或“就……来说”的意思。

sentences.c: We didn't go as far as the others.
sentences.cn: 我们不如其他人走得远。

sentences.c: I read as far as the third chapter.
sentences.cn: 我读到了第三章。

sentences.c: Our land extends as far as the river.
sentences.cn: 我们的土地一直延伸到河边。

trans.cn: 与……一致；按照……的规定或要求

sentences.c: Those products have rightly been stopped in accordance with our safety routines.
sentences.cn: 根据我们的安全惯例，停止使用那些产品是正确的。

sentences.c: In accordance with the stress-triggering hypothesis, faults are unpredictably responsive to subtle stresses they obtain as neighboring faults shift.
sentences.cn: 根据应力触发假说，断层不可预测地对邻近断层移动时所获得的微妙应力作出反应。

sentences.c: In accordance with this kind of purism came an emphasis on studying composers' manuscript notations, a relatively new field of musicology that is flourishing even today.
sentences.cn: 与这种纯粹主义相一致的是对作曲家手稿符号的研究，这是音乐学中一个相对较新的领域，直到今天仍在蓬勃发展。

trans.cn: 量身定制的：为特定目的而特别制作的。

sentences.c: The beautiful San Juan Islands in Washington State are tailor made for romance.
sentences.cn: 圣胡安群岛位于华盛顿，是一个美丽而浪漫的岛屿。

sentences.c: He was wearing a suit that looked tailor-made.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一套似乎是量身定做的西装。

sentences.c: Each client's portfolio is tailor-made.
sentences.cn: 每一位客户的投资组合都是个别设计的。

sentences.c: I would like to place an order for ten copies of this book.
sentences.cn: 这本书我想订购十册。

sentences.c: The city is going to place an order for a hundred and eighty-eight buses.
sentences.cn: 这个城市将下单订购188辆公交车。

sentences.c: I was trying to place an order on your website, but I failed.
sentences.cn: 我想在你们的网站上下单，但是我失败了。

trans.cn: 堵塞：指交通因拥堵而停滞不前。
支持：指在比赛中站在队友后方以协助进攻。
阻止：指阻止某事发生或进行。
备份：指为了防止意外丢失而复制计算机文件或数据；也指复制硬盘上的所有文件。

sentences.c: She invoked several eminent scholars to back up her argument.
sentences.cn: 她援引了几位赫赫有名的学者来支持她的论点。

sentences.c: Furthermore, one sensory ability may back up another.
sentences.cn: 此外，一种感知能力可能会为另一种感知能力提供支持。

sentences.c: You can back up another two feet or so.
sentences.cn: 你可以再退两英尺左右。

synos.cn: 支持，援助；（资料）备份；倒退；裱

trans.cn: 开始逐渐出现：逐渐开始出现或发展。
拜托，求求你：用于哄骗或恳求。
表示惊讶、怀疑或认可：用于表示惊讶、怀疑或对某事的认可。
表现出某种形象：展示某种特定的个人形象。
对某人表示性兴趣：对某人表示性兴趣；也指向某人作出性骚扰行为。
逐渐变得黑暗：逐渐变得黑暗。

sentences.c: Come on! Quick! They'll see us!
sentences.cn: 快点吧！快！他们会看见我们的！

sentences.c: Come on, darling, we'll be late.
sentences.cn: 快点，亲爱的，我们要迟到了。

sentences.c: Come on, it's time we left.
sentences.cn: 快点，我们该走了。

synos.cn: 快点；开始；要求；上演；跟着来；突然产生

trans.cn: 询问或谈论数量的短语

sentences.c: How many sugars do you take?
sentences.cn: 你用多少块糖？

sentences.c: How many people were there?
sentences.cn: 有多少人？

sentences.c: How many moons does Jupiter have?
sentences.cn: 木星有多少颗卫星？

trans.cn: 冰淇淋：一种甜点，由牛奶、糖和其他成分制成，通常在冷冻状态下食用。

sentences.c: She had homemade ice cream for dessert.
sentences.cn: 她吃了些自制冰淇淋当餐后甜点。

sentences.c: She was always treating him to ice cream.
sentences.cn: 她总请他吃冰淇淋。

sentences.c: I'll get you some ice cream.
sentences.cn: 我去给你拿些冰激凌。

sentences.c: Here you are. This is what you were asking for.
sentences.cn: 给你。这就是你一直要的东西。

sentences.c: —Excuse me, may I borrow your pen? —Of course. Here you are.
sentences.cn: ——打扰了，我可以借你的笔吗？ ——当然。给你。

sentences.c: Here you are. Help yourself.
sentences.cn: 你要的在这里。请自便。

trans.cn: 铅笔盒：一种用于存放铅笔和其他小物品的小盒子。

sentences.c: How much is this kind of pencil case?
sentences.cn: 这种文具盒多少钱？

sentences.c: In the big big bag, there is a big big pencil case.
sentences.cn: 在一个大大的书包里，有一个大大的铅笔盒。

sentences.c: I can't find my pencil case. It could be still at school.
sentences.cn: 我不能找到我的铅笔盒，它可能还在学校中。

trans.cn: 跳绳：一种用于跳跃运动的绳子，通常由两端握持并快速旋转。

sentences.c: Start skipping rope now.
sentences.cn: 那么现在开始跳绳吧。

sentences.c: Is this your skipping rope?
sentences.cn: 这是你的跳绳吗？

sentences.c: His hobby is skipping rope.
sentences.cn: 他的业余爱好是跳绳。

sentences.c: I wished her a happy birthday.
sentences.cn: 我祝她生日快乐。

sentences.c: Happy birthday, sweetheart.
sentences.cn: 生日快乐，亲爱的。

sentences.c: The cake had 'Happy Birthday' piped on it.
sentences.cn: 蛋糕上裱了“生日快乐”的字样。

sentences.c: Now we'll all be happy. Hip-hip-hip-hooray!
sentences.cn: 现在我们都高兴了。嘿嘿嘿哈！

trans.cn: 可接受（的）；满意（的）；安全健康（的）；平安无恙（的）
是不是；（表示同意）好；没什么；（引起注意）哎
好的，可以的：表示同意或认可。

sentences.c: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.cn: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

sentences.c: All right class, turn to page 20.
sentences.cn: 好啦，同学们，翻到第20页。

sentences.c: Are you feeling all right?
sentences.cn: 你感觉还好吗？

trans.cn: （机器）突然熄火，突然停止运转
（腿、脚或膝盖）受撞击倒下（常用作比喻）

sentences.c: He's not cut out for teaching.
sentences.cn: 他不适于做教学工作。

sentences.c: Tall trees cut out the sunlight.
sentences.cn: 高高的树木遮住了阳光。

sentences.c: He's not cut out to be a teacher.
sentences.cn: 他不是当教师的材料。

trans.cn: 下一次：在下一次机会或下一次事件中，与本次相对应。

sentences.c: Next time we'll get it right.
sentences.cn: 下次我们就不会错了。

sentences.c: Next time I'll bring a book.
sentences.cn: 下次我带本书来。

sentences.c: We'll be better prepared next time.
sentences.cn: 下次我们会准备得更充分。

trans.cn: 有；拥有；的第三人称单数形式

sentences.c: I have got piles of work to do.
sentences.cn: 我有大量工作要做。

sentences.c: The roses have got greenfly.
sentences.cn: 这些玫瑰花上有蚜虫。

sentences.c: I must have got the figures wrong.
sentences.cn: 我一定是把数字给搞错了。

trans.cn: 自行车头盔：一种专门为骑自行车者设计的头盔，旨在减轻碰撞时对头部的冲击，同时最大限度地减少对周围视野的干扰等副作用。

sentences.c: Put on your cycle helmet.
sentences.cn: 戴上你的自行车头盔。

trans.cn: 坐下：从站立的姿势转为坐下的姿势。

sentences.c: 'Sit down!' Meekly, she obeyed.
sentences.cn: “坐下！”她乖乖地顺从了。

sentences.c: Can we sit down? I'm worn out.
sentences.cn: 我们能坐下吗？我都累坏了。

sentences.c: Shove up! Jan wants to sit down.
sentences.cn: 挪一挪！简要坐下来。

trans.cn: 站起来：指从坐或躺的姿势变为站立的姿势。
经受住：指在压力、攻击或严格的审查下保持稳定和完整。
违约：指未能按约定时间赴约。
支持：指为了捍卫对方而站出来。
面对：指勇敢地面对困难或挑战。
担任伴郎/伴娘：指在婚礼仪式上担任新郎或新娘的伴郎或伴娘。

sentences.c: You must stand up for your rights.
sentences.cn: 你必须维护自己的权利。

sentences.c: She had learnt to stand up for herself.
sentences.cn: 她学会了自我保护。

sentences.c: You'll look taller if you stand up straight.
sentences.cn: 站直身子，你会显得高些。

synos.cn: 站起来；坚持；竖立；站得住脚；拥护

trans.cn: 飞吻：飞吻是一个意义上接近亲吻的手势或仪式。在飞吻时，嘴形闭起类似亲吻，但没有实际的碰触到别人的身体，有时也会配合手势，飞吻时先亲吻自己的手掌，再将手掌挥向对方。或是飞吻时将手掌平放在嘴的下方，再往外移动，有如将亲吻往外传递一様。也有些飞吻是脸颊对脸颊的碰触。

sentences.c: Let's blow a kiss.
sentences.cn: 让我们飞个吻。

sentences.c: Sometimes she stopped to smile at me or blow a kiss.
sentences.cn: 有时她会停下来对我微笑或给一个飞吻。

sentences.c: Blow a kiss.
sentences.cn: 给一个飞吻。

trans.cn: 到校上课；上学去；开始求学
上学：指前往学校接受教育。

sentences.c: She will have to go to school.
sentences.cn: 她将不得不去上学。

sentences.c: You've got to go to school, whether you like it or not.
sentences.cn: 不管你喜欢不喜欢，你得上学。

sentences.c: Some children can read and write before they go to school.
sentences.cn: 有些孩子在上学前就会看书写字了。

trans.cn: 取出；带出(散步等)；除去(污点等)；取得(专卖权等)
扣除，排除：指从总数中减去一部分，或者从范围中排除某些内容。
取出，提取：指从某处获取或提取出某物。
发泄，宣泄：指通过某种方式释放情绪或压力。
消除，清除：指除去某物，使其不再存在。
击败，淘汰：指在比赛或竞争中战胜对手，使其被淘汰。
借出，租出：指将某物借给他人使用，或者将房屋等出租给他人。
订购，购买：指通过订购或购买获取某物。
开始，着手：指开始进行某项活动或任务。

sentences.c: Would you take out the trash?
sentences.cn: 你可以把垃圾带出去吗？

sentences.c: Should I take out a loan?
sentences.cn: 我该去贷款吗？

sentences.c: How many teeth did the dentist take out?
sentences.cn: 牙科医生拔了几颗牙？

trans.cn: 询问某人的年龄的短语

sentences.c: How old is she—seventy odd?
sentences.cn: 她多大年纪？七十出头？

sentences.c: Now let me see—how old is she now?
sentences.cn: 让我想一想，她现在多大了呢？

sentences.c: How old is this building?
sentences.cn: 这座建筑已有多少年了？

trans.cn: 很高兴见到你；很高兴认识你；见到你很高兴
很高兴见到你：当说话者第一次与某人见面时使用的礼貌表达。

sentences.c: "Nice to meet you," said Michael. "Same here," said Mary Ann.
sentences.cn: “很高兴见到你，” 迈克尔说。“我也一样，” 玛丽·安说。

sentences.c: I'm David, nice to meet you.
sentences.cn: 我是大卫，很高兴见到你。

sentences.c: Thank you! Nice to meet you too!
sentences.cn: 谢谢！我也很高兴见到你！

trans.cn: 好主意：表示喜欢或同意某人的建议。

sentences.c: That's a darned good idea!
sentences.cn: 这真是绝妙的好主意！

sentences.c: I thought, "Wow, what a good idea."
sentences.cn: 我想: “哇，多妙的一个主意。”

sentences.c: Mmm, I'm not so sure that's a good idea.
sentences.cn: 嗯，我不知道这想法行不行。

sentences.c: She dozed off in front of the fire.
sentences.cn: 她在炉火前打起盹儿来。

sentences.c: He sat nodding in front of the fire.
sentences.cn: 他坐在火炉前打盹儿。

sentences.c: Mark snoozed in front of the television.
sentences.cn: 马克在电视机前打起盹儿来。

trans.cn: 熟透的（肉）：指肉煮熟后，质地坚实，颜色从内到外呈现灰褐色。

sentences.c: "Daddy! I came second in history"—"Well done, sweetheart!"
sentences.cn: “爸爸！我历史得了第二名”—“做得好，宝贝儿！”

sentences.c: Oh, well done, Sherlock. Did you figure that out all by yourself?
sentences.cn: 喔，干得好，大侦探。你全是自己推断出来的吗？

sentences.c: Well done is twice done.
sentences.cn: 做得好，事半功倍。

trans.cn: 是否包括某人：如何对待某人；
这对某人或某事有什么影响：对某人或某事应该采取什么措施；
用于提出建议：可以做些什么；
用于询问对方的回答：对于刚刚说的事情，你有什么看法或回答。

sentences.c: Now what about that shopping list? I've got to get going.
sentences.cn: 现在那张购物清单怎么样了？我得走了。

sentences.c: Now you've talked about work on daffodils, what about other commercially important flowers, like roses?
sentences.cn: 既然你谈到了种植水仙，那么其他有重要商业价值的花卉，如玫瑰，又怎么样呢？

sentences.c: 'But what about us?' he put in.
sentences.cn: “那我们怎么办？”他插嘴说。

sentences.c: This war has got to end soon.
sentences.cn: 这场战争必将很快结束。

sentences.c: Moya has got through to the final.
sentences.cn: 莫亚已进入决赛。

sentences.c: Which of the applicants has got the job?
sentences.cn: 哪一位应聘者得到了这份工作？

trans.cn: 多少：用于询问数量或程度。

sentences.c: How much homework do you get?
sentences.cn: 你有多少家庭作业？

sentences.c: How much money can I afford?
sentences.cn: 我能出得起多少钱？

sentences.c: How much thickener is used?
sentences.cn: 用了多少增稠剂？

sentences.c: A giraffe casts a shadow against a wall at the London Zoo.
sentences.cn: 在伦敦动物园，一只长颈鹿的影子投射在墙上。

sentences.c: On January 4, London Zoo keepers count new animals as annual animal headcount begins.
sentences.cn: 1月4日，英国伦敦动物园一年一度的“人口普查”开始了，工作人员正在清点园内新到的动物。

sentences.c: They recruited 121 visitors to, rather appropriately, the London Zoo, and split them into 43 groups.
sentences.cn: 他们邀请了大约121名游客访问伦敦动物园，并将他们分成了43个小组。

trans.cn: 寻找：指用视觉寻找特定方向或特定物体。

sentences.c: They look for foods that are low in calories.
sentences.cn: 他们寻找低热量食物。

sentences.c: We all need to look for ways to reduce our carbon footprint.
sentences.cn: 我们都需要寻找减少我们碳足迹的办法。

sentences.c: He went out with an unlicensed shotgun to look for the intruders.
sentences.cn: 他带着一把没有执照的霰弹枪出去寻找闯入者。

trans.cn: 校长：负责管理学校的人。

sentences.c: The head teacher usually takes us for French.
sentences.cn: 校长通常给我们上法语课。

sentences.c: They have appointed a new head teacher at my son's school.
sentences.cn: 我儿子读书的学校任命了一位新校长。

sentences.c: The head teacher came under a lot of criticism from the parents.
sentences.cn: 校长受到了家长的很多批评。

trans.cn: 弓箭：一种武器，由弓和箭组成，通常放在箭筒中。

sentences.c: He had a bow and arrow with him, and Tink noted it, and rubbed her little hands.
sentences.cn: 他随身带着弓和箭，小叮当注意到了，搓着她的小手。

sentences.c: He was armed with a bow and arrow.
sentences.cn: 他佩带着弓箭。

sentences.c: They also hunted with bow and arrow.
sentences.cn: 他们也用弓箭打猎。

sentences.c: I dare say you know about it already.
sentences.cn: 你大概已经知道了。

sentences.c: Go on! Take it! I dare you.
sentences.cn: 来呀！接受吧！我谅你也不敢。

sentences.c: I dare you to knock it off--and anybody that'll take a dare will suck eggs.
sentences.cn: 我谅你也不敢——谁敢的话，我就揍扁谁。

trans.cn: 赛车：一种非常快的汽车，用于专业汽车赛车比赛。

sentences.c: It is smoothly contoured to look like a racing car.
sentences.cn: 这辆车外形设计流畅，看起来像赛车。

sentences.c: A racing car is an extraordinary feat of engineering.
sentences.cn: 赛车是工程学的一项非凡业绩。

sentences.c: The racing car powered down the home straight.
sentences.cn: 赛车在终点直道上急驰。

trans.cn: 倒立：指以头部着地，身体倒立的姿势。
乒乓球：一种类似于网球的游戏，使用木板拍和一个小的空心塑料球，在桌面上进行。

sentences.c: Let's have a game of table tennis.
sentences.cn: 咱们来打场乒乓球赛吧。

sentences.c: Can you play table tennis?
sentences.cn: 你会打乒乓球吗？

sentences.c: They like playing table tennis.
sentences.cn: 他们喜爱打乒乓球。

trans.cn: 纸夹：一种由弯曲成平面环状的金属线制成的，用于将文件或纸张固定在一起的工具。

sentences.c: He fastened the papers together with a paper clip.
sentences.cn: 他用回形针别好了文件。

sentences.c: Cut a small hole in the top of the bottle cap. Unfold and stretch the paper clip out and thread it through the looped end of the swivel.
sentences.cn: 在瓶盖的顶部切开一个小口。铁丝上面可以挂一个漂亮的装饰链，把铁丝穿过瓶盖，在瓶盖的底部旋转制作出环形末端，这样我们的灯笼提手部分就做好了。

sentences.c: Running Rx If the pressure is bothering you and you can handle more hurt, press the end of a paper clip or safety pin, heated with a match, through the nail.
sentences.cn: 跑步对策如果烦恼您的是压力，您可能承受更多痛苦，用火柴加热环形针或安全别针，穿刺放血。

trans.cn: 长命百岁！〔在别人打喷嚏时说的话〕

sentences.c: "Bless you, Eva," he whispered.
sentences.cn: “愿上帝保佑你，伊娃，”他低声说道。

sentences.c: Good luck and God bless you.
sentences.cn: 祝你好运，愿上帝保佑你。

sentences.c: God bless you!
sentences.cn: 愿上帝保佑你！

trans.cn: 回家；〈口〉死；(忠告等)刻骨铭心；击中
回家，到家：返回或抵达自己的住所。

sentences.c: Come on, it's time to go home.
sentences.cn: 快点，该回家了。

sentences.c: Let's go home—it's getting late.
sentences.cn: 咱们回家吧，时间不早了。

sentences.c: Come (my) dearest, let's go home.
sentences.cn: 好啦，亲爱的，咱们回家吧。

trans.cn: 紧邻；在…近旁；仅次于；紧接

sentences.c: The commons is next to the gym.
sentences.cn: 学生公共食堂在体育馆的旁边。

sentences.c: The seat next to him was vacant.
sentences.cn: 他旁边的座位空着。

sentences.c: We sat next to each other.
sentences.cn: 我们紧挨着坐在一起。

synos.cn: 几乎，差不多；紧挨着；居于…之后

trans.cn: 非常，极其：用于强调某事物的重要性或程度。
非常重要：表示某事物在社区中非常重要。
非常掌控局势：表示某人非常掌控局势。
非常感谢：表示非常感谢。
不太喜欢：在否定语句中，表示不太喜欢某事物。

sentences.c: Your work is very much better.
sentences.cn: 你的工作要好得多。

sentences.c: I miss my family very much.
sentences.cn: 我很想念我的家人。

sentences.c: I enjoy reading very much.
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢阅读。

trans.cn: 校服：学生在学校中必须穿戴的一系列统一服装。

sentences.c: The hat is part of the school uniform.
sentences.cn: 帽子是校服的一部分。

sentences.c: She's already outgrown her school uniform.
sentences.cn: 她已经长得连校服都不能穿了。

sentences.c: They were in school uniform.
sentences.cn: 他们穿着校服。

trans.cn: 滴答声；时间的流逝声：表示钟表的滴答声或时间的流逝声。

sentences.c: Tick Tock Timer is that bully for me today.
sentences.cn: 那滴答定时器今天妙极了。

sentences.c: If there was ever a bookmark that actually reduced your unproductive nature, it is Tick Tock Timer.
sentences.cn: 如果曾经有那么一个书签，真的减弱了你低产的本性，那么它是定时器。

sentences.c: I am not sure who got me to the wonders of Tick Tock Timer, but it has simplified and saved my life in countless ways.
sentences.cn: 我不知道是谁将我带到滴滴答答定时器的奇观世界中，但它在无尽的方面简化及合理化我的生活了。

trans.cn: 现在几点了：用于询问当前的时间。

sentences.c: What time is it?
sentences.cn: 现在什么时候了？

sentences.c: What time is it? It's at eight o'clock.
sentences.cn: 什么时间了？八点了。

sentences.c: "What time is it?"—"Eight o'clock."
Burkoth lettered in American football.
sentences.cn: 伯考斯在足球赛中赢得了校名首字母徽章。

sentences.c: Vick carved out his niche as the fastest quarterback in American football.
sentences.cn: 维克凭借自身努力成为了足球队中最快的四分卫。

sentences.c: The 1933 national collegiate American football championship was won by Michigan.
sentences.cn: 1933年全美大学足球联赛的冠军是密歇根大学。

trans.cn: 白菜，青菜〔尤在东亚地区使用〕
中国卷心菜：一种蔬菜，也被称为中国白菜。

sentences.c: And for one kilogram of Chinese leaves, half would be discarded before packaging.
sentences.cn: 一千克的大白菜，在包装之前，一半会被丢弃。

sentences.c: What do Chinese people often use to boil tea leaves?
sentences.cn: 中国人通常用什么来煮茶叶？

sentences.c: Zongzi, a kind of traditional Chinese food eaten on the Dragon Boat Festival, is stuffed with glutinous rice, beans, meat and many different fillings and is wrapped in bamboo leaves or reed leaves.
sentences.cn: 粽子是在端午节吃的一种中国传统食物，里边用糯米，豆子，肉和许多不同的料填充，外边用竹叶或芦苇叶包裹。

sentences.c: He had disgraced the family name.
sentences.cn: 他玷污了家族的名声。

sentences.c: I don't want to bring shame on the family name.
sentences.cn: 我不想给家庭的声誉带来耻辱。

sentences.c: Shall I write your given or family name first?
sentences.cn: 我应该先写您的名字还是姓氏呢？

sentences.c: The actor and his son Michael, 5, look totally pumped up for the March 31 match-up between the L.A. Lakers and the Dallas Mavericks at the Staples Center.
sentences.cn: 马克和5岁的儿子似乎对3月31日在斯台普斯中心举行的湖人和小牛之间的对决充满期待。

trans.cn: 那又怎么样？那又有什么关系？
那又怎样：表示对某事物不感兴趣或不在乎的一种说法。

sentences.c: So what can we conclude from this debate?
sentences.cn: 那么从这场辩论中我们能推断出什么呢？

sentences.c: So what if he was late. Who cares?
sentences.cn: 他就是迟到了又怎么样。谁在乎？

sentences.c: So what do you think, eh?
sentences.cn: 那你是怎么想的，嗯？

trans.cn: 到底怎么样；有什么事吗；出什么事了

sentences.c: What's the matter, darling?
sentences.cn: 怎么啦，亲爱的？

sentences.c: What's the matter?
sentences.cn: 怎么回事？

sentences.c: What's the matter? Is there something wrong?
sentences.cn: 怎么了？出了什么事儿吗？

sentences.c: There's a lot of bitchiness.
sentences.cn: 说了许多刻薄话。

sentences.c: I listened to a lot of people handing out a lot of advice.
sentences.cn: 我听了许多人给予的很多忠告。

sentences.c: I've got a lot of commitments.
sentences.cn: 我有很多要做的事。

sentences.c: "Police! Open up!"—"Oh well," I thought, "here we go."
sentences.cn: “警察!开门！”—“噢，天哪，”我想，“又来了。”

sentences.c: Here we go round the books and bags.
sentences.cn: 我们绕着书和袋子走。

sentences.c: There is no time to waste so here we go.
sentences.cn: 我们没有时间浪费，抓紧开始吧。

trans.cn: 当然：表示对某事的肯定或同意。

sentences.c: Of course I'm not afraid!
sentences.cn: 当然我不怕！

sentences.c: This, of course, is utter nonsense.
sentences.cn: 这当然纯属胡言乱语。

sentences.c: Ben, of course, was the last to arrive.
sentences.cn: 本当然是最后一个到的。

trans.cn: 离开：离开一个地方或一个人。
离家一段时间：离家一段时间。
消失，结束：停止存在或发生，结束。

sentences.c: She told him in no uncertain terms to go away.
sentences.cn: 她非常明确地叫他走开。

sentences.c: We've decided not to go away after all.
sentences.cn: 我们到底还是决定不离开。

sentences.c: Why don't you and I go away this weekend?
sentences.cn: 为什么这个周末咱俩不去度假呢？

trans.cn: 度假：指离开家、学校或工作，通常是为了放松或旅行。

sentences.c: I fell in love on holiday but the girl broke my heart.
sentences.cn: 我在度假时坠入情网，但那个女孩却使我心碎。

sentences.c: They met while on holiday in Greece.
sentences.cn: 他们是在希腊度假时认识的。

sentences.c: We went on holiday together last summer.
sentences.cn: 去年夏天我们一起去度假了。

trans.cn: 客厅：住宅中用于居住者共同社交活动的房间。

sentences.c: The living room is tiny.
sentences.cn: 这间起居室极小。

sentences.c: I'd like the use of your living room, if I may.
sentences.cn: 如果可以，我想用用你的起居室。

sentences.c: The living room is pockmarked with bullet holes.
sentences.cn: 起居室墙壁上坑坑洼洼地布满了弹孔。

sentences.c: Is it the Great Wall in China?
sentences.cn: 那是中国的万里长城吗？

sentences.c: I know the Great Wall of China.
sentences.cn: 我知道中国的万里长城。

sentences.c: The Great Wall runs about 21, 200 kilometres.
sentences.cn: 长城长约21，200公里。

trans.cn: 新南威尔士州：澳大利亚东南部的一个州，首府是悉尼。

sentences.c: As it happens, there is one place where there may be such evidence: Cuddle Springs in New South Wales.
sentences.cn: 碰巧，有一个地方可能有这样的证据：新南威尔士州的拥抱泉。

sentences.c: So far there have been a number of searches by various groups around the world, including Australian searches using the radio telescope at Parkes, New South Wales.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，世界各地的不同组织已经进行了多次搜索，包括澳大利亚人使用射电望远镜在新南威尔士州帕克斯进行的搜索。

sentences.c: A new study from the University of New South Wales has discovered that during the working week, Australian fathers only spend an average of just over a minute each day alone with their children.
sentences.cn: 新南威尔士大学的一项新研究发现，在工作周期间，澳大利亚的父亲们每天单独陪伴孩子的时间平均只有一分钟多一点。

trans.cn: 夏季假期：英国和爱尔兰学年之间的夏季学校假期，以及学校学年中的休息时间。

sentences.c: During his summer holiday he visited Russia.
sentences.cn: 暑假期间他游览了俄罗斯。

sentences.c: Many skiers are happy to forego a summer holiday to go skiing.
sentences.cn: 许多滑雪者乐于放弃暑假去滑雪。

sentences.c: Memorial Day weekend marks the kick-off of the summer holiday season.
sentences.cn: 周末的阵亡将士纪念日标志着暑假的开始。

trans.cn: 拍照：使用相机或手机等设备拍摄照片。

sentences.c: It can take photos and videos.
sentences.cn: 它可以拍照和视频。

sentences.c: You mustn't take photos in the art museum.
sentences.cn: 你不能在艺术博物馆里拍照。

sentences.c: Do not cross safety lines to take photos.
sentences.cn: 请勿越过安全线拍照。

sentences.c: The UK leant towards the US proposal.
sentences.cn: 英国倾向于美国的提案。

sentences.c: Who distributes our products in the UK?
sentences.cn: 谁在英国经销我们的产品？

sentences.c: The UK has refused to recognize the new regime.
sentences.cn: 英国已拒绝承认这个新的政权。

trans.cn: 进入；当选；上台；(党派)组阁
到达现场：指到达某个地方或现场。
可用、可获得：指某物变得可用或可获得。
完成比赛：指在比赛中获得某个位置或名次。
发挥作用：指扮演某个角色或起到某种作用。
成熟、结果或生产：指某物达到成熟、结果或生产的阶段。

sentences.c: You may come in if you wish.
sentences.cn: 你想进来就进来吧。

sentences.c: Oh good, Tom's just come in.
sentences.cn: 嗯好，汤姆正好进来了。

sentences.c: I noticed them come in.
sentences.cn: 我注意到他们进来了。

trans.cn: 《小红帽》：指关于一个年轻女孩“小红帽”和一只大灰狼的欧洲童话故事。

sentences.c: She is now Little Red Riding Hood.
sentences.cn: 她如今是小红帽了。

sentences.c: Little Red Riding Hood forgets what mother said.
sentences.cn: 小红帽忘了妈妈说的话。

sentences.c: Grandmother and little red riding hood are inside.
sentences.cn: 外婆和小红帽在那里面。

trans.cn: 逃跑，离家出走，或者是逃脱

sentences.c: His first instinct was to run away.
sentences.cn: 他的本能反应就是逃跑。

sentences.c: I can't stand any more. I'm going to run away.
sentences.cn: 我再也忍受不了了，我打算逃跑。

sentences.c: They never became tame; they would run away if you approached them.
sentences.cn: 它们从没有被驯服，如果你靠近，它们就跑开了。

trans.cn: （棒球）决胜的，以一击结束比赛的：指导致足够的得分以结束比赛的一击或一次进攻：决胜的本垒打；决胜的保送。

sentences.c: We'd like nothing better than to see him walk off with the big prize.
sentences.cn: 没有什么能比他轻而易举地获得大奖而更令我们欢喜的了。

sentences.c: Both men shake hands and walk off stage, still talking.
sentences.cn: 两个人握手，走开，仍旧谈话中。

sentences.c: It may be impossible for the same worker to walk off an assembly line one day and join a physical therapy practice the next.
sentences.cn: 让一个工人今天离开流水线，明天就参加理疗的工作，也许是不可能的。

trans.cn: 布绒玩具：用布料制成并填充柔软材料的玩具动物，手感舒适。

sentences.c: Many children become attached to some inanimate object, such as a blanket or soft toy.
sentences.cn: 很多儿童都对一些诸如毯子或柔软玩具这样没有生命的物品产生依恋。

sentences.c: A soft toy was placed behind them.
sentences.cn: 他们背后放置了一个毛绒玩具。

sentences.c: The whole object of all the child's affection was a soft toy.
sentences.cn: 那孩子最心爱的东西是个柔软的玩具。

trans.cn: 歌剧院：一个主要用于演出歌剧的剧院，广义上也可以指剧院。

sentences.c: A shower of incendiaries struck the Opera House.
sentences.cn: 阵雨般的燃烧弹击中了歌剧院。

sentences.c: The Opera House is decorated with the Hungarian national colours: green, red, and white.
sentences.cn: 歌剧院饰以匈牙利的国旗色：绿、红、白。

sentences.c: When you see a picture of a famous concert hall that reminds you of a sailing ship, you probably know it is the Sydney Opera House in Australia.
sentences.cn: 当你看到一张让你想起帆船的著名音乐厅的照片时，你可能知道这是澳大利亚的悉尼歌剧院。

sentences.c: He is always chewing gum.
sentences.cn: 他总是在嚼口香糖。

sentences.c: One girl was chewing gum.
sentences.cn: 一个女孩在嚼口香糖。

sentences.c: She was admonished for chewing gum in class.
sentences.cn: 她在课堂上嚼口香糖，受到了告诫。

trans.cn: 沉睡的，熟睡的：形容一个人正在深度睡眠中。

sentences.c: On the bed lay Peter fast asleep.
sentences.cn: 床上躺着熟睡的彼得。

sentences.c: Dorothy fell among the poppies, fast asleep.
sentences.cn: 多萝茜倒在罂粟花丛中睡着了。

sentences.c: She was fast asleep, breathing evenly.
sentences.cn: 她睡熟了，呼吸很平稳。

trans.cn: 赶快：尽快行动或加快速度。
催促：敦促他人加快行动或完成任务。

sentences.c: For Gawd's sake hurry up!
sentences.cn: 看在上帝的份上快点吧！

sentences.c: Oh you're so slow; come on, hurry up!
sentences.cn: 哎哟，你可真慢；加把劲，快点！

sentences.c: I wish the bus would hurry up and come.
sentences.cn: 我希望公共汽车能快点来。

trans.cn: 稍等一下：用于请求某人稍等一下或停下来片刻。
等一下：用于要求某人停下来或倾听。

sentences.c: Could you hold for just a minute?
sentences.cn: 你能等一分钟不挂断吗？

sentences.c: OK, wait just a minute.
sentences.cn: 好的，稍微等一下。

sentences.c: Just a minute. Hold the line, please.
sentences.cn: 稍等一下，请别挂线。

trans.cn: 便签本：一种用于记录笔记、备忘录等的小本子。

sentences.c: Always have a pen and paper (note pad) near the telephone.
sentences.cn: 总是在电话旁放一支笔和纸张(草写本)。

sentences.c: Gayle Delaney: Just keep a note pad by your bed before you go to sleep.
sentences.cn: 盖尔·德莱尼：睡觉前在床边放一个笔记本。

sentences.c: For example, the note Pad sample application USES a content provider to save notes.
sentences.cn: 比如，Note Pad示例使用了一个content provider来保存笔记。

trans.cn: 嗯哼：表示肯定或同意的感叹词。

sentences.c: WHAT HE SAYS: "uh huh."
sentences.cn: 他说：“嗯哼。”

sentences.c: Rose: uh huh. I can't believe it!
sentences.cn: 柔丝：喔，我真不敢相信！

sentences.c: It's just his view of the world. Uh huh. Okay.
sentences.cn: 它只是他眼中的世界，嗯嗯，好。

trans.cn: 握手：握住另一个人的手，作为问候、告别、协议等的表达方式。

sentences.c: Do people in Italy shake hands when they meet?
sentences.cn: 在意大利，人们见面时握手吗？

sentences.c: Hello, Trish. I won't shake hands, because I'm filthy.
sentences.cn: 你好，特里斯。我就不握手了，我的手好脏。

sentences.c: Don't shake hands!
sentences.cn: 不要握手！

trans.cn: 购物：指购买商品或物品的行为。

sentences.c: It is possible for many of them to do shopping through the Internet.
sentences.cn: 对他们中的许多人来说，通过互联网购物都成为可能。

sentences.c: My daughter was very pleased to do shopping.
sentences.cn: 我的女儿非常喜欢去购物。

sentences.c: I often do shopping in this arcade-window-shopping.
sentences.cn: 这条街我常逛只逛不买。

trans.cn: 在那里，在一定距离之外：指在离说话人一定距离的地方。
到那个地方，向那里：表示前往或指向某个地方。
（美国俚语）在美国：表示某人目前居住在美国。

sentences.c: Quick, bag that table over there!
sentences.cn: 快点占住那边的桌子！

sentences.c: That's my dad over there.
sentences.cn: 那边那位是我爸爸。

sentences.c: That's Peter over there.
sentences.cn: 那边那个人是彼得。

trans.cn: 电话亭：一个非常小的房间或封闭结构，内设有公用电话。

sentences.c: I called him from the phone box on the corner.
sentences.cn: 我在拐角处的电话亭打电话给他。

sentences.c: LoveFone, a company that advocates repairing cellphones rather than abandoning them, opened a mini workshop in a London phone box in 2016. The tiny shops made economic sense, according to Robert Kerr, a founder of LoveFone.
sentences.cn: LoveFone 是一家提倡手机维修，反对丢弃手机的公司。该公司于2016年在伦敦的一间电话亭里开设了一个迷你工作室，LoveFone 的创始人罗伯特·科尔表示，这间小工作室具有一定的经济意义。

sentences.c: The phone box was vandalized.
sentences.cn: 那个电话亭被破坏了。

trans.cn: 电话通话：通过电话进行的对话。

sentences.c: I need to make a phone call.
sentences.cn: 我需要打个电话。

sentences.c: I have to make a phone call.
sentences.cn: 我得打个电话。

sentences.c: The phone call came after months of silence.
sentences.cn: 几个月没有音信之后，打来了一个电话。

trans.cn: 明天见：告别时表示明天再见面。

sentences.c: I'll see you tomorrow evening.
sentences.cn: 我明天晚上见你。

sentences.c: I'm off now. See you tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我走了。明天见。

sentences.c: Anyway, I'd better go now—I'll see you tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 反正我现在还是走的好—明天见。

sentences.c: Could you wait a moment , please?
sentences.cn: 请您稍等一下，好吗？

sentences.c: If you can wait a moment, I'll sort it all out for you.
sentences.cn: 要是你能等一会儿，我就可以把什么都给你弄好。

sentences.c: I can't wait a moment!
sentences.cn: 我连一刻也没法等了！

trans.cn: 停下来：达到不再移动的状态：停止。
停止：达到没有进一步活动的状态：停止。

sentences.c: Work has temporarily come to a stop while the funding is reviewed.
sentences.cn: 资金审查期间工作暂停。

sentences.c: People often wrongly open doors before the train has come to a stop.
sentences.cn: 人们常常在火车停下之前错误地打开车门。

sentences.c: The guarantees come to a stop Friday, however.
sentences.cn: 然而，这些担保在星期五停止了。

trans.cn: 去钓鱼：到水边或船上进行钓鱼活动。

sentences.c: Let's go fishing this weekend.
sentences.cn: 咱们这个周末去钓鱼吧。

sentences.c: They can go fishing in the lake.
sentences.cn: 他们可以去湖里钓鱼。

sentences.c: They often go fishing.
sentences.cn: 他们常去钓鱼。

sentences.c: The north pole is warmer than the south and the circulation of air around it is less well contained.
sentences.cn: 北极比南极温暖，其周围的空气循环更为畅通。

sentences.c: The North Pole has no land, only thick ice.
sentences.cn: 北极没有陆地，只有厚厚的冰层。

sentences.c: The island is about one thousand kilometers from the North Pole.
sentences.cn: 这个岛离北极大约有一千公里。

trans.cn: 北极熊：一种生活在北极地区的大型肉食性熊，毛色呈乳白色。

sentences.c: Of the nineteen recognized polar bear subpopulations, three are declining, six are stable, one is increasing, and nine lack enough data.
sentences.cn: 在19个公认的北极熊亚种群中，3个在下降，6个较稳定，1个在增加，9个缺乏足够的数据。

sentences.c: If you live near the Arctic Circle, hug the closest polar bear.
sentences.cn: 如果你生活在北极圈附近，请拥抱离你最近的北极熊。

sentences.c: Although polar bears' locomotion is similarly inefficient, polar bear cubs walk along with their mother.
sentences.cn: 尽管北极熊的运动能力同样低下，北极熊幼崽还是和妈妈一起前行。

sentences.c: My friend was hungry, so we drove to a shopping mall to get some food.
sentences.cn: 我朋友饿了，于是我们就驱车来到一家购物商场买些吃的。

sentences.c: It was, in effect, an outdoor shopping mall.
sentences.cn: 它，实际上，是一个户外购物商场。

sentences.c: A new shopping mall with a large garden will be built.
sentences.cn: 即将建造带有大花园的新购物中心。

trans.cn: 磁南极：磁铁的指向南方的极点。

sentences.c: Five members of Scott's expedition made it to the South Pole.
sentences.cn: 斯科特率领的探险队的五名成员一直来到了南极。

sentences.c: When Scott reached the South Pole he found that Amundsen had anticipated him.
sentences.cn: 斯科特到达南极时发现阿蒙森已先到过那里。

sentences.c: Chinese researchers hope to use the instruments onboard Chang'e-4 to find and study areas of the South Pole-Aitken basin.
sentences.cn: 中国的研究者希望使用嫦娥四号上的设备来寻找和研究南极艾特肯盆地。

trans.cn: 《功夫熊猫》：一部好莱坞梦工场动画电影，讲述敦厚可爱、醉心美食，生性慵懒的熊猫阿宝成为神龙大侠的故事。

sentences.c: It includes seven theme parks, such as Kung Fu Panda: Land of Awesomeness and Transformers: Metrobase.
sentences.cn: 它包含如功夫熊猫盖世之地和变形金刚基地等7大主题景区。

sentences.c: I'm the real Kung Fu Panda.
sentences.cn: 我是真正的功夫熊猫。

sentences.c: You've probably heard of Kung Fu Panda.
sentences.cn: 你或许听说过《功夫熊猫》。

trans.cn: 科幻小说：主要涉及实际或想象中的科学对社会或个人的影响，或者具有科学因素作为基本定向组成部分的小说。

sentences.c: He loves science fiction in particular.
sentences.cn: 他特别喜爱科幻小说。

sentences.c: In this section you'll find horror and science fiction.
sentences.cn: 你可以在这一部分找恐怖和科幻小说。

sentences.c: The idea of cloning extinct life forms still belongs to science fiction.
sentences.cn: 对绝种的生命形式进行克隆的想法仍然属于科学幻想。

sentences.c: I saw Louise walking slowly to the bus stop.
sentences.cn: 我看见路易斯慢慢地走向公共汽车站。

sentences.c: While I was waiting at the bus stop, three buses went by in the opposite direction.
sentences.cn: 我在公共汽车站等车时，对向驶过了三辆公共汽车。

sentences.c: It's near the bus stop.
sentences.cn: 它就在公共汽车站附近。

trans.cn: 劳驾，对不起（用于礼貌地引起某人的注意）
打扰一下：作为礼貌的方式开始说话、打断别人、引起别人的注意、表示不同意、道歉等。

sentences.c: Excuse me, is this your seat?
sentences.cn: 对不起，这是您的座位吗？

sentences.c: Excuse me, but are you Mr. Honig?
sentences.cn: 打扰一下，请问您就是霍尼格先生吗？

sentences.c: Excuse me, could you let me through?
sentences.cn: 对不起，能让我过去吗？

sentences.c: He rang up the police station.
sentences.cn: 他给警察局打了电话。

sentences.c: The police station was blown up by terrorists.
sentences.cn: 警察局被恐怖分子炸毁了。

sentences.c: He was taken to the police station for questioning.
sentences.cn: 他被带到警察局盘问。

trans.cn: 邮局：一种提供邮政服务的公共机构，如接收、处理、发送信件、包裹等。

sentences.c: I went round to the post office.
sentences.cn: 我到邮局去了一趟。

sentences.c: I'm just going down to the post office.
sentences.cn: 我正要到那边的邮局去。

sentences.c: You can buy your stamps at the post office.
sentences.cn: 你可以在邮局买邮票。

trans.cn: 旅游信息问讯处：为游客提供信息、宣传册、地图等的办公室，位于某个地区或地点。

sentences.c: The tourist office operates a useful room-finding service.
sentences.cn: 这个旅游办事处开办了实用的找房业务。

sentences.c: Further information is available from the local tourist office.
sentences.cn: 进一步详情可向当地的旅游办事处查询。

sentences.c: The local tourist office should be your first port of call in any town.
sentences.cn: 当地旅游局应该是你到任何一个城镇的第一站。

trans.cn: 火车站：火车停靠供乘客上下车的地方。

sentences.c: We're handily placed for the train station.
sentences.cn: 我们被安置在去火车站近便的地方。

sentences.c: The train station was packed solid with people.
sentences.cn: 火车站上人挤得水泄不通。

sentences.c: His daughter Carly drove him to the train station.
sentences.cn: 她的女儿卡莉开车送他去火车站。

trans.cn: 儿童节（基督教会浸礼的节日，通常在六月的第二个星期日）

sentences.c: Children had fun playing in Disneyland on Children's Day.
sentences.cn: 儿童节那天，孩子们在迪士尼乐园玩得很开心。

sentences.c: It's a kind of children's day.
sentences.cn: 这是孩子们的节日。

sentences.c: I wish you a happy Children's Day!
sentences.cn: 祝你儿童节快乐！

synos.cn: 儿童节（基督教会浸礼的节日，通常在六月的第二个星期日）

trans.cn: 取得进展：指事物取得进展或进展顺利。
出现：指某人或某物出现或到达。
陪同：指陪同某人前往某地。

sentences.c: Your French has come along a lot recently.
sentences.cn: 你的法语最近进步很大。

sentences.c: I'm not getting married in a hurry—I'm waiting for Mr Right to come along.
sentences.cn: 我不想匆忙结婚—我在等着如意郎君的出现。

sentences.c: Come along! We're late.
sentences.cn: 快点！我们迟到了。

trans.cn: 错过：没有被注意到或被某人采取行动的情况下发生。

sentences.c: As they pass by, a piteous wailing is heard.
sentences.cn: 他们经过时，传出一阵痛哭声。

sentences.c: Birds were chattering somewhere, and occasionally he could hear a vehicle pass by.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿们在某处啁啾，偶尔他能听到一辆汽车经过。

sentences.c: Also, you can watch different people pass by.
sentences.cn: 此外，你可以看到不同的人经过。

trans.cn: 害怕：以一种不合理或不必要的方式害怕事物。

sentences.c: There's nothing to be afraid of.
sentences.cn: 没有什么要害怕的。

sentences.c: There's no need to be afraid of him—he's a big softie.
sentences.cn: 没必要害怕他—他心特好。

sentences.c: They may be afraid of losing you.
sentences.cn: 他们可能害怕失去你。

trans.cn: 从母体中出生，开始存在：指某人在出生时就具备某种特质或命运。

sentences.c: The determinist doctrines in question maintained that certain people were born to be slaves.
sentences.cn: 上述的决定论信条坚信某些人生来就是奴隶。

sentences.c: Maybe you were not born to be a pianist.
sentences.cn: 也许你生来就不是钢琴家的料子。

sentences.c: We are not born to handle quantitative distinctions skillfully.
sentences.cn: 我们不是生来就能熟练处理数量差异的。

trans.cn: 牛仔帽：一种带有宽边和大软顶的帽子，通常被牛仔或西部牧民穿戴。

sentences.c: Let me put on a cowboy hat.
sentences.cn: 让我戴上牛仔帽。

sentences.c: She threw me a cowboy hat.
sentences.cn: 她丢给我一顶牛仔帽。

sentences.c: I had a cowboy hat and cowboy boots.
sentences.cn: 我有一顶牛仔帽和牛仔靴。

trans.cn: 擅长；一清二楚；拿手的；精明的

sentences.c: Are you any good at figures?
sentences.cn: 你的算术好吗？

sentences.c: She was good at repartee.
sentences.cn: 她善于机智地应答。

sentences.c: She's good at art and design.
sentences.cn: 她擅长美术和设计。

trans.cn: 举起双手：表示投降、放弃抵抗或遵守命令时，举起双手的动作。

sentences.c: Hands up, or I will shoot you!
sentences.cn: 举起手来，否则我就开枪了！

sentences.c: Hands up and drop your gun!
sentences.cn: 举起手来，把枪放下！

sentences.c: She brought her hands up.
sentences.cn: 她扬起双手。

sentences.c: We don't know how much money people get from popcorn sales, but film fans usually eat a lot of this salty food, especially when watching a horror film.
sentences.cn: 我们不知道卖爆米花能赚多少钱，但影迷通常会吃很多这种带咸味的食物，尤其是看恐怖电影的时候。

sentences.c: Never take me to a horror film again. I was scared out of my wits.
sentences.cn: 以后再也不要带我去看恐怖电影，我简直被吓得魂不附体。

sentences.c: That is the real horror film.
sentences.cn: 这才是真正的恐怖电影。

trans.cn: 沙堡：在沙滩上用沙子建造的小型城堡或其他结构的模型。

sentences.c: Ba Bi is building a sand castle.
sentences.cn: 巴比在用沙堆城堡。

sentences.c: World's first sand castle hotel at Weymouth beach in the seaside Town of Dorset in the UK.
sentences.cn: 位于英国多赛特镇韦茅斯海滩的第一所世界沙堡酒店。

sentences.c: The hut, one-story tall and made of adobe, had small windows and was as worn as a sand castle.
sentences.cn: 小屋只有一层，以土坯制成，墙上开有几孔小窗口，像个破败的沙土城堡。

trans.cn: 大声呼喊：因疼痛、恐惧、惊讶等而发出大声的声音。
大声说：以大声或远距离的方式说话。
迫切需要：表示某事明显需要或应该有特定的事物、人员、用途等。

sentences.c: You cry out, don't you?
sentences.cn: 难道没有哭出来吗？

sentences.c: I stopped my ears but still heard her cry out.
sentences.cn: 我捂上耳朵，但还能听见她大声喊叫。

sentences.c: He felt so happy that he tried his best to cry out, "Oh, my Fairy!"
sentences.cn: 他感到很高兴，尽力叫道：“噢，我的仙女！”

trans.cn: 相处，和睦相处：指在人际关系中和谐相处，没有冲突或矛盾。
过日子，生活：指维持生活所需，勉强度日。
进展，进行：指事情的进展或进行。

sentences.c: We get along just fine together.
sentences.cn: 我们相处得很融洽。

sentences.c: It's impossible to get along with him.
sentences.cn: 不可能跟他和睦相处。

sentences.c: I just can't get along without a secretary.
sentences.cn: 没有秘书我简直寸步难行。

synos.cn: （勉强）生活；进展；（使）前进；与…和睦相处

trans.cn: 不要紧；没关系，没什么；好极了

sentences.c: That's all right.
sentences.cn: 没关系。

sentences.c: That's all right. Show me the blue pen, please.
sentences.cn: 没关系。请把那个蓝钢笔给我看看。

sentences.c: "Yes, yes, that's all right; thank you very much indeed," said the Toad hurriedly.
sentences.cn: “是的，是的，没关系；真的非常感谢你。”托德急忙说。

trans.cn: 那没关系：表示对某事表示接受或不介意，用于回应别人的道歉或请求。

sentences.c: I'd rather email than phone, if that's OK by you.
sentences.cn: 如果你认为可以的话，我想发电邮而不打电话。

sentences.c: I'd just like to ask you a few questions about your lifestyle. It that's OK with you?
sentences.cn: 我想问你几个关于你的生活方式的问题。你觉得可以吗？

sentences.c: That's OK between sisters but becomes dangerous territory when you're talking to the children of friends or acquaintances.
sentences.cn: 在姐妹之间这是可以的，但当你和朋友或熟人的孩子交谈时，这就变成了危险的领域。

trans.cn: 打开：激活或通过转动控制器使流动、操作或功能运行；
使兴奋：使某人感到兴奋或激动。

sentences.c: I want to turn on the television.
sentences.cn: 我想打开电视机。

sentences.c: I wish I knew how to turn on the heating.
sentences.cn: 要是我知道如何打开暖气装置就好了。

sentences.c: Motorists were forced to turn on their headlights at midday.
sentences.cn: 驾车者被强制要求在正午打开前灯。

trans.cn: 双子塔：指原本位于美国纽约曼哈顿的世界贸易中心的两座高耸的摩天大楼，于2001年9月11日遭遇恐怖袭击而倒塌。

sentences.c: When the twin towers fell, Americans stopped traveling.
sentences.cn: 当双子塔倒塌时，美国人暂停了行走的步伐。

sentences.c: When the twin towers fell, Americans stopped travelling.
sentences.cn: 当双子塔倒塌时，美国人暂停了行走的步伐。

sentences.c: The building stands in the area where the twin towers of the World Trade Center once stood.
sentences.cn: 该建筑坐落在世贸中心双子塔曾经矗立的地方。

trans.cn: 借出：指满足所有要求并借走图书馆书籍。
结账：指列举和计算（出售商品）的费用，并接受付款，尤指在自助商店。
退房：指离开并支付住宿费用（如在酒店）。

sentences.c: Check out the new website. It's the bomb!
sentences.cn: 看一看这新网站。简直是太棒了！

sentences.c: Guests should check out of their rooms by noon.
sentences.cn: 客人必须在中午以前办理退房手续。

sentences.c: The local police found her story didn't check out.
sentences.cn: 当地警方证实她的说法不成立。

phrases.cn: 付款柜台；收银台；结账处
退房时间；检查时间；清除时间

synos.cn: 检验；结帐离开；通过考核；盖章

trans.cn: 灯笼展览会：一种传统的中国文化活动，通常在农历新年期间举行，人们会在公共场所或街道上展示各种各样的彩灯和灯笼。

sentences.c: In fact, at the Dongtou Lantern Fair.
sentences.cn: 其实，在洞头灯会上啊。

sentences.c: The integration of Lantern Fair in Luochun County and folk belief is a special form of local folk customs.
sentences.cn: 洛川县灯棚会与民间信仰的结合是地方乡土民俗的一种特殊形式。

sentences.c: The annual event, now in its 32nd year, is made up of several themed zones including a sculpture art expo and a lantern fair.
sentences.cn: 这个一年一度的盛会，今年已经是第32届举行，它由冰雕艺术展览和灯会等数个主题板块组成。

sentences.c: Today is the Lantern Festival.
sentences.cn: 今天是元宵节。

sentences.c: When is the Lantern Festival?
sentences.cn: 什么时候是元宵节？

sentences.c: I later realized it was Lantern Festival.
sentences.cn: 我后来才知道是元宵节。

trans.cn: 封锁出：指对一群雇员实施封锁。

sentences.c: Lotus Domino 7 also allows you to lock out a user account and to force a password change on next authentication.
sentences.cn: Lotus Domino 7也允许锁定用户帐户并在下一次身份验证时强制更改口令。

sentences.c: However this isn't a good solution because it may lock out the other threads from being able to have fair access.
sentences.cn: 但是，这并非一个很好的解决方案，因为它可能会妨碍其他线程合法的访问。

sentences.c: Cabin crew could lock out certain programmes for unaccompanied minors who sat close to crew, said spokesman Mark Street.
sentences.cn: 发言人Mark Street说，乘务员可以对坐在他们附近且无人陪同的未成年乘客实行部分节目的停播。

trans.cn: 中秋节：中国文化以及其他东亚和东南亚文化中庆祝秋季丰收的节日。

sentences.c: Where are Tom's parents going for the Mid-Autumn Festival?
sentences.cn: 汤姆的父母中秋节要去哪里？

sentences.c: Miss Liu, can you tell me how do you celebrate the Mid-Autumn Festival?
sentences.cn: 刘老师，你能告诉我你们怎么庆祝中秋节吗？

sentences.c: Chinese people have been celebrating the Mid-Autumn Festival and enjoying mooncakes for centuries.
sentences.cn: 中国人庆祝中秋节和吃月饼的历史已经有几个世纪长了。

trans.cn: 月饼：一种传统的中国糕点，通常在中秋节期间食用。

sentences.c: Bread is different from moon cake.
sentences.cn: 面包和月饼不同。

sentences.c: Moon cake is quite sweet.
sentences.cn: 月饼非常甜。

sentences.c: Can I have a moon cake?
sentences.cn: 我可以吃一个月饼吗？

sentences.c: Sweet potato and bamboo rice are my breakfast!
sentences.cn: 甘薯和竹子饭是我的早餐！

sentences.c: Corn, sweet potato, soybean and oats are all coarse food grains.
sentences.cn: 玉米、红薯、大豆和燕麦都是粗粮。

sentences.c: I understood why the old man asked me to buy his wife's sweet potato.
sentences.cn: 我明白了为什么老人要我买他妻子的红薯。

sentences.c: The TP fans produce air circulation that will keep an area from becoming stagnant with hot or polluted air.
sentences.cn: TP的风扇产生空气循环，驱散热空气和污染空气。

sentences.c: I Tried tp keep a straight face.
sentences.cn: 试着摆出一张严肃的脸。

trans.cn: 收起，放好：将某物放回它通常存放的地方，当不使用时，例如放入抽屉中。
关进监狱，送进精神病院：指将某人长期关押在监狱或精神病院中。。

sentences.c: "Yes, Mom," replied Cheryl as she slowly put away her doll.
sentences.cn: “是的，妈妈，”谢里尔一边回答，一边慢慢地把她的玩具娃娃收起来。
