sentences.c: Would you put away your toys?
sentences.cn: 你能把玩具放好吗？

sentences.c: Put away your shoes.
sentences.cn: 把鞋子放好。

trans.cn: 小心，警惕：要小心谨慎或保持警惕；
特别注意：特别关注做或不做某事；
保重：表达离别时的祝福或在信息结尾时的问候等非正式用法。

sentences.c: See that you take care of him.
sentences.cn: 你一定要好好照顾他。

sentences.c: I can take care of your kind.
sentences.cn: 我能对付你这类人。

sentences.c: We need to take care of our bodies.
sentences.cn: 我们需要照顾好自己的身体。

trans.cn: 黑犀牛：一种生活在撒哈拉以南非洲的犀牛，具有可伸缩的上唇，中间突出。

sentences.c: Port Lympne Reserve, which runs a breeding programme, has welcomed the arrival of a rare black rhino calf.
sentences.cn: 负责繁育计划的林姆尼港保护区迎来了一只稀有的黑犀牛幼崽。

sentences.c: When the tiny creature arrived on January 31, she became the 40th black rhino to be born at the reserve.
sentences.cn: 当这只小家伙在1月31日出生时，她成为了在该保护区出生的第40头黑犀牛。

sentences.c: According to the World Wildlife Fund, the global black rhino population has dropped as low as 5500, giving the rhinos a "critically endangered" status.
sentences.cn: 根据世界自然基金会表示，全球的黑犀牛数量已下降至5500头，使犀牛处于“极度濒危”状态。

trans.cn: 看一看：观察或查看某物。

sentences.c: I insisted that we should have a look at every car.
sentences.cn: 我坚持我们应该把每辆车都看一看。

sentences.c: Let's have a look at the TV guide and see what's on.
sentences.cn: 咱们看看电视节目单上有什么节目。

sentences.c: I don't suppose (that) I could have a look at your newspaper, could I?
sentences.cn: 我能不能看看您的报纸？

trans.cn: 华南虎：一种原产于中国南部的虎，因其生活在华南地区而得名。由于过度捕猎和栖息地丧失，华南虎已经濒临灭绝。

sentences.c: The public are skeptical about his claim that he has found a South China tiger, because they can't grow in such an area at all.
sentences.cn: 公众对他发现华南虎的声明持怀疑态度，因为华南虎根本不可能在这种地方生长。

sentences.c: Fujian province presented the South China tiger.
sentences.cn: 福建省提出南中国老虎。

sentences.c: Smaller than the other tiger subspecies in size, the South China tiger has short, bearing broader black strips.
sentences.cn: 体型较其他亚种虎略小。毛短、呈棕黄色，黑色条纹较宽。

trans.cn: 激光唱机; CD 播放器

sentences.c: You can connect the speakers to your CD player.
sentences.cn: 你可以将这些扬声器与你的激光唱机连接起来。

sentences.c: This CD player lists at $200.
sentences.cn: 这台激光唱片机在价目单上定为200元。

sentences.c: He was slotting a CD into a CD player.
sentences.cn: 他正把一张光盘放入光盘播放器中。

trans.cn: 彼此：用于表示两个或更多人中的每个人相互做某事。

sentences.c: We're crazy about each other.
sentences.cn: 我们为彼此疯狂。

sentences.c: We eyed each other thoughtfully.
sentences.cn: 我们若有所思地看了看彼此。

sentences.c: We hardly know each other.
sentences.cn: 我们彼此还不大认识呢。

sentences.c: That's all the news there is for now.
sentences.cn: 目前新闻就这么多。

sentences.c: That's all for now.
sentences.cn: 暂时就这些。

sentences.c: Let's set aside my personal feelings for now.
sentences.cn: 目前咱们就不要顾及我的个人感情了。

trans.cn: 澳大利亚国庆日：澳大利亚的国庆日，每年的1月26日，庆祝第一批英国移民于1788年抵达澳大利亚。

sentences.c: Here in Australia, we celebrated Australia Day today.
sentences.cn: 今天在澳大利亚我们庆祝了澳大利亚日。

sentences.c: Australia Day is on 26th January and it's an important holiday here.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚日在1月26日，这是一个重要的节日。

sentences.c: Eleven painted kangaroos resided in New York City until Australia Day on January 26, 2005.
sentences.cn: 十一只装饰漂亮的袋鼠被放置在纽约港，一直到2005年1月26日澳大利亚日。

trans.cn: 春节：中国农历新年的另一种称呼，是中国最重要的传统节日之一。

sentences.c: The Spring Festival was coming.
sentences.cn: 春节快到了。

sentences.c: The Spring Festival is coming.
sentences.cn: 春节快要到来了。

sentences.c: It's about Spring Festival.
sentences.cn: 它是关于春节的。

trans.cn: 照顾，照料：指关心、照料或保护某人或某物。
照看，监视：指观察、监视或照看某人或某物的行动或情况。

sentences.c: I know the Lord will look after him.
sentences.cn: 我知道上帝会照顾他的。

sentences.c: It makes sense to look after yourself.
sentences.cn: 照顾好你自己是明智的。

sentences.c: Your baby depends on you to look after yourself properly while you are pregnant.
sentences.cn: 你的宝宝靠你怀孕时好好照顾你自己。

trans.cn: 一点也不：用于表示完全不同意或否定某种情况；
不用谢，不客气：用于礼貌地回答别人的道谢。

sentences.c: He was not at all jolly. Quite the reverse.
sentences.cn: 他一点儿也不高兴。恰恰相反。

sentences.c: He had not at all overrated Veronica's desirability.
sentences.cn: 他丝毫没有高估韦罗妮卡的性感。

sentences.c: "Sorry. I sound like Abby, don't I?"—"No. Not at all."
sentences.cn: “抱歉。我听上去像阿比，是吗？”—“不，一点不像。”

trans.cn: 脆皮豆：一种老式的肾豆中有纤维的品种，也可以指脆皮豆；另外还可以指一个非常高瘦的人。

sentences.c: My little brother is like string bean .
sentences.cn: 我的小弟弟长得像个豆芽菜。

sentences.c: TO FATHER — FROM YOUR FAVORITE STRING BEAN.
sentences.cn: 给父亲——您最宠爱的小豆子。

sentences.c: Our vegetable have potato, lettuce cucumber, peking cabbage, string bean.
sentences.cn: 我们的蔬菜有土豆，窝笋，黄瓜，大白菜，姜豆等等。

trans.cn: 全谷物：指未经加工或仅去除外壳的谷物，如全麦、糙米、燕麦等。

sentences.c: Most Americans don't eat enough fruits, vegetables or whole grains.
sentences.cn: 大多数美国人没有吃足够的水果、蔬菜或全谷物。

sentences.c: Whole grains such as brown bread are to be given, instead of "white" grains.
sentences.cn: 应该提供全谷物，比如黑面包，而不是“白”谷物。

sentences.c: Fruits, vegetables and whole grains provide nutrients and plant-based compounds vital for good health.
sentences.cn: 水果、蔬菜和全谷物能够提供对健康至关重要的营养和植物性化合物。

trans.cn: 紧握住：保持对某物的抓握。
等待：等待某事物（如电话连接）的到来；广义上指等待。
坚持：保持某种状态或位置。

sentences.c: Hold on! This isn't the right road.
sentences.cn: 等一下！这条路不对。

sentences.c: You should hold on to your oil shares.
sentences.cn: 你应该继续保留住你的石油股份。

sentences.c: Can you hold on? I'll see if he's here.
sentences.cn: 等一下行吗？我去看看他在不在。

synos.cn: 不挂断电话，等一下；继续

trans.cn: 杂交水稻：通过杂交育种技术培育出的一种高产、抗病虫害的水稻品种。

sentences.c: The hybrid rice increased the rice production.
sentences.cn: 杂交水稻提高了水稻产量。

sentences.c: Yuan made it possible to grow hybrid rice in large amounts, and he is called "Father of Hybrid Rice".
sentences.cn: 袁先生使大量种植杂交水稻成为可能，他被称为“杂交水稻之父”。

sentences.c: In 1973, the first hybrid rice appeared.
sentences.cn: 1973年，第一种杂交水稻诞生。

sentences.c: The poor chap's gone doolally.
sentences.cn: 这可怜的小伙子疯了。

sentences.c: Even the poor have their pride.
sentences.cn: 即使穷人也有他们的自尊。

sentences.c: He was contemptuous of the poor.
sentences.cn: 他那时对穷人是心怀蔑视的。

sentences.c: Who comes here into Sherwood Forest without my pass?
sentences.cn: 谁不经过我的许可就到谢伍德森林来了？

sentences.c: They said they would rather be outlaws a year in Sherwood Forest than President of the United States forever.
sentences.cn: 他们说，他们宁愿在谢伍德森林当一年的亡命之徒，也不愿永远做美国总统。

sentences.c: They will always remember the beautiful Sherwood Forest.
sentences.cn: 他们会永远怀恋美丽的舍伍德森林。

sentences.c: Using polite words every now and then can help us give a good impression on others.
sentences.cn: 时不时地使用礼貌用语能够让我们在他人心中留下一个良好的印象。

sentences.c: Every now and then he regretted his decision.
sentences.cn: 他有时为自己的决定后悔。

sentences.c: My father has a collection of magazines to which I return every now and then.
sentences.cn: 我父亲收藏杂志,我偶尔会翻阅一下。

trans.cn: 尼斯湖（位于英国苏格兰高原北部的大峡谷）

sentences.c: There have been many attempts, both light-hearted and serious, to locate the Loch Ness Monster.
sentences.cn: 为寻找“尼斯湖水怪”，已经进行了很多或轻松有趣或认真的尝试。

sentences.c: They went till Inverness via Loch Ness.
sentences.cn: 他们从尼斯湖走到因弗内斯。

sentences.c: What do people say about the monster in Loch Ness?
sentences.cn: 人们是怎么看待尼斯湖水怪的？

sentences.c: Every day you arrive in workspace with the same items—a cell phone, briefcase and/or purse, mail, keys, and change.
sentences.cn: 每天你都带着同样的东西进入工作区——一只手机、公文包和/或者手提包、邮件、钥匙、零钱。

sentences.c: Unless you have an asymmetric set-up, in which case the client can POST and/or PUT its order somewhere on the server.
sentences.cn: 除非你有一个不对称的设置，在这种情况下客户端可以 POST 和/或 PUT 它的订单到服务器的某处。

sentences.c: An attitude is a settled way of thinking, feeling and/or behaving towards particular objects, people, events or ideologies.
sentences.cn: 态度是一种思考、感受、和/或对特定物、人、事件或意识形态的固定行为方式。

trans.cn: pron．他的/她的：表示某人的性别不确定或不重要时，用于表示某人所拥有或与某人有关的事物。

sentences.c: It is natural for everyone to pay much emphasis on his/her own image.
sentences.cn: 每个人很在意自己的形象这是很正常的事情。

sentences.c: I will buy a cup of coffee for the most successful person in New York and ask for his/her secret of success.
sentences.cn: 我会为纽约最成功的人买一杯咖啡，并问问他（她）成功的秘诀。

sentences.c: A player should never go against his/her sponsor's will.
sentences.cn: 运动员不应违背赞助商的意愿。

sentences.c: If he/she goes into a negative swirl, ignore or give a simple "I see' or 'OK" reply.
sentences.cn: 如果他/她陷入了消极的漩涡中，忽略或者用简单的“我明白了”或“好”来答复。

sentences.c: Cheating undermines confidence and independence: the cheater is a fraud, and knows that without dishonesty, he/she would have failed.
sentences.cn: 欺骗会破坏信心和独立性：行骗者是骗子，他/她知道如果不去欺骗，他/她就会失败。

sentences.c: I hope one could get encouragement when he/she meets something bad and maybe someone else will be inspired and do good things.
sentences.cn: 我希望一个人在遇到不好的事情的时候能够得到鼓励，也许其他人也会受到鼓舞并去做一些好事。

sentences.c: A case in point is Ivy, 57, a pioneer in investment banking.
sentences.cn: 57岁的艾薇就是一个很恰当的例子，她是投资银行的先驱。

sentences.c: A case in point is the study by Linda Sax at UCLA, who used data from a large national survey of college freshmen to evaluate the effect of single-sex versus coeducational high schools.
sentences.cn: 加州大学洛杉矶分校的琳达·萨克斯的研究就是一个恰当的例子，她利用了一项全国性的大一新生调查来评估单性别高中和男女混合高中的效果。

sentences.c: A pair of bills sponsored by Massachusetts state Senator Jason Lewis and House Speaker Pro Tempore Patricia Haddad, to ensure "gender parity" on boards and commissions, provide a case in point.
sentences.cn: 马萨诸塞州参议员贾森·刘易斯和众议院临时议长帕特丽夏·哈达德为确保董事会和委员会中的 “性别平等” 而提出的两项议案就是一个很好的例子。

trans.cn: 尤其是：在所有考虑之前，特别是。

sentences.c: Above all, chairs should be comfortable.
sentences.cn: 首先椅子应该舒适。

sentences.c: He continued to place security above all other objectives.
sentences.cn: 他继续将安全置于其他所有目标之上。

sentences.c: Our goods compete in terms of product quality, reliability and above all variety.
sentences.cn: 我们的产品从质量、可靠性、尤其是多样性来看很有竞争力。

etymology.d: 来自中世纪英语. 参见荷兰语bovenal("above all").

trans.cn: 对…负有责任；对…做出解释；说明……的原因；导致；（比例）占
解释，说明：对某事物进行解释或说明。
占比，占据：在总数或总体中占有一定比例或位置。
对……负责，对……负有责任：对某事物负有责任或义务。
解决，处理：解决或处理某个问题或情况。

sentences.c: How do you account for the fact that unemployment is still rising?
sentences.cn: 你如何解释失业人数仍在增加这个现实？

sentences.c: The gene they discovered today doesn't account for all those cases.
sentences.cn: 他们今天发现的那种基因解释不了所有的那些情况。

sentences.c: The social services account for a substantial part of public spending.
sentences.cn: 社会服务性事业占政府开支的相当大的一部分。

synos.cn: 对…负有责任；对…做出解释；说明……的原因

trans.cn: 适应：适应不同的条件或用途，改变或改变某物。

sentences.c: It helps organisms adapt to environmental changes.
sentences.cn: 它帮助生物体适应环境变化。

sentences.c: Farmers already adapt to variable weather by changing their planting schedules.
sentences.cn: 农民已经通过改变种植计划来适应多变的天气。

sentences.c: Some amphibians adapt to arid environments by completing accelerated development with resting stages deep underground.
sentences.cn: 一些两栖动物通过在地下深处的休眠期内完成加速发育以适应干旱环境。

trans.cn: 适应：稍微改变以适应新的情况、环境或要求。

sentences.c: How did you adjust to college life?
sentences.cn: 你是怎么适应大学生活的？

sentences.c: The study speculated, having a white roommate helps academically prepared black students adjust to a predominantly white university.
sentences.cn: 研究推测，对于在学业方面有所准备的黑人学生来说，或许拥有一位白人室友可以帮助他们进行调节，以适应一所白人占主导地位的大学。

sentences.c: It took her a while to adjust to living alone.
sentences.cn: 她过了一段时间才适应独自生活。

trans.cn: 就……达成一致意见：在某个问题上达成共识或一致意见。

sentences.c: We rarely agree on what to do.
sentences.cn: 我们很少在要做的事情上看法一致。

sentences.c: The deal fell apart when we failed to agree on a price.
sentences.cn: 我们在价格上未能达成一致意见，生意吹了。

sentences.c: I value the opinion of my husband and we agree on most things.
sentences.cn: 我重视我丈夫的意见，而且我们在大多数事情上看法一致。

trans.cn: 同意或接受某事物或某个提议：指表示同意或接受某事物或某个提议。

sentences.c: We, the undersigned, agree to...
sentences.cn: 我们，本文件的具名人，同意…

sentences.c: I'll agree to anything for an easy life.
sentences.cn: 只要有安逸舒适的生活我什么都同意。

sentences.c: You must not agree to do it. Don't weaken.
sentences.cn: 你们一定不能同意做这件事。别心软。

trans.cn: 赞同：以赞同的态度看待（某事物）。

sentences.c: I'm inclined to agree with you.
sentences.cn: 我倾向于同意你的观点。

sentences.c: I don't agree with you there.
sentences.cn: 在那一点上，我不敢与你苟同。

sentences.c: I agree with you, as it happens.
sentences.cn: 我恰恰和你意见一致。

trans.cn: 各种各样的：指多种不同的事物或选择。

sentences.c: He resigned for a variety of reasons.
sentences.cn: 他由于种种原因辞职了。

sentences.c: A variety of heavy industries grew up alongside the port.
sentences.cn: 各种重工业在港口边上兴起并发展起来。

sentences.c: This tool can be used in a variety of ways.
sentences.cn: 这一工具有多种用途。

trans.cn: 上诉：上诉是指在法律中，案件被审查并请求对官方决定进行正式变更的过程。

sentences.c: We need to appeal to a wider customer base.
sentences.cn: 我们需要吸引更广泛的客户。

sentences.c: It's a movie that will appeal to the young.
sentences.cn: 这部电影年轻人会感兴趣。

sentences.c: They took their appeal to the Supreme Court.
sentences.cn: 他们上诉到了最高法院。

synos.cn: 呼吁；上诉；要求；对…有吸引力

trans.cn: 申请，请求，应用：指向某个机构或组织提出申请或请求，或者使用某物。

sentences.c: I am continuing to apply for jobs.
sentences.cn: 我在继续申请工作。

sentences.c: Only genuine refugees can apply for asylum.
sentences.cn: 只有真正的难民才能申请政治避难。

sentences.c: She's left it too late to apply for the job.
sentences.cn: 她申请那份工作已为时太晚。

trans.cn: 赞成、支持或认可某人或某事物，表示对其持有积极的看法：指对某人或某事物持有积极的看法，表示支持、认可或赞同。

sentences.c: We don't approve of smacking.
sentences.cn: 我们不赞成打孩子。

sentences.c: I don't approve of violence in any shape or form.
sentences.cn: 我不赞成任何形式的暴力行为。

sentences.c: Their parents had a puritanical streak and didn't approve of dancing.
sentences.cn: 他们的父母管教颇严格，不赞成跳舞。

trans.cn: 得出结论：通过分析和推理，最终得出一个判断或结论。

sentences.c: We arrive at a conclusion.
sentences.cn: 我们得出了结论。

sentences.c: We must arrive at a conclusion on what to do.
sentences.cn: 我们必须得到结论要做些什么。

sentences.c: We must weigh one fact with the next to arrive at a conclusion.
sentences.cn: 我们必须把各项事实加以权衡之后才能得出结论。

trans.cn: 因此，由于某事发生而产生的结果

sentences.c: As a result, services have been drastically reduced.
sentences.cn: 结果，服务被大大减少了。

sentences.c: He made one big mistake, and, as a result, lost his job.
sentences.cn: 他犯了个大错，结果丢了工作。

sentences.c: She died as a result of her injuries.
sentences.cn: 她由于受伤而死亡。

trans.cn: 交往：与一群人在一起，尤其是那些不被认可的人。

sentences.c: She didn't want to associate with the likes of me.
sentences.cn: 她不想与我这种类型的人交往。

sentences.c: This courtly poetry came out of the idea of chivalry and courtly love that you might associate with knights in shining armor.
sentences.cn: 这种宫廷风格的诗歌来源于骑士精神和宫廷式的爱情，你可能会把它与穿着闪亮盔甲的骑士联系在一起。

sentences.c: The meanings we associate with the phrase will change accordingly.
sentences.cn: 我们对这个短语意思的理解将随之改变。

synos.cn: 联合；与…联系在一起；和…来往

sentences.c: It only lasted a couple of years, as far as I know.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，它仅维持了几年。

sentences.c: As far as I know, the robot that can sweep the floor was invented in the 1980s.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，扫地机器人是在20世纪80年代发明的。

sentences.c: As far as I know, he works until midnight every day.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，他每天工作到半夜。

word: as far as one is concerned

sentences.c: They may be there forever as far as any one of us is concerned… and forever is a long, long time.
sentences.cn: 就我们任何一个人来说，它们也许会永远存在……永远是很长很长的时间。

sentences.c: One of the challenges for firms in customer migration situations is that the firm may not know when the relationship is over (as far as the customer is concerned).
sentences.cn: 对处于客户迁移情况下的公司的一个挑战是公司不知道关系什么时候结束(就客户而言)。

sentences.c: But as far as the single California mother is concerned, she's only one kind of crazy - baby crazy.
sentences.cn: 这位加利福尼亚的单身妈妈只是一种狂热症，那就是对孩子的疯狂。

trans.cn: 至少：表示最小的数量、程度或条件。

sentences.c: It'll cost at least 500 dollars.
sentences.cn: 这东西至少要花500元。

sentences.c: At least he knew right from wrong.
sentences.cn: 至少他明白是非。

sentences.c: At least they died happy.
sentences.cn: 至少他们死时很幸福。

trans.cn: 免费的：表示某物是免费的。

sentences.c: Goods, once they have been made, are assumed to move instantly and at no cost from place to place.
sentences.cn: 人们常常假定货物一旦被制造出来，就可以立即从一个地方转移到另一个地方，而不需要任何费用。

sentences.c: You'll be allowed the use of audiovisual equipment at no cost.
sentences.cn: 你可以免费使用视听设备。

sentences.c: The first truly free public library that circulated books to everyone at no cost was started in a small New England town in 1833.
sentences.cn: 1833年，在新英格兰的一个小镇上，第一家免费向所有人提供图书的公共图书馆成立了。

trans.cn: 可支配；可使用；随时可用

sentences.c: With so much rich interface at one's disposal, only two technical metrics on the client have any impact on the game's server infrastructure: network throughput and latency requirements.
sentences.cn: 尽管界面如此丰富，但是在客户机上只有两个技术指标对游戏的服务器基础结构有影响：网络吞吐量和延迟需求。

trans.cn: 同时；另一方面；与此同时
同时：表示两个或多个事件或情况同时发生或存在。

sentences.c: At the same time she felt a prick on her neck.
sentences.cn: 同时她感到脖子上一阵刺痛。

sentences.c: "We're all talking at the same time."—"Yeah. Sorry."
sentences.cn: “我们都在同时说话。”—“呃，对不起。”

sentences.c: She looked so beautiful, and at the same time so remote.
sentences.cn: 她看上去如此漂亮，但同时又那么孤傲。

trans.cn: 暗中负责；是真正的起源

sentences.c: There was a stream at the bottom of the garden.
sentences.cn: 花园尽头有一条小溪。

sentences.c: He sat at the bottom of the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他坐在楼梯底部。

sentences.c: I found some coins at the bottom of my bag.
sentences.cn: 我在我的手提包底找到了几枚硬币。

trans.cn: 与某个事物或行为有关联，可能会导致问题或危险：指与某个特定的事物或行为有联系或关联，可能会引起问题或危险。

sentences.c: We don't want to be associated with something as symbolic and hateful as a swastika.
sentences.cn: 我们不想和纳粹十字这样象征明显、代表仇恨的东西联系起来。

sentences.c: He no longer wished to be associated with the party's policy on education.
sentences.cn: 他不再愿意与该党的教育方针认同。

sentences.c: While eye contact may be a sign of connection or trust in friendly situations, it's more likely to be associated with dominance or intimidation in adversarial situations.
sentences.cn: 在友好的情境中，眼神交流可能是一种联结或信任的标志，而在敌对的情况下，它更倾向于与支配或恐吓联系在一起。

synos.cn: 和…联系在一起；与……有关，与……有关系

trans.cn: 意识到，知道：意识到某事或某物的存在或重要性。

sentences.c: Be aware of the terrible strain it can put on a child when you expect the best grades.
sentences.cn: 当你期盼最佳成绩时，要意识到这可能给孩子带来的可怕压力。

sentences.c: Advanced students need to be aware of the importance of collocation.
sentences.cn: 层次较高的学生必须意识到词语搭配的重要性。

sentences.c: As with many technological revolutions, you are unlikely to be aware of it.
sentences.cn: 正如很多技术革命一样，你不太可能意识到它。

trans.cn: 基于，以……为基础：建立在某种事物或概念之上，依赖于它来实现或发展。

sentences.c: Your grade will be based on four papers and a final exam.
sentences.cn: 你的成绩将根据四篇论文和期末考试决定。

sentences.c: Both countries agreed that normal relations would be based on noninterference in each other's internal affairs.
sentences.cn: 两国一致同意正常邦交关系应建立在互不干涉内政的基础上。

sentences.c: Should promotion be based on merit or seniority?
sentences.cn: 提拔一个人应当看业绩，还是看资历？

synos.cn: 根据，以…为基础；建立在…基础上

trans.cn: 注定会，必然会：表示某种情况或结果是不可避免的，一定会发生。

sentences.c: He'll be bound to find out what the skipping-rope is.
sentences.cn: 他一定会弄清楚跳绳是什么。

sentences.c: This package needs to be bound to a collection ID.
sentences.cn: 这个包需要绑定到一个集合id。

sentences.c: If you started counting, you'd be bound to get to it eventually.
sentences.cn: 如果你从这里开始数，你最后一定会到达那里的。

trans.cn: 有能力做某事：具备完成某项任务或达到某种状态的能力。

sentences.c: The British Olympic Association (BOA) has said that to earn a slot, a team must be capable of "a credible performance".
sentences.cn: 英国奥运协会（BOA）声称，队伍要拿得出“可信的成绩”才能取得参赛席位。

sentences.c: Such behavior is regarded as "all too human", with the underlying assumption that other animals would not be capable of this finely developed sense of grievance.
sentences.cn: 这种行为被认为“太人类化了”，其言下之意是，其他动物不可能有这种微妙的愤懑感。

sentences.c: Servers and storage must be capable of resizing without impact to users.
sentences.cn: 服务器和存储必须能够在不影响用户的情况下重新调整大小。

trans.cn: 小心，当心：用于提醒或警告某人要注意某种潜在的危险或风险。

sentences.c: Be careful of the nettles—they sting!
sentences.cn: 小心给荨麻扎着—荨麻有刺！

sentences.c: They had to be careful of floating chunks of ice.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不小心漂浮着的厚冰块。

sentences.c: Be careful of fallen power lines.
sentences.cn: 小心倒下的电线。

trans.cn: 被情绪冲昏头脑：变得如此兴奋，以至于无法控制自己的行为。

sentences.c: Don't be carried away by victory.
sentences.cn: 不要让胜利冲昏了头脑。

sentences.c: However, at night it is easy to be carried away by others.
sentences.cn: 可是当黑夜来临时，还是很容易被有心人背着拿走。

sentences.c: I closed my eyes, letting myself be carried away by my daughter's song.
sentences.cn: 我闭上眼睛，任由女儿的音乐牵引我的思绪。

sentences.c: But it can be difficult to be cooperative with someone we dislike.
sentences.cn: 但可能难以与人合作，我们不喜欢。

sentences.c: Long-living women are also more likely to be sympathetic and cooperative than women with a normal life span.
sentences.cn: 与寿命处于正常范围内的女性相比，长寿女性更有可能具有同情心和合作精神。

sentences.c: Leaders of the SCO observer countries and countries and international organizations that have established cooperative relations with the SCO will also be invited to the summit.
sentences.cn: 上海合作组织观察员国、同上海合作组织建立了合作关系的国家以及国际组织的领导人也将应邀与会。

trans.cn: 被覆盖：指表面被某种物质完全覆盖或充满。

sentences.c: The wet soil would be covered with extra grounds.
sentences.cn: 潮湿的土壤会被额外的土地覆盖。

sentences.c: The bulletin board at Wilmington's one-stop center used to be covered with job postings.
sentences.cn: 威尔明顿一站式职业中心的布告牌过去贴满了各种招聘广告。

sentences.c: Looking through a magnifying glass, Hanley focussed on the most legible fingerprint, which appeared to be covered with a clear finishing coat, like a varnish.
sentences.cn: 透过放大镜看，汉利将注意力集中到一枚最清晰的指纹上，这枚指纹表面似乎覆盖着一层罩膜，像是一层清漆。

trans.cn: 被比作，被类比为：用于将一个事物或概念与另一个事物或概念进行比较，以突出它们之间的相似之处或相同特征。

sentences.c: Our work can be compared to a battle.
sentences.cn: 我们的工作好比一场战斗。

sentences.c: A stream can be compared to a development branch.
sentences.cn: 流可以比喻成开发的分支。

sentences.c: Again, this can be compared to the standard schema from the W3C.
sentences.cn: 再一次地，我们可以将这一结果与W3C的标准模式进行比较。

trans.cn: 与……相比较：用于描述两个或多个事物之间的相似或不同之处。

sentences.c: Although you can share something with them, you should know that they can never be compared with the friends around you.
sentences.cn: 虽然你可以与他们分享一些东西，但你应该知道，他们永远无法与你周围的朋友相比。

sentences.c: Nothing in the world can be compared with red shoes.
sentences.cn: 世界上没有什么东西能和红鞋相比。

sentences.c: Chris knows that his boss likes Kim's work, and he expects that his work will be compared with hers.
sentences.cn: 克里斯知道他的老板很欣赏金姆的工作表现，他希望他的工作成果也能与她相比肩。

trans.cn: 被装饰以：指物体表面被添加装饰物或图案以增加美观或吸引力。

sentences.c: Hilton is building its own hotel there, which you may be sure will be decorated with Hamlet Hamburger Bars, the Lear Lounge, the Banquo Banqueting Room, and so forth ,and will be very expensive.
sentences.cn: 希尔顿正在那里建造自己的酒店，你可以肯定的是酒店会配有哈姆雷特汉堡吧、李尔王休息室、班柯宴会厅等等，而且会非常昂贵。

sentences.c: Type parameters can be decorated with the keywords "In" and "Out.
sentences.cn: 类型参数可由关键字“In”和“Out”修饰。

sentences.c: JPA prescribes that object relationships be decorated with persistence qualities.
sentences.cn: JPA规定对象关系是用持久化特性装饰的。

trans.cn: 穿着：指某人穿着某种衣服或服装。

sentences.c: Infants prepared for baptism should be dressed in pure white.
sentences.cn: 准备受洗礼的婴儿应穿纯白色的衣服。

sentences.c: We must be dressed in uniform at school.
sentences.cn: 在学校我们必须穿制服。

sentences.c: This night twelve men will come: their faces will be black, and they will be dressed in chain armour.
sentences.cn: 今夜，有十二个人会来，他们都脸色漆黑，戴着铁链。

trans.cn: 对……感到失望：感到对某人或某事不满意或失望。

sentences.c: My parents will be disappointed with me if I fail to get into college.
sentences.cn: 如果我考不上大学，我的父母会对我失望的。

sentences.c: But it's a good bet that you be disappointed with the results if you only try.
sentences.cn: 但如果你试过却对结果灰心失望也算是个不错的选择。

sentences.c: If the date goes wrong, then you at least will not be disappointed with the food choice.
sentences.cn: 如果约会不顺利，至少不会对食物也很失望。

trans.cn: 以……而闻名：因某种特定的事物、品质或行为而广为人知。

sentences.c: The British are supposed to be famous for laughing at themselves, but even their sense of humour has a limit, as the British retailer Gerald Ratner found out to his cost.
sentences.cn: 英国人本应以自嘲著称，但就连他们的幽默感也有限度，英国零售商杰拉尔德·拉特纳在付出一定的代价之后才明白了这一点。

sentences.c: Its building have to be famous for their beauty or their historical importance.
sentences.cn: 这里的建筑物要出名，必须美观，或具有历史意义。

sentences.c: I want to concentrate on playing volleyball and to be famous for that, not anything else.
sentences.cn: 我希望专心打球，凭借排球上的表现获得关注，而不是其他方面。

sentences.c: His fans would already be familiar with Caroline.
sentences.cn: 他的崇拜者们一定已熟悉卡罗琳。

sentences.c: He does not seem to be familiar with research which might have strengthened his own arguments.
sentences.cn: 他对本来可使他的论证更有说服力的研究似乎不太熟悉。

sentences.c: Any of you happened to be familiar with the Greek word for "sun" by chance?
sentences.cn: 你们中有谁碰巧熟悉希腊语中“太阳”的意思？

trans.cn: 充满：对某事物感到兴奋或有很多话要说或思考。

sentences.c: You can be full of energy.
sentences.cn: 你可以充满活力。

sentences.c: When you do sports, you will be full of confidence.
sentences.cn: 你做运动的时候会充满信心。

sentences.c: An organization without trust will be full of fear and suspicion.
sentences.cn: 一个没有信任的组织将充满恐惧和怀疑。

phonetic0: bi ˈɪntrəstɪd ɪn; bi ˈɪntrestɪd ɪn

trans.cn: 对……感兴趣：对某事或某人感到有兴趣，想要了解更多或参与其中。

sentences.c: Be interested in others and they are sure to be interested in you.
sentences.cn: 对别人感兴趣，别人肯定也会对你感兴趣。

sentences.c: He only seems to be interested in personal gain.
sentences.cn: 他似乎只在乎个人的收益。

sentences.c: I thought she might be interested in Paula's proposal.
sentences.cn: 我以为她可能会对保拉的提议感兴趣。

trans.cn: 参与，涉及：参与某个活动、事件或组织，与之相关联。
卷入，牵涉：被卷入或牵涉到某个活动、事件或问题中。

sentences.c: He was rumoured to be involved in the crime.
sentences.cn: 有传言说他卷入了这桩罪行。

sentences.c: He reasserted that all parties should be involved in the talks.
sentences.cn: 他再次声明各方均应参加会谈。

sentences.c: I'm very much afraid that your son may be involved in the crime.
sentences.cn: 我非常担忧（very much afraid）你儿子可能在这罪案中受到牵连。

trans.cn: 支持，赞成：支持或赞成某个事物、观点或行动。

sentences.c: Who wants to be in favor of drowning sea turtles in fishing nets so that people can eat cheaper shrimp?
sentences.cn: 谁会为了使人们能够吃上便宜的小虾，而赞同在渔网中溺死海龟呢？

sentences.c: The results of this paper will be in favor of the design and optimization of vertical falling film absorber.
sentences.cn: 得出的结论对垂直降膜吸收器的设计和优化具有指导意义。

sentences.c: In the conservation process, the control should be in favor of hardening concrete strength and growth temperature environments.
sentences.cn: 在养护过程中，应控制混凝土在有利于硬化及强度增长的温度环境中。

trans.cn: 充满，挤满：指某个地方或物品被大量的人或物填满，无法再容纳更多的人或物。

sentences.c: That neighbourhood used to be jammed with freeway ramps.
sentences.cn: 那一带过去是挤满了高速公路的坡道。

sentences.c: Although they may not be as packed as some of the other locales on the list, the Minnesota twin cities are still pretty jammed with nearly 7, 000 people per square mile.
sentences.cn: 虽然这个城市和上述那些城市相比没那么拥挤，但明尼苏达双城仍然挤满了人，近7000人每平方英里。

sentences.c: And the campus is jammed with lines of cars and seems to be parking lot instead of an academic institute.
sentences.cn: 而且如果学校挤满了车辆的话，那么看起来更像停车场而不是一个搞学术的机构。

sentences.c: It can be the feeling of jealousy or revenge that starts creeping into your heart.
sentences.cn: 它有可能是你嫉妒或仇恨的心态，渗透你的心中。

sentences.c: It could hardly be otherwise when so many people on the streets of Cairo or Karachi seem to view the Western world with a confusing mix of awe, jealousy, admiration and resentment.
sentences.cn: 当在开罗或者卡拉奇的大街上有如此多的民众用一种令人迷糊的混杂着敬畏、嫉妒、羡慕与愤恨的心态看待西方世界时，这一结果也就并非意料之外了。

sentences.c: Be grateful that you have emotions and are able to express them. Be grateful for the feelings of passion, anger, love, jealousy, sorrow, happiness, joy, and contentment.
sentences.cn: 感激你有那些你能够表达自如的情感，感激你的激情，生气，爱，嫉妒，悲伤，高兴，喜悦，满足。

trans.cn: 热衷于，喜欢，爱好：指对某事物或活动感兴趣、热爱并愿意投入时间和精力。

sentences.c: They always find a new angle, a different part to be keen on especially this class. I think they are really keen on it.
sentences.cn: 他们总能找一个全新的角度，热衷于这个班级的一个不同的角度。我认为他们对它很有热情。

sentences.c: French officials may be keen on Eurobonds, but dare not speak of them in public.
sentences.cn: 法国官方也许渴望欧洲债券，但是并不敢在公共场合表现出来。

sentences.c: Frenchmen are keen on art. They must have a preference for artistic gifts. be keen on.
sentences.cn: 法国人崇尚艺术，他们一定喜欢艺术性强的礼品吧。

sentences.c: The result of the ballot will not be known for two weeks.
sentences.cn: 本次无记名投票的结果将在两周后才会揭晓。

sentences.c: The true cost of these experiments to the environment will not be known for years to come.
sentences.cn: 这些实验对环境造成的确切代价在未来数年内是看不见的。

sentences.c: The final result will not be known for some days.
sentences.cn: 最终结果还需一段时间才能揭晓。

trans.cn: 由……制成：表示某物是由特定材料制成的。

sentences.c: The faucets appeared to be made of solid gold.
sentences.cn: 这些水龙头看上去是纯金做成的。

sentences.c: Baby diapers, which used to be made of reusable cloth, are now paper throw-aways.
sentences.cn: 婴儿尿布以前是用可重复使用的布做的，现在都是用一次性的纸做的。

sentences.c: The pipes should be made of plastic.
sentences.cn: 这些管子应该是用塑料制作的。

trans.cn: 由……制成：指某物是由特定材料或成分制成的。

sentences.c: An unlimited number of copies can still be made from the original.
sentences.cn: 无限量的复制品依然能从原物制作出来。

sentences.c: There's money to be made from tourism.
sentences.cn: 旅游业非常有利可图。

sentences.c: The new chip will be made from a piece of silicon about the size of a postage stamp.
sentences.cn: 这种新的芯片将由大约邮票大小的一块硅片制成。

trans.cn: 由……组成：指某物是由若干部分或成分组成的。

sentences.c: Any rule must be made up of productions.
sentences.cn: 任何规则都必须由产品组成。

sentences.c: A message can be made up of one or more parts.
sentences.cn: 消息可以有一个或者多个part组成。

sentences.c: This is because objects may be made up of other objects.
sentences.cn: 这是因为对象可能是由其他对象构成的。

trans.cn: 被迫做某事：由于某种原因，不得不做某事。

sentences.c: The company's shipping manager is proposing that customer orders be packed with newer, more expensive packing materials that virtually eliminate damage during shipping.
sentences.cn: 该公司的货运经理建议，客户的订单应该用更新、更昂贵的包装材料包装，这样几乎可以消除运输过程中的损坏现象。

sentences.c: Popular cold-weather beverages also can be packed with calories, fat and sugar.
sentences.cn: 冬季里流行的饮品也富含卡路里，脂肪和糖分。

sentences.c: There are no extra calories to spare, so every bite of food needs to be packed with nutrition.
sentences.cn: 没有多余的热量可浪费，所以每一口食物都需要充满营养。

sentences.c: The boss should be pleased with you.
sentences.cn: 上司应该对你满意了。

sentences.c: I think she will be pleased with the hermitage.
sentences.cn: 我想，她一定会喜欢我们这个幽静的小地方。

sentences.c: In all likelihood, though, Baidu won't be pleased with its results.
sentences.cn: 不过，百度很有可能不满意这一结果。

trans.cn: 受……欢迎：指某人或某物在某群体中受到普遍喜爱或欢迎。

sentences.c: In China, Beijing Opera used to be popular with old people while young people didn't like it very much.
sentences.cn: 在中国，京剧过去很受老年人的欢迎，而年轻人则不太喜欢。

sentences.c: The courses seem to be popular with entrepreneurs.
sentences.cn: 这些课程似乎广受企业家的欢迎。

sentences.c: The concept would surely be popular with consumers.
sentences.cn: 这个概念肯定受消费者欢迎。

trans.cn: 为……感到自豪：因某事或某人而感到自豪或自尊。

sentences.c: Your achievements are something to be proud of.
sentences.cn: 你的成就是值得骄傲的。

sentences.c: Every right-thinking American would be proud of them.
sentences.cn: 每一个有正义感的美国人都会为他们感到骄傲的。

sentences.c: What should China be proud of?
sentences.cn: 中国应该引以为傲的是什么？

trans.cn: 对……负责，是造成……原因：指对某事负有责任或是某事的原因。

sentences.c: I sometimes find it a strain to be responsible for the mortgage.
sentences.cn: 我有时发现偿还抵押借款是个负担。

sentences.c: The storm is thought to be responsible for as many as four deaths.
sentences.cn: 这场暴风雨据信造成多达4人死亡。

sentences.c: The man, who police believe is psychotic, is thought to be responsible for eight attacks.
sentences.cn: 警方相信有精神错乱的那个男人，被认为要为8起攻击事件负责。

sentences.c: Never be satisfied with yourself, or you will fall behind others.
sentences.cn: 永远不要自我满足，否则你会落后于别人。

sentences.c: It rarely makes sense to buy at that high a price for them to be satisfied with being paid off only at par (the full value of the bond).
sentences.cn: 以这么高的价格买进，让他们满足于只按票面价值(债券的全部价值)偿付，几乎没有什么意义。

sentences.c: I would be satisfied with just a wife.
sentences.cn: 只要有个老婆我就满足了。

trans.cn: 对……敏感：指对某种事物或情况有较高的敏感度，容易受到其影响或感受到其变化。

sentences.c: The classroom teacher must be sensitive to a child's needs.
sentences.cn: 课堂教师必须理解孩子的需求。

sentences.c: "Once we scale up, algorithms must be sensitive to tiny changes in identities and at the same time invariant to lighting, pose, age," Kemelmacher-Shlizerman said.
sentences.cn: 凯梅尔马赫·施勒泽曼说：“一旦扩大规模，算法必须对身份的细微变化敏感，同时不受光照、姿势和年龄影响。”

sentences.c: When we consider the nightly lifestyle of these bats, we will see they have to be sensitive to the changing light levels because this is how they sense when to start hunting.
sentences.cn: 当我们考虑这些蝙蝠的夜间生活方式时，我们会发现，它们必须对不断变化的光线水平保持敏感，因为这是它们感知何时开始狩猎的方式。

trans.cn: 习惯于做某事：表示某人已经适应了某种习惯或行为方式。

sentences.c: be used to doing sth.
sentences.cn: 表示“习惯于做某事”。

trans.cn: 全神贯注于：非常专注于某人或某事，忽视其他人或事物。

sentences.c: I wanted to be wrapped in net, posing serenely in a forest.
sentences.cn: 我希望沉静地站在树林里用网裹住身体。

sentences.c: I wanted to be wrapped in net, posing serenely in a forest. I know.
sentences.cn: 我希望沉静地站在树林里用网裹住身体。

sentences.c: The piece goods are to be wrapped in Kraft paper, then packed in wooden cases.
sentences.cn: 布匹在装入木箱以前要用牛皮纸包好。

sentences.c: The common quality blemish that carpet shop installs has a beat, corrugate, colour and lustre abhorrent become loose with carpet etc.
sentences.cn: 地毯铺装的常见质量缺陷有起鼓、起皱、 色泽不一致和地毯松动等。

sentences.c: She says she loves the hyped-up adrenaline feeling of trying to beat an opponent.
sentences.cn: 她说自己比赛时特别亢奋，一心想着打败对手。

sentences.c: Simpler Skills: Moves such as feints, drag backs and upper body feints can be applied more naturally when taking on or trying to beat an opponent.
sentences.cn: 更简易的技巧：当要冲击敌手时，象假动作，拉球和上肢假动作那样子将能够更加自若的运用出来。

sentences.c: We beat Roma 7-1, is that enough to be considered destroying an opponent?
sentences.cn: 我们7 - 1战胜罗马，也可以被视作彻底摧毁了对手。

trans.cn: 打破纪录：超过或超越已经建立的记录或成绩。

sentences.c: She beat the record by almost two hours and her father rewarded her with a red sports car.
sentences.cn: 她以将近两个小时的优势打破了纪录，她父亲奖励她一辆红色跑车。

sentences.c: He was as eager as his Captain to beat the record.
sentences.cn: 他和他的队长一样渴望打破纪录。

sentences.c: In 1926, she beat the record by almost two hours and her father rewarded her with a red sports car.
sentences.cn: 1926年，她以领先近两个小时的成绩打破了世界纪录，她的父亲奖励了她一辆红色跑车。

trans.cn: 避开交通高峰：提前或采取其他措施以避免交通拥堵。

sentences.c: If we go early we should beat the traffic.
sentences.cn: 我们早点出发就会避开交通拥挤。

sentences.c: Well, I guess it's the only way to beat the traffic.
sentences.cn: 是啊，我想这是避免堵车的唯一办法。

sentences.c: Trading should be light with the long holiday weekend in the US as most traders will be heading out early to beat the traffic.
sentences.cn: 由于美国较长的周末假期将让交易者提前退出市场，使得交易凌嘞为清淡。

trans.cn: 习惯于：逐渐适应某种环境或情况，使之成为习惯。

sentences.c: In the saloon, he drank whisky and let his eyes become accustomed to the dimness.
sentences.cn: 在酒馆里，他喝了威士忌，双眼也变得适应昏暗。

sentences.c: The crew has also become accustomed to Alinghi's speed.
sentences.cn: 船员也适应了阿林吉号的速度。

sentences.c: And everyone will have to become accustomed to paying more for food.
sentences.cn: 并且每个人都将变得习惯于付更多的钱买食品。

synos.cn: 习惯于；对…变得习以为常

trans.cn: 属于某个特定的类别或环境：适合或应该在某个特定的地方或环境中。

sentences.c: Which of the following does housing belong in according to the text?
sentences.cn: 根据课文，房屋属于下列哪一项？

sentences.c: Some answer choices do not belong in the summary because they express ideas that are not presented in the passage or are minor ideas in the passage.
sentences.cn: 有些答案选项不属于概述，因为它们表达的是文章中没有出现的或者是次要的观点。

sentences.c: There are bound to be some words and phrases that belong in formal language and others that are informal.
sentences.cn: 必定存在着一些属于正式语言的单词和短语，也存在着另一些属于非正式语言的词汇短语。

trans.cn: 属于：指某物是某人的财产，被某人拥有。
是……的成员：指某人是某个俱乐部、组织等的成员。
属于……的一类：指某物被归类到某个类别、群体中。
是……的一部分：指某物是某个整体的一部分。

sentences.c: Lions belong to the cat family.
sentences.cn: 狮属于猫科。

sentences.c: Lions and tigers belong to the cat family.
sentences.cn: 狮子和老虎属于猫科。

sentences.c: The contents of shipwrecks belong to the state.
sentences.cn: 一切沉船中的物品均属国家所有。

trans.cn: 与……相配，与……相称，与……相连，属于……：指某物与另一物相配、相称、相连，或者属于某一类别或群体。

sentences.c: You belong with me.
sentences.cn: 你应该和我在一起。

sentences.c: Those documents belong with the sale report.
sentences.cn: 那些文件归入销售报告。

sentences.c: You are a good person, but we don't belong with each other.
sentences.cn: 你是个很好的人，但是我们没有缘份。

trans.cn: 从中受益：从某种事物或情况中获得好处或利益。

sentences.c: Ted might benefit from hearing his own voice recorded and played back.
sentences.cn: 特德也许能从听到自己声音的录音回放中受益。

sentences.c: I might benefit from getting my teeth fixed.
sentences.cn: 把牙齿补好可能对我有好处。

sentences.c: Who exactly stands to benefit from these changes?
sentences.cn: 到底是谁会从这些变革中直接获益？

synos.cn: 得益于；得利于；因…而得到好处

sentences.c: The self-employed 60-year-old mechanic doesn't have to spend his spare time on the road, but it's a hard habit to break.
sentences.cn: 这位60岁年纪的个体户已经不需要在公路上花费他的空闲时间，但是这却是一个很难打破的习惯。

sentences.c: For today, the story may be most important as an illustration of how secrecy can become a burden that is hard to lay down and a habit that is hard to break.
sentences.cn: 而在今天，要展示“故作神秘”究竟如何成为一个国家无法卸下的负担、如何变成一个很难改掉的陋习，这个故事必是一个最有份量的例子。

sentences.c: Soon, this becomes a habit, which is hard to break.
sentences.cn: 久而久之，这就成了习惯，很难改变了。

trans.cn: 分解成：将某物分成更简单的物质。
分解为：变成更简单的物质。
分成：将某物分成部分或组别。
分为：可以被分成部分或组别。

sentences.c: When bread is baked (烘焙), the carbohydrates break down into black carbon and water.
sentences.cn: 面包在烤制的时候，碳水化合物会分解成黑碳和水。

sentences.c: My 1 year goals, break down into months.
sentences.cn: 我把1年目标分解成月目标。

sentences.c: Q: What if my information doesn't break down into topics?
sentences.cn: 问：如果我的信息没有分成主题，该怎么办？

sentences.c: It would be nice to go faster and break the world record.
sentences.cn: 再快一些，打破世界纪录就好了。

sentences.c: Unless a record number of companies start up this year, Derderia will not break its record for new jobs created.
sentences.cn: 除非今年新成立的公司数量达到创纪录水平，Derderia 将不会打破其创造的新就业机会的纪录。

sentences.c: She set out to break the world record.
sentences.cn: 她一心努力要打破世界纪录。

trans.cn: 违反规则：不遵守规定或制度，违反规则或法律。

sentences.c: So go forth and break rules... but not without really good reasons!
sentences.cn: 继续前进吧，打破那些规则——但必须有充分的理由！

sentences.c: Much of it has to do with his natural impatience, his wish to break rules and break down boundaries.
sentences.cn: 这其中的大部分因素都是与他天生的急性子，以及他打破陈规与破除界限的愿望有关。

sentences.c: Photo Tip: Break rules of composition, and don't be afraid to tilt the horizon when the subject matter calls for it.
sentences.cn: 图片提示：打破构图规则，当题材有要求时，不要惧怕倾斜的地平线。

trans.cn: 引起，导致：指使某事发生或产生特定结果。

sentences.c: The only way they can bring about political change is by putting pressure on the country.
sentences.cn: 他们能引起政治变化的惟一办法就是向该国施加压力。

sentences.c: Interest-rate cuts have failed to bring about economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 利率的降低未能带来经济的复苏。

sentences.c: He urged the United States to persist with its efforts to bring about peace.
sentences.cn: 他敦促美国坚持努力实现和平。

sentences.c: Reading is really good to a person because we can learn a lot from books and broaden one's horizon.
sentences.cn: 阅读是很好的一个人因为我们可以学到很多从书本和开阔眼界。

sentences.c: Reading is really good to a person, because we can learn a lot from books and broaden one's horizon.
sentences.cn: 阅读对于一个人真的很有好处因为我们可以从书本上学到很多东西以及开阔视野。

sentences.c: The middle ones are for delighting, intelligent materials, they more or less can open up one's eyes and broaden one's horizon.
sentences.cn: 中间则是些趣味性﹑知识性的东西，多多少少可以开眼界﹑广见闻。

trans.cn: 逐渐发展：逐步增加或发展。
增强：增加或提高某物的力量、数量或程度。

sentences.c: We first build up a detailed profile of our customers and their requirements.
sentences.cn: 首先，我们建立起我们的客户及其需求的详细资料。

sentences.c: We can build up the speed gradually and safely.
sentences.cn: 我们可以逐步安全地加快速度。

sentences.c: He stumped around the country trying to build up support.
sentences.cn: 他在全国各地巡回演讲，争取更多的支持。

trans.cn: 程度或数量上的巨大差异或优势：表示某事物在程度或数量上远远超过其他事物。

sentences.c: Amy is the smartest by far.
sentences.cn: 埃米显然最聪明。

sentences.c: The last of these reasons is by far the most important.
sentences.cn: 这些理由中最后一条比其他的重要得多。

sentences.c: By far the most important issue for them is unemployment.
sentences.cn: 显然对他们来说最重要的问题是失业。

synos.cn: 到目前为止；远，非常 （与比较级或最高级连用）

trans.cn: 绝不，决不，一点也不：用于强调某件事情不可能发生或不可能是真的。

sentences.c: He was forceful, but by no means a zealot.
sentences.cn: 他很有说服力，但绝不是个狂热分子。

sentences.c: That was by no means the end of the matter.
sentences.cn: 事情决不可能到此为止。

sentences.c: Aggression is by no means a male-only trait.
sentences.cn: 攻击性决不是男性独有的特征。

sentences.c: Helen got into acting purely by accident.
sentences.cn: 海伦当演员完全出于偶然。

sentences.c: She discovered the problem by accident during a visit to a nearby school.
sentences.cn: 她在去附近一所学校参观时偶然发现了这个问题。

sentences.c: It happened—whether by accident or design —that the two of them were left alone after all the others had gone.
sentences.cn: 碰巧—不知是偶然还是有意安排—其他人走后，只剩下了他们两个人。

trans.cn: 取消：指取消原计划、活动或事件。
中止：指提前终止或停止进行某项活动或行动。

sentences.c: There is no attempt to call off the race.
sentences.cn: 没有取消比赛的意图。

sentences.c: Rescue teams had to call off the search because of heavy fighting near the crash site in Savannakhet province.
sentences.cn: 由于萨凡纳赫特省坠机现场附近的激烈战斗，救援队不得不取消搜索。

sentences.c: Jack demands that Victor call off the mission.
sentences.cn: 杰克要求维克托放话出去，取消营救他的行动。

sentences.c: The more stress you are under, the more likely you are to catch a cold.
sentences.cn: 你所受的压力越大，越有可能患感冒。

sentences.c: When you develop a throat infection or catch a cold the glands in the neck swell up.
sentences.cn: 当你咽喉发炎或感冒时, 脖子上的腺体会肿起来。

sentences.c: She is not hurt, and won't even catch a cold.
sentences.cn: 她没有伤到，甚至连感冒也不会得。

trans.cn: 染上疾病：感染某种疾病，通常指通过接触病原体或其他传染途径而患病。

sentences.c: Therefore, it is impossible to catch a disease from a dirty needle.
sentences.cn: 因此，由于脏针头而染病是不可能的。

sentences.c: It deals with an earlier stage in the process of gene coding for biological activity, and could therefore offer therapies and diagnostic markets that catch a disease much closer to the source.
sentences.cn: 它主要涉及生物活动基因编码过程的早期阶段，并且可以提供给治疗和诊断市场距离疾病源更近的产品。

sentences.c: This disease is surprisingly difficult to catch, as most people have a natural resistance to it.
sentences.cn: 这种病令人惊讶的难以患上，因为大多数人对它有一种先天的免疫力。

trans.cn: 钓到鱼：成功地钓到一条鱼。

sentences.c: When the bear puts his tail into the water through a hole in the ice, to try and catch a fish, the ice freezes around it, and he ends up pulling his tail off.
sentences.cn: 当熊把尾巴放到了湖面上的冰洞里面去钓鱼的时候，水在熊尾巴周围结冰了。熊使劲儿往外拔它的尾巴，结果把尾巴拔掉了。

sentences.c: You cannot catch a fish without being near the water.
sentences.cn: 不靠近水就捞不着鱼。

sentences.c: I am hungry, and now I cannot catch a fish. I shall eat your beak instead.
sentences.cn: 害得我一条鱼也没有抓到，你知不知道我很饿啊，我现在就要把你的嘴吃进肚子里去。

phonetic0: kætʃ ə ɡlɪmps; ketʃ ə ɡlɪmps

sentences.c: Saddest of all is when children catch a glimpse of the masked the fire fighter but hide because they think they have seen a monster.
sentences.cn: 最可悲的是，当孩子们瞥见戴面罩的消防队员时，却认为他们看到了怪物而躲了起来。

sentences.c: Some of the fans had waited 24 hours outside the hotel to catch a glimpse of their heroine.
sentences.cn: 某些追星族为了一睹女杰的风采已在宾馆外守候了24小时。

sentences.c: "You catch a glimpse of yourself in the mirror behind the bar," said fashion designer Laura McGrew.
sentences.cn: 时装设计师劳拉·麦克格鲁说:“你可以在吧台后面的镜子里看到自己。”

trans.cn: 赶火车：及时到达车站并乘上火车。

sentences.c: He had to go back to his hotel and prepare to catch a train for New York.
sentences.cn: 他不得不回宾馆准备赶火车去纽约。

sentences.c: By the time she arrived it was time for him to catch a train.
sentences.cn: 女摄影师来的时候，他要去赶火车了。

sentences.c: But do you have to fly to Egypt when you can catch a train to somewhere in France or Spain?
sentences.cn: 但是当你明明可以坐火车到法国或西班牙某个地方的时候，你一定要飞去埃及吗？

trans.cn: 引起某人的注意，使某人对某事感兴趣

sentences.c: The transparent doors catch one's attention as they emerge as a flow of water with clean roof.
sentences.cn: 透明门赶上一个人的注意，因为它们成为一个流动的水，干净的屋顶。

trans.cn: 满足（某人或某物）所需或所求：指为某人或某物提供所需的服务、设施或支持。

sentences.c: The university started some new language programs to cater for the country's Silk Road Economic Belt.
sentences.cn: 为了迎合中国丝绸之路经济带的需要，这所大学开设了一些新的语言课程。

sentences.c: The clubs cater for the enthusiasts, with some computer knowledge already, who get together and eventually form an expert computer group.
sentences.cn: 这些俱乐部迎合了已经有一些计算机知识的爱好者，他们聚在一起，最终形成了一个计算机专家小组。

sentences.c: Our plans need to be flexible enough to cater for the needs of everyone.
sentences.cn: 我们的计划必须能够变通，以满足每个人的需要。

synos.cn: 迎合；供应伙食；为…提供所需

trans.cn: 照料，照顾：做必要的事情来帮助和保护（某人或动物）。
喜欢，关心：对（某人）有感情。
不喜欢，不喜爱：不喜欢或不喜爱（某物）。

sentences.c: I don't really care for spicy food.
sentences.cn: 我其实不喜欢吃辛辣食物。

sentences.c: They hired a nurse to care for her.
sentences.cn: 他们雇了个护士来照顾她。

sentences.c: He didn't much care for her friends.
sentences.cn: 他不太喜欢她的朋友。

sentences.c: See that you take care of him.
sentences.cn: 你一定要好好照顾他。

sentences.c: I can take care of your kind.
sentences.cn: 我能对付你这类人。

sentences.c: He's under the care of Dr Parks.
sentences.cn: 他在接受帕克斯医生的治疗。

trans.cn: 执行，实施：将计划、任务等付诸实施并完成。
完成，实现：将某项工作、任务等做到最后，达到预期的结果。
继续到结束：持续进行直到达到终点或停止点。

sentences.c: She needed a clear head to carry out her instructions.
sentences.cn: 她需要一个清醒的头脑来执行命令。

sentences.c: Make sure the firm is competent to carry out the work.
sentences.cn: 要确保这家公司有能力完成这项工作。

sentences.c: It's just talk. He'd never carry out his threats.
sentences.cn: 这只不过是说说而已。他绝不会把他的恫吓付诸行动。

synos.cn: 执行，实行；贯彻；实现；完成

sentences.c: So I change attitude towards Tom and I soon learned that Tom wad just as adaptable.
sentences.cn: 于是我改变了对汤姆的态度，而且我很快发现汤姆的适应能力很强。

sentences.c: Her sudden change in attitude threw me.
sentences.cn: 她态度上的突然变化令我吃惊。

sentences.c: If you want to pass your exams you'd better change your attitude!
sentences.cn: 你若想通过考试就最好改变你的态度！

trans.cn: 紧紧抓住或依附于某物，不放手；对某人有强烈的情感依赖；始终陪伴在某人身边，拒绝离开

sentences.c: Since you don't like your perception of him, why cling to it?
sentences.cn: 既然你不喜欢你对他的看法，为什么还坚持这个看法呢？

sentences.c: The cat tried to cling to the edge by its claws.
sentences.cn: 那只猫试图用爪子抓紧边沿。

sentences.c: Instead, he appears determined to cling to power.
sentences.cn: 反而，他看来坚决要握紧权力不放。

synos.cn: 坚持；依靠；依附；紧握不放

trans.cn: 几乎，差不多：表示接近某个数量或程度。
从近处，近距离：表示从短距离观察或接触。

sentences.c: She is very close to her father.
sentences.cn: 她和父亲的关系很亲密。

sentences.c: She knew she was close to death.
sentences.cn: 她知道自己已濒临死亡。

sentences.c: She sounded close to tears.
sentences.cn: 她听起来就要哭了。

trans.cn: 与……结合/组合：将两个或多个事物或元素结合在一起，形成一个整体或新的组合。

sentences.c: They combine with dust particles from the comet to form a huge cloud.
sentences.cn: 它们与来自彗星的尘埃颗粒结合在一起，形成了巨大的云团。

sentences.c: Two atoms of hydrogen combine with one atom of oxygen to form a molecule of water.
sentences.cn: 两个氢原子和一个氧原子结合组成一个水分子。

sentences.c: Sleeping pills combine with alcohol to produce a sleepy feeling.
sentences.cn: 酒精加安眠药会让你感到困倦。

trans.cn: 致力于，投身于：表示一个人决定全身心地投入某项事业或活动，为其奋斗并承担责任。

sentences.c: Other social people who have undergraduate or above experience and want to commit oneself to international legal affairs later.
sentences.cn: 本科或本科以上学历，致力于从事国际化法律事务的其他社会人员。

sentences.c: Exactly. One needs to be able to recognize and commit oneself to tasks with inflated importance and unreal deadlines, while making oneself feel that they are important and urgent.
sentences.cn: 确切地讲，有些事情的截止期限是虚幻的，或者重要性被夸大，但人们得能够认识到并致力于此，姑且认为它们真的紧急或重要。

sentences.c: To think exaltation reading comprehension ability want to be malicious to grasp a basic achievement first, commit to memory a list a phrase, extension oneself of vocabulary quantity.
sentences.cn: 要想提高阅读理解能力，首先要狠抓基本功，熟记单词，扩大自己的词汇量。

sentences.c: Choose the video file you want to convert into Flash.
sentences.cn: 选择想要转换为Flash的视频文件。

sentences.c: Once made, HMF is fairly easy to convert into plastics or diesel fuel.
sentences.cn: 一旦制成羟甲基糠醛后，进一步将其转化成塑料或柴油燃料就会相当容易。

sentences.c: All luxury car manufacturers struggle to win younger customers they hope to convert into repeat buyers.
sentences.cn: 所有豪华车厂商都在努力赢得年轻买主的青睐，希望将这些人变成回头客。

trans.cn: 专注于：将全部注意力或精力集中在某个事物上。

sentences.c: We need to concentrate on our core business.
sentences.cn: 我们需要集中在核心业务上。

sentences.c: I am leaving to concentrate on writing fiction.
sentences.cn: 我要离开去专心写小说。

sentences.c: He can now concentrate on a project he'd originally put to one side.
sentences.cn: 他现在能集中做他以前暂时搁置一边的一个项目了。

synos.cn: 集中精力于；全神贯注于

trans.cn: 有助于，促成：表示某个行为、事件或因素对某个结果的产生起到了积极或消极的作用。

sentences.c: Would you like to contribute to our collection?
sentences.cn: 你愿意给我们的募捐捐款吗？

sentences.c: We hope everyone will contribute to the discussion.
sentences.cn: 我们希望大家都能参与讨论。

sentences.c: The three sons also contribute to the family business.
sentences.cn: 3个儿子也为家族企业做贡献。

trans.cn: 砍倒：将树木或其他物体砍倒。

sentences.c: You need to cut down on starches.
sentences.cn: 你有必要少吃些含淀粉的东西。

sentences.c: He was cut down by an assassin's bullet.
sentences.cn: 他被刺客的子弹击中身亡。

sentences.c: Car owners were asked to cut down travel.
sentences.cn: 车主们被要求减少出行。

synos.cn: 削减；砍倒；杀死；删节；胜过

trans.cn: 决定某事物：经过仔细思考后选择某事物或某人。

sentences.c: They decide on flying kites. 3. decide on sth.
sentences.cn: 决定做某事他们决定放风筝。

trans.cn: 处理；应对：对引起问题或困境的人或事物采取行动。
与某人做生意；与某人达成商业协议：与某人进行商业交易或达成协议。
关于某事物；涉及某事物：谈论、处理或讨论的主题。
接受；应对：接受或试图接受无法改变的事实。

sentences.c: I prefer to deal with him direct.
sentences.cn: 我更愿意直接跟他打交道。

sentences.c: He's happy that I deal with it myself.
sentences.cn: 他对我自己处理这件事感到很满意。

sentences.c: He has some unfinished business to deal with.
sentences.cn: 他还要处理一些尚未了结的事务。

sentences.c: Doctors are encouraged to defer to experts.
sentences.cn: 鼓励医生们听从专家的意见。

sentences.c: Let's say, both John and Mary defer to her leadership.
sentences.cn: 假设，约翰和玛丽都服从她的领导。

sentences.c: The elder should be more accessible to new things and the younger should defer to the advisable proposals from parents.
sentences.cn: 长者应该接受更多新事物，而年轻人应该听从父母的建议。

phonetic0: dɪˈveləp ən ˈɪntrəst ɪn; dɪˈveləp ən ˈɪntrest ɪn

trans.cn: 对……产生兴趣：逐渐开始对某个事物或领域产生兴趣。

sentences.c: "Labor education must be carried out with the aim to develop the view of the world life and values and develop an interest in doing chores." said Zheng Fuzhi a Vice-Minister of Education.
sentences.cn: “开展劳动教育，必须以树立正确的世界观和价值观，以及培养做家务的兴趣为目的。”教育部副部长郑富芝如是说。

sentences.c: You should develop an interest in English.
sentences.cn: 你应该培养在英语上的兴趣。

sentences.c: Develop an interest in learning English will also be helpful.
sentences.cn: 培养出兴趣也会对学习英语很有帮助。

trans.cn: 致力于：决定将某物用于特定目的，或是将时间、金钱、精力、注意力等用于某事。

sentences.c: This refers to all the attention young people devote to their phones, tablets and laptops.
sentences.cn: 这反映了年轻人对手机、平板电脑和笔记本电脑所投入的关注。

sentences.c: The biggest restriction on our resources is the number of hours we can devote to something.
sentences.cn: 我们资源上的最大限制是我们可以投入到某件事情上的时间。

sentences.c: I feel that I've been given a second life to devote to something that is meaningful and enormous.
sentences.cn: 我觉得自己被赋予了第二次生命，将其投入到有意义和巨大的事业中去。

trans.cn: 进行体育运动：参加各种体育运动活动，包括但不限于跑步、游泳、篮球、足球等。

sentences.c: Now, we have enough time to do sports.
sentences.cn: 现在，我们有足够的时间做运动了。

sentences.c: We can do sports there, such as playing football and playing table tennis.
sentences.cn: 我们可以在那里做运动，比如踢足球和打台球。

sentences.c: A playground at a school is a place for students to play and do sports.
sentences.cn: 学校的操场是学生们玩耍和做运动的地方。

trans.cn: 洗碗：清洗和擦干餐具和厨房用具的动作。

sentences.c: You must do the dishes.
sentences.cn: 你必须洗餐具。

sentences.c: You can say do the dishes or wash the dishes.
sentences.cn: 你可以说清洗餐具或者清洁餐具。

sentences.c: The kids offered to do the dishes.
sentences.cn: 孩子们主动要求洗盘子。

trans.cn: 做作业：认真学习一个主题或情况，以便你了解它并能够成功地处理它。

sentences.c: You'd better do homework now.
sentences.cn: 你最好现在做家庭作业。

sentences.c: I often do homework carefully.
sentences.cn: 我常常认真做家庭作业。

sentences.c: Unified to do homework right.
sentences.cn: 统一做好作业。

synos.cn: 做作业，做功课；做家庭作业

trans.cn: 完成工作：指完成某项任务或工作。

sentences.c: You hire someone to do a job.
sentences.cn: 您雇佣一些人完成某项工作。

sentences.c: Firefighters do a job that sometimes requires them to put their lives on the line.
sentences.cn: 消防员们在执行任务中时常命悬一线。

sentences.c: If it's worth taking on someone to do a job, it's probably worth paying them something.
sentences.cn: 如果承认一个人的工作是有价值的，那么就应该付给这个人相应的报酬。

sentences.c: Rocky: I think I'll look for an English class. I'd like to do a short course while I'm here.
sentences.cn: 我想我要去找一个英语教学班。在这的这段时间里我想去上个英语短期教学班。

sentences.c: There's nothing more annoying than watching somebody do a crossword puzzle while you're buried in work.
sentences.cn: 没有什么比你自己忙得焦头烂额有人却在做填字游戏更烦人的了。

sentences.c: Traveling is one way to stimulate the brain, he said; a less adventuresome way is to do crossword puzzles.
sentences.cn: 旅游是激活大脑的一种方法，较少冒险的方法是玩拼字游戏。

sentences.c: Well, crossword puzzles aren't a very deep subject, and we might wonder whether or not we would do better if we were engaged in something more mentally challenging than that.
sentences.cn: 填字游戏不算很深奥的东西，我们也不知道自己能否做得更好，如果我们去做，比填字游戏更富挑战性的事情。

trans.cn: 做饭：负责烹饪食物的工作。

sentences.c: Who will then do the cooking, the washing, the mending?
sentences.cn: 那么，谁来做饭、洗衣、缝补呢？

sentences.c: How often do you do the cooking?
sentences.cn: 你多久下厨一次？

sentences.c: I know. You must help me do the cooking this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 我知道了。你今天下午要帮我准备晚饭。

trans.cn: 进行研究：进行系统性的调查、研究或探索以获取新的知识或解决问题。

sentences.c: You have a little time to do research, prepare technical expressions and so on.
sentences.cn: 你会有一些时间来做调查、准备技术用语等等。

sentences.c: I'm helping to do research on the coral and the fish that live around the reefs.
sentences.cn: 我正在帮助研究珊瑚和生活在珊瑚礁周围的鱼类。

sentences.c: You do research, trying to determine which media will reach the most potential customers for the lowest cost.
sentences.cn: 你要做研究，试图确定哪种媒体能够以最低的成本接触到最多的潜在客户。

trans.cn: 梦想：在睡眠中关于所期望或希望的事物的一系列思想、图像或情感，或者强烈渴望的目标或目的。

sentences.c: I still dream of home.
sentences.cn: 我仍然梦见家。

sentences.c: He was pursuing a utopian dream of world prosperity.
sentences.cn: 他那时在追求一个不切实际的世界繁荣之梦。

sentences.c: He had finally accomplished his dream of becoming a pilot.
sentences.cn: 他最终实现了成为了一名飞行员的梦想。

sentences.c: Mr Ghosn's secret is to form cross-functional teams, have them draw up detailed plans and then enforce them.
sentences.cn: 戈恩成功的秘诀在于建立跨部门的团队，由他们制定详尽的计划，而后加以推行。

sentences.c: His work is to draw up plans for an extension.
sentences.cn: 他的工作就是绘制扩建图。

sentences.c: Know what you want, draw up plans to go step by step.
sentences.cn: 明确自己想要的，制定计划，按部就班的走。

trans.cn: 赚钱：通过工作、投资或其他方式获取金钱。

sentences.c: I like it here. It forces you to hustle and you can earn money.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢在这里生活。这个想法迫使你拼命干活，这样可以挣到钱。

sentences.c: We will be more careful with money if we know how hard it is to earn money.
sentences.cn: 如果我们知道赚钱不易，就不会乱花钱。

sentences.c: It was also an excellent way for some women to earn money by giving piano lessons.
sentences.cn: 对一些女性来说，教钢琴课也是一种极好的赚钱方式。

sentences.c: " a perfect response would be: "I want to earn a salary that is commensurate with the contributions I can make.
sentences.cn: 一书中提到的，最佳的回答是：“我想要的薪资是和我所作出的贡献相称的。

sentences.c: He could earn up to a million dollars a year in salary and emoluments from many directorships.
sentences.cn: 他每年可赚高达一百万美金的薪水另加担任多个董事职位的酬金。

sentences.c: After a few years, he began to earn a good salary.
sentences.cn: 几年后，他开始有了不错的收入。

trans.cn: 谋生：为了食物、衣物等生活必需品而赚钱。

sentences.c: He wished to earn a living through writing but despaired of doing so.
sentences.cn: 他原想通过写作谋生，但却对此绝望了。

sentences.c: First you should consider how to equip yourself to earn a living.
sentences.cn: 首先你应该考虑如何让自己有能力谋生。

sentences.c: Remember that most bestselling authors began writing when they were doing other things to earn a living.
sentences.cn: 请记住，大多数畅销书作家当初开始写作的时候都在干着其他赖以谋生的工作。

trans.cn: 以某物结尾：指以某个词缀、符号、标点或物体等作为结尾。

sentences.c: There's no end in sight to the present crisis.
sentences.cn: 目前的危机无望结束。

sentences.c: The show came to an end in the laughter of the audience.
sentences.cn: 演出在观众的笑声中结束了。

sentences.c: This will surely end in disaster.
sentences.cn: 这无疑将以灾难告终。

trans.cn: 最终做某事：指在一系列事件或行动之后，最终做出某种决定或采取某种行动。

sentences.c: I know in my case, I did an English literature degree and I didn't really expect to end up doing what I am doing now.
sentences.cn: 我知道就我自己而言，我拿到了英国文学学位，但我并没有真的想要一直做我现在正在做的事情。

sentences.c: In fact, good students may just end up doing jobs they don't like, and some even lead an unhappy life.
sentences.cn: 事实上，好学生最终可能只是做他们不喜欢的工作，有些甚至过着并不快乐的生活。

sentences.c: Policymakers will probably end up doing this.
sentences.cn: 政策制定者最终很可能会这样做。

trans.cn: - 落后; 下降; 退后
落后：在进度、速度或竞争中落后或滞后。

sentences.c: Contractors who fall behind schedule incur heavy financial penalties.
sentences.cn: 承包商如延误工期将被处以巨额罚款。

sentences.c: I'm afraid I'll fall behind them.
sentences.cn: 我怕我会落后他们。

sentences.c: I don't want my students to fall behind the times.
sentences.cn: 我不希望我的学生落后于时代。

trans.cn: 想要做某事：指对某件事情产生兴趣或愿望。
有意愿做某事：指对某件事情有意愿或倾向。
有某种感觉：指对某种感觉或情绪的体验。

sentences.c: I feel like doing STH.
sentences.cn: 我想做某事。

trans.cn: 充满，装满：使某物充满或装满。

sentences.c: Warehouses at the frontier between the two countries fill up with sacks of rice and flour.
sentences.cn: 两国交界处的仓库里装满了一袋袋大米和面粉。

sentences.c: Otherwise, the Map would simply fill up with entries corresponding to dead keys.
sentences.cn: 否则，map会充满对应于死键的项。

sentences.c: It was always worse than if I had just stopped to take the time to fill up with gas.
sentences.cn: 它总是比我立即去加油变得更糟。

trans.cn: 效仿某人的榜样：模仿或遵循某人的行为、态度或原则。

sentences.c: These also and Zhang Liang education inseparable, Zhang Liang is only a few father cook, display one's skill to the full, in this link father make oneself an example, the children follow suit.
sentences.cn: 这些也和张亮的教育方式分丌开，张亮是几个父亲中唯一会做饭的，在这个环节大显身手，爸爸以身作则，孩子有样学样。

trans.cn: 学术间隔年：学术学习中的一年休假，以便进行非学术活动。

sentences.c: Taking a gap year to figure things out initially can help prevent stress and save money later on.
sentences.cn: 选择间隔年，一开始就把事情理顺清楚，可以帮助预防压力，并在以后节省开支。

sentences.c: Despite common misconceptions, a gap year does not hinder the success of academic pursuits—in fact, it probably enhances it.
sentences.cn: 尽管人们对间隔年存在普遍的误解，但它并不会阻碍学术事业的成功，事实上，它可能会促进学业发展。

sentences.c: But despite common misconceptions, a gap year does not hinder the success of academic pursuits—in fact, it probably enhances it.
sentences.cn: 但是，尽管人们对休学年存在普遍的误解，但它并不会阻碍学术追求的成果——事实上，它可能会促进学术发展。

trans.cn: 对……感到厌烦：对某事或某人感到非常烦躁和不满。

sentences.c: I get fed up with anyone who brags all the time.
sentences.cn: 我受够了那些一直吹牛的人了。

sentences.c: You don't get fed up with the same time everyday?
sentences.cn: 你对每天同样的时间表不感到厌烦吗？

sentences.c: Girls get fed up with the feminine nature of the men.
sentences.cn: 女孩儿们更是受够了那些阴柔的娘娘腔。

trans.cn: 变得健康：通过锻炼和保持良好的身体状况来改善健康和体能。

sentences.c: You get fit by playing the game, day in, day out, morning, noon and night.
sentences.cn: 每日坚持做这项运动，你就会变得健壮。

sentences.c: Would you like to get fit and make new friends? Join our running groups for beginners and for more experienced runners.
sentences.cn: 你想要变得健康、结识新朋友吗？那就加入我们为初学者和进阶跑步者设立的跑步小组吧。

sentences.c: Want to lose weight and get fit?
sentences.cn: 想要减肥和保持健康吗？

synos.cn: 健身；塑型；让身体变健康

trans.cn: 与……取得联系：指与某人或某事建立联系或沟通。
与……保持联系：指与某人或某事保持联系或沟通。
与……接触：指与某人或某事有接触或交往。

sentences.c: I'm definitely going to get in touch with these people.
sentences.cn: 我一定要联系上这些人。

sentences.c: Maybe someone could get in touch with her.
sentences.cn: 也许有人能联系上她。

sentences.c: I will get in touch with my lawyer about this.
sentences.cn: 我会就此与我的律师联系。

trans.cn: 使身体健康，使身体变得健美，使身体变得强壮

sentences.c: Look at you, you get into shape!
sentences.cn: 看看你！你变的更有型了！

sentences.c: He's taking lots of exercise to get into shape.
sentences.cn: 他正积极锻炼使身体健康。

sentences.c: This year I made a resolution to lose weight and finally get into shape.
sentences.cn: 今年我下定决心要减肥，最终让身材变得苗条。

trans.cn: 迷路，迷失：不明地方，失去方向。
滚开：一种粗鲁或愤怒的方式告诉某人离开。

sentences.c: We always get lost in London.
sentences.cn: 我们在伦敦老是迷路。

sentences.c: But I gave you a map so you wouldn't get lost!
sentences.cn: 但我怕你迷路，给过你一张地图！

sentences.c: Tourists often get lost and stray into dangerous areas.
sentences.cn: 旅游者们经常迷路走进一些危险区域。

trans.cn: （在职业摔跤中）摔跤手作为一个角色或派系受到观众欢迎的过程

sentences.c: He'll get over it—young people are amazingly resilient.
sentences.cn: 他会克服这些的—年轻人的适应力惊人。

sentences.c: She can't get over her shyness.
sentences.cn: 她无法克服羞怯心理。

sentences.c: I can't get over how rude she was.
sentences.cn: 她这么粗鲁真使我感到惊讶。

trans.cn: 习惯于做某事 / 某事
屈服于：放弃抵抗，接受某事物或某人的要求或意见。

sentences.c: People physically fit enough to survive over 100 years ultimately give into diseases such as Alzheimer's which affects the mind and cognitive function.
sentences.cn: 身体健康到能够活过100年的人最终会患上老年痴呆症等疾病，这些疾病会影响大脑和认知功能。

sentences.c: Don't give into the wall.
sentences.cn: 不要让步于你的障碍物。

sentences.c: Don't give into anger and impatience.
sentences.cn: 同样不要愤怒和急躁。

trans.cn: 避免或不做某事：指故意避免或不参与某个活动或行动。

sentences.c: I'll have to give it a miss for now, I'm afraid.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我现在只能放弃了。

sentences.c: I usually go swimming on Mondays, but I've decided to give it a miss this week.
sentences.cn: 我通常逢星期一去游泳，但我决定本星期不去了。

sentences.c: And if the office suggests an after-work drink, give it a miss tonight - one hungover day at work is bad enough.
sentences.cn: 如果办公室的同事建议下班后喝一场，今晚就不要参加了——工作日宿醉一次就够了！

trans.cn: 给某人打个电话：指通过电话与某人联系。
搭便车：给某人搭车或搭便车。
宣布，发布：指宣布或发布某事物，使其为公众所知。
发出，散发：指释放或散发出某种物质或能量。
分发，发放：指分发或发放某物给他人。
耗尽，用完：指某物的数量或能量被完全消耗或用尽。
出故障，失效：指某物因损坏或故障而无法正常工作。

sentences.c: He wouldn't give out any information.
sentences.cn: 他不会宣布任何消息。

sentences.c: Could you please teach me how to give out "red envelope" on WeChat?
sentences.cn: 你能教我如何在微信上发“红包”吗？

sentences.c: The teenagers often help give out water and food to those people in need.
sentences.cn: 这些青少年经常帮助分发水和食物给那些有需要的人。

synos.cn: 分发，发出；公布，发表；用尽，精疲力竭

trans.cn: 让位给，让步给：允许某人或某事物取代你的位置或控制某事物。

sentences.c: He should give way to a younger, more decisive leader.
sentences.cn: 他应该让位给一位更年轻、更果断的领导者。

sentences.c: Always give way to buses.
sentences.cn: 要永远为公交车让路。

sentences.c: Both had retreated politely to give way to each other.
sentences.cn: 两人都礼貌地退让。

sentences.c: She shot an angry glance at him.
sentences.cn: 她很生气，瞪了他一眼。

sentences.c: She stole a glance at her watch.
sentences.cn: 她偷偷看了看表。

sentences.c: I snatched a glance at the mirror.
sentences.cn: 我乘机瞥了一眼镜子。

trans.cn: 下降，沉没, 屈服, 被记下
下降：指向地面或水中移动；沉没。
被接受：指被接受或认同。
被记住：指在后世被记住。
遭受失败：指遭受失败或失利。

sentences.c: At midday everyone would go down to Reg's Café.
sentences.cn: 中午每个人都去雷吉的小餐馆。

sentences.c: Go down the road till you reach the traffic lights.
sentences.cn: 沿着这条路一直走到红绿灯处。

sentences.c: "You go down that passageway over there."—"Which one?"
sentences.cn: “你顺着那边的过道走。”—“哪个过道？”

synos.cn: 下降；平静下来；传下去；被接受

trans.cn: 去努力：指为了获得某物或达成某个目标而努力奋斗。
继续：持续进行某个动作或状态。
进行：继续或进行某个活动或事件。
发生：事件或情况正在进行或发生。
夸夸其谈：滔滔不绝地说话，尤指夸大其词。
继续前进：继续或像进行旅程一样继续前进。

sentences.c: Tickets go on sale this week.
sentences.cn: 票本周开始出售。

sentences.c: The shoes go on the shoe shelf.
sentences.cn: 鞋子应该放在鞋架上。

sentences.c: It won't go on beyond midnight.
sentences.cn: 这事不会延续到午夜以后。

synos.cn: 继续；过去；继续下去；发生

trans.cn: 度假：离开日常生活去休闲或旅游的行为。

sentences.c: I just can't wait to go on holiday with my family.
sentences.cn: 我等不及要和家人一起去度假了。

sentences.c: It's an either-or situation—we can buy a camera this year or we can go on holiday but we can't do either.
sentences.cn: 这是一个非此即彼的情况，我们今年要么买个相机，要么去度假，但我们两个都做不到。

sentences.c: Do we or do we not go on holiday?
sentences.cn: 我们去不去度假？

trans.cn: 转变，改变：指变得转变或改变。
通过，获得认可：指获得认可或通过。
被接受，受欢迎：指被接受或受欢迎。
查看，检查：指查看或检查某物。
通过，穿过：指通过或穿过某个区域。

sentences.c: He would go over his work again and again until he felt he had it right.
sentences.cn: 他会反复检查他的工作直到他觉得准确无误为止。

sentences.c: Go over your work before you hand it in.
sentences.cn: 把作业仔细检查后再交。

sentences.c: I'm not sure that I understand. Go over it again.
sentences.cn: 我不敢说我搞懂了。请再来一遍吧。

synos.cn: 复习，重温；仔细检查；转变；润色

trans.cn: 去攀岩：指前往山区或岩壁等地方进行攀登运动。

sentences.c: He was burning to go climbing again.
sentences.cn: 他渴望再去爬山。

sentences.c: Let's go climbing if it is fine this Saturday.
sentences.cn: 如果这个星期六天气好的话，我们去爬山吧。

sentences.c: Do you still want to go climbing or have you changed your mind?
sentences.cn: 你还想去爬山吗？还是改变主意了？

trans.cn: 骑自行车：进行骑自行车的活动，通常是在户外的道路或者自行车道上进行。

sentences.c: Would you like to go cycling?
sentences.cn: 你想去骑自行车吗？

sentences.c: I sometimes go cycling with my sister.
sentences.cn: 我有时和姐姐一起去骑车。

sentences.c: We go cycling on weekends.
sentences.cn: 周末我们去兜风。

trans.cn: 骑行：指骑自行车、摩托车或马等进行活动或运动。

sentences.c: Let's go riding now.
sentences.cn: 现在让我们一起去骑马吧。

sentences.c: How often do you go riding?
sentences.cn: 你多长时间骑一次马？

sentences.c: During the summer holiday, I often go riding on the grassland with my brother.
sentences.cn: 暑假期间，我经常和我的弟弟在草原上骑马。

trans.cn: 去航海：指乘坐帆船或其他船只在海上航行或比赛。

sentences.c: Do you go sailing often?
sentences.cn: 你常去驾帆船玩吗？

sentences.c: If Tom goes, we could go sailing.
sentences.cn: 如果汤姆去，我们就可以去航海。

sentences.c: On Saturdays, my wife and I always go sailing together.
sentences.cn: 星期六我和妻子总是一起去航海。

trans.cn: 购物：去商店或商场浏览和购买商品。

sentences.c: I remarked that I would go shopping that afternoon.
sentences.cn: 我说过那天下午我要去买东西。

sentences.c: We decided to write off the rest of the day and go shopping.
sentences.cn: 我们决定放弃那天余下的时间而去购物。

sentences.c: There's a mock-up of the main street where the Goodwins go shopping.
sentences.cn: 古德温一家购物的那条大街有一个模型街景。

trans.cn: 去滑雪：参加滑雪活动，通常在雪地或滑雪场进行。

sentences.c: We go skiing most weekends in winter.
sentences.cn: 我们在冬天的周末大多去滑雪。

sentences.c: We're debating whether or not to go skiing this winter.
sentences.cn: 我们盘算着今年冬天是否去滑雪。

sentences.c: Many skiers are happy to forego a summer holiday to go skiing.
sentences.cn: 许多滑雪者乐于放弃暑假去滑雪。

trans.cn: 去游泳：参与游泳活动，通常在水中进行。

sentences.c: How often do you go swimming?
sentences.cn: 你多久去游泳一次？

sentences.c: Do you like to go swimming?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢去游泳吗？

sentences.c: I go swimming twice a week.
sentences.cn: 我每星期游泳两次。

trans.cn: 发生意外事故：指在交通工具、户外活动等场合中发生的不幸事件。

sentences.c: She'll have an accident one day.
sentences.cn: 她总有一天会出事的。

sentences.c: Did Liu Yanzhi have an accident when she was a baby?
sentences.cn: 刘艳芝在婴儿时期出过事故吗？

sentences.c: When you go rock climbing, you need to be careful so that you don't have an accident.
sentences.cn: 攀岩时你要十分留心，这样才不会发生意外。

trans.cn: 休息一下：在工作中休息一段时间，员工可以暂时离开工作岗位。这是一种休息时间。根据休息的长度和雇主的政策，休息可能会有薪酬或无薪酬。

sentences.c: I'd love to have a break, but I can't spare the time just now.
sentences.cn: 我是想休息一下，可眼下找不出时间。

sentences.c: They may be able to help with childcare so that you can have a break.
sentences.cn: 他们或许能帮忙看孩子,这样你可以歇歇。

sentences.c: When Mr. Hall said they'd have a break inside because it was raining, Freddy said, "Every cloud has a silver lining."
sentences.cn: 当霍尔先生说因为下雨他们可以在室内休息时，弗雷迪说：“黑暗中总有一丝光明。”

trans.cn: 对…有影响；对……起作用，产生效果

sentences.c: Astronomical cycles have an effect on Earth's climate even during periods when there is no glaciation.
sentences.cn: 即使在没有冰川的时期，天文周期也会对地球的气候产生影响。

sentences.c: A country's capacity to produce wealth depends upon many factors, most of which have an effect on one another.
sentences.cn: 一个国家创造财富的能力取决于许多因素，其中大多数因素相互影响。

sentences.c: A study reported last fall suggests that having a pet dog not only raises your spirits but may also have an effect on your eating habits.
sentences.cn: 去年秋天的一项研究表明，养一只宠物狗不仅能振奋你的精神状态，还可能影响你的饮食习惯。

synos.cn: 对…有影响；对……起作用，产生效果

trans.cn: 对……产生影响：对某事物或某人产生重要或显著的影响或效果。

sentences.c: I don't mean to imply that overall job growth doesn't have an impact on one's ability to land a job.
sentences.cn: 我并不是说总体就业增长不会影响人们找到工作的能力。

sentences.c: Robots continue to have an impact on blue-collar jobs, and white-collar jobs are under attack by microprocessors.
sentences.cn: 机器人继续影响蓝领工作，而白领工作正受到微处理器的攻击。

sentences.c: And of course, if it has an impact on obesity, it will have an impact on diabetes and heart disease and high blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 当然，如果它对肥胖有影响，它对糖尿病、心脏病和高血压也会有影响。

trans.cn: 进行考试：指参加一项正式的考试。

sentences.c: Yes, I shall. Well have an exam.
sentences.cn: 是的，我必须去。我们明天有考试。

sentences.c: Yes, I shall. We'll have an exam.
sentences.cn: 是的，我必须去。我们明天有考试。

sentences.c: I have an exam tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我明天有个考试。

sentences.c: Children have an important role in Iranian cinema.
sentences.cn: 儿童在伊朗电影业中扮演着重要角色。

sentences.c: Health systems also have an important role to play.
sentences.cn: 卫生系统也可发挥重要作用。

sentences.c: Business schools also have an important role to play.
sentences.cn: 商学院也要扮演重要角色。

trans.cn: 找到一份工作：成功地获得一份工作或职业。

sentences.c: You have a job, earned your degree, and you got out of bed today.
sentences.cn: 你有了一份工作，拿到了学位，今天就起床了。

sentences.c: According to economic research, one in six working-age men, 25-54, doesn't have a job.
sentences.cn: 据经济研究，在25岁至54岁的适龄男性劳动力中，有六分之一的人没有工作。

sentences.c: Players like Fabian Boll who have a job on the side and an education are a very rare exception these days.
sentences.cn: 像法比安·波尔这样的球员，他有一份工作，并且受过教育，这在当今是非常罕见的例外。

trans.cn: 四处看看：在某个地方或场所逛逛，浏览周围的环境或物品。

sentences.c: This opening led to a cave, so they decided to have a look around it.
sentences.cn: 这个洞口通向一个山洞，所以他们决定去看看。

sentences.c: A sweeper could have a look around for a job as a janitor or a cleaner.
sentences.cn: 清洁工可以找一份看门人或清洁工的工作。

sentences.c: B：I’d just like to have a look around.
sentences.cn: 我只想随便看看。

trans.cn: 开会：指商讨某个议题或共同解决某个问题的活动。

sentences.c: I will have a meeting this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 我今天下午要开会。

sentences.c: Have a meeting with the headmaster about prizes for excellent student helpers.
sentences.cn: 与校长开会讨论优秀学生助手的奖项。

sentences.c: Do you have a meeting today?
sentences.cn: 你今天有会吗？

trans.cn: 举办聚会：组织或参加一次社交聚会，通常涉及食物、饮料、音乐和社交活动。

sentences.c: Let's have a party.
sentences.cn: 我们来一次聚会吧。

sentences.c: When they decide to have a party they don't mess around.
sentences.cn: 他们决定搞聚会，便会迅速操办起来。

sentences.c: We will have a party for Kate.
sentences.cn: 我们将为凯特举办一个聚会。

trans.cn: 淋浴：在浴室内用水淋浴来清洗身体。

sentences.c: Other bathrooms have a shower.
sentences.cn: 其它浴室里有冲凉设备。

sentences.c: I have a shower every morning.
sentences.cn: 我每天早晨都淋浴。

sentences.c: Does the bathroom have a shower?
sentences.cn: 这个洗澡间有淋浴吗？

trans.cn: 能够到达或进入某个地方：具有使用某物或接触某人的权利或机会。

sentences.c: Students must have access to good resources.
sentences.cn: 学生必须有机会使用好的资源。

sentences.c: Millions of people cannot read these words because they don't have access to a computer.
sentences.cn: 数百万人无法阅读这些文字，因为他们没有使用电脑的机会。

sentences.c: We must ensure that all patients have access to high quality care.
sentences.cn: 我们必须确保所有的病人都能够得到高质量的护理。

trans.cn: 喝咖啡：指喝咖啡作为一种饮料或社交活动。

sentences.c: I'll have coffee and a brioche.
sentences.cn: 我要一杯咖啡和一份法式甜面包。

sentences.c: We have coffee, tea, juice, cola, beer and cocktails.
sentences.cn: 我们提供咖啡、茶、果汁、可乐、啤酒和鸡尾酒。

sentences.c: We have coffee, tea, juice, coke, beer and cocktails.
sentences.cn: 咖啡、茶、果汁、可乐、啤酒和调酒。

sentences.c: Do you have friends?
sentences.cn: 你有朋友吗？

sentences.c: You are not alone because you have friends.
sentences.cn: 你并不会孤单，因为你有朋友。

sentences.c: Since we have friends in Phoenix, we pop in there for a brief visit.
sentences.cn: 因为我们在凤凰城有朋友，所以我们会去那里短暂拜访一下。

trans.cn: 享受自己；体验愉快的活动

sentences.c: Let's have fun!
sentences.cn: 让我们玩得开心！

sentences.c: Let's have fun together!
sentences.cn: 让我们一起去玩耍吧！

sentences.c: Have fun with English!
sentences.cn: 在英语中寻找乐趣！

trans.cn: 有共同点：与某人或某物分享兴趣、经历或其他特征。

sentences.c: The dishes in the north and south have something in common.
sentences.cn: 北方和南方的菜肴有一些共同之处。

sentences.c: People usually become friends because they have something in common.
sentences.cn: 人们之所以会成为朋友，是因为他们有共同点。

sentences.c: They have something in common (共性). We call it a balalaika but it's played differently.
sentences.cn: 它们有一些共同点。我们称之为俄式三弦琴，但演奏方式不同。

trans.cn: 没有共同之处：指没有共同的兴趣、信仰、态度、观点等。

sentences.c: To my surprise, the twins have nothing in common.
sentences.cn: 令我惊讶的是，这对双胞胎毫无共同之处。

sentences.c: The two have nothing in common.
sentences.cn: 两者毫无相同之处。

sentences.c: Two entirely separate islands, or worlds, might have different languages, and most likely have nothing in common.
sentences.cn: 两个完全相隔的岛或者世界之间，会有不同的语言，并且很有可能毫无相通之处。

trans.cn: 与某事有关：与某事物有联系或关联。

sentences.c: My favourite time of the holidays is when the children have torn open their lot and delivered their verdicts and are looking to you for sth else…memories that have nothing to do with things bought.
sentences.cn: 孩子们撕开包装纸检视战利品，表示了好恶之后，望着你要别的东西：这是节日里我最喜欢的一刻……那记忆和买来的东西毫无关系。

trans.cn: 有时间：能够使用一定的时间来完成某个特定的目的。

sentences.c: We don't often have time to talk.
sentences.cn: 我们常常没有时间谈话。

sentences.c: I only have time for a snack at lunchtime.
sentences.cn: 中午，我的时间只够吃点心。

sentences.c: I wouldn't have time to scout the area for junk.
sentences.cn: 我不会有时间在那个地区找废物。

sentences.c: B have difficulty(in)doing sth.
sentences.cn: “做……有困难”，固定用法。

trans.cn: 朝……前进/移动：指朝着某个目的地或方向前进或移动。

sentences.c: You'll need to keep a clear head for your interview.
sentences.cn: 你面试时需要保持清醒的头脑。

sentences.c: He was too trusting—or, to put it another way , he had no head for business.
sentences.cn: 他太轻信人了—或者换个说法，他没有商业头脑。

sentences.c: Her spectacles were propped up on her gray head for safety.
sentences.cn: 为了安全起见，她把眼镜架在灰白的头上。

trans.cn: 帮助：为了让另一个人的工作或任务更容易而做某事。
援助：提供帮助或支持，尤指在需要的时候。

sentences.c: I help out with the secretarial work.
sentences.cn: 我帮助做秘书工作。

sentences.c: Regulars at his local bar have set up a fund to help out.
sentences.cn: 他的当地酒吧的常客们已经设立了一项基金来帮忙解决困难。

sentences.c: Sometimes they are willing to help out students with projects like yours.
sentences.cn: 有时他们愿意帮助学生完成像你的这种项目。

trans.cn: 召开会议：组织并进行一次会议，讨论特定的议题或问题。

sentences.c: The three IT managers hold a meeting.
sentences.cn: 三家花店的 IT 经理进行了一次面谈。

sentences.c: We discussed whether we should hold a meeting.
sentences.cn: 我们讨论了是否要开一个会。

sentences.c: Why not to study under that tree and hold a meeting?
sentences.cn: 为什么不去那棵树下学习再开个讨论会呢？

trans.cn: 持有执照：拥有合法的证明文件，允许某人从事特定的职业或活动。

sentences.c: Although its current products are based on single drugs, the company does hold a license to develop dual-drug nanocells.
sentences.cn: 虽然公司目前的产品都属单一药物性质，但公司持有开发双药物纳米细胞的许可证。

sentences.c: The "business departments" as mentioned in these Provisions refers to the business departments which are established by insurance companies and hold a License for Operating insurance business.
sentences.cn: 本规定所称营业部，是指由保险机构设立的持有《经营保险业务许可证》的营业部。

sentences.c: Officials stated that the Fromms require a license to hold meetings in their home.
sentences.cn: 官员指出弗洛姆家人需要一个许可证在自己的家中举行聚会。

trans.cn: 忍住眼泪：控制自己不流泪或不表现出情感的迹象。

sentences.c: It's good to hold back tears during a tense business discussion.
sentences.cn: 参考译文：在进行紧张的商业讨论时抑制住泪水是比较好的。

sentences.c: Everyone in the small observation post was failing to hold back tears.
sentences.cn: 在这个小小观察站的所有人都忍不住掉下眼泪。

sentences.c: Hearing her daughter's success, she could not hold back tears of joy.
sentences.cn: 听到女儿成功了，她禁不住流下了喜悦的泪水。

trans.cn: 握手：两个或更多人相互握手，通常用于形容情侣或亲密关系中的人们。

sentences.c: We hold hands, looking up to happiness.
sentences.cn: 我们紧握双手，仰望幸福。

sentences.c: Would you just hold hands and swear that we—Oh no, that wouldn't do for this.
sentences.cn: 你能不能举起手来，发誓我们——哦，不，这可不行。

sentences.c: But hold hands madly?
sentences.cn: 但他们会疯狂地牵手么？

trans.cn: 保持纪录：指某人或某事物在某一方面保持着最高的记录或成就。

sentences.c: We hold the record for the longest migration of any animal in the world!
sentences.cn: 我们保持着世界上动物迁徙距离最长的记录！

sentences.c: Arsenal hold the record for Fielding the most players in an England team.
sentences.cn: 阿森纳保持了为英格兰国家队贡献最多球员的纪录。

sentences.c: United hold the record for the most FA cup victories and Charity shield wins.
sentences.cn: 曼联还保有赢得最多足总杯和慈善盾的记录。

sentences.c: I was put in charge of the office.
sentences.cn: 他们让我负责管理这个办公室。

sentences.c: Send it to whoever is in charge of sales.
sentences.cn: 把这寄给负责销售的人。

sentences.c: He was the officer in charge of operations.
sentences.cn: 他是负责指挥作战行动的军官。

sentences.c: The sandy beach was in sight.
sentences.cn: 那片沙滩映入眼帘。

sentences.c: There was no one in sight.
sentences.cn: 一个人也看不见。

sentences.c: At last we came in sight of a few houses.
sentences.cn: 最后，我们看到了几座房屋。

trans.cn: 尽管、不管、虽然：表示尽管存在某种情况或条件，但仍然发生或存在另一种情况。

sentences.c: In spite of great peril, I have survived.
sentences.cn: 尽管危险巨大，我还是活了下来。

sentences.c: In spite of my outward calm I was very shaken.
sentences.cn: 尽管表面看似镇静，我内心却非常慌乱。

sentences.c: He survived in spite of suffering grievous injuries.
sentences.cn: 尽管遭受重伤，他仍然活下来了。

sentences.c: This ensures that the state can be recovered from either the scheduling node or the execution node in event of failure.
sentences.cn: 这样就确保了当调度节点或者执行节点出现故障时那些状态可以恢复。

sentences.c: The bank has agreed to give an immediate refund in the unlikely event of an error being made.
sentences.cn: 银行已同意倘若出现不太可能的错误便立即退款。

sentences.c: In view of the weather, the event will now be held indoors.
sentences.cn: 由于天气的缘故，这项赛事将在室内进行。

sentences.c: In view of the fact that Hobson was not a trained economist his achievements were remarkable.
sentences.cn: 鉴于霍布森非科班出身的经济学家这一事实，他的成就是很了不起的。

sentences.c: Residents were warned not to be extravagant with water, in view of the low rainfall this year.
sentences.cn: 鉴于今年降雨量少，居民被告诫不得浪费用水。

sentences.c: His chances do not seem good in view of the fact that the Chief Prosecutor has already voiced his public disapproval.
sentences.cn: 鉴于首席检察官已公开表示反对这一事实，他的机会看起来不好。

sentences.c: In general, a plain carpet makes a room look bigger.
sentences.cn: 一般来讲，纯色的地毯使房间显得更大。

sentences.c: In general, Japanese cars are very reliable and breakdowns are rare.
sentences.cn: 日本汽车通常是很可靠的，发生故障的情况极少。

sentences.c: I know how it works in general terms.
sentences.cn: 我大致知道其中的运作原理。

sentences.c: Dave was in a hurry to get back to work.
sentences.cn: 戴夫急于回去工作。

sentences.c: We were in a hurry so we had to make do with a quick snack.
sentences.cn: 我们很匆忙，只好将就着来了点小吃。

sentences.c: Kate was in a hurry to grow up, eager for knowledge and experience.
sentences.cn: 凯特急切地想长大，渴望获得知识和经验。

ws: at the drop of a hat

trans.cn: 私下地，不公开地，不让其他人知道地

sentences.c: The proceedings of the inquiry will take place in private.
sentences.cn: 调查行动将秘密进行。

sentences.c: What consenting adults do in private is their own business.
sentences.cn: 成年人私下做什么是他们自己的事情。

sentences.c: The appeal was heard in private.
sentences.cn: 这件上诉案不公开审理。

trans.cn: 作为回报：作为对某事的回应或交换。

sentences.c: In return, we drove John back home.
sentences.cn: 返回途中，我们开车把约翰送回家了。

sentences.c: Can I buy you lunch in return for your help?
sentences.cn: 感谢你帮忙，我请你吃午饭好吗？

sentences.c: We made too many concessions and we got too little in return.
sentences.cn: 我们作出了太多让步，而得到了太少回报。

trans.cn: 处于危险之中：面临可能发生危险或伤害的情况。

sentences.c: The building is in danger of collapsing.
sentences.cn: 这栋建筑有垮塌的危险。

sentences.c: They were more in danger of having their pockets picked than being shot at.
sentences.cn: 他们遭遇扒窃的危险大于遭受枪击。

sentences.c: The economy is in danger of collapse unless far-reaching reforms are implemented.
sentences.cn: 除非实施影响深远的改革，否则经济就有崩溃的危险。

trans.cn: 告知某人某事：向某人传达某一信息或消息。
坚持认为某事是必要的或非常重要的：指坚持认为某件事情是必须要做或非常重要的，不会妥协或放弃。
继续做某事，即使其他人认为这很烦人或不重要：指继续做某件事情，即使其他人认为这件事很烦人、不重要或不必要。

sentences.c: I insist on paying for the damage.
sentences.cn: 我坚持要赔偿损失。

sentences.c: We insist on the highest standards at all times.
sentences.cn: 我们始终坚持最高标准。

sentences.c: They insist on sticking to the letter of the law.
sentences.cn: 他们坚持严守法律的字面意义。

synos.cn: 坚持，坚决要求；督促，强调

trans.cn: 干扰：停止或减慢（某事物）；使（某事物）变得更慢或更困难。
性骚扰：对（儿童）进行性骚扰，触碰（儿童）以不当的方式。

sentences.c: I try not to let work interfere with my personal life.
sentences.cn: 我尽量不让工作干扰我的私生活。

sentences.c: She never allows her personal feelings to interfere with her work.
sentences.cn: 她从不让她的个人感情妨碍工作。

sentences.c: Smoking and drinking interfere with your body's ability to process oxygen.
sentences.cn: 吸烟和喝酒妨碍身体对氧的吸收能力。

synos.cn: 干扰，干涉；妨碍；触动或弄坏；乱动；与……抵触

trans.cn: 与……一致；符合……的计划、想法或期望

sentences.c: Wage increases must be in line with inflation.
sentences.cn: 工资的增长必须与通货膨胀率一致。

sentences.c: Annual pay increases will be in line with inflation.
sentences.cn: 每年加薪幅度将与通货膨胀挂钩。

sentences.c: An eclipse happens when the earth and moon are in line with the sun.
sentences.cn: 地球和月亮与太阳处在一条直线上，日食就发生了。

trans.cn: 在我看来：表示个人观点或意见。

sentences.c: In my view things won't change.
sentences.cn: 在我看来形势不会改变。

sentences.c: In my view, you are a menace to the public.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，你对公众是一个威胁。

sentences.c: In my view this book would deprave young children.
sentences.cn: 我认为这本书会腐蚀儿童。

sentences.c: Strawberries are cheaper when they're in season.
sentences.cn: 草莓在上市季节很便宜。

sentences.c: These are the dog days; watermelons are just in season.
sentences.cn: 现在是伏天，西瓜正当令。

sentences.c: There are a few ideas around on how to treat fillies and mares in season.
sentences.cn: 关于如何对待发情期的小母马和母马有几种观点。

trans.cn: 在户外：在没有遮蔽物的地方，暴露在自然环境中。

sentences.c: We sleep out under the stars, and eat our meals in the open air.
sentences.cn: 我们露宿在星空下，在户外用餐。

sentences.c: They again ate outside, for Clara had to be in the open air all day, if possible.
sentences.cn: 他们又在外面吃饭了，因为克拉拉如果她可以的话，一整天都会待在露天里。

sentences.c: In zoos, animals are no longer kept in cages, but in great spaces, either in the open air or in enormous greenhouses.
sentences.cn: 在动物园里，动物不再被关在笼子里，而是生活在广阔的空间里：要么是露天的环境，要么是巨大的温室。

sentences.c: They live in the end house.
sentences.cn: 他们住在最后的那座房子。

sentences.c: In the end, wiser counsels prevailed.
sentences.cn: 高明的建议最终占了上风。

sentences.c: Everything will come right in the end.
sentences.cn: 一切到最后都会好起来的。
