sentences.cn: 她干这工作很合适。

sentences.c: Oh great! That'll be good for Fred.
sentences.cn: 噢，太棒了！那对弗雷德将会很有利。

trans.cn: 感激，感谢：对某事或某人心存感激和感谢之情。

sentences.c: We should be grateful for your help.
sentences.cn: 对您的帮助我会非常感激。

sentences.c: We would be grateful for any information you can give us.
sentences.cn: 如能提供信息我们将感激不尽。

sentences.c: There was a matter of some delicacy on which he would be grateful for her advice.
sentences.cn: 有一件棘手的事，若能得到她的指点，他会感激不尽。

trans.cn: 渴望，迫切想要得到或实现某事：指对某事物或某种经历感到渴望，迫切希望得到或实现。

sentences.c: "That would be grand, certainly," said Alice thoughtfully, "but then--I shouldn't be hungry for it, you know."
sentences.cn: “那太好了，”爱丽丝想了想说，“不过，我不应该为它挨饿，你知道。”

sentences.c: Can we literally be hungry for money?
sentences.cn: 我们是否会对钱有一种饥饿？

sentences.c: In today's world many people appear to be hungry for money.
sentences.cn: 当今世界，有不少人对金钱流露出极度的渴望。

trans.cn: 迟到：指在规定的时间之后到达某个地点或完成某个任务。

sentences.c: It means I'll be late for work but what the heck!
sentences.cn: 那意味着我上班会迟到，不过管它的呢！

sentences.c: I'll be late for school.
sentences.cn: 我上学要迟到了。

sentences.c: We can't be late for the meeting.
sentences.cn: 我们开会不能迟到。

trans.cn: 对于……是必要的：表示某事对于实现或完成另一件事是必要的。

sentences.c: Exposure to nature has been thought to be necessary for brain development in children.
sentences.cn: 人们一直认为，接触大自然对儿童的大脑发育是必要的。

sentences.c: Such a change may not be necessary for your distribution.
sentences.cn: 对于您所使用的版本可能不需要这种更改。

sentences.c: Dr Heymann: That will be necessary for the countries to negotiate.
sentences.cn: Heymann博士: 这必需由国家进行谈判。

trans.cn: 准备好迎接：做好准备以应对某种情况或事件。

sentences.c: The ship will not be ready for a month.
sentences.cn: 这艘船一个月内将不会准备就绪。

sentences.c: I think he may be ready for a sleep soon.
sentences.cn: 我想他可能准备好了马上睡一觉。

sentences.c: The offices will be ready for occupation in June.
sentences.cn: 办公室将于六月交付使用。

trans.cn: 为……感到抱歉：表示对某人或某事表示歉意或遗憾。

sentences.c: You need not be sorry for her.
sentences.cn: 你们不必为她难过。

sentences.c: I ought to be sorry for myself, too, just now.
sentences.cn: 我现在也应该为自己感到难过。

sentences.c: You will be sorry for this.
sentences.cn: 对此事，你会后悔的。

synos.cn: 为…感到抱歉；为…感到难过

sentences.c: As it ages, these conditions may change and the area around it may no longer be suitable for its offspring.
sentences.cn: 随着年龄的增长，这些条件可能会变，它周围的区域可能不再适合它的后代。

sentences.c: An example of how the connection can influence us is when our weak-ties get in touch and pass on details about jobs they think might be suitable for us.
sentences.cn: 一个关系如何影响我们的例子就是，与我们有弱关系的人联系我们，并告知他们认为可能适合我们的工作的细节。

sentences.c: These regions seem too dry to be suitable for farming.
sentences.cn: 这些地区看来太干燥而不适合农业。

trans.cn: 感激，对……心怀感激：指对某事物或某人心怀感激之情。

sentences.c: He wasn't badly hurt—that's something to be thankful for.
sentences.cn: 他的伤不重，这倒是值得庆幸。

sentences.c: We should be thankful for scientific thinkers like Yuan.
sentences.cn: 我们应该感谢袁先生这样的科学思想家。

sentences.c: This experience has taught me to be thankful for things we have in life.
sentences.cn: 这段经历教会我要对生活中所拥有的一切心存感激。

trans.cn: 因……而闻名：因某种特定的原因或特点而广为人知或闻名。

sentences.c: Well-known figures would be a big plus for the new board.
sentences.cn: 名人会成为新董事会的一大优势。

sentences.c: These licenses can be used over the Internet as well (like an online banking application) because the end user is well known since they must be specifically identifiable for this license.
sentences.cn: 也可以通过因特网使用这些许可（比如在线银行应用程序），因为最终用户是已知的，因而必须被许可明确识别。

sentences.c: That turned out to be very beneficial, since managing an online shop for a well-known brand developed their professional spirit.
sentences.cn: 结果证明这是很用的，因为为知名品牌管理网店能够开发他们的专业精神。

trans.cn: 缺席：不在场，不出席某个活动或场合。
缺少：某物或某人不在某个地方或情况中。

sentences.c: She became so afraid of going to school that she started to be absent from her classes.
sentences.cn: 她变得如此害怕去上学，以至于开始逃课。

sentences.c: This setup allows the HTML-specific code to be absent from your component.
sentences.cn: 这个设置允许特定于HTML的代码从组件脱离。

sentences.c: We are confident, I say, and willing rather to be absent from the body, and to be present with the Lord.
sentences.cn: 我们坦然无惧，是更愿意离开身体与主同住。

sentences.c: If you spoke in the first person, the word would be different from in the third person.
sentences.cn: 用第一人称讲话，所用的词会完全不同于用第三人称讲话。

sentences.c: I'm also interested in how consumers operate online, and how that online behavior might be different from how they operate offline when they go to the shops.
sentences.cn: 我还对消费者如何在网上操作，以及这种在网上购物的行为与他们在线下去商店购物时的行为有何不同很感兴趣。

sentences.c: It is not at all clear why the costs of serving a highly loyal customer should in principle be different from those of serving any other type of repeat customer.
sentences.cn: 为什么服务一个高度忠诚的顾客的成本原则上与服务其他类型的回头客的成本是不同的，这一点完全不清楚。

trans.cn: 完全不同：与某事物完全不同。

sentences.c: Mr. Obama's plan to curb carbon dioxide emissions, though necessary, will be far from cost free, whatever his sunny speeches on the subject might suggest.
sentences.cn: 尽管奥巴马的二氧化碳减排计划是必要的，但无论他在这个问题上发表的充满希望的演讲可能会暗示什么，这远不是免费的。

sentences.c: Mr. Obama's plan to curb carbon dioxide emissions, though necessary, will be far from cost-free, whatever his sunny speeches on the subject might suggest.
sentences.cn: 尽管奥巴马的二氧化碳减排计划是必要的，但这远不是免费的，无论他在这个问题上发表的充满希望的演讲可能会暗示什么。

sentences.c: Be far from dangerous things.
sentences.cn: 远离危险事物。

trans.cn: 免受，免于；没有……的，不受……影响的

sentences.c: "We want people in China to be free from fear or worry," said the song's producer.
sentences.cn: 这首歌的制作人说：“我们希望中国的人们没有恐惧，不再担忧。”

sentences.c: She several times emphasizes this need for protection, need to be free from being torn down from people around them.
sentences.cn: 她多次强调这种保护的需要，需要从周围的人那里解放出来。

sentences.c: Men are not saints; how can they be free from faults?
sentences.cn: 人非圣贤， 孰能无过?

synos.cn: 免受，免于；没有…的，不受…影响的

trans.cn: 免受……的伤害或危险：不受……的威胁或危害。

sentences.c: You might think a bird that could fly so fast would be safe from most types of danger.
sentences.cn: 你可能会认为，一只能飞得如此之快的鸟儿会在大多数危险前安全无恙。

sentences.c: Floating cities will be safe from flooding.
sentences.cn: 漂浮的城市不会被洪水淹没。

sentences.c: The next year, their food would be safe from Bear.
sentences.cn: 接着的那年，他们的粮食将会安全不被熊吃了。

trans.cn: 因……而疲劳：由于某种原因而感到疲劳或疲倦。

sentences.c: I thought the ants would be tired from their daylong work.
sentences.cn: 我认为这些蚂蚁会因为成天劳动而累了。

sentences.c: You must be tired from long flight, please take a rest today.
sentences.cn: 长时间搭乘飞机你一定累了，请你好好休息吧。

sentences.c: You must be tired from the long flight. Please take a rest today.
sentences.cn: 长时间地搭乘飞机您一定累了，今天就请好好休息吧…。

trans.cn: 参与，涉及：与某事或某活动有关联或参与其中。

sentences.c: I don't think we should be concerned in terms of travel to the Middle East or to-to anywhere in the world right now.
sentences.cn: 我不认为咱们现在应该担心前往中东或到世界上的任何地方。

sentences.c: Introduce CE/EMC test requirements for electric & electronic toys, and briefly discuss common issues needed to be concerned in design toys.
sentences.cn: 介绍玩具产品CE认证所需进行的电磁兼容测试及产品中出现的主要问题和解决方法。

sentences.c: But scarcely be concerned in application problem, less convincing theory of solving problems and setting up questions in application problem may be discovered.
sentences.cn: 但对数学奥林匹克应用问题缺乏足够的关注，难以找到令人信服的解题与命题的理论阐述。

ws: to have something to do with

trans.cn: 对……感到失望：对某人或某事感到失望或不满意。

sentences.c: Connie: I hope you won't be disappointed in As pen, Maria.
sentences.cn: 康妮：我希望你在奥斯本不会感到失望，玛丽亚。

sentences.c: I hope so. I just don't want him to be disappointed in me.
sentences.cn: 但愿如此。我只是不希望他对我失望。

sentences.c: My parents will be disappointed in me if I fail in the exam.
sentences.cn: 如果我考试不及格，我父母将为我感到失望。

trans.cn: 从事某事：参与某项活动或工作。

sentences.c: During the first year of the program, students were found to be less likely to transfer schools or be engaged in violent crime.
sentences.cn: 人们发现，在项目的第一年，学生转校或参与暴力犯罪的可能性较低。

sentences.c: I'd be engaged in studying Chinese poetry.
sentences.cn: 因为我会学习中国诗词。

sentences.c: So, it can be engaged in the shipment of wood.
sentences.cn: 对了，它可以用来装载木头。

trans.cn: 熟练掌握：在某个领域或活动中具有丰富的经验和技能。

sentences.c: In this age of information, we should be experienced in using the Internet as a search tool.
sentences.cn: 在这个信息时代，我们应该熟练使用互联网这个搜索工具。

sentences.c: The Chief Executive should be experienced in business administration.
sentences.cn: 总经理应有企业管理经验。

sentences.c: Many of the adverse effects will still be experienced in poor metabolizers.
sentences.cn: 许多不良反应仍然会在代谢不良者身上发生。

trans.cn: 精通于：对某个领域或技能有深入的了解和掌握。

sentences.c: He is said to be expert in English speech.
sentences.cn: 据说，他擅长用英语作演说。

sentences.c: Be expert in...
sentences.cn: 在…方面是专家。

sentences.c: I don't profess to be an expert in this subject.
sentences.cn: 我不敢自诩为这方面的专家。

trans.cn: 在……方面幸运：指在某个特定领域或方面运气好，取得成功或获得好的结果。

sentences.c: However, we may not be so fortunate in the future, experts warned.
sentences.cn: 然而，专家警告，将来我们就不会这么幸运了。

sentences.c: "I never thought I would be a star in a commercial, then this happened. It's very fortunate," Anas said.
sentences.cn: 阿纳斯说：“我从没想过自己能拍广告，而这确实发生了，真是很幸运。”

sentences.c: Nelly, you think you are better and more fortunate than I; in full health and strength: you are sorry for me — very soon that will be altered.
sentences.cn: 耐莉，你以为你比我好些，幸运些；完全健康有力：你为我难过——不久这就要改变了。

sentences.c: Challenge yourself to be honest in your purchases.
sentences.cn: 试着对你要购买的物品诚实一点。

sentences.c: Let us be careful to be honest in all out dealings.
sentences.cn: 让我们小心，在一切我们做的事上诚实不欺。

sentences.c: Paul advised, "Be honest in your evaluation of yourselves."..
sentences.cn: 保罗忠告我们，“要诚实的评价自己…”。

trans.cn: 缺乏：指某物或某方面不足。
不足：指某物或某方面不够充足。

sentences.c: Mrs Merkel may be lack in g high-quality advice.
sentences.cn: 默克尔也许缺少高质量的建议。

sentences.c: There seems to be a lack of appreciation of what is actually going on in the real world.
sentences.cn: 人们似乎缺乏对现实世界中真实情况的了解。

sentences.c: To some extent, they can be ascribed to a distinct lack of a sense of social responsibility among enterprises and individuals, which is of crucial importance in building a better world.
sentences.cn: 在某种程度上，这可以归因于企业和个人明显缺乏社会责任感，而社会责任感对建设一个更美好的世界至关重要。

trans.cn: 富含，充满：指某物质或某地区具有丰富的某种物质或资源。

sentences.c: Film makers would be rich in the future.
sentences.cn: 电影制作人将来会很富有。

sentences.c: He is believed to be rich in mind.
sentences.cn: 大家都相信他很有头脑。

sentences.c: Complementary foods should be rich in nutrients and given in adequate amounts.
sentences.cn: 补充食品应富含营养，同时要喂养充足。

trans.cn: 擅长于：具有某种技能或能力，能够熟练地运用。

sentences.c: Be skillful in computer.
sentences.cn: 熟悉电脑运用。

sentences.c: During communication, the person you are communicating with USES one of the opposite skills. Therefore, in order to understand each other, everyone must be skillful in all four areas.
sentences.cn: 在交流的过程中，你正在交流的那个人可能正在使用一些相反的能力，所以你必须擅长这四种技能。

sentences.c: Be careful when you are dealing with a multi-thread Web application, because you need to be more skillful to make sure that locale information is accessible anywhere in the application.
sentences.cn: 在您处理多线程的网络程序时，要十分谨慎，因为您需要掌握一定的技巧，以确保在程序的任何地方都能够访问场所信息。

trans.cn: 在某方面取得成功：在某个领域或某项活动中获得成功。

sentences.c: Women do not necessarily have to imitate men to be successful in business.
sentences.cn: 女人无须非得效仿男人才能在商界成功。

sentences.c: You will be successful in whatever you do and you will have a very full and interesting life.
sentences.cn: 你在你做的任何事情中都会很成功，你会拥有非常充实而有趣的生活。

sentences.c: Pisces can handle many different tasks at once and be successful in all of them.
sentences.cn: 双鱼座可以同时处理许多不同的任务，而且都能成功。

trans.cn: 在某方面弱：指在某个领域或方面缺乏能力或表现不佳。

sentences.c: She used to be weak in English.
sentences.cn: 她以前英语不好。

sentences.c: I used to be weak in English.
sentences.cn: 我以前英语很弱。

sentences.c: I always considered myself to be weak in the English language and avoided it.
sentences.cn: 那时我总是觉得自己英语不好，所以逃避它。

trans.cn: 感到羞耻，为……感到惭愧：指因为某事或某人而感到羞耻或惭愧。

sentences.c: Peter ought to be ashamed of himself.
sentences.cn: 彼得应为自己感到羞耻。

sentences.c: Mental illness is nothing to be ashamed of.
sentences.cn: 精神病并不可羞愧。

sentences.c: He knew full well he'd be ashamed of himself later.
sentences.cn: 他十分清楚他以后会为自己感到羞愧。

trans.cn: 确信，有把握，有信心：指对某事物或某种情况感到确信，没有疑虑或不确定性。

sentences.c: If you want to be certain of getting a ticket, book now.
sentences.cn: 要想有把握买到票，现在就得预订。

sentences.c: What Descartes has done is find at least one thing that he can be certain of.
sentences.cn: 笛卡尔所做的就是找到了至少一件他能确定的事。

sentences.c: But nobody can be certain of the outcome.
sentences.cn: 但是，谁也不确定这就是结局。

trans.cn: 喜欢：指对某事物或某人有深厚的喜爱和钟爱。
钟爱：指对某事物或某人有非常深厚的喜爱和珍视。

sentences.c: Do you want him to be fond of you?
sentences.cn: 你想让他喜欢你吗？

sentences.c: He thought over various plans for relief, and finally hit upon that of professing to be fond of Pain-killer.
sentences.cn: 他考虑了各种各样的办法来获得解脱，最后想出了一个办法，那称自己喜欢吃止痛药。

sentences.c: "If I were her ghost—my father would be fond of me," he said.
sentences.cn: “如果我是她的灵魂——我爸爸会喜欢我的。”他说。

trans.cn: 没有……的，摆脱了……的：不再受到某种负担、束缚或疾病的影响。

sentences.c: The marriage was a failure and they both wanted to be free of it.
sentences.cn: 这段婚姻是个失败，他们俩都想从中解放出来。

sentences.c: Museum's special exhibition area will now be free of charge.
sentences.cn: 博物馆的特别展览区现在免费开放。

sentences.c: It was vital that the elections should be free of coercion or intimidation.
sentences.cn: 至关重要的是，选举中不得有胁迫或威逼。

trans.cn: 感激，为……而高兴：指对某事感到满意、高兴或感激。

sentences.c: I'd be glad of your help.
sentences.cn: 你若能帮助我，我会非常感激。

sentences.c: In that case, we should be glad of another death.
sentences.cn: 如果是那样的话，我们应该为另一次“死亡”感到高兴。

sentences.c: He replied, 'You mean fortunately.' he explained that I should be glad of the extra exercise that the hill provided.
sentences.cn: 朋友回答说：“你其实很幸运吧，”然后他又解释说，“你应该庆幸有这么一座山给你提供额外锻炼的机会。”

trans.cn: 对……感到紧张或担心：感到对某事或某人紧张、担心或不安。

sentences.c: The horse may be nervous of cars.
sentences.cn: 这匹马可能害怕汽车。

sentences.c: Video games really allowed myself to be me, without having to be nervous of what others thought of me.
sentences.cn: 电脑游戏让我做回了我自己，不会担心别人怎么想我怎么看我。

sentences.c: Compared with other countries it is only middlingly good (see chart) and the RBI may be nervous of using too much ammunition.
sentences.cn: 预期他国家相比，它只能算一般般（见上表）而且RBI可能在动用储备上畏首畏尾。

sentences.c: This is a shock task. It'll be no good to be short of hands.
sentences.cn: 这是一项突击任务，人少了不济事。

sentences.c: But at least he will not be short of advice.
sentences.cn: 但至少他不会缺少建议。

sentences.c: Pay in cash be out of cash be short of cash.
sentences.cn: 付现金无现金缺少现金。

trans.cn: 缺乏，不足，不够：指某物或某人在数量、质量或程度上不足或不够。
不愿意，不敢，害怕：指某人因为害羞、不自信或害怕而不愿意做某事。

sentences.c: Don't be shy of telling us the truth.
sentences.cn: 告诉我们真相，不要不好意思。

sentences.c: If you want something to eat, don't be shy of saying so.
sentences.cn: 你要吃点什么，别不好意思说。

sentences.c: She was old enough to be shy of bears, even very small bears like Little Bear.
sentences.cn: 她是一个大人，知道要躲着熊，即使是小比尔这样的小熊。

trans.cn: 对……感到厌烦：对某事或某人感到非常厌烦或不满。

sentences.c: You must be sick of me.
sentences.cn: 你肯定很厌恶我。

sentences.c: I am sure you must be sick of all our noise.
sentences.cn: 我相信我们吵吵闹闹肯定会使您心烦。

sentences.c: You must be sick of all those dice and buttons by now!
sentences.cn: 你现在一定已经对这些小方块和钮扣厌烦了！

trans.cn: 确信，毫无疑问：表示对某事物有确定的信心或把握，没有任何疑问。

sentences.c: England must win this game to be sure of qualifying.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队必须拿下这场比赛才能确保获得资格。

sentences.c: England must win this game to be sure of qualifying for the World Cup.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队必须拿下这场比赛才能确保获得世界杯的参赛资格。

sentences.c: A lot of people think that it's better to pay for their education so that they can be sure of getting quality.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为最好是自己掏钱受教育，为的是能肯定得到高品质的教育。

trans.cn: 厌倦，对……感到疲倦：指对某事物或某人感到不再有兴趣或满足，希望结束或改变现状。

sentences.c: I'll never be tired of it.
sentences.cn: 我永远不会厌倦。

sentences.c: But she will never be tired of caring about you.
sentences.cn: 但她永远不会厌倦对你的关心。

sentences.c: You'll soon be tired of the game.
sentences.cn: 很快你就会对这种游戏感到厌倦的。

sentences.c: The story of comb would not be worthy of mention, but for a closely related word, no one today associates with it.
sentences.cn: 梳子的故事不值一提，要不是有一个与它密切相关的词，如今没人会联想到它。

sentences.c: Be worthy of people's trust.
sentences.cn: 对得起人民的信任。

sentences.c: You don't need pretenses to be worthy of your own approval.
sentences.cn: 你无需假装赢得自我的认可。

trans.cn: 对某人或某事感到生气或不满：指对某人或某事情感到愤怒、生气或不满。

sentences.c: You can't be angry with these people.
sentences.cn: 你不能跟这些人生气。

sentences.c: Please don't be angry with me. It wasn't my fault.
sentences.cn: 请别冲着我发脾气，不是我的错。

sentences.c: Don't be angry with your parents.
sentences.cn: 不要生你父母的气。

trans.cn: 对……感到厌烦：对某事物或某人感到无聊或不感兴趣。

sentences.c: I think I will be bored with doing the same work everyday, so I prefer a challenging job.
sentences.cn: 我认为每天做同样的工作我会感到厌倦，所以我更喜欢具有挑战性的工作。

sentences.c: I don't think I will be bored with his class.
sentences.cn: 我认为我不会对他的课感到厌烦。

sentences.c: People seem to be bored with more and more singing competitions.
sentences.cn: 人们似乎对越来越多的唱歌比赛感到厌烦了。

trans.cn: 忙于：指某人正在进行或专注于某项活动或任务。

sentences.c: And Mr King can expect to be busy with his pen next year.
sentences.cn: King先生明年很可能还要忙于写信。

sentences.c: By the end of this month we will be busy with company's salary report.
sentences.cn: 这个月的月底我们又将忙于做出公司职工的工资报表。

sentences.c: We should be busy with certain aims that encourage us when we get progress.
sentences.cn: 我们应该忙于某些目标，鼓励我们，当我们得到进步。

trans.cn: 小心，当心：提醒某人对某事物小心谨慎，以免出现危险或错误。

sentences.c: Be careful with that —it cost a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 小心别弄坏那东西，它可值钱了。

sentences.c: She also told me to be careful with it and remember our friendship.
sentences.cn: 她还告诉我要小心对待它，并且记住我们的友谊。

sentences.c: Be careful with daily use.
sentences.cn: 日常使用时要小心。

trans.cn: 关注：指对某事物感兴趣或关心。
担忧：指对某事物感到担心或忧虑。
涉及：指与某事物有关或牵涉其中。

sentences.c: They might also be concerned with other kinds of issues, for example, whether the company is involved in selling arms.
sentences.cn: 他们还可能关心其他类型的问题，例如，该公司是否涉及出售武器。

sentences.c: Women hate it most, since girls are pressurized from an early age to be concerned with appearances of all kinds.
sentences.cn: 女人最讨厌它，因为女孩从小就受到压力，要关注各种各样的外表。

sentences.c: This is the condition for really the lion's share of chemistry, biology, and other kinds of changes we'll be concerned with.
sentences.cn: 这是真正要在化学，生物学和我们将要关注的其他类型变化中占有最大份额的条件。

sentences.c: If Simon had not, early in life, learnt to be content with his life, he might never have been given those chances.
sentences.cn: 如果西蒙在早年没有学会满足于自己的生活，他可能永远不会有这样的机会。

sentences.c: He had to be content with third place.
sentences.cn: 他只好屈居第三名。

sentences.c: He professed to be content with the arrangement.
sentences.cn: 他表示对该安排满意。

trans.cn: 对……感到高兴/满意：表示对某事物或某人感到非常高兴或满意。

sentences.c: They found plenty of things to be delighted with, but nothing to be astonished at.
sentences.cn: 他们发现了许多令人高兴的事情，但没有什么令人惊讶的。

sentences.c: They found plenty of things to be delighted with.
sentences.cn: 他们看到了很多令人欣喜的东西。

sentences.c: I wish you knew Miss Andrews, you would be delighted with her.
sentences.cn: 你要是认识安德鲁斯小姐就好了，你会喜欢她的。

trans.cn: 对某人诚实：表示坦诚、真实地对待某人，不隐瞒或欺骗。
对某事诚实：表示坦诚、真实地对待某事，不隐瞒或欺骗。

sentences.c: You owe it to your staff to be honest with them.
sentences.cn: 与下属坦诚相待，这是你对他们应有的态度。

sentences.c: To be honest with you, I don't remember what he said.
sentences.cn: 跟你说实话，我不记得他说过什么了。

sentences.c: Be honest with yourself.
sentences.cn: 对自己要诚实。

trans.cn: 患病，生病：指身体出现疾病症状。

sentences.c: Woe unto the wicked! It shall be ill with him: for the reward of his hands shall be given him.
sentences.cn: 恶人有祸了。他必遭灾难。因为要照自己手所行的受报应。

sentences.c: The terminally ill should be allowed to die with dignity.
sentences.cn: 应该允许垂危病人死得有尊严。

sentences.c: When they eventually leave the school they will be totally ill-equipped to deal with the real world.
sentences.cn: 当他们最终离开学校的时候，他们将完全没有准备好应付现实世界。

trans.cn: 对……要有耐心：在与某人或某事交往时，需要保持耐心和宽容。

sentences.c: Remember that working long hours can make them tired, so be patient with them.
sentences.cn: 记住长时间工作会让他们感到疲劳，所以要对他们有耐心。

sentences.c: Teachers ought to be patient with students.
sentences.cn: 教师应该对学生有耐心。

sentences.c: Try to be patient with the people around you.
sentences.cn: 试着耐心地对待你周围的人。

sentences.c: Be strict with yourself, but be kind to others.
sentences.cn: 严于律己，宽于待人。

sentences.c: Parents should be strict with their children.
sentences.cn: 家长应该严格对待孩子。

sentences.c: A person should be strict with himself, but be kind to others.
sentences.cn: 一个人应该严格要求自己，但要善待他人。

trans.cn: 对某事物没有意识，或者拒绝注意到对他人来说显而易见的事物：指对某事物缺乏认识或意识，或者故意忽视对他人来说显而易见的事物。

sentences.c: And it is a very scary tyke actually that transform yourself from somebody who would be blind to somebody who would be sighted.
sentences.cn: 实际上，如果你从一个失明的人，变成一个视正常的人也是件十分可怕的事情。

sentences.c: However, blind faith has its limitations. Because if we just focus on how we want the future to be, we may be blind to opportunities along the way.
sentences.cn: 然而，盲目的信仰也有它的局限，因为如果我们仅仅把注意力放在对将来的设想上，我们会对一路上的机会视而不见。

sentences.c: Sometimes, you have to be blind to jump into some of these things, but when you see your daughter in some of these women... you see the human side more clearly than before.
sentences.cn: 但当你看到你的女儿也在那些女人中间，你会看到更多人性的一面。

synos.cn: 不了解，对…是盲目的；对…视而不见；看不懂

trans.cn: 接近事实：说或写的话很接近事实，可能会冒犯一些人。

sentences.c: I'm very much a family man and need to be close to those I love.
sentences.cn: 我其实确是个顾家男人，需要在我所爱的人身边生活。

sentences.c: It's dangerous to be close to a crocodile.
sentences.cn: 靠近鳄鱼很危险。

sentences.c: In this way, you will have chances to be close to nature.
sentences.cn: 这样，你就有机会接近大自然。

trans.cn: 对……残忍：对某人或某物表现出残忍、无情或恶劣的行为。

sentences.c: He used a phrase I hate: "You have to be cruel to be kind."
sentences.cn: 他用了一句我讨厌的习语：“要想善良，就得残忍。”

sentences.c: We shouldn't be cruel to animals.
sentences.cn: 我们不应该对动物残忍。

sentences.c: As long as humans are cruel to animals, they will be cruel to each other.
sentences.cn: 只要人类对动物残酷，他们必然彼此残忍。

trans.cn: 致力于，专心于，献身于：指对某事物或某人有强烈的忠诚和奉献，全身心地投入其中。

sentences.c: The report recommends that more resources be devoted to teaching four-year-olds.
sentences.cn: 该报告建议投入更多的资源用于4岁儿童的教育。

sentences.c: The final term will be devoted to project work.
sentences.cn: 最后一学期的时间将全部用于专题研究。

sentences.c: There are environmental benefits, too: renting a car when you need it, rather than owning one, means fewer cars are required and fewer resources must be devoted to making them.
sentences.cn: 还有环境方面的好处：在需要的时候租一辆车，而不是购买一辆，意味着汽车的需求量更少，用于制造汽车的资源也更少。

trans.cn: 相等，等于：在数量、数字或大小上相同。

sentences.c: She was determined that she would be equal to any test the corporation put to them.
sentences.cn: 她决意要成功应对该公司对他们的任何考验。

sentences.c: They may not be equal to people's contributions.
sentences.cn: 它们也许与人们的贡献不匹配。

sentences.c: Economics is precise about the tax that should, in principle, be levied to deal with negative externalities: the tax on a liter of fuel should be equal to the harm caused by using a liter of fuel.
sentences.cn: 从经济学的角度来看，为了应对负外部性，原则上应该征收的税收是准确的：对一升燃料征收的税应该等于使用一升燃料所造成的危害。

sentences.c: The tags should be familiar to HTML developers.
sentences.cn: HTML开发人员一定要熟悉标记。

sentences.c: Other UI features will be familiar to OS X users.
sentences.cn: 苹果用户将会对其他的界面功能相对熟悉一些。

sentences.c: Most of the operations in Listing 6 will be familiar to you.
sentences.cn: 清单6中的大多数操作应该都是您熟悉的。

sentences.c: Fruit juices can be harmful to children's teeth.
sentences.cn: 果汁可能损坏儿童的牙齿。

sentences.c: The hatred will be harmful to your heart.
sentences.cn: 仇恨会伤害你的心灵。

sentences.c: Too much screen time may be harmful to your health.
sentences.cn: 对着屏幕时间过长可能对你的健康有害。

trans.cn: 对……很重要：表示某事对某人或某事物非常重要或有影响。

sentences.c: This will be important to try and understand the French revolution, "La Revolution Francaise", that there's a difference between absolutism and despotism.
sentences.cn: 这对于尝试理解法国大革命很重要，“La Revolution Francaise”，即绝对主义和专制主义是有区别的。

sentences.c: What other things might be important to you?
sentences.cn: 还有没有其他事情对你来说也是很重要的呢？

sentences.c: That's always going to be important to understanding this work.
sentences.cn: 这一点对于理解这部作品很重要。

trans.cn: 对……持开放态度：愿意接受或考虑某种观点、建议或想法。

sentences.c: The show will be open to the public at 2 pm; admission will be $5.
sentences.cn: 展览将于下午2点对公众开放；入场费为$5。

sentences.c: Her interpretation of the facts may be open to doubt.
sentences.cn: 她对事实的解释可能有待质疑。

sentences.c: Nanjing Zijinshan Insect Museum, which will be open to the public soon, was formed at the foot of Zhongshan on April 2nd.
sentences.cn: 4月2日，即将对外开放的南京紫金山昆虫博物馆在中山山脚下正式成立。

sentences.c: "How can one be opposed to what is taking place before one's eyes each moment of the day"?
sentences.cn: 人怎能抵制每日每时发生在眼前的事物呢？

sentences.c: If there was a way of extracting the stem cells without destroying them, I would not be opposed to it.
sentences.cn: 如果有一条可以不毁灭胚胎而提取干细胞的途径，我就不会反对。

sentences.c: A: it's a great example of how this technology can be used to save lives, relieve pain and suffering and improve the human condition. How can anyone be opposed to that?
sentences.cn: 答：这是转基因技术可以用于拯救生命、减轻病痛与苦难而改善人类生存状况的极好例子，怎么可能有人会反对它呢？

trans.cn: 与……相反：指两个事物或概念在某种方面完全相反或对立。

sentences.c: Let a cherry premier if after slumbering bottom, I and he be opposite to sit, again compotation quite a few cup wine.
sentences.cn: 先让樱若睡下之后，我和他相对坐着，又共饮了好几杯酒。

sentences.c: Viewed from the side, the pagoda seemed to be doing a snake dance—with each consecutive floor moving in the opposite direction to its neighbours above and below.
sentences.cn: 从侧面看，这座宝塔就像在跳蛇舞——每一层楼都朝着上下相邻楼层相反的方向移动。

sentences.c: Body language can also be used to attract members of the opposite sex.
sentences.cn: 肢体语言也可以被用来吸引异性。

trans.cn: 对……有礼貌：表现出对某人的尊重和友好，不使用冒犯性的语言或行为。

sentences.c: If we can be polite to strangers, why can't we do the same for the ones we love?
sentences.cn: 如果我们可以对陌生人礼貌，为什么我们不能对我们所爱的人礼貌呢？

sentences.c: She forced herself to be polite to them.
sentences.cn: 她对他们强装客气。

sentences.c: Take it easy and be polite to criticism.
sentences.cn: 放轻松，礼貌地评论。

trans.cn: 与……有关：指两个或多个事物之间存在某种联系或关联。

sentences.c: It is thought to be related to food consumption.
sentences.cn: 它被认为与食物消费有关。

sentences.c: Innovative science produces new propositions in terms of which diverse phenomena can be related to one another in more coherent ways.
sentences.cn: 创新科学会产生新的命题，使不同的现象以更连贯的方式相互关联。

sentences.c: In the future, pay increases will be related to productivity.
sentences.cn: 以后，工资的增加将和业绩挂钩。

sentences.c: I think the most important thing is to be respectful to the judges but not obsequious.
sentences.cn: 我觉得重要的是要尊重法官而不是对他拍马屁。

sentences.c: Be respectful to your superiors, if you have any, also to strangers, and sometimes to others.
sentences.cn: 若有上级，要尊敬他们，尊重陌生人，有时也要尊重其他人。

sentences.c: Be respectful to your superiors, if you have any, also to strangers, and sometimes to others.
sentences.cn: 对待上司要尊重，要是你们有了上司；

trans.cn: 对……粗鲁无礼：不礼貌地对待某人或对某人表现出粗鲁的行为或态度。

sentences.c: Mexicans may use silence when instructions are given by a person in authority rather than be rude to that person by arguing with him or her.
sentences.cn: 当权威人士下达指令时，墨西哥人可能会保持沉默，而不是粗鲁地与之争吵。

sentences.c: However, Mexicans may use silence when instructions are given by a person in authority rather than be rude to that person by arguing with him or her.
sentences.cn: 然而，当权威人士给出指令时，墨西哥人可能会保持沉默，而不是粗鲁地与对方争吵。

sentences.c: You couldn't actually be rude to them, but you couldn't help feeling about them the same way that, say, a Vietnam veteran would feel about someone who wears combat gear to Neighborhood Watch meetings.
sentences.cn: 你没办法冲他们发火，但始终有种怪怪的感觉。 就好像一个越战老兵看到有人穿着战斗服参加邻里互助会时的感觉一样。

trans.cn: 类似于：具有相似的特征、性质或特点。

sentences.c: Wu said it would be similar to how we get moonlight, but he predicted that the man-made moon would have eight times the brightness of the real one.
sentences.cn: 吴说，这将类似于我们获得月亮光照的方式，但他预测，人造月亮的亮度将是真实月亮的8倍。

sentences.c: Your file will be similar to Listing 5.
sentences.cn: 您的文件将类似清单5。

sentences.c: Your output should be similar to Listing 2.
sentences.cn: 您的输出应该与请单2所示类似。

trans.cn: 忠于，忠实于，遵守：指对某个原则、信念或价值观保持忠诚，不背离或违背。

sentences.c: Be true to yourself in all things.
sentences.cn: 在任何事情上都要忠于自己。

sentences.c: "No," said the Sultan, "I will be true to my master."
sentences.cn: “不，”苏丹说，“我要忠于我的主人。”

sentences.c: The key is to be true to reality, which is also one of the main themes in the course.
sentences.cn: 关键是要真实面对现实，这也是本门课的重要主题之一。

trans.cn: 对……有用：表示某物对某人或某事物有益处或帮助。

sentences.c: It can be useful to write a short summary of your argument first.
sentences.cn: 先把你的论点纲要写下来可能会有帮助。

sentences.c: He might be useful to us.
sentences.cn: 我们也许用得上他。

sentences.c: A tripod will be useful to align and steady the camera.
sentences.cn: 三脚架会有助于对齐稳住照相机。

sentences.c: It was the first commercially available machine to employ artificial intelligence.
sentences.cn: 这是第一台具有商业价值的人工智能机器。

sentences.c: Managers have learned to grapple with networking, artificial intelligence, computer-aided engineering and manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 管理人员已经学会如何去应付网络、人工智能、计算机辅助工程和制造等问题。

sentences.c: It's the most powerful branch of artificial intelligence.
sentences.cn: 它是人工智能最强大的分支。

trans.cn: 维持现状；现状乐团；改变现状
现状：指当前存在的事物或情况，通常用于描述某个特定领域或问题的现状。

sentences.c: By 492 votes to 391, the federation voted to maintain the status quo.
sentences.cn: 联盟以492票对391票投票决定维持现状。

sentences.c: They could cement the status quo of peer-reviewed research.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会使同行评审研究的现状停滞不前。

sentences.c: The United States, it was believed, had no status quo ante.
sentences.cn: 人们认为，美国没有维持现状。

trans.cn: 嘻哈文化（由快板歌、涂墙艺术、霹雳舞等构成的亚文化）

sentences.c: Hip hop music from America is also getting more and more popular.
sentences.cn: 来自美国的嘻哈音乐也越来越受欢迎。

sentences.c: During the 1980s, hip hop became popular all over the US. Some people don't like hip hop because of its spoken words.
sentences.cn: 在20世纪80年代，嘻哈开始在美国流行起来。有些人不喜欢嘻哈是因为它的口语。

sentences.c: At the BET Hip Hop awards Rhymefest rapped, "Remmy, start the revolution girl."
sentences.cn: 在 BET 嘻哈颁奖典上 Rhymefest 唱道：“雷米，发动革命的女孩。”

etymology.d: 爵士乐类型，hip可理解为屁股或无意义词，为hop的韵律构词，字面意思即跳动的音乐或扭屁股的音乐。

trans.cn: 很多的，大量的：指有很多或大量的数量或程度。

sentences.c: Plenty of stores stay open late.
sentences.cn: 许多商店都营业到很晚。

sentences.c: The city has plenty of open space.
sentences.cn: 这座城市有很多开阔的空地。

sentences.c: Don't worry. We have plenty of time.
sentences.cn: 不必担心。我们有很多时间。

trans.cn: 以……结束，最终得到：指最终达到某种状态或结果。

sentences.c: If they take this game lightly they could end up with egg on their faces.
sentences.cn: 如果他们轻率地对待这场比赛，他们可能会以出洋相收场。

sentences.c: They could end up with a 50-point winning margin.
sentences.cn: 他们最后可能会以50点的优势获胜。

sentences.c: You end up with a mishmash of policies rather than a consistent national approach.
sentences.cn: 你最后得到的是一些杂会七杂八的政策，而不是统一的全国性措施。

trans.cn: 用一个特定的动作、事件或项目来结束或结束某事
以……结束：在某个点或某个事件结束时使用某个特定的动作或词语。

sentences.c: Terminate the database partition expression with a space character; whatever follows the space is appended to the container name after the database partition expression is evaluated.
sentences.cn: 数据库分区表达式以一个空格字符结束；数据库分区表达式计算完毕后，空格后的内容附在容器名称的后面。

sentences.c: Icahn had said he wouldn't oppose a search partnership with Google if Microsoft refused to negotiate a deal, as long as they could terminate the agreement if Microsoft renewed its advances.
sentences.cn: 伊坎曾表示，在微软能够提出新的收购方案的情况下雅虎仍可终止与Google合作的情况下，若与微软协商无果，他并不反对雅虎与Google在搜索方面结成伙伴。

sentences.c: When you're done executing any commands that you want to capture your interaction with, you can type the exit command (or the Control-d key combination on most systems) to terminate the shell.
sentences.cn: 在执行您想要捕获与它的交互的任何命令时，可以键入exit命令(大多数系统上也可以按Control - d组合键)来终止shell。

sentences.c: The Senate is expected to pass the bill shortly.
sentences.cn: 预计参议院将很快通过这项议案。

sentences.c: The Senate has now endorsed the bill and can't turn back.
sentences.cn: 参议院现已同意了该议案，无法回头了。

sentences.c: She became the first black woman to be elected to the Senate.
sentences.cn: 她成为第一个被选进参议院的黑人妇女。

trans.cn: 回来；想起来；〔口语〕复原；归
返回：回到之前的位置、状态或活动中。
复苏：恢复到之前的状态或健康状况。
重现：重新出现或再次发生。
重返：返回某个地方或某人身边。

sentences.c: "Come back!" he called after me.
sentences.cn: “回来！”他在我身后冲我喊。

sentences.c: 'He'll come back,' Susan assured her.
sentences.cn: “他会回来的。”苏珊安慰她道。

sentences.c: She's going to come back every so often.
sentences.cn: 她会偶尔回来一下。

phrases.cn: 卷土重来；东山再起；再度走红

synos.cn: 回来；记起；恢复原状，重新流行

sentences.c: Safety inner lining, safety alarming system, and commodities circulation container.
sentences.cn: 安全内衬，安全报警系统，物流容器。

sentences.c: This alarming system has been applied in the safety valve testing boiler in Harbin boiler Company Limited.
sentences.cn: 此报警系统在哈尔滨锅炉有限责任公司安全阀蒸汽试验锅炉中得到了实际应用。

sentences.c: Intellectualized electromagnetic radiation detecting and alarming system is realized through programming SCM.
sentences.cn: 通过对单片机编程，实现了智能化的电磁辐射报警系统。

trans.cn: 空气泵：一种用于排出封闭空间中的空气或压缩空气或将其强制通过其他设备的泵。

sentences.c: But don't we have a portable air pump?
sentences.cn: 但是我们不是有个手提的空气帮浦吗？

sentences.c: Manufacturer of air pump and personal product vending machines.
sentences.cn: 空气泵和个人的产品制造商自动售货机。

sentences.c: In this case breathing can be maintained artificially by an air pump.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下，呼吸得以维持，人为地由一个空气泵。

trans.cn: 空气污染：指大气中有害气体和颗粒物的污染。

sentences.c: Air pollution has risen above an acceptable level.
sentences.cn: 空气污染已经超标。

sentences.c: Air pollution in the city had reached four times the acceptable levels.
sentences.cn: 这座城市的空气污染程度曾高达可接受标准的四倍。

sentences.c: Cases of breathing difficulties increase in lockstep with air pollution.
sentences.cn: 呼吸困难的病例随空气污染的加剧而增加。

trans.cn: 空气质量：指空气中污染物的浓度和组成，以及对人类健康和环境的影响程度。

sentences.c: His birdhouse tells you about the air quality.
sentences.cn: 他的鸟巢告诉你空气质量的情况。

sentences.c: The government is taking action to make air quality better.
sentences.cn: 政府正在采取行动改善空气质量。

sentences.c: How can we tell the air quality is good or bad?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能分辨空气质量是好是差呢？

trans.cn: 动物行为：指动物在生活过程中表现出的各种行为，包括觅食、繁殖、交流等。

sentences.c: The term retreat is applied to the short-term escape behavior of desert animals, and it usually assumes the pattern of a daily rhythm.
sentences.cn: 撤退一词用于描述沙漠动物的短期逃跑行为，通常以日节律的形式出现。

sentences.c: Let's continue our discussion about animal behavior by talking about decisions that animals face, complex ones.
sentences.cn: 让我们继续讨论动物行为通过讨论动物面临的决定，复杂的决定。

sentences.c: Although humans are more advanced and intelligent, animals are more genuine and authentic in their behavior and responses than human beings.
sentences.cn: 虽然人类更高等、更聪明，但动物在行为和反应上比人类更真切、真实。

trans.cn: 动物生活：指动物在自然界中的生存状态和生活方式。

sentences.c: Animals are obviously a lower form of life than man.
sentences.cn: 动物显然是比人类更低级的生命体。

sentences.c: They contended that land animals that began to adapt to aquatic life would soon be neither fowl nor fish, incapable of surviving in either medium.
sentences.cn: 他们认为，开始适应水生生活的陆地动物很快就会变成既不是鸟也不是鱼，无法在任何一种环境中生存。

sentences.c: They believe that the animals painted were those central to the symbolic and spiritual life of the times.
sentences.cn: 他们相信画中的动物是那个时代的象征和精神生活的中心。

trans.cn: 艺术画廊：一个房间、一组房间或其他空间，用于展示艺术作品，可能出售。

sentences.c: The art gallery waives admission charges on Sundays.
sentences.cn: 美术馆星期天免费开放。

sentences.c: The Art Gallery of Ontario has the world's largest collection of sculptures by Henry Moore.
sentences.cn: 安大略美术馆关于亨利•摩尔的雕塑收藏品居世界之最。

sentences.c: If you can, visit an art gallery too, so you can experience seeing the "real thing".
sentences.cn: 如果可以的话，去参观美术馆，这样你就可以体验看到“真实的东西”。

trans.cn: 腰(背) 部的毛病 ( 吞 )
背部问题：指与背部相关的健康问题或疾病，如背痛、脊柱问题等。

sentences.c: I'm having treatment for my back problem.
sentences.cn: 我正接受背部疾患的治疗。

sentences.c: Caution: Anyone with a back problem shouldn't do this exercise.
sentences.cn: 注意：背部有问题的人不宜做此练习。

sentences.c: If you have a back problem, you should pick a light exercise.
sentences.cn: 如果你的背部有问题，就应该挑一些运动量小的锻炼方式。

trans.cn:
后门：建筑物的后面或侧面的门，或车辆的后面的门
用于指间接实现某事的方式，尤指人们不知道并且无法反对的方式。

sentences.c: He opened the back door.
sentences.cn: 他打开了后门。

sentences.c: Dora slipped unobtrusively in through the back door.
sentences.cn: 多拉悄悄地从后门溜了进去。

sentences.c: There was movement behind the window in the back door.
sentences.cn: 后门窗户的后面有动静。

trans.cn: 后轮：车辆的后部轮子，通常由驱动轴带动。

sentences.c: I need a spanner to change the back wheel.
sentences.cn: 我要一个扳手来换掉后面的轮胎。

sentences.c: A bicycle with 12 rockets mounted on the back wheel.
sentences.cn: 后轮上绑了12枚小火箭的自行车。

sentences.c: I make it some way in before the back wheel buries itself.
sentences.cn: 我做了一些方式后轮前埋本身。

trans.cn: 背景音乐：用于伴随电影、广播或电视剧中的对话或动作的音乐。

sentences.c: There's soft background music.
sentences.cn: 那里有柔和的背景音乐。

sentences.c: Background music may aid viewer understanding by linking scenes.
sentences.cn: 背景音乐可以通过联系场景来帮助观众理解。

sentences.c: In addition, background music often foreshadows a change in mood.
sentences.cn: 此外，背景音乐往往预示着情绪的变化。

sentences.c: We're in Bird Park.
sentences.cn: 我们在小鸟公园。

sentences.c: And finally, where is the Jurong Bird Park?
sentences.cn: 最后一题，裕廊飞禽公园在哪里？

sentences.c: 'And finally, where is the Jurong Bird Park?' asked Lester.
sentences.cn: “最后一题，裕廊飞禽公园在哪里？”莱斯特问道。

trans.cn: 公共交通巴士服务：指定的巴士沿着特定路线按照公布的公共交通时间表，在约定的巴士站停靠的定期运营服务。

sentences.c: The bus service is appalling now.
sentences.cn: 现在公共汽车服务很差。

sentences.c: The bus service stops at midnight.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车午夜停止服务。

sentences.c: There is a regular bus service to the airport.
sentences.cn: 有班车定时发往机场。

trans.cn: 公交车票：乘坐公交车的入场凭证。

sentences.c: From its original bus ticket to now, the top bus tickets.
sentences.cn: 从原来坐公交车不买票，到现在上公交车买票。

sentences.c: Stocks and shares were recovered, and so were London bus tickets.
sentences.cn: 股票被复原了，伦敦公共汽车车票也被复原了。

sentences.c: Now even long-distance bus tickets to join the real name army!
sentences.cn: 现在连长途汽车票也要加入实名大军了！

trans.cn: 商业管理：开发和控制公司、部门、项目等中使用的流程，以确保它们的有效性。

sentences.c: They have excelled in learning the lessons of business management theory, and putting them into action.
sentences.cn: 他们在学习商业管理理论并将其付诸实践方面表现优异。

sentences.c: The theme of your paper can be about business management or touring resources in China, and the length of the paper should be no less than fifteen pages.
sentences.cn: 你论文的主题可以是有关中国的商业管理或旅游资源，论文长度应不少于十五页。

sentences.c: Many libraries will help you with locally supplied information about business management shared through chambers of commerce and government agencies, and they will offer printing, faxing and database services you need.
sentences.cn: 许多图书馆会为你提供由本地商会及政府机构共享的商业管理信息，同时提供你所需要的打印、传真及数据库服务。

trans.cn: 商务名片：用于商务交流中的个人名片，通常包含个人姓名、职位、公司名称、联系方式等信息。

sentences.c: I could custom design the business cards though, right?
sentences.cn: 但我可以定制设计名片，对吗？

sentences.c: Instead, Taylor decided to buy business cards and had her father's phone number on them.
sentences.cn: 相反，泰勒决定买名片，并把她父亲的电话号码放在上面。

sentences.c: Running on a variety of phones, Dub lets you swap business cards electronically, even with people who don't use the service.
sentences.cn: Dub 可以在多种手机上运行，让你可以通过电子方式交换名片，甚至可以与不使用这项服务的人交换名片。

trans.cn: 商业计划：一份总结了商业所有者、经理或企业家打算如何组织创业活动并实施必要和足够使企业成功的活动的摘要。

sentences.c: Did you show them your business plan?
sentences.cn: 你向他们展示你的商业计划了吗？

sentences.c: A business plan should be a strategic outline of what you are going to do.
sentences.cn: 商业计划应该是一个战略纲要，讲明你打算做什么。

sentences.c: They didn't really articulate any position regarding the actual business plan.
sentences.cn: 对于实际的商业计划，他们并没有明确地表达任何立场。

trans.cn: 商业区：城市中主要用于商业活动的区域，通常有许多商店、办公楼和餐厅等。

sentences.c: Policies for data management in each business area
sentences.cn: 在每个业务领域内的数据管理规则

sentences.c: Each business area has its own registry that it governs.
sentences.cn: 每个业务领域都有自己控制的注册中心。

sentences.c: Many years ago, there weren't many fast-food restaurants in the business area.
sentences.cn: 许多年前，那里没有很多快餐厅在这个商业区。

trans.cn: 商务访问：指为了商务目的而进行的访问活动，通常涉及到与商业合作伙伴会面、洽谈业务、考察市场等。

sentences.c: He makes several business visits to America every year.
sentences.cn: 他每年都要去几次美国进行公务视察。

sentences.c: He makes several business visits to American every year.
sentences.cn: 他每年都要为商务到美国去几次。

sentences.c: The administration did not break down the numbers into tourist and business visits for non-foreign travelers.
sentences.cn: 旅游局没有把数据分为旅游部分和非外籍的商务旅行。

trans.cn: 汽车轮胎：汽车的重要组成部分，负责承载车辆重量、传递动力和制动力，以及保证车辆行驶稳定性的圆形橡胶制品。

sentences.c: Worn-out car tyres were stacked in heaps.
sentences.cn: 汽车废轮胎散乱地堆放着。

sentences.c: This is used to make the synthetic rubber in car tyres.
sentences.cn: 它常用以制造汽车轮胎的合成橡胶。

sentences.c: But even today natural rubber makes up around 14% of car tyres and 27% of lorry tyres.
sentences.cn: 但是直到今天，制造轿车胎仍然需要约14%的天然橡胶，载重胎是27%。

trans.cn: 提款机：一种人们通过使用特殊卡片从银行账户中取款的机器。

sentences.c: For two weeks, the cash machine spewed out receipts apologizing for its inability to dispense money.
sentences.cn: 两周了，自动取款机就输出了一些因其无法提款而致歉的凭条。

sentences.c: You'll only realize when you later go to a cash machine to withdraw some money, then discover that every penny in your account has been cleared out.
sentences.cn: 只有在之后你去取款机取钱时，你才会意识到，你账户里的每一分钱都被清空了。

sentences.c: Barca is also a cash machine.
sentences.cn: 巴萨也是一架造钱机器。

synos.cn: 自动提款机，自动柜员机

trans.cn: 中央车站：一个位于城市中心的主要交通枢纽，提供公共交通服务。
中央电站：一个中央的电力发电厂，用于产生和供应电力。

sentences.c: My hospital room was like Grand Central Station with everybody coming and going.
sentences.cn: 我的病房就像纽约的中央火车站，整天人来人往。

sentences.c: A raucous crowd of 25,000 delirious fans greeted the team at Grand Central Station.
sentences.cn: 一群喧闹的25000名狂热球迷在格兰德中心车站欢迎球队。

sentences.c: We started from the central station.
sentences.cn: 我们从中央车站出发。

trans.cn: 中央供暖：一种为建筑物的所有部分提供供暖的系统。

sentences.c: The house has gas-fired central heating.
sentences.cn: 这所房子有燃气中央供暖系统。

sentences.c: He kept turning the central heating down.
sentences.cn: 他不断地调低中央暖气系统的温度。

sentences.c: I am thinking of installing central heating.
sentences.cn: 我在考虑安装中央供暖系统。

trans.cn: 更衣室：公共场所（如商店）中供人们更换衣服的房间；英国学校、体育场等地供人们更衣和存放衣物和设备的储物柜房间。

sentences.c: They'll swear that they left it in the changing room, create havoc and then discover it had been in their car all the time.
sentences.cn: 他们会发誓说他们把它忘在了更衣室，搞得一团糟，然后发现它一直在他们的车里。

sentences.c: "It's an earthquake, a big one," I said, urging Ben on to the changing room next door.
sentences.cn: 我一边说：“是地震，很大的地震。”一边敦促本到隔壁的更衣室。

sentences.c: There are following facilities on the beach: a shower, a restroom, and a changing room.
sentences.cn: 这些就是沙滩上仅有的一些设施：冲浴室，洗手间，还有一个更衣室。

sentences.c: But security experts say it contains biological and chemical sensor technology, video, wireless communications, and computer software to simulate the spread of potential contaminants.
sentences.cn: 但安全专家说，它包括了生物和化学传感器技术、视频、无线通信，以及模拟潜在污染物蔓延的计算机软件。

sentences.c: Acrylamide is one of the most important chemical materials, which has been widely used in industry. It is one kind of many contaminants in occupational environments.
sentences.cn: 丙烯酰胺作为一种常见的化工原料，在工业中广泛应用，是职业环境中的一种污染物。

trans.cn: 化学实验室：用于进行化学实验和研究的专门设备和场所。

sentences.c: The first time I took a class in the chemistry lab, I was surprised to find that students were fully "armed".
sentences.cn: 第一次在化学实验室上课时，我惊讶地发现学生们都“全副武装”了起来。

sentences.c: MR ZHU : Now , this is the chemistry lab .
sentences.cn: 朱老师：现在这就是化学试验室。

sentences.c: Don't TASTE anything in a chemistry lab.
sentences.cn: 在化学实验室不要尝任何东西。

trans.cn: 儿童教育：指对儿童进行教育和培养的过程，包括学习知识、培养技能、塑造品格和发展个人潜能等方面。

sentences.c: Sort of young children education programs in the United States catches up to nice countries, like Korea.
sentences.cn: 美国的一种儿童教育项目在紧跟出色的国家的步伐，比如韩国。

sentences.c: They scrimped and saved to give the children a good education.
sentences.cn: 他们省吃俭用，为的是攒钱让孩子受到良好的教育。

sentences.c: This gives children a more broadly based education.
sentences.cn: 这让孩子们有一个基础更为广泛的教育。

trans.cn: 关闭，停业：指由于某种原因而停止运营或关闭。

sentences.c: The Dow Jones average closed down 7.49, or 0.1%.
sentences.cn: 道琼斯股票平均价格指数当天下挫7.49点，跌幅0.1%。

sentences.c: Minford closed down the business and went into politics.
sentences.cn: 明福特关了买卖，进入了政界。

sentences.c: You know that restaurant round the corner? It's closed down.
sentences.cn: 拐角那家餐馆，你知道吧？已经倒闭了。

trans.cn: 清洁产品：指用于清洁和保养家居、个人卫生等方面的产品，如洗衣液、洗发水、肥皂等。

sentences.c: Sand, trim, grind or clean products into final form using hand tools.
sentences.cn: 使用手工工具打磨，修整，研磨或清洁产品形成最终形式。

sentences.c: Banks need to reinvent themselves with healthy, simple, clean products that can be securitised and sold to the world.
sentences.cn: 银行应该重塑自身，提供健康、简单、干净的产品，然后把这些产品证券化，卖向全世界。

sentences.c: It is a core to produce clean products and it is critical to design for clean products well in clean production.
sentences.cn: 生产清洁的产品是清洁生产的核心，其关键是要做好清洁产品的设计。

sentences.c: Tomorrow costumes and a rigorous selection process to invite all the manufacturers work together, jointly launched inexpensive sections of the latest trends in clothing.
sentences.cn: 明日服饰全力邀请并严格挑选各厂商携手联盟，共同推出物美价廉的各款最新时尚服装。

sentences.c: Results and Discussion Wearers' body sections under clothing, stimulated by cold signal, would result in their skin temperatures' dropping.
sentences.cn: 效果与讨论穿着者的身材部分服装，冷的刺激信号，将导致他们的皮肤温度的降落。

sentences.c: Clothing. Two-pInternet Explorerce garments were favored so that the top part could be easily rearoused in warmer sections of the space station.
sentences.cn: 两节式衣服很受欢迎，它的上面部份在太空站较暖的地方简易脱下来。

sentences.c: Mr. Yiu of the Jockey Club says he has received requests to save items such as the bunk beds in the prison cells and worn carpeting on office floors.
sentences.cn: 饶恩培表示已经有人向他提出了要求，例如要他保留监狱的旧床铺以及警局办公室的旧地毯等。

sentences.c: The office room of our elders was a sort of club where laughter and conversation were freely mixed with matters of business.
sentences.cn: 我们的长辈们的办公室有点像俱乐部，欢声笑语和交谈正经事完全混在一起。

sentences.c: There is a private table tennis club near our office.
sentences.cn: 我们办公室附近有一家私人的桌球俱乐部。

trans.cn: 城市议会：城市的立法机构。

sentences.c: He was elected chair of the city council.
sentences.cn: 他当选为市议会主席。

sentences.c: The city council has voted almost unanimously in favour.
sentences.cn: 市议会几乎全部投了赞成票。

sentences.c: The city council commissioned geological experts earlier this year to survey the cliffs.
sentences.cn: 该市议会今年早些时候委托地质专家们对这些悬崖进行勘测。

trans.cn: 城市中心：城市的主要或中心部分，是城市中高楼大厦、商店、办公室等聚集的地方。

sentences.c: Our offices are in the city centre.
sentences.cn: 我们的办公室位于市中心。

sentences.c: The old city centre is architecturally rich.
sentences.cn: 这座古老的市中心在建筑上多姿多彩。

sentences.c: Police cordoned off part of the city centre.
sentences.cn: 警察封锁了市中心的部分地区。

trans.cn: 咖啡桌：一种用于放置书籍、杂志等物品的桌子，通常放置在客厅或休息室中。

sentences.c: He got up slowly and hobbled over to the coffee table.
sentences.cn: 他慢慢地起身，一瘸一拐地走到咖啡桌边。

sentences.c: The coffee table is glass, to be as unobtrusive as possible.
sentences.cn: 咖啡茶几是玻璃制的，尽可能地不引人注目。

sentences.c: He sprang to his feet, grabbing his keys off the coffee table.
sentences.cn: 他跳了起来，从咖啡桌上抓起他的钥匙。

trans.cn: 咖啡机：可以是一个自动售卖咖啡的机器，也可以是一个制作咖啡的小型电器，即咖啡壶。

sentences.c: Do you know how to work the coffee machine?
sentences.cn: 你会使用咖啡机吗？

sentences.c: They collaborated on building the first space coffee machine.
sentences.cn: 他们合作建造了第一台太空咖啡机。

sentences.c: She said she saw him by the coffee machine more often than at his desk.
sentences.cn: 她说，比起在他的办公桌前，她更经常在咖啡机旁看到他。

sentences.c: The guide for all budgets, updated every year, with a pullout map and colour photos.
sentences.cn: 配有地图和彩照，每年更新，全面的预算指南。

sentences.c: Each Application Form must be accompanied by two 3r recent colour photos of the applicant, one head shot and one full length shot.
sentences.cn: 所有参加表格必须附有参加者两张3r的正面近照，半身及全身各一张。

sentences.c: So, like photos and illustrations, colour should be used to support the message, not be the message itself.
sentences.cn: 因此，像照片和插图一样，颜色应当用来支撑信息的表达，而不该成为信息本身。

sentences.c: The computer centre opened last year is very popular among children.
sentences.cn: 去年开办的电脑中心很受孩子们的欢迎。

sentences.c: Shop 123A, Mongkok Computer Centre, 8 Nelson Street, Mongkok, Kowloon.
sentences.cn: 九龙旺角奶路臣街8号，旺角电脑中心一楼123A号店。

sentences.c: Mr Lanier also had access to the well-equipped computer centre at White Sands.
sentences.cn: 还帮助拉尼尔获得在白沙中心使用装备先进的计算机的权利。

trans.cn: 计算机程序员：一位编写和开发计算机程序的人。

sentences.c: Mike found a challenging job as a computer programmer.
sentences.cn: 迈克找到了一份富有挑战性的工作——当电脑程序师。

sentences.c: Good jobs for you: writer, computer programmer...
sentences.cn: 适合你的好工作是作家和计算机程序员等。

sentences.c: If you are going to be a computer programmer, you'd better start with the basic knowledge of computers.
sentences.cn: 如果你想成为一名计算机程序员，你最好从计算机的基础知识开始。

trans.cn: 电脑办公：指在办公场所使用电脑进行工作和管理的活动。

sentences.c: Be familiar with computer office software.
sentences.cn: 熟悉使用计算机办公软件。

sentences.c: Suppliers add computer consumables, office equipment and furniture to their product range.
sentences.cn: 供应商把计算机耗材、办公设备及家具加进他们的产品范围中。

sentences.c: I don't want that hulking great computer in my office.
sentences.cn: 我不要把那台又笨又大的计算机放在我的办公室。

trans.cn: 计算机科学：一门涉及计算理论或计算机设计的科学分支。

sentences.c: It is possible to combine Computer Science with other subjects, for example Physics.
sentences.cn: 将计算机科学与其他学科，如物理学，结合起来是可能的。

sentences.c: He studies computer science.
sentences.cn: 他学习计算机科学。

sentences.c: math and computer science.
sentences.cn: 数学和计算机科学。

trans.cn: 通信系统：由硬件和软件组成的一套设备，用于传输和接收信息，包括语音、数据、图像等。

sentences.c: It began as a military communication system, which expanded into a government-funded civilian research network.
sentences.cn: 最初它是一个军事通信系统，后来扩展为一个政府资助的民用研究网络。

sentences.c: Human language is productive, an open-ended communication system, whereas no other communication system has this property.
sentences.cn: 人类的语言是多产的，是一个开放的交流系统，而其他交流系统都没有这种特性。

sentences.c: A warming climate could lead to a more fragrant world, but it might disturb an intricate communication system used by plants.
sentences.cn: 气候变暖可能会导致一个更芳香的世界，但它可能会扰乱植物使用的复杂的通讯系统。

trans.cn: 公共休息室：一个供住宿社区所有成员使用的休息室，或者是大学供教职员工使用的房间。

sentences.c: I left Dede in the common room, peering at her biology notes.
sentences.cn: 我走了，留下黛德一个人，看生物笔记。

sentences.c: In the common room, Dede said, "Surprise holiday is an Ault tradition."
sentences.cn: 休息室里，黛德说：“惊喜假日是奥尔特的一个传统。”

sentences.c: Or you wouldn't come down from your house to get the coffee from the common room.
sentences.cn: 或者你不会从你房子下来，到休息室取咖啡。

trans.cn: 会议中心：专门用于举办大型会议、研讨会等活动的场所。

sentences.c: Fear of terrorist attack has turned the conference centre into a fortress.
sentences.cn: 由于害怕恐怖分子袭击，会议中心已变成了堡垒。

sentences.c: Further to our conversation of last Friday, I would like to book the conference centre for 26 June.
sentences.cn: 按我们上星期五说过的，我想预约6月26日使用会议中心。

sentences.c: The initiative has been launched by Kings Place, a cultural and conference centre, situated in Kings Cross.
sentences.cn: 本次活动由位于英皇十字区的Kings Place文化会议中心牵头。

trans.cn: 会议厅：一种用于举办大型会议、研讨会、讲座等活动的场所。

sentences.c: The design of the concert hall is similar to the conference hall.
sentences.cn: 音乐厅的设计与会议厅相似。

sentences.c: The design of the concert hall is similar to the conference hall.
sentences.cn: 音乐厅的设计与会议厅相似。

sentences.c: The conference hall is provided with facilities for simultaneous interpretation in five languages.
sentences.cn: 这个会议大厅配有五种语言的同声传译设备。

trans.cn: 会议礼包：一种在会议期间分发给与会者的包裹，通常包含会议日程、资料、笔记本等物品。

sentences.c: For example, the meeting content has a variety of conference facilities and products beyond the base pack.
sentences.cn: 例如，会议内容在基本包的基础上提供许多与会议有关的设施和物品。

sentences.c: Here are your conference badges and this is your information pack.
sentences.cn: 这是你们的会徽，这是资料袋。

sentences.c: PolyPlus's battery may be just that: dip the encapsulated lithium pack into a glass of ordinary water and it produces current that lights up an LED display at the company's conference showcase booth.
sentences.cn: 而 PolyPlus 电池也许就是这样一种新技术：把密封包装好的锂浸入一罐普通的水中就能产生电流，可将公司展会展位上的LED灯点亮。

trans.cn: 文化背景：指在特定的文化环境中理解和解释事物的背景和框架。

sentences.c: Part one of this article dwells on the origin of India's strategic culture through geographical factor, historical evolution and broad culture context.
sentences.cn: 文章的第一部分从地缘因素、历史渊源以及广义的文化背景等三个方面探讨了印度战略文化的来源。

sentences.c: The research on the neurobiology of optimism and its influence mechanism on people's physical-mental health in Chinese culture context is the trend of research in this field.
sentences.cn: 在中国文化背景下有关乐观的神经生物学基础的研究和乐观对人的身心健康的影响机制的研究是未来的研究趋向。

sentences.c: Then I realised I couldn't just look at creativity from the perspective of the brain, because it's also about the culture and context, about the group and the team and the way we collaborate.
sentences.cn: 然后我意识到，我不能仅仅从大脑的角度来看待创造力，因为它还关乎文化和背景，关乎团队以及我们合作的方式。

trans.cn: 文化意识；文化意识目标；文化觉识
文化意识：对不同文化的认知和理解，包括尊重和欣赏其他文化的价值观、习俗和传统。

sentences.c: To develop cross-culture awareness, attention should be paid to the principal part of culture as much as Cultural differences.
sentences.cn: 培养跨文化意识，一方面要重视文化差异意识的培养； 另一方面，对主体文化意识的培养也不容忽视。

sentences.c: Some language teachers also realized the importance of culture awareness in English teaching and put it into teaching practice.
sentences.cn: 一些英语教师也注意到文化意识在英语教学中的重要性，并致力于使其在教学实践中发挥作用。

sentences.c: Northeast China writer cluster comes into being under the Northeast China culture awareness, as culture carrier, their writings carries the Liaoning culture.
sentences.cn: 在关东文化意识的条件下所形成的东北作家群，他们的文学作品作为文化载体，其所承载的主体就是辽宁文化。

trans.cn: 舞蹈课：一种教授舞蹈技巧和舞蹈表演的课程。学生可以学习各种舞蹈风格，如芭蕾舞、爵士舞、现代舞等。

sentences.c: We have a dance class.
sentences.cn: 我们有一节舞蹈课。

sentences.c: Take a dance class?
sentences.cn: 报个舞蹈班？

sentences.c: Take a dance class or invite your friends over for a mini dance party.
sentences.cn: 参加舞蹈课，或者邀请你的朋友来一场小型的跳舞聚会也是一个不错的锻炼方法。

trans.cn: 舞蹈表演：一种以舞蹈为主要形式的演出，通常包括音乐、灯光、服装等元素。

sentences.c: The dance show was a real turn-on; we went back several times.
sentences.cn: 那舞蹈表演非常令人兴奋；我们已经看过很多次了。

sentences.c: They are allowed to host a concert, an exhibition, theater, dance show.
sentences.cn: 他们可以举办音乐会、展览、戏剧、舞蹈表演。

sentences.c: It must once have seemed a good idea to spend a weekend in Rio DE Janeiro, watching a song-and-dance show in a favela.
sentences.cn: 对于他，去里约热内卢度过一个假期曾经似乎是一个不错的主意，看着贫民窟的人们载歌载舞的表演。

sentences.c: For hot desert locations with access to seawater, a new greenhouse design generates freshwater and cool air.
sentences.cn: 对于能够接触到海水的炎热沙漠地区，一个新的温室设计可以产生淡水和冷空气。

sentences.c: The world largest telescopes are found in such remote mountain locations as the Andes Mountains of Chile, the desert peaks of Arizona, and Mauna Kea in Hawaii, a dormant volcano.
sentences.cn: 世界上最大的望远镜是在一些偏远山区发现的，包括智利的安第斯山脉，亚利桑那州的沙漠山峰，以及夏威夷的莫纳基亚休眠火山。

sentences.c: The ideal locations for fog harvesting are mountainous and desert regions where fog is present but water sources are far away.
sentences.cn: 收集雾气的理想地点是远离水源但有雾聚集的山区和沙漠。

trans.cn: 讨论组：一群人聚集在一起讨论共同感兴趣的话题的团体。
讨论组：一个专注于特定话题的电子论坛，也被称为“newsgroup”。

sentences.c: My favorite is the MQSeries List, an e-mail-based discussion group.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢的是基于电子邮件的讨论组MQSeries List。

sentences.c: I read a comment on a real estate discussion group on the Internet.
sentences.cn: 我曾经在一个房地产网络论坛上读到一个帖子的回复。

sentences.c: There's a dedicated discussion group, wiki, and website for getting familiar with this work.
sentences.cn: 有一些专门的讨论组，wiki和网站可以让你熟悉和了解它的工作方式。

trans.cn: 远程学习：一种学习方法，教师和学生不在教室内面对面授课，而是通过互联网、电子邮件、邮寄等方式进行课程学习。

sentences.c: The Internet is often used as a resource and as a tool for distance learning.
sentences.cn: 互联网通常被用作远程学习的资源和工具。

sentences.c: The flexibility of distance learning would be particularly suited to busy managers.
sentences.cn: 远程学习的灵活性尤其会适合忙碌的经理们。

sentences.c: The resultant diploma or degree should also be the same whether distance learning or on-campus study is employed.
sentences.cn: 无论是远程学习还是在校学习，所获的文凭或学位也应相同。

sentences.c: Would there need to be a person with a driving license in the car at all times?
sentences.cn: 需要一个有驾照的人一直在车里吗？

sentences.c: The reason London taxi drivers are so efficient is that they all have gone through a very tough training period to get the special taxi driving license.
sentences.cn: 伦敦的出租车司机之所以效率这么高，是因为他们受到非常严格的训练才获得了专用出租车驾驶执照。

sentences.c: He doesn't have a driving license.
sentences.cn: 他没有驾驶执照。

sentences.c: Chapter six gives a design of future drinking machines based on the frontal research and results.
sentences.cn: 第六章主要在前面研究的结果基础上，进行饮水产品的设计提案。

sentences.c: On April 23, 2000, police solved the mystery when they arrested a man who had been using a computer and radio to gain complete control over machines governing sewage and drinking water.
sentences.cn: 年 4 月 23 日，当警方逮捕了一名男子时才解开了这个谜团，这名男子一直在使用计算机和无线电设备对管理污水和饮用水的机器进行完全控制。

sentences.c: Operate and maintain machines that press or blow molten glass in moulds to form or shape containers, such as bottles, jars and drinking glasses.
sentences.cn: 操作和维护按压或吹熔融玻璃模具的机器，形成或塑造容器，如瓶子，罐子和饮用水杯。

trans.cn: 双人房：酒店中供两人使用的房间。

sentences.c: Each guest has her own single room, or shares, on request, a double room.
sentences.cn: 每位客人都有自己的单人房间，经要求也可共用双人间。

sentences.c: If you want to change for a double room, you'll have to pay another $25.
sentences.cn: 如果你想换一间双人房，你得再付25美元。

sentences.c: A double room with a balcony overlooking the sea had been reserved for him.
sentences.cn: 一个带一座阳台的海景双人间已被预留给他了。

trans.cn: 教育体系：按照相关法律规定进行监管和组织的教育系统，旨在为国家社会和其成员提供教育，包括所有涉及教育人口的方面。

sentences.c: Their education system is useless.
sentences.cn: 他们的教育制度一点儿也不好。

sentences.c: The education system is going down the tubes.
sentences.cn: 这种教育体系就要垮台了。

sentences.c: The education system must satisfy the needs of all children.
sentences.cn: 教育系统必须满足所有儿童的需要。

trans.cn: (公司、机构内部的) 教育组，教育部
教育部门：负责管理和监督教育事务的政府机构或部门。

sentences.c: The Education Department of China has announced that schools should ban students from carrying mobile phones during school hours.
sentences.cn: 中国教育部宣布，学校应该禁止学生在上课时间携带手机。

sentences.c: I suggest you contact the education department secretary.
sentences.cn: 我建议你和教育部秘书联系一下。

sentences.c: I'll stop by the education department office this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 我今天下午会顺道去教育部办公室。

trans.cn: 教育官员：负责教育事务的政府或机构工作人员，通常负责制定、实施和监督教育政策。

sentences.c: The writer is a senior education officer.
sentences.cn: 作者是本地资深教育工作者。

sentences.c: The education officer liaises between students, schools and colleges.
sentences.cn: 教育官员在学生、学校和大学之间进行联络。

sentences.c: She is the founder and chief education officer of the Movement Vision Lab, a grassroots think tank.
sentences.cn: 她是移动视觉实验室(一个草根智库)的创立者和首席教育官。

trans.cn: 教育计划：一种为学生提供的详细学习计划，包括课程、学习目标和评估方法等。

sentences.c: China published a national education plan for the next decade.
sentences.cn: 中国日前发布了未来10年教育规划纲要。

sentences.c: Do we need a national bird education plan, and if so, what would it include?
sentences.cn: 我们需要一个全国鸟类教育计划吗？如果要的话，应该包括什么？

sentences.c: Some nurses specially assigned for making, performing, evaluating the health education plan.
sentences.cn: 由专人负责制定、实施、评价健康教育计划。

trans.cn: 电动汽车：使用电力驱动的汽车，通常使用电池或燃料电池作为能源。

sentences.c: Hybrids, unlike pure electric cars, never need to be plugged in.
sentences.cn: 混合动力汽车，不像纯电动汽车，从不需要接电源。

sentences.c: Fans of electric cars say they are clean, quiet, and economical.
sentences.cn: 电动车爱好者说电动车无污染，无噪音，而且经济。

sentences.c: Electric cars themselves are more expensive.
sentences.cn: 电动汽车本身更加昂贵。

trans.cn: 电子目录：一种以电子形式存储和检索信息的目录，通常用于查找联系人、地址、电话号码等信息。

sentences.c: You may set up either a file or an electronic directory on each club, adding information as you have contact with the club or receive club bulletins.
sentences.cn: 您可以每个扶轮社建立一个档案或是一个电子目录，然后将您与扶轮社联络的纪录或是收到的社刊继续归档。

sentences.c: Run the setup program from either the directory to which you uncompressed the electronic software distribution, or from the installation CD.
sentences.cn: 从您解压电子软件分布系统的目录或安装 CD 中运行安装程序。

sentences.c: Run the installer program setupwin32.exe from either the directory to which you uncompressed the electronic software distribution, or from the installation CD.
sentences.cn: 从您解压电子软件分布系统的目录或安装CD中运行安装程序setupwin 32 . exe。

trans.cn: 电子卡：一种使用电子技术存储和传输信息的卡片，常用于支付、身份验证、门禁等领域。

sentences.c: Similarly, electronic card access systems are used in many hotels and office buildings.
sentences.cn: 同样，电子卡接入系统是用在许多饭店和办公楼。

sentences.c: Cards can be orderly collected in some quantity by electronic card collator, and stably transported onto conveyor belt.
sentences.cn: 由电器控制的回圈理牌器可将每付扑克牌或卡牌按一定的数量理顺整齐，并可靠地送至输送带上。

sentences.c: Potential applications of the system include design of decorative pattern, electronic card, advertisement, game and animation.
sentences.cn: 该系统可以广泛地应用在装饰图案设计、电子贺卡、广告以及游戏、动画等领域。

trans.cn: 电力供应：提供所需的电力，通常是大量且长期提供的。

sentences.c: The electricity supply here is quite erratic.
sentences.cn: 这里的电力供应相当不稳定。

sentences.c: The electricity supply has been cut off at the mains.
sentences.cn: 电的供应在电源处被切断。

sentences.c: The main electricity supply had been sabotaged by the rebels.
sentences.cn: 叛乱者破坏了供电干线。

trans.cn: 电子邮件地址：用于发送和接收电子邮件的唯一标识符，通常由用户名和域名组成。

sentences.c: What's your email address ?
sentences.cn: 你的电邮地址是什么？

sentences.c: They each have their own email address.
sentences.cn: 他们每个人都有自己的电子邮件地址。

sentences.c: Each student has been given their own email address.
sentences.cn: 每个学生都得到一个自己的电子邮件地址。

sentences.c: However, since Baggy stands at about the same height as a child in a pushchair (婴儿车) , she frequently records pollution levels which are much higher than the data gathered by the Environment Agency.
sentences.cn: 然而，由于贝基的站立高度约与婴儿车里的婴儿同高，她所记录的污染水平时常远远高于环境机构收集到的数据。

sentences.c: Since the 2007 floods, the Environment Agency has completed 158 schemes and increased protection to 128,000 properties.
sentences.cn: 自从2007年的洪灾以来，环境厅已完成了158个方案，增加了128,000份财产保护。

sentences.c: Transport emissions in European Union countries grew 26 percent from 1990 to 2007, according to the European Environment Agency.
sentences.cn: 根据欧洲环境局的数据，欧盟国家交通领域的碳排放量在1990至2007年间增长了26%。

sentences.c: These gases cause untold damage to the environment.
sentences.cn: 这些气体对环境造成难以估计的破坏。

sentences.c: The oil spill has caused incalculable damage to the environment.
sentences.cn: 这次石油泄漏对环境造成了难以估计的损害。

sentences.c: There is little assessment of the damage to the natural environment.
sentences.cn: 几乎没有有关自然环境破坏的评估。

trans.cn: 节能：与产品、系统等相关的，尽可能少使用电力、燃气等能源的。

sentences.c: Each of us can develop his or her own "energy saving programme" with a little self-observation, critical self-control and, above all, logical consistency.
sentences.cn: 我们每人都可以通过些许自我观察、批判性的自我控制，尤其是逻辑一致性，来制定自己的“节能计划”。

sentences.c: I'd like to outsource as much energy saving as possible to smarter technology.
sentences.cn: 我很乐意将尽可能多的节省能源的方法外包给那些更聪明的技术。

sentences.c: The houses will boast the latest energy-saving technology.
sentences.cn: 这些房屋将采用最新节能技术。

sentences.c: Such things as facial expressions, body languages and eye contacts play important parts in giving a speech.
sentences.cn: 诸如面部表情、肢体语言和眼神交流等在演讲中发挥着重要作用。

sentences.c: Along with surgery to change the shape of his eyes, Xiahn wears dark eye contacts and dyes his hair black.
sentences.cn: 除了通过整容手术改变了眼睛的形状，夏恩还佩戴深色美瞳，并把头发染成黑色。

sentences.c: So, on the one hand I was expecting to have a eye contacts with you, one the other hand I was afraid of being discovered by you that I was looking at you secretly.
sentences.cn: 所以一方面我很期待能和你对上眼，另一方面由于我的腼腆，我又害怕被你发现我一直在偷偷看你。

trans.cn: 家庭照片：一张展示家庭成员的照片，通常是在特殊场合或旅行时拍摄的。

sentences.c: Thanks for your family photo. Here is my family photo.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你的家庭照片。这是我的全家福。

sentences.c: I really like the family photo that we took on my grandpa's 80th birthday.
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢爷爷80岁生日时我们拍的那张全家福。

sentences.c: Write a letter, look at a family photo.
sentences.cn: 写一封信，看看家人的照片。

sentences.c: They paid five dollars for the family ticket at the gate.
sentences.cn: 在大门口，他们付了五美元的门票钱。

sentences.c: My brother-in-law, a pilot for a commercial airline, let me travel on his family ticket.
sentences.cn: 当时我的姐夫正任职民航客机飞行员，他让我享用他的家属票乘机。

sentences.c: Family members and media commentators had complained the original amount was low, particularly given the money the powerful Railway Ministry collects from insurance premiums built into ticket prices.
sentences.cn: 但是目前并没有关于多少人接受赔偿金的准确数据。 考虑到铁道部在高铁票中收取的高额保险费，遇难者家属和媒体评论人都认为初始赔偿金实在太低。

trans.cn: 家庭关系：指家庭成员之间的亲属关系，如父母、兄弟姐妹、祖父母、孙子孙女等。

sentences.c: It gives our parents more time to do what they like and it improves the family relationship.
sentences.cn: 它给了我们的父母更多的时间去做他们喜欢的事情，而且这改善了家庭关系。

sentences.c: Poor family relationship is bound to leave its mark on the children.
sentences.cn: 不和谐的家庭关系一定会给孩子留下不好的影响。

sentences.c: Now I view chores as a family relationship builder instead of a burden.
sentences.cn: 现在我把家务更多的看做是一种建立家庭关系的方式而非重担了。

trans.cn: 家庭成员：指一个家庭中的人，包括父母、兄弟姐妹、子女等。

sentences.c: He instructed family members in nursing techniques.
sentences.cn: 他教家人们护理技术。

sentences.c: There may be a period of disequilibrium as family members adjust to the new baby.
sentences.cn: 家庭成员对新婴儿可能有个比较混乱的适应期。

sentences.c: Cremains of family members often go unclaimed, leaving funeral homes with heaps of cinders.
sentences.cn: 家庭成员们的骨灰经常无人认领，殡仪馆里留下一堆堆的灰烬。

trans.cn: 农产品：指从农田或农场生产出来的各种农作物和畜禽产品。

sentences.c: The country depends heavily on its export of farming products.
sentences.cn: 这个国家在很大程度上依赖于其农产品的出口。

sentences.c: Thee country depends heavily on its export of farming products.
sentences.cn: 这个国家在很大程度上依赖于其农产品的出口。

sentences.c: It has been proved that Low Till Farming increases harvests and reduces water use, and this method reduced the need for chemical products because there are fewer unwanted plants.
sentences.cn: 实践证明，低耕农业提高了作物产量，减少了用水量；而且，由于有害植物变少了，这种农业对化工产品的需求也降低了。

trans.cn: 喂食时间：指动物园或养殖场等地的动物定时进食的时间段。

sentences.c: Does the dog barks only at feeding time?
sentences.cn: 这只狗只在喂食的时候叫吗？

sentences.c: I believe your fish will surely know when it is feeding time.
sentences.cn: 我相信你的鱼一定会知道什么时候是喂食时间。

sentences.c: We used to have the main feeding time in the afternoon at around 3 pm, but we found that some of the animals got a bit hungry waiting until then and so we now have it at noon.
sentences.cn: 我们过去主要的喂食时间是下午3点左右，但我们发现等到那时有些动物会有点饿，所以我们现在的喂食时间是中午。

sentences.c: The aquarium staff made a glass bulb to separate the shark from other fish. They did it purposely so that they can feed the shark in different way.
sentences.cn: 水族馆为此特意弄了一个大大的玻璃罩，把鲨鱼和其它鱼类分开，只对鲨鱼进行单独的投食喂养。

sentences.c: In order to allow sharks to capture capture prey as in nature, the shark trainers themselves go into the water to feed the sharks, throwing the food to the sharks.
sentences.cn: 为了让鲨鱼可以像在自然界中一样捕食，鲨鱼驯养师们在喂食的时候都是亲自下到水中，向鲨鱼投喂食物。

sentences.c: Shark fins are being "harvested" in ever greater Numbers to feed the growing demand for shark fin soup, an Asian "delicacy".
sentences.cn: 鲨鱼鱼翅每年大量被“收获”，由于亚洲的一道“美食”的需求。

trans.cn: 喂养动物：给动物提供食物，以满足它们的生活需求。

sentences.c: I will help to prepare food, feed animals and clean up.
sentences.cn: 我会帮忙准备食物，喂养动物和情节。

sentences.c: While British farmers are able to use lush pastures here to feed animals most of the year, in much of the world, it is too dry to grow enough grass.
sentences.cn: 英国农民有林立的牧场来供养动物，而在世界的许多地方，由于太干旱而无法种植足够的草地，因此常常用购买的食物来喂养动物，玉米、小麦、大麦，让禽类尽快成长。

sentences.c: More meat production will mean more hunger, not less. A third of the world's cereal crops and over 90 per cent of soya goes to feed animals rather than humans.
sentences.cn: 更多的肉类产品意味着饥饿的增多而不是减少。

trans.cn: 财务业绩；财务结算；财报
财务结果：公司在特定时间内所获得的利润或亏损的金额，或者展示这些数据的报告。

sentences.c: Full Year 2009 Financial results.
sentences.cn: 2009年全年财务结果。

sentences.c: Fourth Quarter 2009 Financial results.
sentences.cn: 2009年第四季度财务结果。

sentences.c: Second Quarter 2010 Financial results.
sentences.cn: 第二季度主要财务业绩。

sentences.c: The debenture market is the most important part of the finance market.
sentences.cn: 企业债券市场是金融市场的重要组成部分。

sentences.c: Secondary mortgage loan becomes the sword of Damocles which hung on the top of American finance market.
sentences.cn: 次级抵押贷款变成了高悬美国金融市场头顶的达摩克利斯之剑。

sentences.c: If the home finance market were fully private, then it would bear the losses from its own mistakes in pricing and insurance.
sentences.cn: 如果住房金融市场完全私营化，那么市场遭受的损失将由市场自己来承担，如果市场在定价和保险方面犯了错误，那它将自行承担后果。

trans.cn: 火灾演习：一种在灭火或火灾情况下撤离时进行的实践演习。

sentences.c: A fire drill will be conducted in your residence hall every semester.
sentences.cn: 每学期都会在宿舍楼进行一次消防演练。

sentences.c: This is not a fire drill—it's for real.
sentences.cn: 这不是救火演习—是真失火了。

sentences.c: A fire drill interrupted the lesson.
sentences.cn: 一场火警演习中断了上课。

trans.cn: 养鱼场：一种用于养殖水生动物以供人类食用的商业设施。

sentences.c: A proud catch for this fish farm worker in southwest France.
sentences.cn: 法国西南部渔场的工人捕到了这条令其骄傲的大鱼。

sentences.c: I found one answer last year, at a fish farm called Veta la Palma.
sentences.cn: 我去年在一个叫Veta la Palma鱼养殖场找到了一个答案。

sentences.c: But Veta la Palma is not just a fish farm; it's also a bird sanctuary.
sentences.cn: 但是Veta la Palma不只是一个渔场，它也是一个鸟类的保护区。

trans.cn: 渔业：指与捕鱼、养殖、加工、销售等相关的产业。

sentences.c: Then they sell their catch at price too low for the local fish industry to compete.
sentences.cn: 然后，他们把捕获物以极低的价格卖出，以至于当地的渔业无法无其竞争。

sentences.c: Bacteriosis is the main effect to fish industry, and it usually do larger loss to fish industries.
sentences.cn: 细菌性鱼病是渔业生产的大敌，种类多、流行广、危害大，常常给渔业生产带来较大损失。

sentences.c: The top ten will be decided in October, with the winner to be announced in January by the Sea Fish Industry Authority, the organizer of the competition.
sentences.cn: 全国已有900多家店参加了这次评选，前十名将于十月份选定，获胜者名单于第二年一月份由“海鱼行业办事处”宣布，该协会是这次比赛的组织者。

trans.cn: 鱼饼：一种由切碎的鱼肉和土豆泥制成的圆形炸饼。

sentences.c: On this special day, the seal got a large ice fish cake as a birthday gift.
sentences.cn: 在这个特殊的日子里，海豹得到了一个大冰鱼蛋糕作为生日礼物。

sentences.c: Fried fish cake, spiced with Thai curry and kaffir lime leaves.
sentences.cn: 油煎鱼饼配泰式咖喱，青柠檬叶。

sentences.c: Pork Ball, Fish Ball, Egg Dumpling, Crab Meat, Fish Cake, and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 贡圆，鱼丸，蛋饺，蟹柳，鱼饼，各式时令蔬菜。

sentences.c: New fishing Tours include the services of the chef who will cook your catch upon your return, and a visit to a local botanical garden includes a lesson in making hibiscus tea from flowers.
sentences.cn: 新增的钓鱼观光游包含厨师服务，会在你回来后用你的垂钓收获烹饪佳肴，当地植物园观光游则包含用鲜花制作木槿茶的课程。

sentences.c: Said to bear mother know that: "children, bragging will kill yourself, you must remember this lesson!" Since then, the bear never bragging, mother also learned the river fishing skills.
sentences.cn: 熊妈妈知道后对小熊说：“孩子，吹牛会害了自己的，你一定要记住这个教训呀！”从此，小熊再也不吹牛了，跟妈妈也学会了河里捉鱼的本领。

sentences.c: The Basques, Dutch, and English developed the first offshore fishing boats adapted to a colder and stormier Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 巴斯克人、荷兰人和英国人发明了第一艘适应相对寒冷多风暴的大西洋的近海渔船。

sentences.c: A number of fishing boats were moored to the quay.
sentences.cn: 很多渔船系泊在码头。

sentences.c: In Karakalpakstan, he is saddened by the dust storms, diseases and fishing boats stuck miles from the sea.
sentences.cn: 在卡拉卡尔帕克斯坦，他一想到沙尘暴、疾病以及困在离海数英里处的渔船，内心便悲伤不已。

trans.cn: 免费停车：指提供给司机免费停泊汽车、摩托车、单车等的服务。

sentences.c: Ample free parking is available.
sentences.cn: 有宽敞的免费停车场。

sentences.c: The hotel is centrally situated with ample free parking.
sentences.cn: 饭店坐落在市中心，有充裕的免费停车位。

sentences.c: The waiter told me that free parking was provided for the hotel guests.
sentences.cn: 服务员告诉我酒店为客人提供免费停车服务。

trans.cn: 免费交通：提供免费的交通工具或服务。

sentences.c: The city is providing free transportation to the stadium from downtown.
sentences.cn: 本市现在提供从市中心到体育场的免费交通。

sentences.c: People saw a need for free transportation, and they wanted to help control pollution.
sentences.cn: 人们看到了免费交通的必要性，他们想帮忙控制污染。

sentences.c: We offer free transportation to and from airport.
sentences.cn: 我们提供免费的机场迎送服务。

trans.cn: 免费餐：指无需支付费用的餐食。通常是由商家、组织或个人提供的免费食物。

sentences.c: Food in a doggy bag is like a free meal ticket.
sentences.cn: 打包的食物就像一张免费餐券。

sentences.c: Salespeople like Schaefer walk the line between the common practice of buying a prospect's time with a free meal, and bribing doctors to prescribe their drugs.
sentences.cn: 像谢弗这样的销售人员游走于两种常见的做法之间，一种是请可能购买药物的潜在主顾吃一顿饭，另一种是贿赂医生使其为病人开自己公司的药。

sentences.c: She then confounds me by sitting down to eat the free meal.
sentences.cn: 她之后坐下吃免费餐食的行为则让我困惑。

trans.cn: 自由进入：企业可以自由进入市场，通过建立生产并开始销售产品的条件。

sentences.c: The ticket will guarantee you free entry.
sentences.cn: 这张票可保证你免费入场。

sentences.c: Pennsylvania has 121 state parks, and they all have free entry.
sentences.cn: 宾夕法尼亚州有121个州立公园，它们都是免费进入的。

sentences.c: Free entry does not attract people or encourage them to appreciate art.
sentences.cn: 免费入场并不能吸引或鼓励人们欣赏艺术。

sentences.c: Call any time for a FREE booklet.
sentences.cn: 调用任何时间，一个自由的小册子。

sentences.c: Ask for the free booklet "Debt: a Survival Guide".
sentences.cn: 可以索要免费小册子《债务：生存指南》。

sentences.c: Ask for the free booklet 'Debt: a Survival Guide'.
sentences.cn: 可以索要免费小册子《债务：生存指南》。

trans.cn: 免费饮料：在购买某种商品或服务时，赠送的免费饮料。

sentences.c: He takes an early break, and requests his free drink.
sentences.cn: 他提前结束了演奏，并要求来一杯免费饮料。

sentences.c: Traveler Well, in that case please give me some free drink.
sentences.cn: 乘客：既然那样，就给我点免费饮料吧。

sentences.c: I suggested that some villagers must have come in for a free drink.
sentences.cn: 我暗示说一定是村里有些人来喝不花钱的酒了。

sentences.c: Her father took her camping in the Adirondacks one summer in the 1970s, and behind the lean-to at their campsite in the middle of a seemingly pristine forest they discovered a small open-air dump.
sentences.cn: 她们露营地所在斜坡的后面看起来似乎是一片原始的森林，然而她们在那里发现了一些户外垃圾。

sentences.c: On July 28, a mother grizzly killed a camper and injured two others at a campsite for tents in a national forest in Montana.
sentences.cn: 7月28日，在蒙大拿一国家森林的帐篷宿营地，一母灰熊杀死了一名宿营者，并伤害了另外两人。

sentences.c: The campsite is set in the middle of a pine forest.
sentences.cn: 露营地建在了松树林的中间。

trans.cn: 食物来源：指人类或动物获取食物的途径或来源。

sentences.c: Nonetheless advection is a more likely alternative food source.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此，平流是一种更可能的替代食物来源。

sentences.c: They replaced other minute organisms as a food source in the major marine food chain.
sentences.cn: 它们取代了其他微小生物，并成为了主要海洋食物链的食物来源。

sentences.c: They were an easily found and plentifully available food source in farming areas, especially for poor immigrants.
sentences.cn: 在农业地区，特别是对贫穷的移民来说，它们是一种很容易找到的、丰富的食物来源。

trans.cn: 食物摄入量：指个体在一定时间内摄入的食物的总量。

sentences.c: Keeping a diary can help you work out your daily food intake more accurately.
sentences.cn: 记录日记可以帮你更准确地算出你每天的食物摄入量。

sentences.c: In a year's time, assuming no increase in food intake, you could lose ten pounds.
sentences.cn: 在一年的时间里，假设食物摄入量没有增加，你可以减掉10磅。

sentences.c: This shows that the relationship between hunger and food intake is more complex than we thought.
sentences.cn: 这表明饥饿和食物摄入之间的关系比我们想象的要复杂得多。

trans.cn: 食物链：生态系统中生物按照捕食顺序排列的一种组织形式，每个生物都以比它更低层次的生物为食物来源。

sentences.c: Insects are fairly low down (on) the food chain.
sentences.cn: 在食物链中，昆虫是相当低的一级生物。

sentences.c: The whole food chain is affected by the overuse of chemicals in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 整个食物链因农业中过度使用化学制品而受到影响。

sentences.c: This poses a threat to agriculture and the food chain, and consequently to human health.
sentences.cn: 这会对农业和食物链造成威胁，由此而危及人的健康。

trans.cn: 食物容器：用于储存和盛放食物的容器，通常具有密封性能，可以保持食物的新鲜和卫生。

sentences.c: They also produce plastic food containers and wrap ice cream bar.
sentences.cn: 它们还能用于制造塑料食品包装容器或包扎雪糕等工作。

sentences.c: During a typical meal in space, a meal tray is used to hold the food containers.
sentences.cn: 太空中典型的伙食是用拖盘盛着食物盒来食用。

sentences.c: Waste reduction will be pursued, with reusable cups and limited use of food containers.
sentences.cn: 利用可再用杯和限制食物容器来减少垃圾。

trans.cn: 食品供应：指为满足人们的食品需求而提供的食品。

sentences.c: As hare numbers fall, so do lynx numbers, as their food supply depleted.
sentences.cn: 随着野兔数量的减少，猞猁数量也会减少，因为它们的食物供应已经耗尽。

sentences.c: When their food supply is sufficiently large, the lemmings live a normal, undisturbed life.
sentences.cn: 当食物供给量足够大时，旅鼠过着正常、不受干扰的生活。

sentences.c: For his contributions to the world food supply, Borlaug was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1970.
sentences.cn: 由于他对世界粮食供应的贡献，博洛格于1970年被授予诺贝尔和平奖。

trans.cn: 园艺工具：用于在花园中进行种植、修剪和维护植物的工具。常见的园艺工具包括锄头、剪刀、铲子、喷壶等。

sentences.c: There are farm tools and garden tools.
sentences.cn: 这儿有农具及园林工具。

sentences.c: Go down this aisle, pass the garden tools, you'll find them on the shelf next to the light bulbs.
sentences.cn: 沿着这条通道走下去，把园艺工具递给我，你可以在灯泡旁边的架子上找到它们。

sentences.c: If your back garden shed is cluttered with a broken lawnmower, rusty bicycles and a range of unused garden tools then prepare to be amazed.
sentences.cn: 如果你的后院仓库堆积着破旧的割草机、生锈的自行车以及一堆用不上的园艺工具，那么请准备好被惊艳吧。

trans.cn: 玻璃屋顶：一种使用玻璃材料覆盖的屋顶，可以提供自然光线和美景的室内空间。

sentences.c: The morning sun slanted through the glass roof.
sentences.cn: 朝阳透过玻璃屋顶斜射进来。

sentences.c: These black gridded frames also encompass a mono-pitched glass roof.
sentences.cn: 此外，倾斜的玻璃屋顶也采用了这种黑色网格框架。

sentences.c: A rear alleyway was enclosed WTH a glass roof to create a well-lit interior living room.
sentences.cn: 屋后的小弄堂则加盖了玻璃顶，为起居室内增添了光照效果。

trans.cn: 全球市场：指所有世界各地购买或可能想购买某种商品的人。

sentences.c: Farmers going grass-fed are not affected by the ever-changing milk prices of the global market.
sentences.cn: 用草饲养奶牛的农民不会受到全球市场不断波动的牛奶价格的影响。

sentences.c: I think this a global market.
sentences.cn: 我认为这是一个全球性的市场。

sentences.c: This is an extension of global market competitions.
sentences.cn: 这是全球范围市场竞争的延伸。

trans.cn: 全球支付：指跨越国界的支付交易，包括跨境电子支付、跨境汇款等。

sentences.c: A coherent story of global payments imbalances and the financial crisis can be told without recourse to charges of an undervalued yuan.
sentences.cn: 用不着指控人民币汇率低估，也可以将全球收支失衡和金融危机的来龙去脉解释清楚。

sentences.c: The first is that global payments are significantly out of balance, with a huge US current account deficit offset by surpluses elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 第一，全球收支现在严重失衡，美国经常帐户赤字被其他国家的盈余抵消。

sentences.c: You cannot challenge fiat currencies and disrupt the global payments industry while reacting to any uninvited scrutiny like an adolescent whose parent has opened the bedroom door without knocking.
sentences.cn: 你不能一边挑战法币，颠覆全球支付行业，一边又对不请自来的关注暴跳如雷，就像因为父母没敲门就进卧室而大发脾气的少年一样。

trans.cn: 全球变暖：指地球表面温度逐渐上升的现象，主要原因是人类活动导致的温室气体排放增加。

sentences.c: Global warming is a real problem.
sentences.cn: 全球变暖是个确实存在的问题。

sentences.c: Will global warming mean the spread of tropical parasitic diseases?
sentences.cn: 全球变暖将会意味着热带寄生虫病的传播吗？

sentences.c: Rich industrialized countries have sown the seeds of global warming.
sentences.cn: 富裕的工业化国家已经播下了使全球变暖的种子。

trans.cn: 政府选举：指由政府或政府机构组织的选举活动，旨在选出政府的领导人或代表。

sentences.c: Papen lost a confidence vote in August, and his government fell after losing in the fourth election in a year in November.
sentences.cn: 帕彭在8月失去了一次信任投票，他的政府在11月的第四次选举中失败后垮台。

sentences.c: Will the government honour its election pledge not to raise taxes?
sentences.cn: 政府会履行它的竞选诺言，不增加税收吗？

sentences.c: The government which followed the election was a very different animal.
sentences.cn: 选举后的政府与前一届的截然不同。

trans.cn: 政府机构；政府机关；国家机关
政府机构：指由政府设立、管理和运作的机构，负责执行政府的职能和任务。

sentences.c: Government agencies must invest more funds in training and development programmes.
sentences.cn: 政府机构必须将更多的资金投入到培训和开发项目中。

sentences.c: Social media allows government agencies to spy on their own citizens.
sentences.cn: 社交媒体允许政府机构监视他们自己的公民。

sentences.c: To help track the ruffe's spread, government agencies have produced wallet-sized cards about the ruffe.
sentences.cn: 为了追踪梅花鲈的蔓延，政府机构制作了钱包大小的关于梅花鲈的卡片。

trans.cn: 政府政策：指政府为了达成特定目标而制定的方针、措施和规定。

sentences.c: This speech may mark a change in government policy.
sentences.cn: 这篇演讲表明政府的政策可能会有变化。

sentences.c: He renewed his attack on government policy toward Europe.
sentences.cn: 他重新开始抨击政府的欧洲政策。

sentences.c: These latest developments argue a change in government policy.
sentences.cn: 最近的事态发展表明政府改变了政策。

sentences.c: All the ground floor windows were fitted with bars.
sentences.cn: 底层所有的窗户都装了铁栅。

sentences.c: She showed him around the ground floor of the empty house.
sentences.cn: 她带他看了那个空房子的底层。

sentences.c: I live on the ground floor.
sentences.cn: 我住在一楼。

trans.cn: 建筑平面图：建筑物楼层的平面图，与立面图相区别。也可以指第一版或基本计划。

sentences.c: The ground plan is rectangular, oriented e.
sentences.cn: 地面的计划是矩形，面向e。

sentences.c: The actual living experience is three-dimensional and more fluid than what a ground plan can describe.
sentences.cn: 实际的生活经验是三维的、比一个平面图更能清晰地表达。

sentences.c: The process begins with the geometric construction of circles traced on the ground at sunrise to orientate the temple and to lay out the ground plan.
sentences.cn: 这种过程是在日出时以阳光映照在地面上的圆形几何构造为起点定位寺庙，并由此展开其建筑群。

trans.cn: 小组讨论：涉及一些通过某种共同活动、兴趣或特质相互联系的人之间的讨论。

sentences.c: Most people have individual study more than group discussion.
sentences.cn: 大多数人有个人研习多于集体讨论。

sentences.c: Slashdot focuses instead on group discussion and news-worthiness of links.
sentences.cn: 而Slashdot却将目光集中在了组讨论和链接的新闻价值上。

sentences.c: People make their minds up to varying degrees before they have a group discussion.
