sentences.cn: 人们在开始群体讨论前对问题已经有了不同程度的决断。

trans.cn: 团队会议：由一组人员参与的会议，旨在讨论和解决共同的问题、制定计划或进行决策。

sentences.c: The instruction I always give at Buddhist student group meetings whenever somebody comes in and needs instruction is pretty simple.
sentences.cn: 每当有人进来需要指导时，我经常在佛教学生小组会议上给出的建议，都很简单。

sentences.c: Hold user group meetings.
sentences.cn: 主持用户组会议。

sentences.c: Many organizations publicize their programs in group meetings.
sentences.cn: 很多组织都会在团体会议上公布他们的方案。

trans.cn: 小组的规模，团队的规模 ( 吞 )
群体规模：指组成一个群体或社会单位的个体数量。

sentences.c: This modest group size allows our teachers to respond to the needs of each student.
sentences.cn: 这个适中的小组规模使得我们的老师们可以应对每个学生的需要。

sentences.c: The group size for this should remain Percentage with a value of 100.
sentences.cn: 这个组的大小中的 Percentage 值应该仍然保持为 100。

sentences.c: The default user group size is 100% running on the local computer (see Figure 38).
sentences.cn: 默认的用户组大小是100%运行在本地计算机上，如图38中所示。

trans.cn: 团体旅行：由一组人一起旅行的行程，通常由旅行社或组织者安排。

sentences.c: If you don't have a car, join a group trip for the day.
sentences.cn: 如果你没车，可以加入一个组团旅行团打发一天。

sentences.c: She also joined a group trip to go places she was uncomfortable in traveling alone, like visiting Morocco with Gap Adventures, which specializes in small group travel.
sentences.cn: 对于不适合独自旅行的地方，她还经常加入别的旅行团，比如随gap Adventures(专门组织小型旅游团)去游览摩洛哥。

sentences.c: Mr. Yang, with the Ningbo branch of Shanghai's Spring Travel, said that the couple was part ofa six-day group trip to Japan, which included a stay at Toyoko Inn in Nagoya.
sentences.cn: 据上海春天旅行社宁波分社的杨先生表示，这对夫妇参与了一趟前往日本6天旅游的旅行团，安排他们在名古屋的东横INN住宿。

trans.cn: 导游旅行：一种带有解说的旅游，提供关于所见内容的信息。

sentences.c: After exploring the old part of town there is a guided tour of the cathedral.
sentences.cn: 考察老城区之后，有到大教堂的导览之旅。

sentences.c: Stratford: Includes a guided tour exploring much of the Shakespeare wonder.
sentences.cn: 斯特拉特福德：包括有导游带领的旅行，去探索许多莎士比亚奇观。

sentences.c: EDWARD GREEN: I 'll give you the guided tour.
sentences.cn: 爱德华·格林：我会带你参观的。

trans.cn: 健康问题；健康话题；健康的状况
健康问题：指身体或心理上的不适或异常情况，可能需要医疗或治疗。

sentences.c: In parts of South America, vitamin-A deficiency is a serious health problem, especially among children.
sentences.cn: 在南美部分地区，缺乏维生素 A 是一个严重的健康问题，尤其在儿童之中。

sentences.c: Since I started working in TB as a public health problem in 1996, we have been talking about the problems of drug management.
sentences.cn: 自从1996年我开始进行结核病作为公共卫生问题方面的工作，我们就一直在谈论药物管理的问题。

sentences.c: HIV is "a large and growing public health problem", according to Harvard Medical School genetic professor George Church.
sentences.cn: 艾滋病毒是“一个庞大且日益严重的公共卫生问题”，哈佛大学医学院遗传学教授乔治·丘奇表示。

trans.cn: 医疗保健：通过受过训练和持有执照的专业人员进行的努力，以维护或恢复身体、心理或情感的健康状况。

sentences.c: Nobody wants to pay more for health care.
sentences.cn: 没人愿意为医疗保健花更多的钱。

sentences.c: Good health care is of primary importance.
sentences.cn: 良好的医疗保健是重中之重。

sentences.c: Health care should not become a political football.
sentences.cn: 保健问题不应该成为被踢来踢去的政治皮球。

sentences.c: The programme spotlights financial problems in the health service.
sentences.cn: 节目突出报道了公共医疗机构的财政问题。

sentences.c: Cuts in the health service could have tragic consequences for patients.
sentences.cn: 减少公共医疗卫生服务可能对病人造成悲惨的后果。

sentences.c: The committee will publish their report on the health service in a few weeks.
sentences.cn: 委员会将在几周内发表他们对公共医疗服务的调查报告。

trans.cn: 健康检查：一种医学检查，用于评估一个人的健康状况，通常包括身体检查和各种测试。

sentences.c: The Big Bolton Health Check is a great example.
sentences.cn: 博尔顿疾病检查机构就是一个鲜明的例子。

sentences.c: Using this, you can potentially ‘health check’ your account.
sentences.cn: 使用上面的数据，你能够检查你Adwords账户的健康状态。

sentences.c: A HEALTH check of America's housing market is bound to be sobering.
sentences.cn: 美国住房市场的健康状况注定让人们放心不下。

sentences.c: For months dentists and the health department have been at loggerheads over fees.
sentences.cn: 牙医们与卫生部之间数月以来在费用问题上发生了争执。

sentences.c: The local health department may be able to do that test.
sentences.cn: 这种测试可以由当地卫生部门来做。

sentences.c: Could you offer us a certificate issued by your Health Department?
sentences.cn: 你能提供你们卫生部门提供的证明么？

ws: Department of Health and Human services

trans.cn: 健身俱乐部：一种通常是商业机构的场所，会员支付费用以使用其健康和健身设施和设备。

sentences.c: Of course, I was talking about an issue in strategic marketing, the healthy club model; I mean with a health club you might think they would have trouble attracting customers right?
sentences.cn: 当然，我当时所讲的是战略营销中的一个问题，健身房模式；我是说，你可能认为健身房很难吸引客户，对吗？

sentences.c: Mary: You've joined a health club?
sentences.cn: 玛丽：你参加健身俱乐部了？

sentences.c: Consider, for example, a health club.
sentences.cn: 设想，例子，一个健康俱乐部。

sentences.c: We all know that when we exert ourselves our heart rate increases.
sentences.cn: 大家都知道，当我们竭尽全力时，心率会加速。

sentences.c: Scientists used to think that their diving heart rate was 15 bpm.
sentences.cn: 科学家们曾经认为他们的潜水心率是每分钟15次。

sentences.c: When the whales go to the ocean's surface to breathe, their heart rate is between 25 and 37 bpm.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼游到海面上呼吸时，它们的心率达到每分钟25到37次。

trans.cn: 心脏病：指心脏或心脏与循环系统出现异常的疾病，包括冠心病、心律失常或心脏瓣膜缺陷等。

sentences.c: Heart disease runs in the family.
sentences.cn: 这家人都有心脏病。

sentences.c: It reduces the risks of heart disease.
sentences.cn: 它减小了犯心脏病的危险。

sentences.c: Obesity can increase the risk of heart disease.
sentences.cn: 肥胖会增加患心脏病的危险。

trans.cn: 骑马运动：一种骑马的运动或活动。

sentences.c: Horse riding was boring.
sentences.cn: 骑马很枯燥。

sentences.c: If you desire physical activities, you can choose activities from swimming to horse riding.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢体育活动，你可以选择游泳、骑马等活动。

sentences.c: You know we were planning to go horse riding in the summer holidays.
sentences.cn: 你知道我们正计划暑假去骑马。

sentences.c: Body brush: soft bristled brush, usually made of horse hair.
sentences.cn: 身体刷：也软毛刷，软毛制成，多用马鬃毛为材质。

sentences.c: The handles were carved out of cattle bones and the bristles were made from wild boar or horse hair.
sentences.cn: 牙刷柄刻有牛骨，牙刷毛由野猪毛或马毛制成。

sentences.c: A relative gave him a textile book with pictures of horses where the tail was horse hair and the body real hide.
sentences.cn: 一位亲戚曾经送他一本材料书，里面有各种各样的马，马的尾巴就是真真实实的马尾，而书本身就是用马皮做的。

sentences.c: Pilar made an extra copy of her house key and gave it to her aunt for safekeeping.
sentences.cn: 皮拉尔配了另外一把家里的钥匙并把它交给她的阿姨妥善保管。

sentences.c: And, by the way, Jimmy will keep us safe, " he chuckled as he slipped the spare house key in my pocket."
sentences.cn: 再说，吉米会保护我们的，顺便告诉你一下，”他把房子钥匙滑入我口袋的时候轻声的笑着。

sentences.c: I was in a hurry to go to school, so I forgot to bring the key of my house.
sentences.cn: 我急急忙忙地去上学，所以忘记带家里的钥匙了。

trans.cn: 房屋保险：一种财产保险，用于保护房屋及其内部财产免受火灾等造成的损失。

sentences.c: He should make a claim on his house insurance for storm damage.
sentences.cn: 他应该就风暴损失的房屋保险提出索赔。

sentences.c: The woman has failed to pay her house insurance in time.
sentences.cn: 这位妇女未能及时支付房屋保险。

sentences.c: She take out a life insurance policy or a house insurance policy.
sentences.cn: 她投了人寿保险或房屋保险。

trans.cn: 来电：指接收到的电话通话请求或呼叫。

sentences.c: To answer an incoming call, slide the glass keyboard out.
sentences.cn: 接听来电，只需划出玻璃键盘。

sentences.c: This is because no application should prevent users from receiving an incoming call.
sentences.cn: 这是因为不应该有任何应用程序可以阻止用户接听来电。

sentences.c: He sends the photo to his E-mail address just as the phone shows he has an incoming call.
sentences.cn: 他将照片发送到自己的邮箱中，这时有个电话打入。

sentences.c: In new York foreign investors mainly help to fuel the finance, insurance and information sectors, according to a new report by the Partnership for new York City, a business group.
sentences.cn: 根据商业机构“纽约城委员会”的一份新报告显示，纽约市的外国投资者主要涉足金融、保险和信息产业。

sentences.c: For women, however, some things have changed, with 84% of working women in the USA now being part of the information and service sectors.
sentences.cn: 然而对女性而言，起了一些变化。美国84%的工作妇女现在成了信息和服务行业的从业人员。

sentences.c: More liquid sectors will have more detailed information on security level transaction costs.
sentences.cn: 在流动性更强的行业，关于证券的交易成本会有更详细的信息。

trans.cn: 信息台：一个有工作人员提供信息给公众的地方，尤其是给游客或者访客。

sentences.c: She rang a buzzer at the information desk.
sentences.cn: 她按响了信息台上的一只蜂鸣器。

sentences.c: Then, you need to go to the information desk.
sentences.cn: 那你要到服务台办理。

sentences.c: B: Then, you need to go to the information desk.
sentences.cn: 那你要到服务台办理。

trans.cn: 保险公司：提供保险政策的公司。

sentences.c: She gave false information to the insurance company.
sentences.cn: 她向保险公司提供了不真实的资料。

sentences.c: The insurance company is refusing to settle her claim.
sentences.cn: 保险公司拒付她提出的索赔款项。

sentences.c: The insurance company will refund any amount due to you.
sentences.cn: 保险公司将退还你应得的所有款项。

trans.cn: 国际学生宿舍：一种提供给国际学生居住的住宿设施，通常位于大学校园内或附近。

sentences.c: The group also has a program called Christmas International House.
sentences.cn: 这个组织也有一个叫做“圣诞国际屋”的节目。

sentences.c: Check in at International House with receipts of deposit and accommodation fee.
sentences.cn: 持住宿押金条与住宿费收据至国际公寓办理住宿登记。

sentences.c: Ethan: Well, at least you're having an American experience. At the International House, sometimes I feel like I'm not in America at all.
sentences.cn: 伊森：嗯，至少你有了美国经验。在国际学舍，有时我觉得自己根本不是在美国。

trans.cn: 国际快递：指跨国运输和投递货物的快递服务，通常用于国际贸易和跨境电商。

sentences.c: Assurance of delivery speed, cooperate with international express.
sentences.cn: 发货速度保障。国际快递强强合作。

sentences.c: Beijing DHL international express is DHL Beijing professional service agent.
sentences.cn: 北京DHL国际快递是DHL北京专业代理服务机构。

sentences.c: According to the guests to confirm shipment booking, arrange shipping, air transport, international express etc..
sentences.cn: 根据客人确认的出货方式订舱，安排海运，空运，国际快递等。

trans.cn: 国际研究；国际关系；国际问题研究
国际研究：一门学术领域，专注于国际关系的研究。它涉及对全球事务的各个方面进行考察，包括政治、经济、文化和社会问题。

sentences.c: According to the Centre for Strategic and International Studies, about three quarters of energy we use to move things, including ourselves, accomplish no useful work.
sentences.cn: 根据战略与国际研究中心的数据，我们用于移动包括我们自己的物体的能量中，约有四分之三没有完成任何有用的工作。

sentences.c: According to the Center for Strategic and International Studies, about three quarters of the energy we use to move things, including ourselves, accomplishes no useful work.
sentences.cn: 战略与国际研究中心表示，包括我们自己在内，我们用来移动事物的能量中，约有四分之三的能量没有产生有用功。

sentences.c: Teresitaat is an expert in the Center for Strategic and International Studies.
sentences.cn: 特里西塔是国际战略研究中心的专家。

sentences.c: I had found the local Internet cafe.
sentences.cn: 我找到了当地的网吧。

sentences.c: Can you tell me where the nearest Internet cafe is please?
sentences.cn: 请问你知道离这里最近的网吧在哪儿吗？

sentences.c: Go into the Internet cafe, put your CD in the drive, and restart it.
sentences.cn: 去网吧，把CD放进光驱，然后重启。

sentences.c: The rooms have higher quality requirements, the Internet line facilities is a basic requirement.
sentences.cn: 酒店的客房质量有更高的要求，互联网线设施是最基本的要求。

sentences.c: You've got an Internet line, you can set your company up in India, you can set up your company in the Czech Republic — it doesn't really matter where you are.
sentences.cn: 只要有一根网线，你就能在印度、捷克设立公司——你身处哪里一点都不重要。

sentences.c: Get a communication export to intercept the message on your internet line when you are export a special garbage formula, then you can sue them. Let them pay! ! ! !
sentences.cn: 找一个通讯专家帮你拦截互联网线出口信息，用一个特殊的垃圾公式（容易辨认），那么你就可以起诉他们。让他们赔偿你！

trans.cn: 网络连接；网际网路连线；互联网连接
网络连接：指通过电信设备和网络服务提供商连接到互联网的过程和状态。

sentences.c: I'm having problems with my Internet connection.
sentences.cn: 我的互联网连接有问题。

sentences.c: Almost everything you can do on the device requires an Internet connection.
sentences.cn: 你在这套设备上可做的几乎每件事都需要连接因特网。

sentences.c: In a similar sense, the ever increasing number of online conversations may be disrupted by misinterpretations and anxiety that are produced by insuperable delays in the Internet connection.
sentences.cn: 同样地，越来越多的在线对话可能会被互联网连接上无法克服的延迟问题所造成的误解和焦虑所打断。

trans.cn: 面试技巧：指在求职面试过程中展示自己能力、经验和个性的一系列方法和策略。

sentences.c: How are your interview skills?
sentences.cn: 你的面试技能如何？

sentences.c: Such are my advices about the interview skills.
sentences.cn: 这就是我对于面试技巧的建议。

sentences.c: Hope you can impress them with your great interview skills.
sentences.cn: 我希望你可以用你超凡的面试技巧给他们留下深刻印象。

trans.cn: 面试问题：在招聘过程中，面试官向求职者提出的一系列问题，以了解求职者的经验、技能、性格等方面是否符合职位要求。

sentences.c: The Appendix presents the interview questions.
sentences.cn: 附录提供了采访问题。

sentences.c: Great! What would the interview questions be like?
sentences.cn: 不错！都有什么样的问题呢？

sentences.c: An applicant sang all of her answers to interview questions.
sentences.cn: 有一位求职者从头到尾用唱歌的方式来回答面试官的问题。

trans.cn: 求职面试；工作面试；参加面试
工作面试：指为了求职而进行的面试过程。

sentences.c: First impressions are really important in job interviews.
sentences.cn: 第一印象在工作面试中非常重要。

sentences.c: Job interviews can be very different from country to country.
sentences.cn: 每个国家的求职面试都不一样。

sentences.c: In most countries, however, personal questions are very common during job interviews.
sentences.cn: 然而，在大多数国家，求职面试中问私人问题是很常见的。

trans.cn: 厨房区域：指房屋内用于烹饪和准备食物的区域，通常包括炉灶、洗涤池、储物柜等设施。

sentences.c: The ordinary 4-bed frame tent doesn't usually have a separate kitchen area, but the larger ones often do.
sentences.cn: 普通的四室框架帐篷通常没有单独的厨房区域，但更大的帐篷通常有。

sentences.c: They are trapped in the kitchen area.
sentences.cn: 结果他俩被困在酒店厨房区。

sentences.c: Storage is built into one of the walls, and also provides a kitchen area.
sentences.cn: 储藏空间做成了一整面嵌入式的壁柜，另外也提供了一个厨房区域。

trans.cn: 厨房帮工；厨房帮手；厨房助手

sentences.c: Furthermore, I had been doing a lot of other part-time jobs during my study in Australia, such as tutor, kitchen hand, and housekeeper.
sentences.cn: 此外，我在澳洲留学期间还做过许多其他兼职工作，例如家庭教师、厨房帮手，甚至管家。

sentences.c: Five minutes later, I turned my head to see Wyatt coming downstair with his favorite doll in one hand, the missing half pair of kitchen scissors in the other.
sentences.cn: 五分钟后，我转过头看见怀亚特走下楼梯，一手拿着他最喜欢的娃娃，另一只手拿着厨房里少了一半的剪刀。

sentences.c: He collected some orange juice from the refrigerator and, glass in hand, strolled to the kitchen window.
sentences.cn: 他从冰箱里取了些橙汁，然后手拿玻璃杯，溜达到厨房的窗边。

trans.cn: 当地商店：一个位于某个社区或地区的商店，通常出售日常生活用品和食品。

sentences.c: Some local shops have been fleecing tourists.
sentences.cn: 有些当地商店一直在敲旅游者的竹杠。

sentences.c: Small local shops are intrinsic to the town's character.
sentences.cn: 本地的一些小店铺是这个镇的基本特点。

sentences.c: The choice of consumer goods available in local shops is small.
sentences.cn: 本地商店中可供选择的消费用商品很少。

trans.cn: 当地学校：指在某个特定地区或社区内的学校，通常为公立学校，为当地居民提供教育服务。

sentences.c: Local schools supply many of the volunteers.
sentences.cn: 许多志愿者来自当地学校。

sentences.c: She started teaching him at home after finding that local schools were not prepared for children who learned at Ted's speed.
sentences.cn: 在发现当地学校没有准备好教泰德这种学习速度的孩子后，她开始在家里教他。

sentences.c: A new kind of sea sponge found in Norfolk, England, has been named by a nine-year-old girl after a competition for local schools.
sentences.cn: 在英国诺福克郡发现的一种新海绵，经过当地学校的竞争，被一个9岁的女孩命名。

sentences.c: If you have time, pay a visit to the local museum.
sentences.cn: 你若有空，参观一下当地的博物馆。

sentences.c: "It's like a samurai boom," says a curator at the local museum.
sentences.cn: “这就像一个武士的繁荣”，一位当地博物馆的馆长说。

sentences.c: Visit a local museum or art gallery and view their latest exhibition.
sentences.cn: 参观一所当地博物馆或画廊，欣赏其中最新的展品。

trans.cn: 当地部落：指居住在某一地区的原住民部落，通常有自己的文化、语言和传统。

sentences.c: She makes friends with the local tribes and shares their customs and rituals.
sentences.cn: 维珍妮亚跟当地的族人结成朋友，分享他们的习俗和礼仪。

sentences.c: In fact the local tribes—Nivkh, Orchen, Evenki—had peopled the lands for centuries.
sentences.cn: 但事实上，有些当地的部落，像是Nivkh和Orchen以及Evenki，他们已经在这块土地上生活了很多个世纪了。

sentences.c: Meanwhile, local tribes, regarding "the Ancient One" as an ancestor, have demanded that he be handed over to them and ceremonially re buried.
sentences.cn: 同时，当地土著居民却认为这是他们祖先的遗骸，要求将其归还给他们厚葬之。

trans.cn: 地方报纸；当地报纸；当地报刊
当地报纸：一份覆盖当地新闻、事件和社区活动的报纸。

sentences.c: I spotted a notice in a local newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我在当地一家报纸上看到了一则启事。

sentences.c: We advertised for staff in a local newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我们在一份地方报纸上登了广告招聘员工。

sentences.c: Miss Parrish recently placed an advertisement in the local newspaper.
sentences.cn: 帕里什小姐最近在当地报纸上登出了一则启事。

trans.cn: 当地社区：指生活在同一地区的互动人群，通常是在社会单位大于家庭的范围内组织在共同价值观周围的群体。

sentences.c: The local community was shocked by the murders.
sentences.cn: 当地社会对这些谋杀案感到震惊。

sentences.c: The development was bitterly opposed by the local community.
sentences.cn: 这一开发项目遭到了当地社区的愤怒抵制。

sentences.c: Our newspaper aims to reflect the views of the local community.
sentences.cn: 我们的报纸旨在表达当地人民的心声。

trans.cn: 锁闭式车库：一种可以锁闭的独立车库，通常用于存放汽车或其他物品，以保证安全。

sentences.c: Push up the electric connecting lines for the interior light and the control unit for garage door opener through the assembly openings on the front lock.
sentences.cn: 将车内灯和车库门遥控接收器控制单元的电线向上推，穿过前锁装配孔。

trans.cn: 菜园：一种以种植蔬菜和水果为主的农场，通常用于供应市场销售。

sentences.c: Veterans of the invasion came to the Netherlands for the 65th anniversary of the Allied Forces Operation Market Garden.
sentences.cn: 这些来到荷兰的老兵是为了庆祝盟军“菜市花园行动”65周年。

sentences.c: Plans, organises, controls, coordinates and performs farming, greenhouse and market garden operations to grow vegetables.
sentences.cn: 菜农负责计划、组织、控制、协调和执行耕作、温室和商品蔬菜园种植蔬菜。

sentences.c: She lived in a small house three miles away, and was now going to the market to sell the apples which grew on the only tree in her little garden.
sentences.cn: 她住在三英里外的一所小房子里。现在她要到市场上去卖她小花园里唯一的那棵树上的苹果。

trans.cn: 多媒体室：一种专门用于观看电影、玩游戏、听音乐等多媒体娱乐的房间，通常配备有高质量的音响、投影仪、大屏幕电视等设备。

sentences.c: No problem, we'll get that from the media room…must remember to book it.
sentences.cn: 没问题，我们可以从媒体室拿，别忘了预定。

sentences.c: This room can be used as a library, study or media room or as a third bedroom.
sentences.cn: 这个房间可以用作图书馆、书房或媒体室，或作为第三间卧室。

sentences.c: Elsewhere, a media room is equipped for film screenings and presentations.
sentences.cn: 其余地方，多媒体室配备电影放映和演示功能。

trans.cn: 媒体研究：一门学术学科，研究各种媒体，特别是大众媒体的内容、历史、意义和影响。

sentences.c: MIT Comparative Media Studies offers both undergraduate degree opportunities and a two-year course of study leading to an SM degree.
sentences.cn: 麻省理工学院比较媒介研究提供了获得本科学位的机会，同时经过两年学习可以得到理科硕士的学位。

sentences.c: At the University of Michigan, she studied English and global media studies, wrote TV reviews for the student paper and short stories for fun.
sentences.cn: 在密歇根大学，她攻读英语和全球媒体研究，以为学生报纸写作电视剧评论和短篇小说为乐。

sentences.c: MIT Comparative Media Studies offers both undergraduate degree opportunities, as well as a two-year course of study leading to an SM degree.
sentences.cn: 麻省理工学院比较媒介研究提供了获得本科学位的机会，同时经过两年学习可以得到理科硕士的学位。

sentences.c: This website consists of various multimedia resources on promoting intellectual property.
sentences.cn: 本网站包括各种推广知识产权的多媒体资源。

sentences.c: They acquire multimedia resources and equipment, then teach library patrons how to use them.
sentences.cn: 这些人先获得多媒体资源和设备，然后教给顾客如何使用。

sentences.c: Towards the end are introduced net and multimedia resources - a partial relief for the teacher to produce the flow.
sentences.cn: 文章最后指出网络多媒体资源的引入，可以部分地缓解英语语流演示对中国教师形成的压力。

trans.cn: 医疗中心：提供医疗服务的机构，通常设有医生、护士和其他医疗专业人员，用于诊断、治疗和护理病人。

sentences.c: Louis is going to Medical Centre from Damen.
sentences.cn: 路易要从达门去医疗中心

sentences.c: His medical centre also has a Facebook page, a MySpace page and a Twitter feed.
sentences.cn: 他的医疗中心也有一个 Facebook 页面，一个  MySpace 页面和一个 Twitter 订阅源。

sentences.c: Biohackers could also be brought onto biosafety committees at their local university or medical centre.
sentences.cn: 生物黑客也可以进入他们本地大学或医学中心的生物安全委员会中。

trans.cn: 微电影：一种短片电影，通常时长在5-30分钟之间，以小成本、小规模、小制作为特点，多在网络上发布和传播。

sentences.c: Micro - micro film casting dream, dream, media small wish big!
sentences.cn: 微梦·传媒 — 微影视 铸梦想，小愿望 大制作！

sentences.c: The making of a micro film doesn't require much: a digital video camera, a tripod and a script, plus a director, a cameraman, and a few actors.
sentences.cn: 拍摄微电影不需要太多东西：一台数码摄像机，一个三脚架，一个剧本，外加一名导演，一名摄影师，几位演员即可。

sentences.c: As the term suggests, "micro" is the main characteristic, and the length of a micro film can be anywhere between three minutes to half an hour.
sentences.cn: 顾名思义，“微”是此类电影的主要特征。 微电影的长度从3分钟到半小时不等。

trans.cn: 矿物土壤：一种由矿物质或岩石衍生而来，含有很少腐殖质或有机物的土壤。

sentences.c: Humus is classified according to how well it is incorporated into the mineral soil, the types of organisms involved in its decomposition, and the vegetation from which it is derived.
sentences.cn: 根据腐殖质与矿物质土壤的结合程度、分解作用中所含的有机物类型以及原有的植被，腐殖质可区分为几个类型。

sentences.c: The mineral elements from the soil that are usable by the plant must be dissolved in the soil solution before they can be taken into the root.
sentences.cn: 土壤中对植物有用的矿物质元素必须先溶解在土壤溶液中，然后才能被根吸收。

sentences.c: In modern agriculture, mineral depletion of soils is a major concern, since harvesting crops interrupts the recycling of nutrients back to the soil.
sentences.cn: 在现代农业中，土壤的矿物损耗是一个主要的问题，因为收割农作物会中断养分的循环，使其无法重新回到土壤中。

trans.cn: 山地自行车：一种具有宽大的齿状轮胎、直杆式把手和通常18到21个齿轮的全地形自行车。

sentences.c: Lizzie bought herself a mountain bike.
sentences.cn: 莉齐给自己买了一辆山地自行车。

sentences.c: In 1981 it launched the first mass-produced mountain bike.
sentences.cn: 在1981年，首款大批量生产的山地车投放市场。

sentences.c: Robbie Pruitt admitted that he got mad when he discovered the theft of his mountain bike last September.
sentences.cn: 罗比·普鲁伊特承认，去年9月发现他的山地车被盗时，他很生气。

trans.cn: 音乐视频：流行音乐表演的视频录制。

sentences.c: Songdo appears in the most famous music video ever to come out of South Korea.
sentences.cn: 松岛出现在韩国有史以来最著名的音乐视频中。

sentences.c: The singer's music video has been viewed nearly 9 million times since it was posted on the Internet four weeks ago.
sentences.cn: 自四周前发布到网上以来，这位歌手的音乐视频已经被浏览了近900万次。

sentences.c: We'll make a music video show together!
sentences.cn: 我们将一起做音乐视频节目。

trans.cn: 音乐节；音乐节介绍；音乐夏令营之随写二
音乐节：一种大型的音乐活动，通常在户外举行，吸引大量音乐爱好者前来观看演出。

sentences.c: Our school music festival is coming.
sentences.cn: 我们学校的音乐节就要来了。

sentences.c: You missed the announcement about the music festival.
sentences.cn: 你错过了音乐节的公告。

sentences.c: The school music festival will be held next Monday.
sentences.cn: 学校音乐节将在下星期一举行。

trans.cn: 国家公园：由政府设立并管理的自然保护区，旨在保护自然环境和野生动植物，同时提供公共休闲和教育活动。

sentences.c: The area has been declared a national park.
sentences.cn: 该地区已宣布为国家公园。

sentences.c: This area has been designated (as) a National Park.
sentences.cn: 本区已定为国家公园。

sentences.c: Roads into Yosemite National Park are closed due to landslides.
sentences.cn: 通进约塞米蒂国家公园的路因塌方而被关闭。

trans.cn: 国家假日：在整个国家范围内庆祝的假日，尤其是纪念一个国家的诞辰或独立的假日。

sentences.c: We spoke to three students from around the world about different national holidays.
sentences.cn: 我们采访了来自世界各地的三个学生，讨论了不同的国家假日。

sentences.c: The Forbidden City attracts a constant stream of visitors every day, especially during national holidays.
sentences.cn: 故宫每天都吸引源源不断的游客来观光旅游，尤其是在国庆假期期间。

sentences.c: In all, China would have 11 national holidays, one more than now.
sentences.cn: 这样，中国将有11天全国性假日，比目前多一天。

trans.cn: 全国性报纸；国家级报纸；全国性报刊
全国性报纸：在一个国家范围内发行的报纸，通常覆盖全国性的新闻和事件。

sentences.c: United News Media is the national newspaper and television group.
sentences.cn: 联合新闻传媒公司是一家全国性的报纸和电视集团。

sentences.c: Our newspaper is a national newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我们的报纸是全国性的报纸。

sentences.c: The son of an acquaintance of mine has recently landed a good job on a national newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我一位熟人的儿子最近在一家全国性报社找到了一份好工作。

trans.cn: 自然药物：指从自然界中提取的草药、植物、矿物等天然物质，用于治疗疾病和促进健康。

sentences.c: Objective: Inquiry into the existent problem in the natural medicine teaching.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨天然药物教学中存在的问题。

sentences.c: Results: Be one of the important measures which improves natural medicine teaching.
sentences.cn: 结果是改进天然药物教学的重要措施之一。

sentences.c: This article reviews the influences of the active composition of natural medicine to leukemia cell apoptosis.
sentences.cn: 本文综述了天然药物活性成分对白血病细胞凋亡的影响。

trans.cn: 天然气：一种主要由甲烷组成的燃气，通常用于供暖、烹饪和发电等领域。

sentences.c: More than half of all U.S. households are heated with natural gas.
sentences.cn: 超过半数的美国家庭用天然气供暖。

sentences.c: Because oil and natural gas became scarce?
sentences.cn: 因为石油和天然气变得稀缺了，是吗？

sentences.c: The amount of oil and natural gas in the Earth was still plentiful.
sentences.cn: 地球上的石油和天然气储量仍然丰富。

trans.cn: 引用内容的注释、注解系统 ( 吞 )

sentences.c: NoteMesh - A Wiki-based collaborative note system for people in the same class.
sentences.cn: NoteMesh - 一个基于Wiki的合作笔记，给那些在同一课堂的人使用。

sentences.c: This system has the information search and increase, modify, deletes, the data is saving, the homework adjusts the degree, the note system form and print etc. function.
sentences.cn: 本系统具有信息查询、添加、修改、删除，数据存储，作业调度，票据的制表和打印等功能。

sentences.c: A Wiki-based note system that allows you to create notes about any subject you want, interlink them to similar concepts and even download your notes as a web page or spreadsheet.
sentences.cn: 一个基于Wiki的笔记系统，允许你针对任何你需要的主题创建笔记，通过内部链接到相似的概念记录，甚至能以网页HTML或者演示文档的形式下载。

trans.cn: 办公室助理：一种通常在办公室中工作的职业，负责协助管理人员完成日常工作，如文件处理、电话接听、预约安排等。

sentences.c: OFFICE ASSISTANT: Good morning.
sentences.cn: 办公室文员：早上好。

sentences.c: OFFICE ASSISTANT: Just a moment, please.
sentences.cn: 办公室文员：请稍等。

sentences.c: What is his job?He is an office assistant.
sentences.cn: 他是做什么的?他是名办公室勤杂人员。

trans.cn: 油滤器：一种设计用于去除发动机油、变速器油、润滑油或液压油中的杂质的过滤器。

sentences.c: Oil filter design life usually use for 2000 hours.
sentences.cn: 油滤芯设计使用寿命通常为2000小时。

sentences.c: A clogged oil filter can also result in low oil pressure.
sentences.cn: 一个被堵住的过滤器也能引起油压不足。

sentences.c: Check the oil filter to see if it is plugged up with gunk.
sentences.cn: 检查油过滤器是否被粘性物质堵住。

synos.cn: [机][车辆][动力]滤油器；机油滤清器

trans.cn: 包装材料：用于包装物品的材料，如纸箱、泡沫塑料、气泡膜等。

sentences.c: Spartina was transported to Washington State in packing materials for oysters transplanted from the east coast in 1894.
sentences.cn: 1894年，米草属植物夹杂在移迁牡蛎的包装材料中，从东海岸来到了华盛顿州。

sentences.c: The company's shipping manager is proposing that customer orders be packed with newer, more expensive packing materials that virtually eliminate damage during shipping.
sentences.cn: 该公司的货运经理建议，客户的订单应该用更新、更昂贵的包装材料包装，这样几乎可以消除运输过程中的损坏现象。

sentences.c: We need these goods to be packed in special packing materials even though they may cost us more.
sentences.cn: 我们需要用特殊的材料包装货物，尽管它们会花费我们更多钞票。

trans.cn: 停车场：指一个室外的区域，可以在那里停放汽车一段时间。

sentences.c: We pulled into the weedy parking lot.
sentences.cn: 我们开进了杂草丛生的停车场。

sentences.c: The vehicles cluttered up the parking lot.
sentences.cn: 车辆停满了停车场。

sentences.c: The parking lot was full when I left about 10:45.
sentences.cn: 停车场在我10:45左右离开时已满了。

trans.cn: 停车位：一个可以停放汽车或其他车辆的空间。

sentences.c: She reversed into a parking space.
sentences.cn: 她将车倒着开进停车位。

sentences.c: I managed to find a parking space.
sentences.cn: 我终于找到了一个停车位。

sentences.c: Let's hope we can find a parking space.
sentences.cn: 希望咱们能找到个停车位。

trans.cn: 护照照片：一张用于护照申请的照片，通常要求符合特定的尺寸、背景和面部表情等要求。

sentences.c: Britain doesn't allow smiling in passport photos.
sentences.cn: 英国不允许在护照照片中微笑。

sentences.c: I want to get some passport photos in black and white.
sentences.cn: 我想拍几张黑白的护照照片。

sentences.c: Please attach two passport photos with your name written on the back.
sentences.cn: 请附两张护照照片，名字写在照片背面。

trans.cn: 个人兴趣：指个人对某种事物或活动的喜好、爱好、追求等。

sentences.c: A clear recognition of self orientation and personal interest will decide whether you will tick the box of vocational college or university.
sentences.cn: 对自我定位和个人兴趣的清晰认识将决定你会选择职业学院，还是大学。

sentences.c: First, let me declare my personal interest.
sentences.cn: 首先我声明我个人兴趣所在。

sentences.c: Takes a personal interest that things are done right.
sentences.cn: 兼顾了个人兴趣，事情就好办多了。

trans.cn: 个人报警器：一种便携式的安全设备，用于在遇到紧急情况时发出响亮的警报声，以吸引注意并寻求帮助。

sentences.c: A range of buttons and sensors are available including personal alarm buttons, sensors which detect gas or smoke and those which can detect actions such as getting out of bed.
sentences.cn: 一个按钮和传感器的范围可包括个人报警按钮，传感器，检测气体或烟雾，哪些可以检测如下床行动。

sentences.c: Many base units have an alarm button on the front to trigger the alarm (although you're more likely to use your personal alarm button) and a cancel button to cancel an accidental alarm call.
sentences.cn: 许多基本单位，前面有一个报警按钮触发报警(尽管你很可能会使用你的个人报警按钮)和一个取消按钮，取消意外报警电话。

sentences.c: She began to forget meetings, sleep past her alarm, accidentally forward highly personal emails to her boss.
sentences.cn: 她开始忘记开会，睡过了头，不小心把高度个人化的电子邮件发给她的老板。

trans.cn: 电话卡：一种预付费卡，用于支付所打电话的费用。

sentences.c: Send a phone card or care package to a soldier.
sentences.cn: 给士兵们寄电话卡或是爱心包裹。

sentences.c: I'd Iike a prepaid phone card The 20-pound one, please!
sentences.cn: 我要一张电话预付卡20英镑的，谢谢！

sentences.c: I'd Iike a prepaid phone card. The 20-pound one, please!
sentences.cn: 我要一张电话预付卡20英镑的，谢谢！

trans.cn: 电话簿：一本列出某个地区人员和企业的姓名、地址和电话号码的书籍。

sentences.c: I picked up the phone book and glanced through it.
sentences.cn: 我拿起电话簿，浏览了一下。

sentences.c: Would you ring me as soon as you find out? My number's in the phone book.
sentences.cn: 你一查清就给我打电话好吗？我的号码在电话簿里。

sentences.c: Would you call me as soon as you find out? My number's in the phone book.
sentences.cn: 你一查清就给我打电话好吗？我的号码在电话簿里。

trans.cn: 电话号码：分配给特定电话线路或一组电话（如住宅电话）的号码，用于拨打该电话的号码。

sentences.c: My phone number is 266998.
sentences.cn: 我的电话号码是266998。

sentences.c: I'll give you my address and phone number.
sentences.cn: 我会告诉你我的地址和电话号码。

sentences.c: I left my phone number with several people.
sentences.cn: 我把我的电话号码留给了几个人。

trans.cn: 电话面试：一种通过电话进行的面试方式，通常用于筛选候选人或在远程工作情况下进行。

sentences.c: Would phone interviews be a better way of interviewing for jobs?
sentences.cn: 电话招聘是不是一个更好的方法？

sentences.c: The phone interviews were conducted in English and Spanish in May and June.
sentences.cn: 这些电话采访在5月和6月用英语和西班牙语进行。

sentences.c: Step 2 Spend time with your source.Don't rely on phone interviews and e-mail.
sentences.cn: 第二步和你的信源呆在一起，不要依赖电话和邮件采访。

sentences.c: But any interruption, whether it's an E-mail, a phone call, or a walk-up, will break this flow and it takes time (15 minutes on average based on the statistics) to get back into the flow again.
sentences.cn: 而任何的打扰，不管是一封Email，一个电话，或者是一次起身走动，都会打破这个流，并且需要时间(根据统计平均需要15分钟)来重新回到流中。

sentences.c: There is a new player profile statistics record so that you can keep track of your performance, as well as the option to choose between three different people when using the 'phone a friend' lifeline.
sentences.cn: 有一个新玩家侧面统计纪录以便您能记录您的表现，以用作为选项之间在三种不同人之间选择使用电话连线。

trans.cn: (健身俱乐部) 带会员照片的会员卡
照片卡片：一种带有照片的卡片，通常用于纪念、庆祝或发送个人照片给他人。

sentences.c: As long as you only use this location for files copied from your SD card, there's no reason to be scanning it and slowing your PC down while doing photo editing.
sentences.cn: 只要你在这些地方使用拷自sd卡的文件时，如编辑照片，压根不需要扫描它们而减慢了系统速度。

sentences.c: The photo on the card is an important image, so there should be an Alt attribute with a meaningful description.
sentences.cn: 卡上的照片是重要的图片，因此其al t属性应包含有意义的描述。

sentences.c: All Contacts in Outlook can be labeled with a photo of the person, which you add by double clicking on the small head icon in someone's contact card and then choosing a photo from your collection.
sentences.cn: Outlook中的所有联系人都能配上相应的照片，只要双击某人名片上的小头图标，然后从图片收藏中选择一张照片即可。

trans.cn: 钢琴家：指弹奏钢琴的音乐家。
钢琴自动演奏机械：19世纪的一种钢琴自动演奏机械，可以内置在钢琴中或放置在钢琴前的可移动柜中，通过钢琴卷帘激活一组类似手指的杠杆来按下琴键。

sentences.c: Yeah, I heard you are a talented piano player.
sentences.cn: 是啊，我听说你是个天才钢琴家。

sentences.c: I have been a struggling piano player for many years.
sentences.cn: 多年来，我一直是个离钢琴家很遥远的钢琴演奏者。

sentences.c: Become a piano player is a hard job. But I believe I can do it.
sentences.cn: 成为钢琴演奏者是一件非常难的工作，但是我相信我能做到。

trans.cn: 塑料袋：一种由薄、柔软的塑料薄膜、淀粉或塑料纺织品制成的包装材料，用于包装和运输食品、废物和消费品。

sentences.c: A plastic bag was floating in the water.
sentences.cn: 一个塑料袋在水中漂浮。

sentences.c: He tied the ends of the plastic bag together.
sentences.cn: 他把塑料袋的两头系在一起。

sentences.c: You look like a plastic bag.
sentences.cn: 你看起来像是一个塑胶袋。

trans.cn: 后续调查：在完成某项任务或活动后进行的调查，以了解参与者的反馈和意见。

sentences.c: The Yangtse Evening Post conducted the survey among 50 personnel managers.
sentences.cn: 《长江晚报》对50名人事经理进行了调查。

sentences.c: I'm still sorting through the results of the survey but I will post a summary here and address some specific concerns when I've made a little more sense of the data.
sentences.cn: 我还在整理那些调查的结果，但是我会把总结贴到这儿并且当我对这些数据有所感悟时还会附上他们。

sentences.c: A number of questions were asked in this survey, but this post will stick to just the responses surrounding the budget.
sentences.cn: 调查中问了许多问题，但主要是围绕对预算的反应。

trans.cn: 岗位设置：指在组织中确定和规划各个岗位的职责、权限和工作内容。

sentences.c: This paper discusses the meaning and importance of office post design, analyses the deficiency and advances the general thoughts to design office post rationally.
sentences.cn: 文章论述了图书馆进行岗位设置的目的及意义，针对当前图书馆在岗位设置上存在的不足，提出了图书馆进行科学岗位设置的总体思路。

sentences.c: Based on introducing the necessity of box section post, a box section post design is presented, the characteristics and structure of which are illustrated in detail.
sentences.cn: 在介绍了箱式分区所必要性的基础上，提出一种电气化铁道箱式分区所设计方案，对该分区所的设计特点和系统构成进行详细阐述。

sentences.c: A similar approach will be used on the post area of the blog design, each post will be enclosed in its own container.
sentences.cn: 博客日志区的设计方法跟前面的很类似，每一日志都需要有一个自己的封闭区域。

trans.cn: 演示技巧：指在公开场合或工作环境中有效地展示和传达信息的能力。这包括使用适当的语言、声音、肢体语言和视觉辅助工具来引起观众的兴趣和理解。

sentences.c: How important are presentation skills to you?
sentences.cn: 演讲技巧对你来说有多重要？

sentences.c: We train our agency leaders to enhance their presentation skills.
sentences.cn: 我们培训公司的管理层以增强其表达技巧。

sentences.c: I start by telling my story of how developing presentation skills has enriched my career.
sentences.cn: 我会从讲述一个提高演讲技巧是如何对我事业带来提升的故事开始。

sentences.c: To compete, Microsoft has focused on aggregating and presenting specific kinds of information in areas like travel, restaurants and recipes as part of a search result.
sentences.cn: 要想同它竞争，微软已经把注意力集中到搜集和显示某个特定地点的某种信息例如旅行，宾馆，食谱，作为搜索结果的一部分显示。

sentences.c: Rather, OPERA researchers are simply presenting a curious result that they cannot explain and asking the community to scrutinize it.
sentences.cn: OPERA的研究员们不如说只是简单地给出了一个他们不能解释的有意思的结论，并请求大家去检验它。

sentences.c: The itemid will be passed to the AssocReport and thus result in just presenting rules with this product in the rule's head.
sentences.cn: 这个itemid将被传递给AssocReport并且会导致只显示规则头内包含有此产品的那些规则。

trans.cn: 印刷技术：指用于印刷的各种技术和方法，包括传统的印刷技术和数字印刷技术等。

sentences.c: The fifteenth century saw big progress in printing technology in the west.
sentences.cn: 15世纪西方印刷术有了很大进步。

sentences.c: The way they are building the houses is unusual—by 3D-printing technology.
sentences.cn: 他们建造房屋的方式与众不同——使用 3D 打印技术。

sentences.c: Our life will be influenced greatly by 3D printing technology in a few years.
sentences.cn: 再过几年，3D 打印技术将极大地影响我们的生活。

trans.cn: 印刷机：一种生产印刷副本的机器。

sentences.c: The printing press gave power to a few to change the world for the many.
sentences.cn: 印刷机赋予了少数人为多数人改变世界的力量。

sentences.c: Such changes have not been seen since the invention of the printing press.
sentences.cn: 自从发明了印刷机，这种变革还没有出现过。

sentences.c: Much more people could afford the books that were produced on a printing press.
sentences.cn: 更多的人可以买得起用印刷机生产的书。

trans.cn: 问题解决：寻找解决问题的过程。

sentences.c: You need to systematize your approach to problem solving.
sentences.cn: 你需要用有条理的方法解决问题。

sentences.c: Kapur applied the principle of productive failure to mathematical problem solving in three schools.
sentences.cn: 卡普尔将生产失败原理应用于三个学校正在解决的数学问题中。

sentences.c: An early study gave participants abundant time to complete problem solving and word association exercises.
sentences.cn: 一项早期研究给参与者充裕的时间来解答问题并完成词汇联想训练。

sentences.c: A firm might publish a privacy-protection policy, but who enforces it?
sentences.cn: 一家公司可能会公布一项隐私保护政策，但谁来执行呢？

sentences.c: Developing clean energy should be placed at the core of the new environmental protection policy.
sentences.cn: 发展清洁能源应为新环保政策的核心。

sentences.c: There was a risk of inconsistency of protection policy.
sentences.cn: 保护政策可能有不一致之处。

trans.cn: 防护服：一种用于保护人体免受危险物质、环境或活动伤害的服装。通常包括防护面罩、手套、护目镜、防护服等。

sentences.c: It pays to invest in protective clothing.
sentences.cn: 在防护服上投资值。

sentences.c: Workers should wear full protective clothing.
sentences.cn: 工人应该穿着全套防护服。

sentences.c: It is obligatory for all employees to wear protective clothing.
sentences.cn: 所有员工必须穿防护服装。

trans.cn: 公共广场：城市或城镇中人们聚集的公共开放区域。
公共舆论的范围：指公共舆论的讨论和交流空间。
退出公共舆论或被迫沉默：指某人或某事物从公共舆论中退出或被迫沉默。

sentences.c: I think it's also the struggle of a generation trying to enrich the public square with the positive conversation about religion.
sentences.cn: 我认为这也是一代人试图通过积极地谈论宗教来丰富公共广场的努力。

sentences.c: We're connecting people's particular identity with the public square.
sentences.cn: 我们将人们不同的身份与，公共场所相联系。

sentences.c: If Sony had built more secure systems, it would not find itself being mocked in the public square.
sentences.cn: 如果索尼事先构建了更为安全的系统，那么它就不会发现自己沦为在公开场合遭到嘲笑的对象。

trans.cn: 公共区域：指供公众使用的场所或空间，如公园、广场、图书馆、商场等。

sentences.c: The public areas offer a subtle blend of traditional charm with modern amenities.
sentences.cn: 这些公共场所表现出对传统魅力与现代设施的巧妙结合。

sentences.c: One solution is to build more accommodation on these public areas to cut down on travel time for work.
sentences.cn: 一个解决方案是在这些公共区域建造更多的住所，以减少工作通勤时间。

sentences.c: Toxic chemicals are everywhere in our lives—insect-killing chemicals used on public grass areas, cleaning chemicals on the floors of public areas.
sentences.cn: 有毒化学物质在我们的生活中随处可见，比如公共草地上用于杀虫的化学制剂，以及公共区域地板上用于清洁的化学物质。

trans.cn: 公共交通：由政府支付或管理的火车、公共汽车等交通系统。

sentences.c: Are you for or against public transportation?
sentences.cn: 你是支持还是反对公共交通？

sentences.c: The new museum must be accessible by public transportation.
sentences.cn: 新博物馆必须能通公共交通。

sentences.c: And there isn't good public transportation from inner city Detroit to those suburban malls.
sentences.cn: 从底特律市中心到那些市郊的商场并没有好的公共交通。

synos.cn: 公共交通，公共运输；公共交通工具

trans.cn: 广播节目：为广播而制作的一段内容，可以是一次性的制作，也可以是定期重复播出的系列节目的一部分。

sentences.c: I can listen for useful information in a radio program.
sentences.cn: 我可以收听广播节目中有用的信息。

sentences.c: I do hope this online radio program could be your forever friend.
sentences.cn: 真心地希望这个网络电台会成为您永远的朋友。

sentences.c: Just let you know, whenever or wherever you're sad, this online radio program is always by your side.
sentences.cn: 只想告诉你，不管何时何地当你悲伤时，这个网络电台节目一直在你身边。

trans.cn: 无线电信号：通过无线电波传输和接收的信号，其强度可能因各种因素而变化。

sentences.c: Radio signals received from the galaxy's centre back up the black hole theory.
sentences.cn: 从该星系中心接收到的无线电信号证实了黑洞理论。

sentences.c: And so it made sense to search for radio signals.
sentences.cn: 所以，探寻无线电信号是有意义的。

sentences.c: All diagnostics are done remotely, using radio signals.
sentences.cn: 所有的诊断均使用无线电信号远程操作。

trans.cn: 雨水：指下雨时从天空降落到地面上的水。

sentences.c: Rain water will only percolate through slowly.
sentences.cn: 雨水只会慢慢地渗进来。

sentences.c: Rain water was once considered to be good for the complexion.
sentences.cn: 雨水曾一度被认为对肤色有益。

sentences.c: Rain water poured down the mountain.
sentences.cn: 雨水从山上倾泻而下。

trans.cn: 动词短语 大声朗读 ( 连 )
朗读：指出声地读出文字内容。

sentences.c: The last suggestion is to read aloud.
sentences.cn: 最后一个建议是大声朗读。

sentences.c: One of the best ways is to read aloud every day.
sentences.cn: 最好的方法之一就是每天大声朗读。

sentences.c: Of course, to really enjoy poetry, it has to be read aloud.
sentences.cn: 当然，要真正欣赏诗歌，就必须大声朗读。

sentences.c: By skill, I mean the tools to handle the studying and learning demands placed on you, like how to read with purpose, when and where to get assistance if you are having difficulty.
sentences.cn: 所谓技能，我指的是应对研究和学习要求的工具，比如如何有目的地阅读，遇到困难时在何时何地能够得到帮助。

sentences.c: Readability is most often and more properly used to describe the ease with which written language is read and understood - it concerns the difficulty of the language itself, not its appearance.
sentences.cn: 可读性通常用来形容某种书面语言阅读和理解的容易程度——它关乎这种语言本身的难度，而非其外观。

sentences.c: This category also encompasses a wide range of disabilities, but generally refers to people who have difficulty understanding what they read.
sentences.cn: 此类别也包含很大范围的残疾类型，但是通常指不容易理解所读内容的人。

trans.cn: 参考号码：用于标识某个交易、订单或申请的唯一号码。

sentences.c: What's your customer reference number, please?
sentences.cn: 请问您的客户编号是什么？

sentences.c: And its reference number are all recorded on CARDS and in computer files.
sentences.cn: 和相关编号都会被记录在卡片上和电脑文档里。

sentences.c: The police gave us a crime reference number, and nothing much more happened.
sentences.cn: 警察给了我们一张犯罪嫌疑人的名单，然后就没有了。

trans.cn: 研究方法：指在科学研究中采用的一种特定的方法或策略，用于解决研究问题、收集数据和分析结果。

sentences.c: This research approach is integration analysis of using the literature and questionnaire investigation and deep interview.
sentences.cn: 本研究的研究方法主要是运用了文献回顾的整合分析以及问卷调查和深度访谈法。

sentences.c: For a long time, there are many different opinions on the justice problem, this has certain relation with research approach.
sentences.cn: 长期改来，学术界在公正问题研究上之所以出现较大的分歧，同研究方法有一定的关系。

sentences.c: In the course of studying, research approach that I adopt whether document study law and summarize the experience law mainly.
sentences.cn: 在研究过程中，我采用的研究方法主要是文献研究法和经验总结法。

trans.cn: 研究发现：指在科学研究中所得到的结论或发现。

sentences.c: This is also the main research finding of this paper.
sentences.cn: 这也是本文的主要研究成果。

sentences.c: The Pew Research finding of a strong correlation between smoking and stress raises an obvious question: is the stress a by-product of the smoking or of other unrelated factors?
sentences.cn: 皮尤中心研究显示吸烟和解忧之间有很大联系，很明显人们会问到吸烟的副作用是解忧或者吸烟过程中其他因素起到了解忧作用？

sentences.c: If there's a certain answer that you want, for example, an exciting research finding that's going to get published in a research journal, then you will probably find some way to achieve it.
sentences.cn: 如果你想得到一个肯定的答案，例如找一个将要在研究杂志上发表的令人兴奋的研究发现，那么你总会有办法找到的。

trans.cn: 报告写作：指撰写各种类型的报告，包括学术研究报告、商业报告、技术报告等。

sentences.c: Follow the standard Crystal report writing wizards to.
sentences.cn: 按照标准的Crystal报表编写向导。

sentences.c: Launched in 2004, this series of courses teaches everything from evidence collection to report writing.
sentences.cn: 这个系列课程始于2004年，教授从证据搜集到报告撰写的所有内容。

sentences.c: He had to liaise directly with the police while writing the report.
sentences.cn: 写报告的时候他不得不直接与警方联系。

sentences.c: The river is inaccessible to hikers, so the only way to enjoy it is to take a river trip that requires several days of camping.
sentences.cn: 这条河无法通过远足活动访问，所以享受它的唯一方法就是去河旅行，需要几天的露营。

sentences.c: They took a trip down the river.
sentences.cn: 他们沿河往下游旅行。

sentences.c: It's interesting to take a trip on the river.
sentences.cn: 在河上旅行很有趣。

trans.cn: 河景：指从房间、阳台或其他地方可以看到河流的美丽景色。

sentences.c: The home has been orientated to connect the primary living Spaces to the northerly river view.
sentences.cn: 住宅的朝向使主要生活空间与北部河流景色相连。

sentences.c: Yet the people with the river view don't strikeme as any more productive or happier than anyone else.
sentences.cn: 然而在我看来，能欣赏河景的同事并不比其他人更有效率或者更快乐。

sentences.c: Several kilometers of my journey home are alongside the Lanxi River.I always sit on the side with a river view.
sentences.cn: 回家途中我沿着兰溪河走了好几公里，总喜欢坐在路旁看着河上的景色。

trans.cn: 道路地图：一张显示道路，特别是用于汽车旅行的地图。

sentences.c: If you bring a road map for each child, they can trace your trip in pen or crayon and draw landmarks on the map themselves.
sentences.cn: 如果你给每个孩子带一张路线图，他们可以用钢笔或蜡笔记录你的旅程，并在地图上自己画路标。

sentences.c: Against a backdrop of drastic changes in economy and population structure, younger Americans are drawing a new 21st-century road map to success, a latest poll has found.
sentences.cn: 一项最新民调发现，在经济和人口结构发生巨变的背景下，美国的年轻一代正在绘制一幅21世纪通向成功的地图。

sentences.c: The idea was to create a comprehensive road map of the Web.
sentences.cn: 这个想法原是为万维网做一个综合指南。

trans.cn: 橡胶毯：一种由橡胶制成的毯子，通常具有防水、防滑等特性，常用于保护床垫、防水覆盖物等。

sentences.c: Durometer: Instrument for measuring the hardness of a resilient material, such as rubber blanket.
sentences.cn: 硬度计：用来量度弹性材料如胶布的硬度的仪器。

sentences.c: Cleaning agent is excellent, daily use of cleaning blanket, plastic layer can be formed in the surface of the rubber blanket, blanket more durable.
sentences.cn: 极佳的清洁剂，每天使用清洗橡皮布，可在橡皮布表面形成塑性层，促使橡皮布更耐用。

sentences.c: The relationships between the parameters which affect the shrinkage of fabric, such as the thickness of rubber blanket and the diameters of both pressure accepting and pressure applying rollers.
sentences.cn: 分析了影响织物预缩率的橡毯厚度、加压辊直径与承压辊直径各参数之间的关系。

trans.cn: 安全规则：指为了保障人身安全而制定的规则和条例。

sentences.c: Safety rules were disregarded.
sentences.cn: 安全规定被忽视了。

sentences.c: They must know and obey the safety rules.
sentences.cn: 他们必须知道并遵守安全规则。

sentences.c: We hope children will follow our safety rules in our fields.
sentences.cn: 我们希望孩子们在地里遵守我们的安全规则。

trans.cn: 安全规定：指为保障人员、设备和环境安全而制定的规定。

sentences.c: The building does not conform with safety regulations.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑物不符合安全条例。

sentences.c: The company was found guilty of contravening safety regulations.
sentences.cn: 那家公司被判违反了安全条例。

sentences.c: The boom in the sport's popularity has meant more calls for stricter safety regulations.
sentences.cn: 该项运动普及程度的大幅提高带来了更多要求更严格安全法规的呼声。

trans.cn: 安全检查：对某物或某地进行系统性的检查，以确保其符合安全标准和要求。

sentences.c: Planes have to undergo rigorous safety check.
sentences.cn: 飞机必须接受严密的安全检查。

sentences.c: Before a long trip I always give my car a safety check.
sentences.cn: 在远行之前，我都要对我的汽车进行安全检查。

sentences.c: The following safety check lists and qualified personnel shall be utilized when inspecting scaffolds.
sentences.cn: 检查脚手架时，必须使用以下安全检查表和合格的检查人员。

trans.cn: 沙拉吧台：一种自助式的柜台（如餐厅），提供各种沙拉材料和调味品。

sentences.c: When I get salad from the salad bar, I usually load it with cheese, croutons, and creamy dressing.
sentences.cn: 每当我从沙拉区拿沙拉时，我通常会在里面放上奶酪、面包块和奶油酱。

sentences.c: I'm at the salad bar, looking in among the greens at a fairly standard run of potato salad, rice, sweetcorn and kidney beans.
sentences.cn: 我在沙拉吧绿色蔬菜前面，想按照标准选一份土豆沙拉、米饭、甜主米、云豆。

sentences.c: I'm at the salad bar, looking in among the greens at a fairly standard run of potato salad, rice, sweetcorn and kidney beans.
sentences.cn: 我在沙拉吧绿色蔬菜前面，想按照标准选一份土豆沙拉、米饭、甜主米、云豆。

trans.cn: 学费：指在学校就读所需支付的费用，通常包括课程费、教材费等。

sentences.c: School fees can make a big hole in your savings.
sentences.cn: 学费可以花掉一大笔储蓄。

sentences.c: He dropped out of high school at the age of 16 because his family could not afford school fees.
sentences.cn: 因为家庭负担不起学费，他16岁的时候就从中学退学了。

sentences.c: I need to obtain a part-time job because my mother's income can not cover the cost of my school fees.
sentences.cn: 我需要找一份兼职工作，因为我妈妈的收入不够付我的学费。

trans.cn: 科学研究：使用科学方法进行的研究。

sentences.c: Our scientific research is second to none.
sentences.cn: 我们的科学研究不亚于任何人。

sentences.c: Scientific research and conservation are intimately connected.
sentences.cn: 科学研究与环境保护联系密切。

sentences.c: Scientific research is widely claimed to be the source of the high standard of living in the U.S.
sentences.cn: 在美国，科学研究被广泛宣称为高生活水平的来源。

trans.cn: 科学探索：指通过科学方法和技术对未知领域进行研究和探索的活动。

sentences.c: Where did the FIve embark upon their life-altering scientific explorations?
sentences.cn: 五人组是在哪里开始改变他们人生的科学研究的？

sentences.c: Then, in what ways should scientific explorations be conducted in physics teaching?This is a brand-new research project for physics teachers.
sentences.cn: 那么，如何在物理教学中实施科学探究?这是摆在物理教师面前的新课题。

sentences.c: In actual scientific researches, necessity, as the ideal and ultimate, is always unfinished, and it guides the direction of scientific explorations.
sentences.cn: 在实际的科学研究中，必然性是自然律的理想和极限，它总是未完成的，它引导着科学探索的方向。

trans.cn: 海景：指从某个地方可以看到海洋的景象或风景。

sentences.c: The cottage had a delightful sea view.
sentences.cn: 这小屋可以看到宜人的海景。

sentences.c: We didn't choose sea view room but our room can see both sea and mountain.
sentences.cn: 但是我们的房间可以看到葱绿的山和一片海，非常美丽。

sentences.c: However, for Sanya valuable to first-line sea view, this is not the most effective development methods.
sentences.cn: 然而，对于有价值的三亚第一线海认为，这不是最有效的开发方法。

trans.cn: 海平面：指海洋表面的水平面，特别是指在平均高潮和低潮之间的平均位置上的海面水平。

sentences.c: The whole place is at sea level.
sentences.cn: 整个地区与海平面持平。

sentences.c: The sea level is going up because of climate change.
sentences.cn: 由于气候变化，海平面正在上升。

sentences.c: The floating cities could move up with the sea level.
sentences.cn: 漂浮的城市会随着海平面上升。

trans.cn: 自主学习实验室：一种供学生自主学习和实践的场所，通常配备有各种学习资源和设备。
造船：指建造船只的过程，包括设计、制造、装配和试验等。

sentences.c: The area's ship building tradition, partly established by the Vikings, also meant that sophisticated carpentry was a major aspect of the local culture.
sentences.cn: 该地区的造船传统，部分是由维京人建立的，也意味着熟练的木工是当地文化的一个主要方面。

sentences.c: He said the new plant would produce steel plates with a width of more than two meters used in automotive or ship building industries in the country.
sentences.cn: 他说新厂将生产用于本国汽车或轮船建造工业的两米多宽的钢板。

sentences.c: You have advantages and distinctive technologies and techniques in such sectors as auto-making, ship building, aircraft manufacturing, sewage treatment, brewery and bio-pharmacy.
sentences.cn: 中东欧在汽车、船舶、飞机制造、污水处理、酿酒和生物制药等许多行业都有优势，许多技术和工艺极具特色。

trans.cn: 银纸：一种金属箔，通常用于包装食物或其他物品。

sentences.c: They decorated it with stars cut out of silver paper, and candles, and ornaments made of black out material.
sentences.cn: 他们装饰它与明星的凿出来的银光纸，和蜡烛，和装饰出材料是黑色的。

sentences.c: He was 13 and just floated over the ground like a cocker spaniel chasing a piece of silver paper in the wind.
sentences.cn: 当时还只有13岁在操场上踢球，就像是在追逐风中银色纸片的小猎犬。

sentences.c: Painted egg shells and fur cones and fragments of silver paper from processed cheese packets were also used as decorations.
sentences.cn: 涂上颜色的蛋壳和毛球，还有从加工乳酪的包装上弄来的银纸碎片也都被用来做装饰。

trans.cn: 学生证：一种身份证明文件，用于证明持有人是学生身份。通常用于学校、图书馆、电影院等场所的学生优惠和身份验证。

sentences.c: Yes, here's my student card.
sentences.cn: 有的。这是我的学生证。

sentences.c: If the student card, I will not let myself make the same mistake.
sentences.cn: 如果这次学生证下来，我不会再让自己犯同样的错误。

sentences.c: You (7) bring your student card every time you go to the library, but remember to bring your library card.
sentences.cn: 每次你到图书馆，你(7)不必带上你的学生证，但记住带上你的借书证。

trans.cn: 学生贷款：用于支付学生教育费用的贷款。

sentences.c: She managed to eke out her student loan till the end of the year.
sentences.cn: 她想方设法节约用钱使学生贷款维持到了年底。

sentences.c: I thought there was still time for me to apply for a student loan.
sentences.cn: 我以为我还有时间申请学生贷款。

sentences.c: When we talk about Americans barely into adulthood who are saddled with unbearable levels of debt, the conversation is almost always about student loan debt.
sentences.cn: 美国人刚成年就背负着难以承受的债务，谈及他们时，话题几乎总是关于助学贷款。

trans.cn: 给学生以支持和辅导 ( 吞 )
学生支持：指为学生提供各种形式的帮助和支持，以促进他们的学习、发展和福祉。这包括心理健康支持、学术指导、职业规划、社交支持等方面的服务。

sentences.c: The school maintains a staff sufficient to provide stability and ongoing quality improvement for student support activities.
sentences.cn: 学院应具有充足的行政人员，为学生提供支持以保障稳定且持续的质量改进。

sentences.c: Student pilots and support divers must become scuba certified in order to compete.
sentences.cn: 学生飞行员和支持潜水员必须得到水中呼吸器认证书才能比赛。

sentences.c: Were it not for the support of the teachers, the student could not overcome her difficulty.
sentences.cn: 如果没有老师的支持，这个学生就无法克服困难。

sentences.c: She'd sooner share a house with other students than live at home with her parents.
sentences.cn: 她宁可和其他学生合住，也不愿跟父母住在家里。

sentences.c: It is not uncommon for college students to live at home.
sentences.cn: 大学生住在家里并不少见。

sentences.c: Students complete projects for a personal tutor, working at home at their own pace.
sentences.cn: 学生们为个人导师完成课题研究，在家里按自己的速度工作。

trans.cn: (大学的)学生活动大楼,学生会
学生会；大学的学生活动大楼

sentences.c: Bob is running for chairman of the student union.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃正在竞选学生会主席。

sentences.c: Mark is the best candidate for chairman of the student union, isn't he?
sentences.cn: 马克是学生会主席的最佳人选，不是吗？

sentences.c: I'm convinced I'm the best candidate for the chairman of the Student Union.
sentences.cn: 我确信我是学生会主席的最佳人选。

synos.cn: 学生会；大学的学生活动大楼

trans.cn: 学生服务：指为学生提供各种支持和帮助的服务，包括但不限于学术咨询、生活指导、就业辅导等。

sentences.c: Student Service Associate will communicate with EF student on a daily base.
sentences.cn: 客户服务专员负责与EF学员的日常沟通。

sentences.c: "When I consulted officials in the overseas Student Service in China last month, they told me that I should stay 360 days overseas," she said.
sentences.cn: 我上个月咨询中国留学服务中心的工作人员时，他们说我必须要出国留学满360天。

sentences.c: Listen to a conversation between a student and a food service manager.
sentences.cn: 听一段学生和食品服务经理之间的对话。

trans.cn: 社交活动：指人们在社交场合中进行的各种活动，旨在与他人建立联系、交流和互动。

sentences.c: You can also take part in social activities, like playing sports with your friends.
sentences.cn: 你也可以参加社会活动，比如和朋友一起运动。

sentences.c: It participates in our daily events, extending our intelligence, comprehending our feelings, and expanding the range of social activities.
sentences.cn: 它参与我们的日常活动，扩展我们的智力，理解我们的情感，并扩大了社会活动的范围。

sentences.c: I also advise you to take an active part in sports and social activities.
sentences.cn: 我还建议你积极参加体育和社会活动。

trans.cn: 社交活动：指为了社交目的而举办的各种活动，如晚宴、舞会、聚会等。

sentences.c: For example, if you want to make new friends at a social event, you will want to appear friendly.
sentences.cn: 例如，如果你想在社交活动上结交新朋友，你就需要表现得友好。

sentences.c: It is a social event for her.
sentences.cn: 这对她来说是个社交活动。

sentences.c: It should have been the social event of the year.
sentences.cn: 这本应该是本年度社会上的大事件了。

trans.cn: 社会信息：指与社会相关的信息，包括政治、经济、文化、教育等方面的内容。

sentences.c: Cliqset; Merging, Organizing and Sharing Social Information.
sentences.cn: Cliqset；合并、组织、分享社交信息。

sentences.c: Adding Metadata Over Time: Communities Building Social information.
sentences.cn: 随时间而添加的元数据：由社群建设的群体信息。

sentences.c: If confirmed by future studies, the results would indicate that infants are sensitive to social information and to what others see.
sentences.cn: 如果结果能被未来的实验确定，这表明婴儿对社会信息和他们所看见的是很敏感的。

trans.cn: 社交技能：成功进行社交沟通和互动所需的个人技能。

sentences.c: In this job you will need social skills allied with technical knowledge.
sentences.cn: 这项工作需要社交能力和专业知识。

sentences.c: This is contrasted by the lady's social skills and common sense.
sentences.cn: 这与这位女士的社交技巧和常识形成了鲜明的对比。

sentences.c: Social skills are regarded as one of the most important skills of human beings in today's society.
sentences.cn: 社交技能被认为是当今社会人类最重要的技能之一。

sentences.c: Soft sediment deformation is one of the key indicators identifying the existence of paleo-earthquake.
sentences.cn: 软沉积物变形构造是确定古地震存在的关键证据之一。

sentences.c: However, I did find some really cool places where there had been soft sediment deformation, probably from the rocks landing in marshy areas next to the river.
sentences.cn: 然而，我确实发现了一些真正酷的地方，那儿曾经有一些柔软的沉淀物异形，可能从岩石飘落在紧邻河流的沼泽区域。

sentences.c: The sample consisted of pebbles of hardened sediment that had once been soft, deep-sea mud, as well as granules of gypsum and fragments of volcanic rock.
sentences.cn: 这一样本包括曾经柔软的的硬化沉积物的卵石、深海淤泥以及石膏颗粒和火山岩碎片。

trans.cn: 太空博物馆：一个展示太空探索历史、宇宙知识和航天技术的博物馆。

sentences.c: Trip includes round-trip air tickets, hotel stay for two nights, and tours of the National Air and Space Museum and the office of National Geographic World.
sentences.cn: 行程包括往返机票、两晚的酒店住宿、国家航空航天博物馆和国家地理世界办公室之旅。

sentences.c: We saw it at the Space Museum.
sentences.cn: 我们在空间博物馆看见它。

sentences.c: The Space Museum is a very interesting place.
sentences.cn: 空间博物馆是一个非常有趣的地方。

trans.cn: 特价优惠：以低于平常价格出售的产品或服务，以鼓励人们购买或使用，或者以这种方式提供商品和服务的行为。

sentences.c: The direct marketing industry has become adept at packaging special offers.
sentences.cn: 广告直邮业已经很会为特价销售做包装宣传了。

sentences.c: She just couldn't stop shopping and she loved special offers.
sentences.cn: 她就是无法停止购物，而且还喜欢特价商品。

sentences.c: Underserved Markets: Local Alerts, Special offers.
sentences.cn: 未饱和市场：当地通知，特别服务。

sentences.c: A special code is needed to override the time lock.
sentences.cn: 这定时锁要用特定密码才能打开。

sentences.c: No special code in the product was used.
sentences.cn: 在产品使用上没有任何特殊代码。

sentences.c: Sometimes, however, you must write special code.
sentences.cn: 但是，有时候必须编写特殊的代码。

sentences.c: There are special buses to all Olympic sites.
sentences.cn: 有特殊的公共汽车通往奥运比赛场地。

sentences.c: The bus company has scheduled six special buses for hikers.
sentences.cn: 巴士公司为徒步旅行者安排了六部专车。

sentences.c: All the students are expert drivers, but before they drive any of the buses, they will have to pass a special test.
sentences.cn: 所有的学生都是开车的能手，但在驾驶公共汽车之前，他们必须通过一项专门测验。

trans.cn: 运动器材：指用于各种体育运动的器材，如球类、器械、装备等。

sentences.c: She collected sports equipment for the disabled.
sentences.cn: 她为残疾人收集了运动器材。

sentences.c: Like, maybe you're advertising Sports equipment, and you have been spending most of your budget during the holiday season when people buy gifts for each other.
sentences.cn: 比如，你可能在为体育器材做广告，而你的大部分预算都花在了节日期间，因为在此期间人们会为彼此购买礼物。

sentences.c: Don't overlook some of the more mundane items, such as books and sports equipment.
sentences.cn: 也别忽视那些看起来更家常的物品，比如书籍和运动器材。

sentences.c: The sign of ripe community sports has perfect community sports service network systems.
sentences.cn: 成熟社区体育的标志是拥有完善的社区体育服务网络体系。

sentences.c: Efficiency and regulation of sports service are the selling strategy in accordance with non-storage.
sentences.cn: 根据不可储存性采取的营销策略是体育服务的效率化和可调化。

sentences.c: Therefore, in sports industry the features of "experience economy" are typically reflected by sports service economy.
sentences.cn: 为此，体育产业的服务性经济典型地体现了“体验经济”的特点。

trans.cn: 体育中心：一个设施齐全的场所，提供各种体育活动和设施，如运动场、健身房等。

sentences.c: The new sports centre will take the pressure off the old one.
sentences.cn: 新的体育运动中心将减轻老体育运动中心的压力。

sentences.c: Remember, there's no rule that says you have to go to a sports centre or buy equipment like swimming suits.
sentences.cn: 记住，没有规定说你必须去体育中心或购买泳衣等装备。

sentences.c: I often play indoor sports in the sports centre.
sentences.cn: 我通常在体育中心进行室内运动。

trans.cn: 运动伤害：在进行体育运动时可能发生的损伤，包括扭伤、拉伤、骨折等。

sentences.c: Due to a sports injury, Michael was bed-ridden for two weeks.
sentences.cn: 由于运动伤害，麦可在床上躺了两星期。

sentences.c: When I had a sports injury a while back I found Epsom salts really helped. Good tip, Rae!
sentences.cn: 我不久之前发生运动伤害，发现泻盐真的很有效。真是好点子，瑞伊！

sentences.c: I was suffering from a common sports injury called black toe, jogger's toe or tennis toe, caused by repeated trauma.
sentences.cn: 我受的是一种常见的运动创伤，称黑脚趾，又称慢跑脚趾或网球脚趾，是由于多次重复撞击而引起的。

trans.cn: 体育馆，运动馆：一座建筑物或建筑物内的一个房间，特别是在学校里，具备进行室内运动的设施。

sentences.c: Designs for the new sports hall are on display in the library.
sentences.cn: 新体育馆的设计图展示在图书馆里。

sentences.c: In front of the sports hall.
sentences.cn: 在体育馆前面。

sentences.c: The students are doing sports in the sports hall.
sentences.cn: 学生们正在体育馆里做锻炼。

trans.cn: 调查方法：用于收集数据和信息的一系列技术和程序，通常用于研究、评估或了解某个特定领域或问题。

sentences.c: Traditional methods are certainly applicable, such as user research with surveys, interviews and observation.
sentences.cn: 传统的方法必然是适用的，比如通过调查、采访和观察来做用户研究。

sentences.c: In our surveys we learned that API docs often lacked specificity around methods and API call examples.
sentences.cn: 在我们此前的调研中，我们了解到API文档通常缺乏方法上的专用性和API调用样例。

sentences.c: The major research methods adopted in this dissertation are comparative analysis and social surveys.
sentences.cn: 本文采用的研究方法主要是比较分析和社会调查的方法。

trans.cn: 遮阳帽：一种戴在头部用于防晒的帽子，可以保护头部和颈部免受阳光照射。

sentences.c: This product is not only a sun hat , is also telescope.
sentences.cn: 此产品既是太阳帽，也是望远镜。

sentences.c: Cover up with protective clothing, tightly woven but loose-fitting, and a sun hat.
sentences.cn: 穿上衣服(针织细密，但是宽松的衣物)，戴上太阳帽。

sentences.c: In the summer, the sun is so strong that you need to wear a sun hat and sunglasses.
sentences.cn: 夏天里，阳光如此的猛烈，你要戴上太阳帽和太阳镜。

sentences.c: Before adding materials we tend to do a couple of clay shots as we found this to be a great way to best assess sun position in relation to object while keeping render times fast.
sentences.cn: 在添加材质之前，我们要先制作一些大地镜头，因为我们发现这是确定物体相对太阳所处位置的最好的办法，而且渲染速度也很快。

sentences.c: Kramer surmised, therefore, that they were orienting according to the position of the Sun.
sentences.cn: 因此，克雷默推测，他们是根据太阳的位置来确定方向的。

sentences.c: Earth has been a cradle for life because of its position relative to the Sun.
sentences.cn: 由于地球与太阳的相对位置，地球一直是生命的摇篮。

trans.cn: 游泳池：用于游泳的水池，通常是人工建造的。

sentences.c: The swimming pool drains very slowly.
sentences.cn: 游泳池里的水排得很慢。

sentences.c: The swimming pool is floodlit in the evenings.
sentences.cn: 游泳池晚间有泛光灯照明。

sentences.c: The swimming pool is framed by tropical gardens.
sentences.cn: 游泳池四周环绕着热带花园。

trans.cn: 税号：用于纳税目的的唯一标识号码，通常由政府税务机构颁发给纳税人。

sentences.c: According to this new regulation all export declarations must be associated to a Tax Number.
sentences.cn: 根据这条新的规定，所有的出口货物声明必须附有税号。

sentences.c: They have to identify which of the infinite number of progressive tax schedules they embrace, and then explain why it is best.
sentences.cn: 即他们首先要确定累进率到底是多少，然后能够说明为什么这个数字是最优的。

sentences.c: A queasy economy means that tax receipts will soon flag and the number of welfare claimants will rise.
sentences.cn: 动荡的经济意味着税收锐减，申领救济的人数将会增加。

trans.cn: 网球场：一个大的矩形区域，用于打网球的场地。

sentences.c: They marked out a tennis court on the lawn.
sentences.cn: 他们在草坪上标出网球场。

sentences.c: Players complained about the uneven bounce of the tennis court.
sentences.cn: 运动员抱怨说网球场的反弹力不均匀。

sentences.c: When he's not on the tennis court, you'll find him practising his golf swing.
sentences.cn: 当他不在网球场时，你会发现他在练高尔夫挥杆动作。

trans.cn: 耗时的，需要花费很多时间去完成的

sentences.c: It's just very time consuming to get such a large quantity of data.
sentences.cn: 要收集这么多的数据就是非常耗时。

sentences.c: You'll have to make social media an occasional activity rather than a daily, time-consuming habit.
sentences.cn: 你将不得不让使用社交媒体成为一项偶尔为之的活动，而不是每天都要做的、耗费时间的习惯。

sentences.c: Going to court can be an expensive, time-consuming, and gut-wrenching experience that is best avoided.
sentences.cn: 上法庭会是种费钱，费时间，并带来精神痛苦的经历，最好能加以避免。

trans.cn: (建筑物、楼宇的) 顶层；最高级别，最高等级 ( 吞 )
最高级别的：指与最高职位或等级相关的。

sentences.c: A pitfall trap can be any small container placed in the ground with the top level with the surrounding surface and filled with a preservative.
sentences.cn: 陷阱可以是任何放置在地面上的小容器，其顶部与周围的表面齐平，并装满防腐剂。

sentences.c: Despite nearly a decade of positive discrimination since apartheid was dismantled, few black sportsmen have reached the top level.
sentences.cn: 尽管种族隔离被取消后采取了近十年的平权举措，几乎没有黑人运动员达到过顶极。

sentences.c: After de-layering in this way, a company may be left with just a top level of senior managers, front-line managers and employees with direct contact with the public.
sentences.cn: 通过这种方式减少层级后，公司可能只剩下最高层管理人员、一线管理人员和与公众直接接触的员工。

trans.cn: 市政厅；市政府；市民集会所

sentences.c: The fire badly damaged the town hall.
sentences.cn: 火灾使市政厅遭到严重破坏。

sentences.c: Police were on guard at Barnet town hall.
sentences.cn: 警察在巴尼特市政厅值守。

sentences.c: The car pulled in and double-parked in front of the town hall.
sentences.cn: 这辆车停了下来且并排停放在市政厅前。

synos.cn: 市政厅；市政府；市民集会所

trans.cn: 交通流量：指在某一时间段内通过某一道路或交通枢纽的车辆数量。

sentences.c: Smooth traffic flow on the road.
sentences.cn: 道路交通顺畅。

sentences.c: And in Singapore, where signals respond to traffic flow.
sentences.cn: 还在新加坡测试过，那里的信号灯反应交通流量。

sentences.c: May I suggest you take a more productive step and diversify your traffic flow.
sentences.cn: 我可以建议你采取一个更加多产的方法，将你的流量源多样化。

sentences.c: Is there a traffic light?
sentences.cn: 那里有红绿灯吗？

sentences.c: The red traffic light made me stop.
sentences.cn: 红灯让我停了下来。

sentences.c: The traffic light is red.
sentences.cn: 现在是红灯。

trans.cn: 交通噪音：指由车辆行驶、喇叭声、引擎声等交通活动产生的噪音。

sentences.c: Except for traffic noise the night passed peacefully.
sentences.cn: 除了交通噪音，那夜安宁地过去了。

sentences.c: The city has less traffic noise and pollution than any other European capital.
sentences.cn: 这个城市的交通噪音和污染比欧洲其他国家的首都都要少。

sentences.c: As an economical and effective method, the expressway noise barrier is a primary measure to reduce traffic noise.
sentences.cn: 高速公路隔声屏障作为一种经济有效的方法，是降低交通噪声的主要措施。

trans.cn: 运输服务：提供运输服务的公司或组织，包括货运和乘客运输。

sentences.c: The transport service cannot cope with the strain of so many additional passengers.
sentences.cn: 运输部门无法应对临时增加这么多乘客所带来的紧张局面。

sentences.c: The transport service ensures reliable delivery and transactional integrity.

sentences.c: We are adding MRT lines and buses, to improve public transport service standards.
sentences.cn: 我们将增添地铁线和巴士，以改善公共交通的服务水平。

trans.cn: 素食汉堡：制作这种汉堡的肉饼并非用肉制成，原材料是一种人造肉，通常由大豆等非肉类模仿肉的口感。

sentences.c: Boca burger Grilled Vegetable burger.

sentences.cn: 联合国总部的午餐菜单上还有一款蔬菜汉堡，它的原材料是榨取蔬菜汁后所剩的残渣。榨汁通常会浪费掉大部分蔬果。

sentences.c: How about …? burger n. (=hamburger) vegetable n. fruit n. right adj. apple n. then adv.

trans.cn: 视频录制：通过摄影电视显像管拍摄的电视制作的动态影片，也可以指视频磁带录制。

sentences.c: We've been advising shop owners along there about what kind of video recording equipment they can have put in—we'll then be able to get evidence of any criminal activity on film.
sentences.cn: 我们一直在向那里的店主们建议，他们应该安装什么样的录像设备——这样我们就能在录像中找到任何犯罪活动的证据。

sentences.c: We have viewed the video recording of the incident.
sentences.cn: 我们已观看了该事件的录像。

sentences.cn: 第四章出版、表演、录音录像、播放第三节录音录像。

sentences.c: For a secondary persona with hearing impairment, you would ensure that you have provided volume adjustment capability for sound output, subtitles for video clips, and so forth.
sentences.cn: 对于听力损伤的次要角色，您会确保为声音输出提供音量调节功能，为视频剪辑提供字幕，等等。

sentences.c: Video clips, music, subtitles, stunt also, electronic albums production, DVD, VCD, CD recording.

trans.cn: 摄像机：用于拍摄视频的设备。

sentences.c: Video cameras with night vision can be activated by movement.
sentences.cn: 有夜视功能的摄像机能被物体的活动激活。

sentences.c: Modern video cameras are light and easy to carry.
sentences.cn: 新型的摄像机很轻，容易携带。

sentences.c: The video cameras are linked to a powerful computer.
sentences.cn: 这些摄像机是与一台功能强大的计算机相连接的。

trans.cn: 观景亭：一种建在户外的小型建筑物，通常用于观赏风景或保护观众免受恶劣天气的影响。
浇水植物：给植物浇水以保持其生长和健康。

sentences.c: I just enjoy watering plants and digging in the soil.
sentences.cn: 我只是享受浇灌植物和在土壤中的挖掘。

sentences.c: Recycle and reuse water for watering plants or your cleaning needs.
sentences.cn: 循环和再利用水资源，可用来洗菜或者其它需要清洗的物品。

sentences.c: And you thought they were only good for watering plants, and as bird feeders, seed starters and funnels.
sentences.cn: 也许你认为它们只适合用来给植物浇水，当鸟的进料器，用来育苗或是当漏斗。

trans.cn: 水平仪：通过槽或U形管中的水面来显示水平的仪器。
水线：特定物体或柱状水体的表面所处的水平。

sentences.c: The water level of the Mississippi River is already 6.5 feet below normal.
sentences.cn: 密西西比河的水位已经比正常水位低6.5英尺。

sentences.c: The water clock told the time by the water level in the bowls.
sentences.cn: 水钟是根据碗中的水位来报时的。

sentences.c: There wasn't enough difference between the height of the ground level and the water level.
sentences.cn: 地面高度与水位没什么明显的区别。

trans.cn: (水净化处理装置中的) 纯净水收集容器

sentences.c: The present invention discloses a washing clothes dryer whose condenser is placed in the washing waste water collection tank.
sentences.cn: 本发明公开了一种冷凝器设置在洗衣废水收集箱的洗衣干衣机。

sentences.c: In the middle of the roof is an air layer which is cooled and cleaned automatically by water spraying system linked to the rainwater collection tank.
sentences.cn: 屋顶的中部是通风口，通过连接雨水收集池的水喷淋装置自动化控制，实现冷凝和净化。

sentences.c: Rain falls on the metal roofs and flows into aluminum gutters. These gutters carry the water to a large collection tank on the side of the home.
sentences.cn: 雨水降落到金属屋顶，然后流入铝水槽内。这些水槽中的水汇集到家中的一旁的大量收集箱中。

trans.cn: 热水器：一种用于加热并通常储存热水（用于家庭使用）的装置。

sentences.c: Do you own a hot-water heater?
sentences.cn: 你家有热水器吗？

sentences.c: Run the hose to the water heater.
sentences.cn: 把软管接到热水器上。

sentences.c: One component looks like a six-foot water heater.
sentences.cn: 这个部件看起来就像一台六英尺热水器。

trans.cn: 水力：从流动或落下的水中获得的机械或电力能量；最初是从浸在溪流中的水车获得的；现代水力发电是从水库供给的涡轮机获得的。

sentences.c: She has created her own regional water power.
sentences.cn: 她已经在这一地区建立了她自己的威望。

sentences.c: Mills used to depend on wind power or water power.
sentences.cn: 磨坊过去依赖风力或水力操作。

sentences.c: Once heated, could the water power the air-conditioning too?
sentences.cn: 水一旦加热了也能带动气温调节系统吗？

trans.cn: 水处理：对水进行物理、化学或生物处理的过程，以去除污染物、杀灭细菌和病毒，使水达到安全和可用的标准。

sentences.c: The water treatment was new, now, and Tom's low condition was a windfall to her.
sentences.cn: 现在新出了水疗法，而正好汤姆状态低迷，这下她可来了劲儿。

sentences.c: She dropped the water treatment and everything else, and pinned her faith to Pain-killer.
sentences.cn: 她放弃了水疗法和其他别的，把希望寄托在止痛药上。

sentences.c: The city has proposed a number of water treatment and conservation projects the cost of which raises water bills high enough so that even environmentalists are beginning to raise alarms.
sentences.cn: 该市已经提出了一系列的水资源处理和保护项目，这些项目的成本大大提高了水费，以至于连环保人士也开始发出警告。

trans.cn: 风帆冲浪运动(注：也可以写成windsurfing)  ( 吞 )
风帆冲浪（windsurf 的 ing 形式）

sentences.c: Wind surfing can be strenuous but immensely exciting.
sentences.cn: 风帆冲浪可能紧张吃力，但却非常刺激。

sentences.c: He made use of no space shuttle. He USES his pen, chisel and graver etc. as well as a heart which is forever on the wind surfing.
sentences.cn: 他没有穿梭其间的飞船只有自己的笔、刻刀、凿子……和那一颗驰骋的心。

sentences.c: He has a wide range of interests and hobbies which include stamp collecting, photography, travel, music, ice hockey, swimming, wind surfing, as well as reading classic literature ancient history.
sentences.cn: 他的兴趣广泛，爱好集邮摄影旅游音乐冰上曲棍球游泳风帆以及阅读古典文学及古代历史。

sentences.c: Insurance costs will be reduced for houses fitted with window locks.
sentences.cn: 窗户有锁的房子保险费用降低。

sentences.c: The company can refuse to insure a property that does not have window locks.
sentences.cn: 保险公司可以拒绝为没有窗锁的房产提供保险。

sentences.c: If you are going to spend some money, what I'd recommend more than anything else is that you invest in some well-made window locks for your house.
sentences.cn: 如果你打算花钱的话，我最建议你为你的住宅买一些制作精良的窗户锁。

trans.cn: 窗外景色：从窗户里看到的景色。

sentences.c: Figure 7 also shows a table but USES the: window view to put it in an on-demand popup instead of an inset.
sentences.cn: 图7还显示了一个表格，它使用：window视图放置了一个按需弹出窗口而不是inset。

sentences.c: He quickly sketched the view from the window.
sentences.cn: 他很快勾勒出了窗外的风景。

sentences.c: An ugly new building blocked the view from the window.
sentences.cn: 一座难看的大楼把窗外的景物遮住了。

trans.cn: 年轻人；(特指已到结婚年龄的)小伙子

sentences.c: Young people these days have no morals.
sentences.cn: 现在的年轻人根本不讲道德。

sentences.c: Young people often kick against the rules.
sentences.cn: 年轻人常常违反规定。

sentences.c: Young people are very environmentally aware.
sentences.cn: 年轻人的环保意识很强。

trans.cn: 年幼的孩子：指年龄在幼儿园或小学阶段的孩子。

sentences.cn: 她对幼儿特别有耐心。

sentences.cn: 他们中多数人都有岁数不到学龄的孩子。

sentences.c: Young children have difficulty grasping the finality of death.
sentences.cn: 小孩子很难理解死亡的终局性。

sentences.c: This anti-smoking campaign is mainly aimed at young teenagers.
sentences.cn: 这次反吸烟运动主要是针对青少年的。

sentences.c: This anti-alcohol campaign is mainly aimed at young teenagers.
sentences.cn: 这场反酗酒运动主要是针对青少年的。

sentences.c: Some of the young teenagers giggled - but every one of them winced.
sentences.cn: 一些年纪小的少年咯咯笑起来。但是他们每个人都又缩了回去。

sentences.c: Young graduates are in debt, out of work and on their parents' couches.

sentences.c: For many young graduates, it's all about survival.
sentences.cn: 对于许多年轻毕业生来说，生活的全部为了生存。

sentences.c: His academic record was unimpressive.
sentences.cn: 他的学业成绩平平。

sentences.c: No matter what my academic record, all he can see is my long hair.
sentences.cn: 不管我的学术成绩怎么样，他能看见的就只有我的长头发。

sentences.c: Since its establishment, the government officer system in Ningbo has been effective in improving administration efficiency, enhancing personnel quality.
sentences.cn: 宁波市自公务员制度实施以来，取得了不少显著的成绩，对提高行政效率，优化干部队伍素质起到了积极作用。

sentences.c: First of all, the system of liability of law-officer of ancient China is one of the symbols of the maturity of the administration of country.
sentences.cn: 门中国古代司法官责任规定的法律化、制度化，这是国家管理走向成熟的标志。

sentences.c: It means you have prepared yourself well to take on the practice of the next level. (or more advance level). Congratulations!
sentences.cn: 这意味着你已经准备好进入下一级的修炼。(或是更高一级)。祝贺你！

sentences.c: Like any skill, cooking gets easier as you do it more; every time you cook, you advance your level of skills.
sentences.cn: 做饭就像任何一种技能一样，做得越多，就变得越容易；每一次做饭，你都会提高你的技能水平。

sentences.c: Through interviews and E-mails, she finds out in advance her listeners' educational level and what information they want to know.
sentences.cn: 通过采访和电子邮件，她提前了解了听众的教育水平和他们想了解何种资讯。

trans.cn: 接电话：接听来电并与对方交流。

sentences.c: No one is answering the phone—I can't understand it.
sentences.cn: 没人接电话，我不知道是怎么回事。

sentences.c: No one is answering the phone.

sentences.c: No one is answering the phone..

trans.cn: 苹果汁：苹果的汁液，通常用作饮料。

sentences.cn: 比起苹果汁，我更喜欢橙汁。

sentences.c: I'll have an apple juice with that, please.

sentences.cn: 申请表应不迟于6月7日交回。

sentences.c: Check what you have written before you hand in your application form.
sentences.cn: 在你递交申请表之前，检查一下你所写的内容。

sentences.cn: 这些数字与银行结单核对无误。

sentences.cn: 张：好的，请把银行对账单给我。

trans.cn: 电汇：一种通过银行进行的转账方式。

sentences.c: The easiest way to transfer money from a British bank account to a French one is by bank transfer: simply provide your British bank with the name, address and number of your French bank account.
sentences.cn: 把钱从英国银行转到法国银行最简单的方法是银行转账：只需提供你的英国银行的名字，地址和你的法国银行的账户号码。

sentences.c: For large purchases online, payment is generally made by bank transfer.
sentences.cn: 大型在线购物网一般都要银行转账付款。

sentences.cn: 职员：那好，请您填写汇款申请单，并标出“经银行电汇”，好吗？

trans.cn: 床单：用于覆盖床铺的布料，通常由棉、亚麻或合成纤维制成。

sentences.c: If you have a leather sofa, cover it with a white bed sheet.
sentences.cn: 如果你有一张皮革沙发，请用一张白色的床单罩住它。

sentences.c: She will give me some horror but exciting stories, and I hide in my bed sheet and then close my eyes.
sentences.cn: 她会给我讲一些恐怖但又激动人心的故事，而我躲在我的床单里，然后闭上眼睛。

sentences.c: There's cigarette burn on the bed sheet.
sentences.cn: 床单上有一个香烟头的烧痕。

trans.cn: 生物学课：一节关于生物学的课程，通常在学校或大学中教授。

sentences.c: A little biology lesson here.
sentences.cn: 这里给你上节小小的生物课。

sentences.c: We have a biology lesson tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天我们有堂生物学课。

sentences.c: In the biology lesson, the teacher dissected a frog with a scalpel.
sentences.cn: 生物课上老师用手术刀解剖了一只青蛙。

trans.cn: 生物防治：通过干预害虫生态系统（如引入寄生虫或疾病）来减少或消灭害虫数量的过程。

sentences.c: Once a biological control agent is released, it is difficult to control its speed.
sentences.cn: 一旦实施了生物控制手段，它的速度就很难控制。

sentences.c: Legal consequences of attempts at biological control present a potential minefield.
sentences.cn: 尝试进行生物防治的法律后果是一个潜在的雷区。

sentences.c: How effectively biological control can be pressed into service is proved by the following examples.
sentences.cn: 下面的例子证明了生物防治如何能有效地投入使用。

trans.cn: 身体形态：一个人身体的整体形状，通常由两个或更多点（如胸围和臀围）的测量结果来定义。

sentences.c: Framestore used body doubles with resemblance to Hepburn's facial structure and body shape as a framework for manual animation.
sentences.cn: 后期制作使用与赫本的面部结构和体型相似的替身作为手工动画的框架。

sentences.c: Although over the years Barbie has had more than 180 different careers—including football coach, sign language teacher, ambassador, president and astronaut—her body shape hasn't changed much.
sentences.cn: 尽管这些年来芭比娃娃有超过180种不同的职业，包括足球教练、手语教师、大使、总统和宇航员，但她的体型并没有太大变化。

sentences.c: Although over the years Barbie has had more than 180 different careers including football coach, sign language teacher, ambassador, president and astronaut, her body shape hasn't changed much.
sentences.cn: 尽管这些年来芭比娃娃有超过180种不同的职业经历，包括足球教练、手语教师、大使、总统和宇航员，但她的体型并没有太大变化。

trans.cn: 体液：指人体内的液体，如血液、淋巴液、尿液、汗液等。

sentences.c: Abnormally high alkalinity of the blood and body fluids.
sentences.cn: 血液和骨髓检查均未找到异常组织细胞。

sentences.c: People can get monkeypox from an animal with monkeypox if they are bitten or if they touch the animal's blood, body fluids, or its rash.
sentences.cn: 如果人被有猴痘的动物咬伤或接触这些动物的血液、液或皮疹都会患猴痘。

sentences.c: The function of lung Qi regulating body fluids and heart Qi regulating blood relate through the close relationship between the heart Qi and lung Qi.
sentences.cn: 肺气行津与心气行血的功能通过心肺之气间的密切关系连接起来。

trans.cn: phrase 身体语言，肢体语言
身体语言：人或动物通过姿势、动作和举止与他人进行交流的方式。

sentences.c: I can tell by your body language that you're happy with the decision.
sentences.cn: 我能从你的身体语言看出来你对这个决定感到满意。

sentences.c: Body language can also be used to attract members of the opposite sex.
sentences.cn: 肢体语言也可以被用来吸引异性。

sentences.c: These can be verbal cues or even body language.
sentences.cn: 这些可以是语言暗示，甚至是肢体语言。

trans.cn: 提前预订：在实际需要使用之前预先预订或安排。

sentences.c: Book in advance.
sentences.cn: 提前预订。

sentences.c: You can join the family for a meal as well - just book in advance for supper.
sentences.cn: 你也可以参加本地家庭的用餐，不过要提前预定，而且只有晚餐。

sentences.c: Non-residents must book in advance for a HK$39,000 (around $5,031) package stay in public hospitals - and only when extra beds are available.
sentences.cn: 非本地居民必须以39,000港元（约合5,031美元）的价格提前预订到公立医院住院，而且只有在有额外床位的时候才可以。

trans.cn: 预订表格：一种用于填写预订信息的表格，通常用于酒店、机票、租车等服务的预订过程中。

sentences.c: The agent needs a new flight booking form page.
sentences.cn: 代理人员需要一个新的机票预订表单页面。

sentences.c: Could you please fill in this booking form.
sentences.cn: 请您填一下这张预定单。

sentences.c: Player who need Club Caddie please fill out the Caddie Booking Form attached.
sentences.cn: 用球会球童的球员请填写附件内的球童预订表。

trans.cn: 瓶盖：瓶盖是一种可以安装在大多数12盎司和16盎司铝罐上的装置，可以将其变成可重新封闭的容器。它声称还可以保持罐中的碳酸饮料，尽管这一点存在争议。该产品目前由Telebrands公司营销，该公司是领先的直销营销公司之一。

sentences.c: Milk bottle tops are made of tin foil.
sentences.cn: 牛奶瓶盖是用锡箔制成的。

sentences.c: Q. Soda bottle tops: on or off before recycling?
