sentences.c: Detective Delaney entered the water without an air tank, but only his diving suit, mask and snorkel and approached a woman floating in a life vest, he said.
sentences.cn: Delaney警探在只穿了潜水服、面具和通气管而没有带氧气罐的情况下入水向依靠救生衣漂浮在水中的一名女性靠近。

trans.cn: 挨门逐户的；(货物由发货场)直送用户的
挨家挨户：指在各个住宅之间进行拜访、销售等活动。
送货上门：指商店或企业直接将货物送到住宅。

sentences.c: They are going from door to door collecting money from civilians.
sentences.cn: 他们挨家挨户地从老百姓那里收钱。

sentences.c: They sold their second hand books, put on talent shows and asked for donations (捐赠) , even going door to door for them.
sentences.cn: 他们卖二手书，参加才艺表演，甚至挨家挨户地去寻求捐款。

sentences.c: One famous man, who now owns many big factories, used to sell socks from door to door when he was young.
sentences.cn: 有一个名人，他现在拥有了很多大工厂，他年轻的时候曾经挨家挨户地卖袜子。

trans.cn: 饮食习惯；饮食模式；进食模式
饮食习惯：指个人或群体在一段时间内所采取的饮食方式和规律。

sentences.c: The Mediterranean diet is based upon the eating patterns of traditional cultures in the Mediterranean region.
sentences.cn: 地中海饮食是以地中海地区传统文化中的饮食模式为基础的。

sentences.c: Changing eating patterns can be extremely difficult.
sentences.cn: 改变饮食方式可以是极其困难的。

sentences.c: People may develop social norms or beliefs about what are acceptable weight and eating patterns.
sentences.cn: 人们可能有一种关于什么是可接受体重和饮食结构的社会基准或信条。

trans.cn: 经济史：研究过去经济活动、制度和思想的历史学科，分析历史上的经济现象、变迁和发展。

sentences.c: He studied History and Economics.
sentences.cn: 他学过历史和经济学。

sentences.c: Economics does not determine history, but it does provide the backbeat.
sentences.cn: 经济不会决定历史，但它提供了一个分析工具。

sentences.c: So, again, austerity it is to be and history trumps economics.
sentences.cn: 所以还是要采取紧缩措施，历史责任 胜过经济责任。

trans.cn: 娱乐产业：指以娱乐为主要目的的产业，包括电影、电视、音乐、游戏、演艺等领域。

sentences.c: One day virtual reality will revolutionize the entertainment industry.
sentences.cn: 有朝一日虚拟现实将给娱乐业带来一场革命。

sentences.c: The world of arts and entertainment is often referred to as "the entertainment industry" or "show business".
sentences.cn: 艺术界和娱乐界通常被称为“娱乐产业”或“演艺行业”。

sentences.c: In response, the alarmists accuse critics and news reporters of being deceived by the entertainment industry.
sentences.cn: 作为回应，那些危言耸听者指责批评家和新闻记者受到了娱乐产业的欺骗。

trans.cn: 论文写作：指撰写一篇有关某个主题或问题的文章，通常需要进行研究和分析，并包含引用和参考文献。

sentences.c: Essay Writing: an academic paper of 2,000 to 2,500 words.
sentences.cn: 论文写作：一篇2000-2500词的学术论文。

sentences.c: Talking to admissions professionals like Boshoven, you realize that the list of "don't"s in essay writing is much longer than the "do"s.
sentences.cn: 与博肖文这样的招生专家交谈，你会意识到论文写作中“不应该做的事情”的清单比“应该做的事情”要长得多。

sentences.c: We provide our great solution with our online essay writing help.
sentences.cn: 我们将提供在线写作帮助的最好解决方案。

sentences.c: John discovered that he, too, enjoyed singing songs at evening meals.
sentences.cn: 约翰发现他自己，也喜欢在晚餐的时候唱歌。

sentences.c: I love raw carrots. They are perfect for snacks, lunch and even for late evening meals.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢生胡萝卜，它是最好的点心，午餐，甚至是晚餐。

sentences.c: We have even given up sitting at table and having a leisurely evening meals, exchanging the news of the day.
sentences.cn: 我们甚至再也不围桌而坐，不从容不迫的享受晚餐，交流一天的信息。

trans.cn: 晚间新闻；新闻晚报（报纸名）

sentences.c: She anchored the evening news for seven years.
sentences.cn: 她主持了七年晚间新闻报道。

sentences.c: "I love Jin Yong's wuxia stories," Jin told Gusu Evening News.
sentences.cn: “我喜欢金庸笔下的武侠故事。”金在接受《姑苏晚报》采访时表示。

sentences.c: According to a study of nearly 3,000 students that was done by Ningbo Evening News in March, only 22% of students help with everyday chores around the house.
sentences.cn: 今年3月，《宁波晚报》的一项调查显示，调查中近3000名学生里，只有22%的学生会帮忙做家务。

trans.cn: 初稿：指文学或图像创作中作者完成的初始稿件，和修改稿、校对稿相对。

sentences.c: This is only the first draft of my speech.
sentences.cn: 这只是我演讲的初稿。

sentences.c: I faxed a first draft of this article to him.
sentences.cn: 我把这篇文章的初稿传真给他。

sentences.c: When the first draft was completed, Nichols typed it up.
sentences.cn: 当初稿完成时，尼科尔斯把它打了出来。

sentences.c: For years, studies have found that first generation college students those who do not have a parent with a college degree lag other students on a range of education achievement factors.
sentences.cn: 多年来，研究发现，父母都没有大学学历的第一代大学生在一系列教育成就方面落后于其他学生。

sentences.c: As a result, their math grades overtook those of the other students by the end of the first semester—and the gap between the two groups continued to widen during the two years we followed them.
sentences.cn: 结果，他们的数学成绩在第一个学期末就超过了其他学生——在我们持续观察他们的两年中，两组学生之间的差距继续扩大。

sentences.c: As a result, their math grades overtook those of the other students by the end of the first semester — and the gap between the two groups continued to widen during the two years we followed them.
sentences.cn: 结果，他们的数学成绩在第一个学期末就超过了其他学生——在我们持续观察他们的两年中，两组学生之间的差距继续扩大。

trans.cn: 急救箱：一种装有急救用品的箱子，用于提供基本的医疗援助。

sentences.c: You should keep a first-aid kit in your home just in case there is an accident.
sentences.cn: 你应该在家里放一个急救箱，以防发生事故。

sentences.c: A: Where is the first-aid kit?
sentences.cn: A：急救箱在哪里？

sentences.c: You'd better take along a first-aid kit to cope with unexpected catastrophes.
sentences.cn: 你们最好带着一个急救药箱以便应付意想不到的灾难。

trans.cn: 健身水平：一个人在身体健康和体能方面的水平和能力。

sentences.c: I suppose my main aim is to build up my fitness level.
sentences.cn: 我想我的主要目标是提高我的健康水平。

sentences.c: You'd better test your fitness level first to decide what activities you need.
sentences.cn: 你最好先测试一下你的体能水平，以决定你需要什么样的活动。

sentences.c: There are several ways to measure your fitness level.
sentences.cn: 这里有几种方法来测量你的健康水平。

trans.cn: 健身中心：提供健身设施和服务的场所。

sentences.c: Free use of Fitness Centre.
sentences.cn: 免费使用健身中心。

sentences.c: The hotel has a fitness centre and a library.
sentences.cn: 酒店拥有一个健身中心和一间图书馆。

sentences.c: It will also have a swimming pool and fitness centre.
sentences.cn: 它还将有一个游泳池和健身中心。

trans.cn: 水果汁：一种或多种水果的汁液。

sentences.c: When you really want to drink fruit juice, drink only fresh fruit juice, not from the bottles or cans.
sentences.cn: 当你真的想喝果汁时，只喝新鲜的果汁，不喝瓶装或罐装的。

sentences.c: I like drinking fruit juice.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢喝果汁。

sentences.c: What kind of fruit juice is red?
sentences.cn: 哪种果汁是红色的？

trans.cn: 果树：一种能够定期结出可食用水果的树木。

sentences.c: There is a fruit tree in front of the house.
sentences.cn: 房子前面有一棵果树。

sentences.c: Just down in the valley, under the big yellow fruit tree, she told me, pointing outside the window.
sentences.cn: 她指着窗外说：“就在山窝那棵大黄果树下面，一下子就走到的。”

sentences.c: Fruit tree farmers can buy one load of manure a year from a cow or pig farm to start their digester and add wood pruned from fruit trees.
sentences.cn: 果树种植户每年可以从养牛养猪户那里购买一批粪肥建起沼气池，然后添加修剪下来的果树树枝。

trans.cn: 水果蛋糕：一种含有水果的甜点。

sentences.c: Waiter: We have fruit cake. cream cake and chestnut cake.
sentences.cn: 服务员：我们有水果蛋糕、奶油蛋糕和栗子蛋糕。

sentences.c: So go ahead, give the fruit cake to Aunt Mary and save yourself the clean up time.
sentences.cn: 所以，把让玛丽阿姨来坐水果蛋糕吧，给自己清闲一刻。

sentences.c: Below are five ways to help keep that connection strong and avoid a food fight with the fruit cake.
sentences.cn: 以下是帮助你保持良好关系，避免因水果蛋糕而发生争执的五种方法。

trans.cn: 正式花园：按照古典设计方法，在完全规则的形式和线条上布置的花园，植物按照对称排列的行或几何图形进行种植。

sentences.c: Do you want your ideal living place having greening, such as formal garden or vertical garden?
sentences.cn: 你认为理想的居住环境应该拥有绿化特色吗？例如花园或绿色幕墙。

sentences.c: Beloved by Louis XIV, orange trees outline a formal garden at Versailles, the royal residence just outside Paris.
sentences.cn: 凡尔赛宫位于巴黎郊外。在这座昔日的王宫内，有许多曾经深受路易十四喜爱的桔树，它们组成了一个齐整的花园轮廓。

sentences.c: Tip: the Gardens of Versailles are the epitome of the French formal garden, known for symmetry and the principle of imposing order on nature.
sentences.cn: 贴士：凡尔赛花园是法式花园的典型，以对称和建于自然之上的秩序原则著称。

trans.cn: 正式服装：指在正式场合穿着的服装。

sentences.c: Today's trend is toward less formal clothing.
sentences.cn: 眼下时尚趋向于穿着随便。

sentences.c: The [bankers] all wear suits or very formal clothing.
sentences.cn: 所有的银行家都穿西装或非常正式的服装。

sentences.c: To better present yourself to HR personnel, it is strongly recommended to wear formal clothing.
sentences.cn: 为了更好的在德企人事面前展示自己，我们强烈建议您着正装出席。

trans.cn: 正式会议：一种正式的商务或组织会议，通常有特定的议程和参与者，目的是讨论重要事项、做出决策或传达信息。

sentences.c: This tailored pantsuit is perfect for formal meetings.
sentences.cn: 这套剪裁讲究的裤装非常适合正式的会议。

sentences.c: Tim: I want a suit of fine workmanship for formal meetings.
sentences.cn: 提姆：我想买一套做工好能在正式场合穿的套装。

sentences.c: I want a suit of workmanship and suitable for formal meetings.
sentences.cn: 我想要一套做工好，适合参加正式会议的西装。

trans.cn: 全职：指全天工作或全日制学习，没有其他兼职或业余活动。

sentences.c: The referee blew his whistle for full time.
sentences.cn: 裁判吹响了比赛结束的哨音。

sentences.c: How many full-time staff have we got?
sentences.cn: 我们有多少全职员工？

sentences.c: All full-time staff get a 20 percent discount.
sentences.cn: 所有全职员工都可以享受8折优惠。

trans.cn: 娱乐室：尤其是为玩桌上游戏而装备的房间。

sentences.c: Gonna have a movie theater, game room... I want to give them that.
sentences.cn: 建造一座电影院，有游戏室…我想给他们。

sentences.c: Gourmet kitchen, bonus room, game room, office, 3 en-suite bedrooms.
sentences.cn: 美食厨房，奖金室，游戏室，办公室，3个套间卧室。

sentences.c: The company provides its workers with a game room, a pool and other fun areas.
sentences.cn: 公司为员工提供了游戏间、游泳池和其他好玩的区域。

trans.cn: 汽车上的油箱；煤气罐；储气罐；气柜
汽油箱：用于储存汽车或其他机械设备的燃油的容器。

sentences.c: On an upper balcony lined with gas tanks.
sentences.cn: 在上面的阳台内衬的油箱。

sentences.c: The gas tanks themselves might leak or be mishandled during transport and disposal.
sentences.cn: 储气罐自身也可能泄漏或者在运输和放置的时候操作失误。

sentences.c: The article brings forward a project of management system basing on RFID technology for dangerous chemical gas tanks.
sentences.cn: 提出一种基于射频识别(RFID)技术开发危化品气瓶管理系统的方案。

trans.cn: 一般讨论：涉及各种主题和观点的广泛讨论，通常不局限于特定的议题或领域。

sentences.c: I've got your details—now let's move on to a more general discussion about what we're looking for here.
sentences.cn: 我已经得到了你们的详细信息——现在让我们进行一个更广泛的讨论，关于我们在这里寻求什么的话题。

sentences.c: Nowadays, there is a general discussion about the issue of canceling the school uniform or not.
sentences.cn: 如今，人们普遍在讨论是否取消校服的问题。

sentences.c: It would fit better in a more general discussion of Gtk development.
sentences.cn: 这些代码更适合针对Gtk开发的更全面讨论。

sentences.c: However, there was not much difference between general tour and leisure tour on tourists' data and behavior.
sentences.cn: 而在游客基本资料及消费行为 上，显示出一般的旅游与休閒农场旅游其差异并不大。

sentences.c: This is a recorded message lasting approximately four minutes and it provides general information on the town bus tour.
sentences.cn: 这是一段约四分钟的录音信息，它提供了城市巴士旅游的基本信息。

sentences.c: Voyages, an Australian tour operator, is advertising for a general manager for its Lizard Island resort, a post that comes with a two-bedroom house overlooking the Great Barrier Reef.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚旅游经营商Voyages目前为蜥蜴岛度假村刊登了一则诚招总经理的广告。 该职位配有双卧室住所，能俯瞰大堡礁。

trans.cn: 高尔夫球场：一种专门用于高尔夫运动的场地，通常由18个球洞组成，球员需要在规定的杆数内将球打入每个洞中。

sentences.c: And it's good exercise, walking on the golf court.
sentences.cn: 这是很好的锻炼，在高尔夫球场上行走。

sentences.c: Exactly. And it's good exercise, walking on the golf court.
sentences.cn: 确实。这是很好的磨炼，在高尔夫球场下行走。

sentences.c: It also can be used to kill snail in rice field and earthworm in golf court.
sentences.cn: 它也可以用来杀人蜗牛稻田和蚯蚓在高尔夫球场。

trans.cn: 绿色按钮：一种绿色的按钮，通常用于表示启动、确认或执行某个操作。

sentences.c: Green button click, become spring clothing.
sentences.cn: 绿色的按钮按一下，会变成春装。

sentences.c: Roger:Yes. Just type in the quantity of copies and push the green button. Easy, right?
sentences.cn: 罗杰︰对。只要输入影印的数量，然后按下绿色键。简单吧?。

sentences.c: For emergency opening, keep pressing the green button and pull the screen door to both sides.
sentences.cn: 紧急情况按住门框上绿色按钮，向两边拉开屏蔽门。

trans.cn: 绿色垃圾：指生活中产生的可生物降解的废弃物，如花草树叶、果皮等。

sentences.c: The paper studied the physicochemical characteristics changes of green waste during its composting and the effect of compost on the growth of some trees.
sentences.cn: 通过以园林垃圾为主要原料，研究高温好氧堆肥化过程中，理化性质的变化及堆肥对几种园林植物生长的影响。

sentences.c: The power of the Green movement in Germany has made that country a leader in the drive to recycle more waste materials.
sentences.cn: 德国环保运动的力量已经使该国成了循环利用更多废料运动中的领先者。

sentences.c: They burn waste to make electricity in a green way.
sentences.cn: 他们以环保的方式燃烧废物来发电。

trans.cn: 绿色税：一种财政政策，通过差别税收水平促进生态可持续活动。

sentences.c: The basic content of green tax.
sentences.cn: 绿色税收的基本内容。

sentences.c: Why would a green tax increase the airlines' takings?
sentences.cn: 为什么绿色税会增加航空公司的收益？

sentences.c: The second part is the theory analysis that the environment degradation and the green tax revenue.
sentences.cn: 第二部分是环境退化与绿色税收的理论分析。

sentences.c: We are looking for someone who is reliable and hard-working.
sentences.cn: 我们在物色可靠而又勤奋的人。

sentences.c: This must have been one of the proudest moments of his busy and hard-working life.
sentences.cn: 在他忙碌、勤奋的一生中，这可能是他最自豪的时刻之一。

sentences.c: He is honest, sober and hard-working.
sentences.cn: 他诚实、稳重、勤奋。

trans.cn: 总部：一个公司或组织的主要行政中心。

sentences.c: I don't know what head office will think about this proposal.
sentences.cn: 我不知道总公司对此提案会有何想法。

sentences.c: Travel arrangements are subject to confirmation by the head office.
sentences.cn: 旅行安排需经总公司确准。

sentences.c: Bonus notices were issued each year from head office to local agents.
sentences.cn: 红利通告每年由总公司发给各地方代理商。

trans.cn: 高温：指气温较高的状态，通常指超过正常范围的高温。

sentences.c: A very high temperature often denotes a serious illness.
sentences.cn: 高烧常常说明病得很重。

sentences.c: The high temperature in Korla makes it difficult for anyone to work day after day in the sunshine.
sentences.cn: 库尔勒的高温使得人们很难日复一日地在阳光下工作。

sentences.c: If you get a high temperature, use an onion.
sentences.cn: 如果你的体温很高，吃个洋葱。

sentences.c: What more automobile plant, on the one hand eroded car prices, high taxes and fees, on the other hand seems to the consumer price expectations too high.
sentences.cn: 汽车厂说辞更多，一方面推脱轿车价外税费太高，另一方面嫌消费者对降价的期望过高。

sentences.c: Just as you might have a healthy snack to stop yourself getting hungry, exercise snacks can keep energy levels high.
sentences.cn: 就像一顿健康的快餐可以阻挡饥饿一样，这种快餐式的锻炼也能保持人体很高的能量。

sentences.c: By refueling with healthy snack foods, instead of traditional junk food, you'll keep your energy levels high without sacrificing your health.
sentences.cn: 传统的垃圾食品扔掉吧，健康的零食才会让你保持精力又不至于牺牲了健康。

sentences.c: American Memory US historical maps, motion pictures, photos and prints, sound recordings.
sentences.cn: 该站提供美国历史地图，电影照片，图片和出版品，声音记录等。

sentences.c: The completion of the historical Atlas of China shows the achievement in the compilation of historical maps.
sentences.cn: 《中国历史地图集》等图集的完成显示了历史地图编绘的成就。

sentences.c: Help you find some primary source historical maps that may not have been available to you through other means.
sentences.cn: 帮你找到一些可能无法透过别种方式找到的第一手历史地图资料。

trans.cn: 住宅电话；家庭电话；住家电话
固定电话：透过金属线或光纤线等固态媒体发送信号的电信网络，有别于透过大气电波发送的无线通信。固话一般能提供较高质量的通信质量及较高带宽，以及可以在没有通信信号的地点下使用。此外，由于固话不易受到外界的干扰，所以可以用作提高通信的安全性。

sentences.c: More than half of Australian homes are still choosing to stick with their home phone.
sentences.cn: 超过一半的澳大利亚家庭仍然选择保留他们的座机。

sentences.c: Generation Xers with young families, like my wife and I, can still find it convenient to have a home phone rather than providing a mobile phone for every family member.
sentences.cn: 拥有年轻家庭的 X 世代，比如我和我的妻子，仍然发现相比于为每个家庭成员配一部手机，有个座机还是挺方便的。

sentences.c: That said, to be honest the only people who ever ring our home phone are our Baby Boomers parents, to the point where we play a game and guess who is calling before we pick up the phone (using Caller ID would take the fun out of it).
sentences.cn: 也就是说，事实上唯一给我们家里打电话的人是我们婴儿潮世代的父母。所以我们会玩一个游戏，在拿起电话之前猜是谁在打电话（使用来电显示功能会让游戏失去乐趣）。

trans.cn: 冰袋：一种装满冰块或其他冷冻物的袋子或容器，用于敷在身体某个部位上，以缓解疼痛或减轻肿胀。

sentences.c: To make it less painful, put an ice pack on the arm.
sentences.cn: 为了减轻疼痛，在手臂上放一个冰袋。

sentences.c: Put an ice pack on the wound.
sentences.cn: 把冰袋敷在伤口上。

sentences.c: Use an ice pack.
sentences.cn: 使用冰袋。

trans.cn: 利率：贷款或投资本金在一定时间内所收取的利息百分比。

sentences.c: Interest rates came down today.
sentences.cn: 利率今天下降了。

sentences.c: Interest rates should come down.
sentences.cn: 利率应下降。

sentences.c: Interest rates have risen by 1%.
sentences.cn: 利率上升了1%。

trans.cn: 生物钟：人体内部的一个系统，控制着人们需要睡觉、进食等的时间。
内部时钟：计算机内部的时钟或计时装置。

sentences.c: Our research suggests it has something to do with shifting the body's internal clock.
sentences.cn: 我们的研究表明，这与改变人体内部的生物钟有关。

sentences.c: The continuation of biological rhythms in an organism without external cues attests to its having an internal clock.
sentences.cn: 在没有外部提示的情况下，生物体中生物节律依然能够延续，这能证明它体内有一个时钟。

sentences.c: He has an internal clock that the Swiss would envy.
sentences.cn: 他有一个让瑞士人都妒忌的生物钟。

trans.cn: 入会费：加入某个组织或俱乐部时需要支付的费用。

sentences.c: Within one month after course $500 maximum credit to joining fees.
sentences.cn: 课程完毕后一个月内入会可获自入会费中扣除最高$500。

sentences.c: Even doctors are joining in, preventing patients from paying fees at state hospitals.
sentences.cn: 甚至医生参与，阻止病人付费在国家医院。

sentences.c: All these additional costs elevate the joining fee, monthly dues and pay-to-play greens fees.
sentences.cn: 所有这些额外的费用最终会被反应在高额的会员加盟费、月会费和果岭费等上面。

trans.cn: 知识分享：将知识传递给他人或组织的过程。

sentences.c: Get some training and knowledge sharing cooking!
sentences.cn: 赶紧多做点培训，多进行知识分享吧。

sentences.c: Clearly, a shift towards knowledge sharing culture was achieved.
sentences.cn: 很显然，向分享知识的文化的转变已经达成。

sentences.c: We hope that such knowledge sharing activities can continue in the future.
sentences.cn: 我们希望将来继续开展这种知识分享活动。

trans.cn: 实验报告：一份详细记录实验过程、结果和结论的文档，通常由科学家、工程师或学生撰写。

sentences.c: They can also establish report parameters to reduce data variability between users and laboratories for the same application.
sentences.cn: 他们还可以建立报告参数，以便减少用户和实验室之间的数据差异。

sentences.c: This report provides estimates of the number of laboratories performing cancer tests, as well as test volume and sales forecasts by country.
sentences.cn: 本报告提供全球癌症检验的研究室数量估计及其检验数和销售额预测，并依不同国家分别加以提供。

trans.cn: 大型办公室：一个较大的房间或空间，用于办公或商业活动。

sentences.c: Now, for a customer base, the most obvious example would be a large office building since the employees could theoretically go shopping after work or during their lunch hour, right?
sentences.cn: 那么，对于客户来讲，最明显的例子就是大型办公楼，因为理论上员工可以在下班后或午餐时间去购物，对吧？

sentences.c: NAT is like the receptionist in a large office.
sentences.cn: 面具之后NAT就像一个大办公室里的传达员。

sentences.c: Also as in large office gate switch sides, are equipped with flange is easy to replace them switch.
sentences.cn: 另外如在大的闸阀开关处两边，都设有法兰盘，就是为了拆换开关方便。

trans.cn: 大规模：指范围或程度很大。
放大的，以显示细节的：指为了显示细节而放大的。

sentences.c: Isn't large scale market research safer getting data on a lot of people?
sentences.cn: 进行大规模的市场调查，并从许多人身上获得数据不是更保险吗？

sentences.c: A vertical solar project on such a large scale has never been repeated since.
sentences.cn: 从那以后，再也无人复刻过如此大规模的纵向太阳能项目。

sentences.c: Private firms are willing to make large scale investments to help cure Russia's economic troubles.
sentences.cn: 私有公司愿意进行大规模投资来帮助解决俄罗斯的经济困难。

trans.cn: 领导风格，管理风格 ( 吞 )
领导风格：领导者提供方向、实施计划和激励人们的方法。

sentences.c: What is your leadership style?
sentences.cn: 你作为领导者，会有怎样的风格？

sentences.c: How do you characterize the leadership style?
sentences.cn: 你如何刻划领导层的类型？

sentences.c: If not, maybe you should rethink your leadership style.
sentences.cn: 如果不是，那么你就应该思考一下你的领导方式是否合适。

sentences.c: [My daughter] has got a specific learning difficulty, although she is very bright.
sentences.cn: 虽然我的女儿很聪明，但他还是有着特殊的学习困难。

sentences.c: The prepositional learning difficulty mainly lies in the correct use preposition collocations.
sentences.cn: 介词学习的难点主要在于正确的介词搭配。

sentences.c: In the last part, that how to prevent the mathematical learning difficulty happening has been discussed.
sentences.cn: 第四部分探讨了如何防止数学学业不良的发生。

sentences.c: In the learning zone, he did what Dr.
sentences.cn: 在其学习区，在做到了安德斯·埃里克森博士Dr。

sentences.c: So what does the learning zone look like?
sentences.cn: 那么，学习区是怎样的状态？

sentences.c: They go through life deliberately alternating between two zones: the learning zone and the performance zone.
sentences.cn: 他们在生活中刻意切换于两个区域中：学习区和表现区。

trans.cn: 学习风格：指个体在学习过程中所倾向的方式和方法，包括对信息的接受、处理和记忆的偏好。常见的学习风格包括视觉型、听觉型、动手型等。

sentences.c: Include information that matches your learning style and your needs.
sentences.cn: 包括与你的学习风格和需求相匹配的信息。

sentences.c: Whatever your learning style is, accept it and find out a way that will work with it, whether it is written/audio notes or some other ways.
sentences.cn: 无论你的学习风格是怎样，接受它并找到一种与之相洽的方法，无论是以书面/音频笔记还是其他方式。

sentences.c: Every student has a different blend of intelligence and within that a different learning style and pace.
sentences.cn: 每个学生有一个不同的混合智力类型，其中包含的是不同的学习方式和节奏。

trans.cn: [保险] 人寿保险；（保险公司付给的）[保险] 人寿保险金；（被保险人缴纳的）[保险] 人寿保险费
人寿保险：一种保险类型，指的是在某人去世后向其家人支付一定金额的保险金。

sentences.c: The pension and life assurance schemes.
sentences.cn: 是养老金和人寿保险计划。

sentences.c: Kevin is a salesman for a life assurance company.
sentences.cn: 凯文是一家人寿保险公司的业务员。

sentences.c: "I'm not selling life insurance," Vicino explains. "I'm providing life assurance."
sentences.cn: “我不是在卖人身保险”，维奇诺解释到，“我是在提供人身保险。”

synos.cn: [保险]人寿保险；（保险公司付给的）人寿保险金；（被保险人缴纳的）人寿保险费

trans.cn: 生命周期：指一个生物在经历一系列形态和功能活动阶段后，在特定的主要阶段之间循环重复的过程。

sentences.c: Their life cycle helps man provide himself with a basic food—fish.
sentences.cn: 鱼类的生命周期使其成为一种人类的基本食物。

sentences.c: We can see how the product life cycle works by looking at the introduction of instant coffee.
sentences.cn: 通过观察速溶咖啡的推行，我们可以看到产品生命周期是如何运作的。

sentences.c: For a brief moment during that stage of its life cycle, the tongue consists of two tiny half-tubes before merging into one.
sentences.cn: 在它生命周期的这一阶段，有短暂的一刻，其舌头由两个微小的半管组成，随后融合为一体。

trans.cn: 生活费；生活费用；生活花费
生活费用：指个人或家庭在日常生活中所需的开支，包括食品、住房、交通、医疗、教育等方面的支出。

sentences.c: The downside of living in a city is the high living expense.
sentences.cn: 城市生活的缺点就是生活成本很高。

sentences.c: Who will sponsor you with tuition fee and living expense?
sentences.cn: 谁会赞助你的学费和生活费？

sentences.c: The downside of living in the city is the high living expense.
sentences.cn: 住在城市中的缺点就是很高的生活费用。

trans.cn: 长棍子：一种长度较长的棍子，通常用于支撑或搅拌等活动。

sentences.c: A long stick is needed for each sport.
sentences.cn: 每种运动都需要一根长棍。

sentences.c: The players use two things: one long stick, called a danda and a short egg-shaped bat, called a gilli.
sentences.cn: 玩家使用的装备有两种，一种是长棍，叫做丹达，另一种是卵圆形短棒，叫做吉利。

sentences.c: The boy clubbed the bird's nest with a long stick.
sentences.cn: 那男孩用一根长长的竿子捅鸟窝。

trans.cn: 长桌：一种长条形的桌子，通常用于宴会、会议或其他需要容纳较多人的场合。

sentences.c: As darkness fell outside, they sat down to eat at long tables.
sentences.cn: 当外面黑暗降临时，他们坐在长条桌子旁吃饭。

sentences.c: Where the room was once filled with TV trays and long tables, now only one table is set.
sentences.cn: 那间曾经摆满了高脚电视桌和长桌的屋子里，现在只剩下一张桌子了。

sentences.c: Historically, the kulich were carried to church and set out on long tables to be blessed by a priest.
sentences.cn: 在过去，人们会将kulich送至教堂，并放在一张长桌上，让一位牧师祝圣。

trans.cn: 观景点：指位于高处或特定位置，供人观赏周围景色的地点。

sentences.c: People crowded Lookout Point in Corona del Mar on Friday morning, looking for any sign of a tsunami.
sentences.cn: 周五上午，科罗纳·代尔·马尔瞭望台挤满了人，关注着任何海啸即将到来的预警。

sentences.c: Norwegian firm LJB Arkitektur has constructed a floating concrete path and accompanying wooden bench for a lookout point at Vedahaugane, Norway.
sentences.cn: 来自挪威的LJB建筑事务所最近在挪威建造了一个拥有漂浮的混凝土步道和与之配套的木质座椅的观景点项目。

sentences.c: Danielle and I went for a hike all the way up Eagle Mountain to the lookout point. The view was awesome and we had a little picnic when we got to the top.
sentences.cn: 丹妮尔和我一路爬到鹰山缭望台那里欣赏美丽风光，还在山顶小小野餐了一下。

trans.cn: 失踪的孩子；走失的儿童
走失的孩子：指在公共场所、旅行途中等地方与家长或监护人失散的孩子。

sentences.c: "O Wendy," cried Tootles, "was one of the lost children called Tootles?"
sentences.cn: “哦，温迪，”图图喊道，“丢失的孩子里是不是有一个叫图图的？”

sentences.c: The lost children had not been found.
sentences.cn: 走失的孩子还没有找到。

sentences.c: "They flew away," Wendy continued, "to the Neverland, where the lost children are."
sentences.cn: “他们飞走了，”温迪接着说，“飞到永无乡去了，丢失的孩子们就在那儿。”

trans.cn: 低冲击力：指不涉及一件事物或人用大力撞击另一件事物或人，例如跑步或跳跃时不涉及脚着地。

sentences.c: Ecotourism is commonly regarded as low impact travel to undisturbed places.
sentences.cn: 生态旅游通常被认为是到不受干扰的地方的影响比较低的旅行。

sentences.c: Activities there range from whale watching to hiking and accommodations aim to have a low impact on the natural environment.
sentences.cn: 那里提供的活动包括赏鲸、远足，并且住宿旨在减少对自然环境的影响。

sentences.c: They put it in a pretty low impact paper.
sentences.cn: 他们把它发表在一个影响力很低的杂志上。

trans.cn: 低风险投资：指投资风险较低的投资方式，通常具有较低的波动性和较稳定的回报。这类投资往往包括国债、定期存款、货币市场基金等。

sentences.c: Low stock investment position is that the fund can be used to circumvent the key market risk.
sentences.cn: 低股票投资的立场是，该基金可用于规避市场风险的关键。

sentences.c: On the condition that the stock market index has dropped for a long time, convertible bonds become the new investment instrument by the institution because of the low risk.
sentences.cn: 在近几年股票市场长期调整的状况下，可转换债券以其低风险的特性逐步获得了市场机构投资者的认同。

sentences.c: Paper abstract: risk investment has high risk, high yield, high investment, low liquidity, high technical basic characteristics.
sentences.cn: 论文提要：风险投资具有高风险、高收益、高投入、低流动性、高技术性的基本特征。

sentences.c: It is known to all that all the hamburgers are junk food containing high calorie and high fat while low nutrition.
sentences.cn: 众所周知，汉堡包是垃圾食品，含有高热量，高脂肪，低营养。

sentences.c: Three theories were put forward by some researcher. 1 low nutrition and low calcium 2 free radical 3 magnesium theory.
sentences.cn: 最近有学者指出地氟病的发病机制主要有以下三方面学说：1低营养低钙学说，2自由基学说，3镁学说。

sentences.c: Besides the low nutrition value and lack of fibres from green vegetables, vast amounts of fat, particularly trans fat, starts alarming the public.
sentences.cn: 除了低营养价值和缺乏纤维从绿色蔬菜，大量的脂肪，尤其是反式脂肪，开始令人担忧的公众。

trans.cn: 形容词短语—男性的和女性的
男性和女性：指代男性和女性两个性别。

sentences.c: For about six or seven weeks after conception, there is no differentiation between male and female.
sentences.cn: 在受精后大约六七个星期时，男性和女性胚胎之间没有什么差别。

sentences.c: Somehow the old male and female stereotypes no longer fit.
sentences.cn: 不知何故，过去对男性和女性的刻板印象不再相符。

sentences.c: There is, however, a definite structural variation between the male and female brain.
sentences.cn: 然而，男性和女性的大脑确实存在结构上的差异。

trans.cn: 主会场：指一个建筑物或场所中的主要大厅或大堂，通常用于举办重要活动、会议或演出等。

sentences.c: A dark narrow passage led to the main hall.
sentences.cn: 一条阴暗狭窄的走廊通向大厅。

sentences.c: Is this the main hall?
sentences.cn: 这里是大厅吗？

sentences.c: All the students were asked to assemble in the main hall.
sentences.cn: 全体学生获通知到大礼堂集合。

trans.cn: 智力能力：指人类的智力水平和能力，包括思考、记忆、推理、判断等方面。

sentences.c: KNOW that you have the mental ability to do well.
sentences.cn: 你要明白你有能力去做好。

sentences.c: But teens have the mental ability to be self-aware.
sentences.cn: 但青少年有自我意识的心智能力。

sentences.c: The next day he gave them mental ability or 'cognitive' tests.
sentences.cn: 第二天，再让他们做脑力或“认知”测试。

synos.cn: 心智能力；智能；心理能力

trans.cn: 现代语言（尤指在学校里教授的欧洲语言）
现代语言：一种活着的或最近灭绝的人类语言。

sentences.c: He got a first in Modern Language.
sentences.cn: 他在近代语言一科中获得第一名。

sentences.c: In fact, it's hard to find a modern language that doesn't support the Sockets API.
sentences.cn: 事实上，很难找到一种不支持Sockets API的现代语言。

sentences.c: The Modern language Association has been tracking language enrollment for half a century.
sentences.cn: 现代语言协会对于语言类专业研究人数的调查进行了半个世纪。

trans.cn: 资金管理：组织和投资自己或他人的资金的活动。

sentences.c: Money management 35%
sentences.cn: 理财35%

sentences.c: This requires careful money management skills.
sentences.cn: 这就要求你必须有高超的理财技能。

sentences.c: So, start giving him some basic money management lessons.
sentences.cn: 所以，开始教他一些基本的理财课程吧。

trans.cn: 负面影响：指对某事物或某人产生不利或不良的结果或影响。

sentences.c: The crisis had a negative effect on trade.
sentences.cn: 这次危机对贸易产生了很坏的影响。

sentences.c: "Over-praising can have a negative effect," says Phillip.
sentences.cn: “过度表扬会产生负面影响。”菲利普说。

sentences.c: How can eating meat have a negative effect on the environment?
sentences.cn: 吃肉怎么会对环境产生负面影响呢？

trans.cn: 消极思维：消极思维是指对事物持悲观、负面的看法和态度。

sentences.c: Call it the power of negative thinking.
sentences.cn: 这就是消极思维的力量。

sentences.c: But I caught my negative thinking.
sentences.cn: 但是我想到这是个消极的想法。

sentences.c: Just as negative thinking can be learned, so can positive thinking.
sentences.cn: 正如消极思维是可以后来学来的，积极的想法也可以。

trans.cn: 夜间的旅游项目，夜间的旅游线路 ( 吞 )
夜间游览：在晚上进行的观光活动，通常包括参观城市景点、欣赏夜景等。

sentences.c: Traveler: DO you have any night tour?
sentences.cn: 游客：有夜晚观光游吗？

sentences.c: Traveler: : I'd prefer the night tour.
sentences.cn: 游客：夜景观光感觉更好。

sentences.c: That's good. But can you arrange night tour?
sentences.cn: 那好。但你们能安排夜间游览吗？

trans.cn: 夜班(时间)；〈集合词〉夜班工人
夜班：在夜间工作的一段时间，例如从晚上11点到早上7点。
夜班工作人员：在夜班工作的一组人员。

sentences.c: The workers in this workshop do day and night shifts in weekly rotation.
sentences.cn: 这个车间的工人上白班和上夜班每周轮换一次。

sentences.c: I took night shifts so I had plenty of time to study in the daytime.
sentences.cn: 而且我上的是晚班，这样一来我白天就有充裕的时间来学习。

sentences.c: Working as a journalist at ITN meant regular two-week spells of night shifts.
sentences.cn: 在ITN当记者意味着有规律的为期两周的夜班轮换。

trans.cn: 护理照顾：提供给需要特殊护理的人的医疗服务，包括监测健康状况、提供药物、协助日常活动等。

sentences.c: As nurses, we are licensed to provide nursing care only.
sentences.cn: 作为护士，我们只有获准提供护理服务的执照。

sentences.c: The quality of nursing care is being affected dramatically by these situations.
sentences.cn: 护理质量正受到这些情况的显著影响。

sentences.c: Nursing care homes already are full. Who would be willing to accept former convicts?
sentences.cn: 护理养老院已经人满为患了，谁愿意接受有前科的人呢？

sentences.c: The situation of swing for ocean condition is emphatically analyzed and calculated. Analysis of the acquired results is carried out.
sentences.cn: 对于海洋条件，主要是针对左右摇摆的情况进行了计算，并对结果作了简单的分析。

sentences.c: The rolling motion is chosen as the ocean condition in this experimental study, we study on Natural Circulation subcooling vapor bubble departure in vertical channel.
sentences.cn: 本文取摇摆为海洋影响条件，研究摇摆对竖直管自然循环过冷沸腾气泡脱离点的影响。

sentences.c: An intelligent model for a ship's horizontal motion, which can self-adapt with navigating speed, ocean condition and course, was established based on the Radial Basis Function (RBF) neural network.
sentences.cn: 以某水面舰艇为研究对象，利用径向基函数神经网络算法和标况下的水池实验数据，建立了基于航速、航向角和海情自适应变化的船舶横向运动非线性参数模型。

trans.cn: 海洋洋流，指海洋中由于风、地球自转、水温、盐度等因素引起的水流运动

sentences.c: Other scientists have proposed to use the network for tracking ocean currents and measuring changes in ocean and global temperatures.
sentences.cn: 其他科学家已经提议，要利用这个网络体系来追踪洋流，测量海洋和全球温度的变化。

sentences.c: There are several hypotheses, including warming or cooling of Earth, changes in seasonal fluctuations or ocean currents, and changing positions of the continents.
sentences.cn: 有几种假说，包括地球变暖或变冷，季节波动或洋流的变化，以及大陆位置的变化。

sentences.c: And there might be drastic changes in the climate of some regions as ocean currents shift.
sentences.cn: 随着洋流的变动，一些地区的气候将会产生急剧的变化。

trans.cn: 旧衣服：指已经使用过一段时间的衣物，通常不再适合正式场合穿着。

trans.cn: 网上购物：消费者使用网页浏览器或移动应用程序在互联网上直接从卖家购买自己需要的商品或服务。

sentences.c: Nine years after the defining moment of the 21st century, a stunning set of photographs taken by New York Police helicopters forces us to look afresh at a catastrophe we assumed we knew so well.

trans.cn: 回收材料：指通过对废弃物或废旧物品进行加工处理，使其重新成为可用的原材料。

sentences.c: Making lovely objects using recycled materials.
sentences.cn: 用可回收的材料制作可爱的物品。

sentences.c: Although they used mostly recycled materials, the tiny bedroom was truly wonderful.
sentences.cn: 他们使用的大多是回收材料，但这间小小的卧室确实很棒。

sentences.c: Buying products made from recycled materials closes the loop.
sentences.cn: 购买那些由可循环的材料做成的商品就达到了这个目的。

trans.cn: 红细胞：含有血红蛋白的细胞，负责将氧气输送到组织中。

sentences.c: Red blood cells are roughly the shape of a disk.
sentences.cn: 红细胞大致呈圆盘状。

sentences.c: Isabelle's body is unable to produce healthy red blood cells.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔体内无法产生健康的红细胞。

sentences.c: After a pint of blood is collected, it is processed into its transfusible components: plasma, platelets and red blood cells.
sentences.cn: 采集一品脱血液后，将其加工成可输血的成分：血浆、血小板和红细胞。

trans.cn: 红旗(保险公司名)  ( 吞 )
红旗：特别是与左翼革命意识形态有关的红旗。在非正式场合，“red flag”也可以表示提示、警告或警报；表示某事物出了问题的标志或信号。

sentences.c: The abnormal bleeding is your body's own red flag of danger.
sentences.cn: 这反常的流血是你身体本身的危险信号。

sentences.c: Then the rain came and the red flag went up to signal a halt.
sentences.cn: 当时，雨下了起来，红旗被升起，发出停止的信号。

sentences.c: Every year thousands of students visit the Red Flag Canal Museum.
sentences.cn: 每年成千上万的学生参观红旗渠博物馆。

synos.cn: 红旗；危险信号；惹人生气的事物

trans.cn: 玫瑰花园：专门种植玫瑰花的花园。

sentences.c: Then came those magic moments in the rose garden.
sentences.cn: 接着就是玫瑰园里的魔力时刻。

sentences.c: I planted a rose garden.
sentences.cn: 我种了一个玫瑰园。

sentences.c: A rose garden fronts the house.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰园位于房子的前面。

trans.cn: 圆桌：指亚瑟王和他的骑士们所围坐的大圆桌。
圆桌会议：指由多个参与者进行讨论或研究的会议；也指参与者本身。

sentences.c: The sweetest memory of my childhood is about a round table.
sentences.cn: 我童年最温馨的记忆是关于一张圆桌。

sentences.c: The round table has been a symbol of the Chinese feelings. It was, it is and will always be.
sentences.cn: 圆桌一直是中国人情感的象征。过去是，现在是，将来也永远会是。

sentences.c: The history of our nation has been the stories of looking for or running to the round table which we belong to.
sentences.cn: 我们国家的历史就是寻找或奔向我们所属的圆桌的故事。

trans.cn: 销售经理：负责管理销售团队，监督销售活动，并确保销售目标的实现。

sentences.c: We are currently advertising for a new sales manager.
sentences.cn: 目前我们公开征聘一位新的销售经理。

sentences.c: Her promotion to Sales Manager took everyone by surprise.
sentences.cn: 竟然提拔她当销售经理，叫每个人都感到意外。

sentences.c: She is divisional sales manager for the Philadelphia region.
sentences.cn: 她是费城地区的部门销售经理。

trans.cn: 座位预订：在旅行、演出、电影院等场所提前预订座位的行为。
中学：介于小学和大学之间的学校，通常提供普通、技术、职业或大学预备课程。

sentences.c: I went to a secondary school in South Town.
sentences.cn: 我去了南镇的一所中学上学。

sentences.c: She taught history at a secondary school.
sentences.cn: 她在一所中学教过历史。

sentences.c: Children usually transfer to secondary school at 11 or 12.
sentences.cn: 儿童通常在11或12岁时升读中学。

trans.cn: 安全官：通常指在公司、机构、政府等单位中负责保护安全的人员。

sentences.c: He flashed his pass at the security officer.
sentences.cn: 他向保安员亮了一下通行证。

sentences.c: It's standard practice for a company like this one to employ a security officer.
sentences.cn: 像这样的公司雇用一名保安是惯例。

sentences.c: It's a standard practice for a company like this one to employ a security officer.
sentences.cn: 像这样的一家公司，雇佣安保人员是一种标准做法。

sentences.c: I've known about the Schneider Culture Model for some time, Michael Spayd had introduced it to me when I had a private seminar series with a coaching group that I was a part of.
sentences.cn: 我已经了解了Schneider文化模型，是Michael Spayd把它介绍给我的，当时我在参加一个教练小组的非公开系列课程，我也是小组成员之一。

sentences.c: Literary seminar is the earliest literary society in the history of New Chinese literary. It is a group of writers who advocate and support the Logan "art for the sake of life".
sentences.cn: 文学研究会是中国新文学史上最早出现的文学社团，它是以“为人生而艺术”的口号凝聚起来的作家群体。

sentences.c: In order to assess candidates' team work ability, Apple Retail interview at the Specialist level will be arranged in the form of a group discussion seminar.
sentences.cn: 为了评估候选人的团队合作性，Apple Retail的Specialist面试将用小组讨论会的形式举行。

trans.cn: 研讨会室：用于举办研讨会、培训或学术讲座的房间或空间。

sentences.c: Finally, there would be a seminar room with closed circuit television.
sentences.cn: 最后，还有一个带闭路电视的会议室。

sentences.c: Ways of reading on a train or in bed are likely to differ considerably from reading in a seminar room.
sentences.cn: 在火车上或床上的阅读方式可能与在研讨室里的阅读方式有很大的不同。

sentences.c: Our first goal was an event to raise awareness of the moon and its importance to society. We couldn’t get a seminar room on such short notice, so we used the student union cafeteria.
sentences.cn: 我们的首要目标是举行一次公开活动以提高人们对月亮的认识以及月亮对整个社会的重要性。

synos.cn: 会议室；专题教室；研讨室

trans.cn: 高级管理层：公司或组织中最高级别的管理人员，作为一个群体来考虑。

sentences.c: I have ten years' experience at senior management level.
sentences.cn: 我有十年的高层管理经验。

sentences.c: Following the plant shutdown, New Hampshire Yankee realigned senior management at the plant.
sentences.cn: 在该工厂关闭之后，新罕布什尔州扬基公司对该厂高级管理班子进行了重组。

sentences.c: In her current role she broke through the glass ceiling as the first woman to reach senior management level in the company.
sentences.cn: 在她目前的职位上，她突破了那道升迁的无形障碍，成为公司里第一位升至高级管理层的女性。

trans.cn: 高级顾问：指在某个领域或组织中拥有高级别职位的顾问，通常具有丰富的经验和专业知识，为决策者提供意见和建议。

sentences.c: The news was carried the day after a preparatory team led by his senior advisor Ali Korum ended a 4-day visit to the Iraqi capital Baghdad.
sentences.cn: 在他的高级顾问阿里·柯鲁姆领导的预备队结束了对伊拉克首都巴格达为期4天的访问后，这一消息被公布。

sentences.c: "We see the potential for capture and storage to play an integral role in reducing emissions," says Kim Corley, Shell's senior advisor of CO2 and environmental affairs.
sentences.cn: “我们看到捕获和储存二氧化碳在减少排放方面发挥整体作用的潜力。”壳牌二氧化碳和环境事务高级顾问 Kim Corley 说。

sentences.c: He is currently a Senior Advisor at Terra Firma, as well as a Non-Executive Director of DTZ Plc.
sentences.cn: 他目前的高级顾问在陆地，以及非执行董事戴德梁行公司。

trans.cn: 服务经理：负责管理和协调服务团队，确保客户满意度和服务质量。

sentences.c: Listen to a conversation between a student and a food service manager.
sentences.cn: 听一段学生和食品服务经理之间的对话。

sentences.c: Now try starting the VVM service via service manager.
sentences.cn: 现在通过服务管理器启动VVM服务。

sentences.c: When SOAP server receives the message, it hands it over to service manager.
sentences.cn: 当SOAP服务器收到消息时，将消息交给服务管理器。

trans.cn: 动词短语 和他人分享、交流自己的想法
分享想法：与他人交流自己的想法或观点，以便获得反馈或启发。

sentences.c: Many view these meetings as an occasion to share ideas and refresh friendship.
sentences.cn: 很多人把这些聚会看作是交流思想、重叙友情的机会。

sentences.c: Its goals were to educate, share ideas and present Indiana's best products.
sentences.cn: 它旨在教育、交流思想以及展示印第安纳州最好的产品。

sentences.c: A formal community to share ideas and concerns.
sentences.cn: 分享想法和关注内容的正式社区。

trans.cn: 短讲：一种时间较短的演讲或讲座，通常持续时间在30分钟到1小时之间。

sentences.c: The professor has covered a lot of ground in his short lecture.
sentences.cn: 教授在短短的一课内涵盖很多领域。

sentences.c: Much of the material in the book grows out of talks and short lecture series given by the authors in the past several years.
sentences.cn: 在书里的大部分材料由在过去的几年中那些作者给的交谈和短的系列演讲产生。

sentences.c: This dinner would be followed by a very short lecture or movie about the merits of work, preferably by someone who actually works and has done well in life by working.
sentences.cn: 饭后要听一个简短演讲或看一段劳动光荣的电影，最好演讲者或电影主角是生活中的优秀劳动者。

trans.cn: 睡袋：一种为户外露营或帐篷中睡眠而设计的袋子，内部有保暖材料或填充物。

sentences.c: This sleeping bag is very warm.
sentences.cn: 这条睡袋很暖和。

sentences.c: I was woken up by someone grabbing hold of my sleeping bag.
sentences.cn: 有人抓住我的睡袋把我弄醒了。

sentences.c: It can be turned into a sleeping bag for homeless people.
sentences.cn: 它可以变成一个睡袋给无家可归的人。

trans.cn: 睡眠病：一种严重的疾病，主要流行于非洲热带地区，其症状包括发热、头痛、嗜睡、混乱和睡眠障碍，由两种锥虫（Trypanosoma brucei gambiense和T. b. rhodesiense）通过茅蝇传播引起。

sentences.c: Trypanosoma brucei is the hemoflagellate that causes sleeping sickness.
sentences.cn: 布氏锥虫是一种造成嗜睡症的血鞭毛虫。

sentences.c: Q: What is sleeping sickness?
sentences.cn: 问：什么是昏睡病？

sentences.c: What is sleeping sickness?
sentences.cn: 什么是昏睡病？

trans.cn: 安眠药：一种用于帮助人们入睡的药物，通常被用于治疗失眠或其他睡眠障碍。

sentences.c: She's been taking sleeping pills.
sentences.cn: 她一直在服用安眠药。

sentences.c: She laced his food with sleeping pills.
sentences.cn: 她在他的食物里加了安眠药。

sentences.c: She took a massive overdose of sleeping pills.
sentences.cn: 她服用了过量的安眠药。

trans.cn: 幻灯片演示：一种通过幻灯片展示信息的演示方式，通常用于商业、教育和培训等场合。

sentences.c: He pulls up a slide presentation, the crowd lets out a huge groan, and the battle is lost.
sentences.cn: 他开始一个用幻灯片的演讲后，群众发出了大声的咕哝声，但是舌战渐渐消失。

sentences.c: You can find a "how to use" guide here and a slide presentation overview of Scala.Net project here.
sentences.cn: 你可以在这里找到一份“使用指南”和有关Scala.Net项目的幻灯片。

sentences.c: Less than four slides into my 32-slide presentation, the second investor interrupted me and said, "OK." Stop.
sentences.cn: 32页的幻灯片我还没放到四页，第二位投资者打断问我：“好的，停下来。”

trans.cn: 侧门：位于建筑物侧面的门，通常用作进出侧院、后院或侧面通道的入口。

sentences.c: A side gate led into the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 一道边门通往教堂墓地。

sentences.c: The side gate opens onto a small lane.
sentences.cn: 这扇侧门通向一条小巷。

sentences.c: Rectangle-shape side gate and the gear-rack taking off thread mechanism were used.
sentences.cn: 采用矩形侧浇口、齿轮齿条脱螺纹机构。

trans.cn: 道路通畅，平坦的路：指路面平整，没有凹凸不平的地方，行驶起来舒适顺畅。

sentences.c: He stumbled on a smooth road.
sentences.cn: 他走在坦路上摔了一跤。

sentences.c: Love is a sweet pain, and true love never goes a smooth road. — Shakespeare.
sentences.cn: 爱是一种甜蜜的痛苦，真诚的爱情永不是走一条平坦的道路的。镢——莎士比亚。

sentences.c: But you enjoy the smooth road afterwards, so don't stay on the humps too long.
sentences.cn: 但随之而来的，是更平坦的道路，所以请别待在路拱上太久！

trans.cn: (汽油等的) 标准等级 ( 吞 )

sentences.c: The main difference between the two is that the standard grade contains more inorganic ash than the premium grade.
sentences.cn: 在这两个等级之间的主要差别是与高级的等级相比较，标准等级包含更多的无机灰。

sentences.c: The British Standard grade 460 bars, which when quenched with left heat after rolling, are naturally aged for different times.
sentences.cn: 对采用轧后余热处理工艺生产的英标460级钢筋进行不同时间的自然时效后测定其力学性能。

sentences.c: The main body besides the Renmin South Road shall be developed into international standard Grade A office building, and CBD headquarters base;
sentences.cn: 其中位于人民南路一侧的主楼将开发为国际标准甲级写字楼、CBD总部基地；

trans.cn: 标准教学：指按照一定的教学标准和规范进行的教学活动。

sentences.c: Standard teaching facilitates learning.
sentences.cn: 标准化教学有利于学习。

sentences.c: Moreover, most of the standard teaching materials in the field deal primarily with the federal system.
sentences.cn: 另外，多数行政法领域的标准教材都主要涉及联邦制度。

sentences.c: The teaching experiment showed the experience group was better than the contrast group in terms of skill evaluation, standard teaching tests and theoretical tests.
sentences.cn: 结果表明，无论技术评定、达标测验，还是理论考核，实验组都明显优于对照组，教学效果显示出了显著性差异。

sentences.c: An extraordinarily important study skill is knowing how to mark a book.
sentences.cn: 知道如何在书上做标记是一个非常重要的学习技巧。

sentences.c: There isn't one study skill or learning strategy that works for very person in very situation.
sentences.cn: 学习方法是针对个人而言的，没有一种学习技能或者学习方法对任何人都适用。

sentences.c: This is why good reading habits are not only an important study skill for the student, but also and important life skill for anyone.
sentences.cn: 这就是为什么良好的阅读习惯不仅是学生的重要学习技能，而且也是每个人的重要生活技能。

trans.cn: 土壤改良剂，土壤调理剂
土壤改良剂：一种化学物质（如石膏），用于改善土壤的结构，增加其孔隙度和易碎性。

sentences.c: The increasing use of dried animal waste as a substitute fuel has also hurt the soil because this valuable soil conditioner and source of plant nutrients is no longer being returned to the land.
sentences.cn: 人们开始越来越多地使用脱水后的动物粪便作为替代燃料，这同样会损害土壤，因为这些珍贵的土壤改良剂和植物养分的来源将无法再回归到土壤之中。

sentences.c: The nutrient value of the sludge is beneficial to vegetation, and its granular nature may serve as a soil conditioner.
sentences.cn: 污泥的营养成分有利于植物成长，而其颗粒特性可用于土地改良。

sentences.c: The effect of the soil conditioner MDM on ameliorating the meadow alkali soil was investigated by pot culture and field experiment.
sentences.cn: 通过盆栽及田间小区试验，研究了改良剂MDM对松嫩平原草甸碱土的改良效果。

synos.cn: [土壤]土壤调理剂；土壤改良剂

trans.cn: 太阳能：从太阳发射出的电磁辐射形式的能量，特别是人类将这部分能量转化为可用的热能或电能的能量。

sentences.c: Without sunshine, here is no solar energy.
sentences.cn: 没有阳光就没有太阳能。

sentences.c: The field of solar energy is developing fast.
sentences.cn: 太阳能领域正在迅速发展。

sentences.c: It produces more electricity from falling rain than solar energy.
sentences.cn: 它从降雨中产生的电能比从太阳能中的还多。

trans.cn: 音效：在广播、电视节目或电影中，除了语音或音乐之外添加的声音，使其更加刺激或真实。

sentences.c: Added new Rain sound effect.
sentences.cn: 增加了新的雨音效果。

sentences.c: Arrows hitting trees now have a sound effect!
sentences.cn: (音)箭打在树上有一个良好的效果！

sentences.c: Now, a solution to this “sound effect” may be in sight.
sentences.cn: 现在，这种“声音影响”的解决办法可能已在眼前。

trans.cn: 音质：指音频设备输出的声音的质量，包括音调、音色、音量、失真等方面。

sentences.c: The sound quality of the tapes was excellent.
sentences.cn: 磁带的音响效果极佳。

sentences.c: Cassette recorders cannot rival the sound quality of CDs.
sentences.cn: 盒式磁带录音机在音质上无法与CD相媲美。

sentences.c: Tape is expensive and loses sound quality every time it is copied.
sentences.cn: 磁带很贵，而且每被复制一次，音质就会有所降低。

trans.cn: 夏季学校：在夏季举办的学校或学期，让学生加快进度以获得文凭或学位，弥补因缺席或失败而失去的学分，或者完善职业教育。

sentences.c: I'm studying French at a summer school.
sentences.cn: 我在一所暑期学校学法语。

sentences.c: We were in the same summer school and now she thinks we're best friends.
sentences.cn: 我们在同一个暑期学校，现在她认为我们是最好的朋友。

sentences.c: Many traditional summer school programs offered physical education, breakfast, and lunch.
sentences.cn: 许多传统的暑期学校项目提供体育课、早餐和午餐。

trans.cn: 总结报告：一份提供概要信息和重要数据的报告，通常用于汇总和总结某个项目、活动或事件的主要结果和要点。

sentences.c: I made a summary report for the records.
sentences.cn: 我对记录内容做了简要报告。

sentences.c: Pc_summary produces a coverage summary report.
sentences.cn: pc _ summary生成一种覆盖率总结报告。

sentences.c: Figure 1: Coverage summary report produced by pc_summary.
sentences.cn: 图1：pc总结产生的覆盖率总结报告。

sentences.c: In one corner (project management), there are the project managers, who must supervise the work efforts of their development teams to meet their release deadlines.
sentences.cn: 一方面（项目管理），会有项目管理者们监控着他们开发小组的工作成果，看何时能够达到他们发布最终期限的目标。

sentences.c: May supervise the work of ICT quality assurance teams.
sentences.cn: 可能还负责监督信息和通信技术质量保证团队的工作。

sentences.c: Project teams supervise the installation and set-up of the whole systems, provide training and maintenance services of your systems.
sentences.cn: 训练有素的项目团队为客户规划、设计、建造整个系统，安装调试工艺设备，并提供培训和维护服务。

trans.cn: 外卖：指在餐馆或快餐店购买的准备好的餐食或其他食物，意图在其他地方食用。

sentences.c: I'll take away these teacups.
sentences.cn: 我会把这些茶杯拿走。

sentences.c: Would you please take away your books?
sentences.cn: 请你把你的书拿走好吗？

sentences.c: We'll take away the lantern.
sentences.cn: 我们会拿走灯笼。

trans.cn: 磁带录音机：一种用于录音和播放磁带的设备。

sentences.c: He was wired up to a police tape recorder.
sentences.cn: 他被连接到了警方的录音机上。

sentences.c: The guards permitted me to bring my camera and tape recorder.
sentences.cn: 守卫允许我带上相机和录音机。

sentences.c: Who invented the tape recorder?
sentences.cn: 录音机是谁发明的？

trans.cn: 教学经验：指一个人在教育领域中所积累的教学经历和知识。

sentences.c: Previous teaching experience is a necessary qualification for this job.
sentences.cn: 教学经验是担任这项工作的必备条件。

sentences.c: Mrs Smith, who has a lot of teaching experience at junior level, will be joining the school in September.
sentences.cn: 史密斯太太将在九月份加盟这所学校，她在初级教育方面颇有经验。

sentences.c: She is a teacher who has much teaching experience.
sentences.cn: 她是一位有丰富教学经验的教师。

trans.cn: 教职员工：指教育机构中的教学人员，包括基础教育和高等教育机构的教师。

sentences.c: We have a special Valentine's Day message dedicated from the teaching staff to the students.
sentences.cn: 我们有一份特别的情人节祝辞，是教职工献给学生的。

sentences.c: You will find that the teaching staff take an informal, although disciplined, approach.
sentences.cn: 大家将发现老师会以一种友好轻松而又严谨的方式来教学。

sentences.c: The teaching staff includes internationally known manga researchers and active authors and editors.
sentences.cn: 精华大学漫画系的师资包括国际知名漫画研究员和圈内活跃的漫画作者及编辑。

trans.cn: 团队领导：在一个团队或项目中负责管理和指导其他成员的人。

sentences.c: People want team leaders they can trust.
sentences.cn: 人们想要他们可以信任的小组领导者。

sentences.c: Some were team leaders.
sentences.cn: 其中的一些人是团队领导。

sentences.c: One of my favorite team leaders, Ann, came to talk to me last week.
sentences.cn: 上周，我最为器重的团队领导人之一，Ann，和我进行了一次谈话。

trans.cn: 电话面试：一种通过电话进行的面试方式，通常用于初步筛选候选人或跨地区面试。

sentences.c: "It's our record," Carter insisted in a recent telephone interview.
sentences.cn: “这是我们的记录，”Carter在最近的一个电话采访中强调。

sentences.c: "What we were surprised at was the variation," he said in a telephone interview.
sentences.cn: 他在接受一个电话采访时说：“让我们感到惊讶的是变异。”

sentences.c: 'No one's going to die for the lack of bear bile,' she said in a telephone interview.
sentences.cn: 她在接受电话采访时说，没有人会因为缺乏熊胆而死。

sentences.c: The official unemployment rate is the product of a telephone survey of about 60000 homes.
sentences.cn: 官方的失业率是对大约60000个家庭进行电话调查得出的结果。

sentences.c: The telephone survey was conducted from Friday through Sunday and received 872 valid responses .
sentences.cn: 这项电话民意调查从上周五持续至上周日，共收到了872个有效回复。

sentences.c: First, here's a little bit of info about the more than 3, 000 people who responded to the telephone survey.
sentences.cn: 首先这是关于接受电话调查的这3000多人的一点信息。

trans.cn: 文本结构：指文本的组织和布局方式，包括段落、标题、标点符号等元素的使用，以及文本的逻辑顺序和组织结构。

sentences.c: English Reading; Text Structure Model; Teaching Mode; Construct; Significance.
sentences.cn: 英语阅读；篇章结构模式；教学模式；构建；意义。

sentences.c: The effects of text structure and time stress on web reading performance were examined.
sentences.cn: 探讨了文本结构和时间应激对网页阅读绩效的影响效应。

sentences.c: This research studied the transfer of problem-solving effected by text structure factor.
sentences.cn: 探讨阅读过程中文章结构因素对问题解决迁移效果的影响。

trans.cn: 教材补贴：为学生购买教材提供的一种经济补助。

sentences.c: First, take out your textbook, go over the lesson you have today in the school, then do some exercise or recite a poem.
sentences.cn: 首先，把你的课本拿出来，复习你今天在学校里上过的课程。然后做一些练习，或者背一首诗。

sentences.c: Use the model to assess a short lesson, workshop, or textbook chapter.
sentences.cn: 如使用模型评价一小节课，一段讨论或教材的一章。

sentences.c: While in a Potions lesson, Harry takes possession of a strangely annotated school textbook, inscribed 'This is the property of the Half-Blood Prince', which contains astonishing information.
sentences.cn: 在魔药课上，哈利得到了一本写满了奇怪注解的课本，课本上写着“本书属于混血王子”，里面包含着令人惊讶的信息。

sentences.c: There’s more theory here than you normally find in Python textbooks, but I found the examples intriguing and he has unusual exercises at the end of the chapters that should keep you thinking.
sentences.cn: 它有比着一般常见的Python书籍更多的理论介绍，但是我发现该书有很多有意思的实例并在章节的后面有很多精心设计的练习题目可以使你不断的思考。

sentences.c: I shall be pleased to see that you verify my theory with yours but I care not the result. The logic of the book is not demonstrated among the chapters.
sentences.cn: 本书旨在为迷徒们构建自己的思想体系提供一种视角，仅为参考，仅为借鉴，很高兴大家拿吾之思想与自己相印证，但吾并不关心印证之结果 本书其逻辑不体现于章节之间。

sentences.c: Through the above content the evidence is offered to the theory which sustains the forward chapters.
sentences.cn: 通过以上内容对前述章节提供的理论支持加以佐证。

trans.cn: 玩具工厂：专门生产玩具的工厂。

sentences.c: There were only two ways for me to do this — working in the toy factory in my town, or getting married.
sentences.cn: 要做到这一点，我只有两个办法：在我家乡的玩具厂工作，或者结婚。

sentences.c: But he has a job in a toy factory.
sentences.cn: 可是他不是在玩具厂有一份工作吗？

sentences.c: Workers at a toy factory in Guangzhou.
sentences.cn: 广州一家玩具厂的工人。

trans.cn: 行业期刊或行业杂志：专门为特定行业或行业群体提供信息和新闻的出版物。

sentences.c: Read trade journals for themes and topics that are of particular interest to studios.
sentences.cn: 阅读有关电影制片厂特别感兴趣的主题或题目的行业期刊。

sentences.c: You do this by reading trade journals, attending conferences, and talking to key people in your industry.
sentences.cn: 通过阅读商务杂志，参加会议，与行业中的关键人物保持沟通会使你了解这些问题。

sentences.c: Submit articles related to your business to the local paper, trade journals and professional organization's newsletters.
sentences.cn: 常写一些与你业务有关联的文章，给当地的报纸、商业杂志以及相关专业机构的简讯部门。

sentences.c: While the younger generations prefer to communicate visually, for those used to working with traditional tools like email, it may feel like a learning curve.
sentences.cn: 虽然年轻一代更喜欢视觉上的交流，但是对于那些习惯于使用电子邮件等传统工具的人来说，这就像是一个学习曲线的过程。

sentences.c: We realized that at scale, the traditional tools for storing and processing information fall down.
sentences.cn: 我们认识到在高伸缩的条件下，传统的存储和信息处理工具力不从心。

sentences.c: In fact, they operate in an unknowable [2] future and traditional tools to capture their dynamics do not apply.
sentences.cn: 事实上，它们发生在不可知的[2]未来，传统用来捕获它们动态特点的工具不起作用。

trans.cn: 传统风格；传统样式；传统式培训

sentences.c: I would put you in the later category, with the individual, anti-traditional style of your writing.
sentences.cn: 我把你归入后一类，你的写作风格是独特的、反传统的。

sentences.c: "The Incredibles", a cartoon in traditional style, was one of the most successful movies in history.
sentences.cn: 一部传统手法的卡通片《超人总动员(The Incredibles)》成为历史上最成功的影片。

sentences.c: LM: I would put you in the later category, with the individual, anti-traditional style of your writing.
sentences.cn: 在LM：我会把你放在后一类，因为你作品中的个人的，反传统的风格。

trans.cn: 海底世界：指海洋中的生物和自然景观，通常用于描述水下的生态环境和生物多样性。

sentences.c: These are the only animals scientists know of that could live in the deep undersea world.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止这些动物是迄今位置科学家所知道的唯一的可以生活在这么深的海底世界的动物！

sentences.c: So far, these are the only animals scientists know of that could live in the deep undersea world.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止这些动物是迄今位置科学家所知道的唯一的可以生活在这么深的海底世界的动物！

sentences.c: To his two floor staircase and the top surface of the undersea world design elements, and grilled fish with.
sentences.cn: 他通向二楼大厅的楼梯及顶面设计成海底世界元素，和烤鱼暗合。

trans.cn: 城市地区；城镇；城镇地区
城市地区：指城市中心区域或城市周边的高密度人口聚集区域。

sentences.c: Thousands were forced to migrate from rural to urban areas in search of work.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的人为了寻找工作被迫从农村涌进城市。

sentences.c: With bonfires outlawed in urban areas, gardeners must cart their refuse to a dump.
sentences.cn: 市区禁止户外焚烧垃圾，园林工人必须用推车把垃圾运到垃圾场。

sentences.c: The spread of urban areas endangers wildlife.
sentences.cn: 扩大城市面积危害着野生物。

trans.cn: 维生素A；视黄醇；抗干眼醇；肝黄质
维生素 A; 维他命 A

sentences.c: Liver and kidneys are particularly rich in vitamin A.
sentences.cn: 肝脏和肾脏尤其富含维生素A。

sentences.c: There was no positive evidence that any birth defects had arisen as a result of Vitamin A intake.
sentences.cn: 没有确凿证据表明摄入维生素A会导致先天缺陷。

sentences.c: How much Vitamin A should they have?
sentences.cn: 他们应该摄入多少维生素A？

trans.cn: 温水浴：使用温暖的水来洗澡的一种方式，通常用于放松身心或舒缓肌肉。

sentences.c: The midwife gave him a warm bath.
sentences.cn: 助产士给他洗了个温水澡。

sentences.c: Pain relieving creams don't work, but a hot shower or warm bath can provide some relief.
sentences.cn: 止痛药膏不起作用，但热水澡或温水浴可以缓解疼痛。

sentences.c: Pain-relieving creams don't work, but a hot shower or warm bath can provide some relief.
sentences.cn: 止痛药膏不起作用，但热水澡或温水浴可以缓解疼痛。

trans.cn: 温暖气候：指气温较高、四季温暖的气候条件。

sentences.c: The warm climate favours many types of tropical plants.
sentences.cn: 温暖的气候对多种热带植物生长有利。

sentences.c: If you live in a place with a warm climate you can hang greetings in the trees.
sentences.cn: 如果您住在气候温暖的地方，您可以在树上挂个问候。

sentences.c: Negative hands and dots tend to be one of the most frequent pairings, especially during a warm climate period known as the Gravettian.
sentences.cn: 凹下的手掌形和小圆点是最频繁出现的成对图形之一，尤其在温暖气候的葛拉夫特时期。

sentences.c: It was a luxury if you had a washing machine in those days.
sentences.cn: 那时候有洗衣机就算是奢侈了。

sentences.c: When the washing machine spurts out water at least we can mop it up.
sentences.cn: 洗衣机溅出水时，我们至少可以把水擦掉。

sentences.c: This smart washing machine will dispense an optimal amount of water for the load.
sentences.cn: 这台智能洗衣机会根据衣物多少适当安排进水量。

trans.cn: 废物处理：包括收集、运输、处理和处置各种废弃物的过程。

sentences.c: Attempts are being made to solve the problem of waste disposal.
sentences.cn: 正在想办法解决废物处理的问题。

sentences.c: A study by the University of Manchester calculated the emissions of CO2—the main greenhouse gas responsible for climate change—at every stage of microwaves, from manufacture to waste disposal.
sentences.cn: 曼彻斯特大学的一项研究计算了二氧化碳（造成气候变化的主要温室气体）在微波炉生产的每个阶段的排放量，从产品制造到废物处理。

sentences.c: Waste disposal is one of the biggest headaches for cities.
sentences.cn: 垃圾处理是许多城市的顽疾之一。

synos.cn: [环境]废物处理；废物处理装置

sentences.c: At least a dozen people attend on the bride of the wealthy prince.
sentences.cn: 至少有12人侍候这个富有的王子的新娘。

sentences.c: At least a dozen people attend upon the bride of the wealthy prince.
sentences.cn: 至少有12个人侍候这个富有的王子的新娘。

sentences.c: Alloy wheels in a totally new weight class.
sentences.cn: 全新重量级别铝合金轮毂。

sentences.c: Taekwondo awards two bronze MEDALS in each weight class.
sentences.cn: 在每个重量级别，跆拳道比赛都设有两枚铜牌。

sentences.c: Well, we ended up walloping them. We took every weight class.
sentences.cn: 所以我们最终大败他们，赢得了所有重量级的比赛。

trans.cn: 白金：一种金的合金，通常与镍或钯混合，外观类似于铂金。

sentences.c: In fact, it became so valuable that it was known as white gold and spies were sent to China to discover what they did to the clay to produce such high-quality merchandise.
sentences.cn: 事实上，它变得如此珍贵，以至于被称为“白金”，间谍被派往中国，以查明他们如何处理粘土，从而生产出如此高质量的商品。

sentences.c: We spent 6,000 yuan on a discounted white gold ring decorated with little diamonds.
sentences.cn: 我们花了6000元买了一个打折的白金戒指，镶有小宝石的那种。

sentences.c: Top quality cotton is a source of national pride and is known as Burkina Faso's "white gold".
sentences.cn: 优质棉花被誉为布基纳法索的“白金”，是民族的骄傲之一。

trans.cn: 白板：一种用于写字或画图的平面表面，通常是白色的，可以使用干擦笔进行书写和擦拭。

sentences.c: In each classroom there is a computer, an overhead projector, and a smart white board.
sentences.cn: 每个教室里都有一台电脑、一台投影仪和一块智能白板。

sentences.c: I have a white board eraser.
sentences.cn: 我有一个白板擦。

sentences.c: All answers will be written on the white board.
sentences.cn: 所有的答案将写在白板上。

trans.cn: 书面作品：指以书面形式表达的作品，如文章、小说、诗歌、剧本等。

sentences.c: It's a good way to store and share your written work publicly, in the cloudy.
sentences.cn: 把你的创作的东西通过云计算分享给大众，并存储在“云”上面，这是一个非常好的主意。

sentences.c: If you have any questions about how you should document the sources of your ideas, please ask your instructors before you submit your written work.
sentences.cn: 如果有任何关于应该如何引用文献证明你的想法来源的问题，在提交书面报告之前请先征询指导老师。

sentences.c: Robert Hirst, director of the Mark Twain Project, spoke about the resulting "talked" autobiography, which follows a less linear path than a more traditional written work.
sentences.cn: 马克·吐温项目负责人Robert Hirst说最终的口述版自传不同于传统的线性式作品。

trans.cn: 用文字表述、记载的语言(区别于没有文字记载的口语)
书面语言：指用文字表达的语言，与口头语言相对。

sentences.c: The fashion at the time was for teaching mainly the written language.
sentences.cn: 那时教学时兴的主要是书面语。

sentences.c: So we're trying to redress the balance and to give teachers a sense that both spoken and written language are equally important.
sentences.cn: 所以我们正力求平衡，让老师们感觉到口语和书面语同样重要。

sentences.c: The specialized written language of art history needs to be relinquished or at least tempered for the screen.
sentences.cn: 艺术史的专门书面语言需要被放弃，或者至少为银幕做些调整。

trans.cn: 动词短语—进行音乐创作
创作音乐：创作音乐作品，包括作曲和填词。

sentences.c: I was just finding more time to write music.
sentences.cn: 我刚好抽得出更多的时间来作曲。

sentences.c: I want to write music.
sentences.cn: 我想创作音乐。

sentences.c: I want to write music. What am I to do?
sentences.cn: 我想创作音乐。看看我在做什么？

trans.cn: 瑜伽学院；瑜伽课程；瑜珈班
瑜伽课程：一种体育活动，通过特定的体位和呼吸控制来提高身体的柔韧性、平衡性和力量。

sentences.c: Each student determines their own pace in the yoga class.
sentences.cn: 每个学生决定他们自己在这个瑜珈班的学习速度。

sentences.c: On Thursday night she went to her yoga class, glad to have something to fill up the evening.
sentences.cn: 星期四晚上她去上了瑜珈课，很高兴有事可做来打发晚上的时间。

sentences.c: I went to the yoga class to feel healthier and instead I caught a cold!
sentences.cn: 我去上瑜伽课是想让自己更健康，结果却感冒了！

trans.cn: 替代能源：可再生或绿色资源产生的可用能源（如热能或电能），可以替代传统能源的选择，例如太阳能、风能、水能等。

sentences.c: It would provide hundreds of millions of dollars for research into alternative energy sources.
sentences.cn: 它可以提供数亿美元用于可替代能源的研究。

sentences.c: Alternative energy sources includes solar energy, wind power and so on.
sentences.cn: 替代能源包括太阳能、风能等。

sentences.c: What Washington does—or doesn't do—to promote alternative energy may mean less and less at a time of a global shift in thought.
sentences.cn: 在这个全球思维都在转变的时代，华盛顿在推动可替代能源发展方面作为或是不作为，其影响越来越小。

trans.cn: 动词短语 攻击人类，袭击人类 ( 连 )
攻击人类：指动物或其他生物攻击人类的行为。

sentences.c: To most of us sharks are the most dangerous fish in the sea and they attack humans.
sentences.cn: 对我们大多数人来说，鲨鱼是海里最危险的鱼类，它们攻击人类。

sentences.c: Wolves will not usually attack humans.
sentences.cn: 狼并不惯于袭击人。

sentences.c: They are the third most likely shark to attack humans, according to NOAA Fisheries.
sentences.cn: 根据美国海洋和大气局渔业公司称，它们在最可能攻击人类的鲨鱼中排名第三。

trans.cn: 理发店：理发师的营业场所。

sentences.c: We finally arrived at the big barber shop, where they cut our hair for free because we were orphans.
sentences.cn: 我们终于到了那家大理发店，他们免费为我们剪头发，因为我们是孤儿。

sentences.c: Is there a beauty salon (barber shop)?
sentences.cn: 旅馆内有美容院(理发院)吗？

sentences.c: Is there a beauty salon (barber shop) in this hotel?
sentences.cn: 旅馆中有美容院理发厅吗？

sentences.c: The Universal Product Code symbol, also known as the 'bar code', is printed on products for sale and contains information that a computer can read.
sentences.cn: 通用产品代码符号，亦称“条形码”，印在出售的商品上，其中含有计算机能识别的信息。

sentences.c: When you cross the finish line you'll be given a bar code and you take this to one of the run volunteers, who will scan it.
sentences.cn: 当你冲过终点线时会得到一个条形码，你把它交给其中一个赛跑志愿者，他会扫描这个条形码。

sentences.c: It can also be encrypted into the bar code.
sentences.cn: 它也可以被加密到条形码内。

sentences.c: I'm a baseball coach.
sentences.cn: 我是一位棒球教练。

sentences.c: I'll teach you an exercise my baseball coach taught me.
sentences.cn: 我教你一个我的棒球教练曾教给我的练习方法。

sentences.c: I love the new baseball coach.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢新的棒球教练。

trans.cn: 燃烧时间：指火箭发动机推进剂完全燃烧的时间。

sentences.c: Converted Camp Fire burning time to operate on new game time.
sentences.cn: 转换阵营火燃烧的时间来操作新的游戏时间。

sentences.c: The fire engine can carry extra tanks or refilling equipment, and a firefighter spends a limited time in the burning building.
sentences.cn: 消防车可以装载额外的气瓶或者充气设备，而消防员在着火建筑内停留时间也有限。

sentences.c: He lit the candle and could tell the time by counting the number of parts left of the burning candle.
sentences.cn: 他点燃了蜡烛，因为通过计算着燃烧着的蜡烛剩下的部分就能推测时间。

sentences.c: I'm a charity worker.
sentences.cn: 我是个慈善工作者。

sentences.c: English charity worker Eglantyne Jebb was shocked to see the influence that action had on children.
sentences.cn: 看到该举动对儿童的影响，英国慈善工作者埃格兰泰恩‧杰布感到很震惊。

sentences.c: A Russian charity worker and her husband were abducted and shot dead in Chechnya.
sentences.cn: 一个俄罗斯慈善机构员工与她的丈夫在车臣遭挟持后被枪杀。

trans.cn: [地质] 瓷石；半风化花岗岩

sentences.c: Yunnan zhaotong city home county is skillfully newly discovered China stone producing area county one of.
sentences.cn: 云南昭通巧家县是新近发现的中国奇石产地县之一。

sentences.c: Shanghai Pearl stone co., Ltd. was evaluated the year 2008 China stone industry, the top ten most competitive brands.
sentences.cn: 上海明珠集团下属子公司上海明珠石材被评为2008年度中国石材业十大最具竞争力品牌。

sentences.c: We will always never stop with positive attitudes to try our best to make us become China stone sanitary ware the first national brand.
sentences.cn: 但是我们必将始终以积极的心态永不止步-倾力打造中国石材洁具第一民族品牌。

trans.cn: 沿海城市：位于海岸线附近的城市，通常具有海洋气候和海洋资源。

sentences.c: The coastal cities of Liguria sit on narrow strips of land lying under steep mountains.
sentences.cn: 利古里亚的那些海滨城市坐落在陡峭山脉下的狭长地带。

sentences.c: One day drought may be a thing of the past at least in coastal cities.
sentences.cn: 至少在沿海城市，总有一天干旱会成为过去。

sentences.c: Scotland and several coastal cities in the US stop people from using plastic straws as well.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰和美国的几个沿海城市也禁止人们使用塑料吸管。

trans.cn: 联系方式；联络资料；联络方式
联系方式：如何联系某个人或实体的信息，通常包括电话号码、地址等。

sentences.c: You must leave your full name and contact details when you phone.
sentences.cn: 你打电话时必须留下自己的完整姓名及用于联络的详细资料。

sentences.c: Contact details can be obtained from the Citizen's Advice Bureau.
sentences.cn: 你可以从市民咨询局获取联系方式。

sentences.c: Can you send me his contact details and I'll set up a meeting with him.
sentences.cn: 你能把他的联系方式发给我吗？我会安排和他见面。

trans.cn: “cool down”的现在分词；【体】准备活动

sentences.c: Cooling down may help reduce muscle injury, stiffness and soreness, but the research is uncertain.
sentences.cn: 降温活动可能有助于减少肌肉损伤，僵硬和疼痛，但是研究还不是很确定的。

sentences.c: The problem with that theory is that no other mammal has resorted to this method of cooling down.
sentences.cn: 这一理论的问题在于，没有其他的哺乳动物采取了这种降低体温的方式。

sentences.c: Here are some of the most common treadmill running mistakes, starting with not warming up or cooling down.
sentences.cn: 这里是一些最常见的跑步错误，从不热身和不冷却开始。

synos.cn: 冷却，[制冷]降温；缓和运动；结束活动

trans.cn: 日常生活：指个人每天重复进行的活动和习惯。

sentences.c: The players had to change their daily routine and lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 这些运动员不得不改变他们的每日常规和生活方式。

sentences.c: Wondering how my mum could consume them so quickly, I began observing her daily routine for two weeks.
sentences.cn: 我不知道妈妈怎么这么快就吃完了，于是我开始观察她两个星期的日常生活。

sentences.c: Reading is his daily routine.
sentences.cn: 读书是他的日常生活。

trans.cn: 台灯：一种放置在桌子上用于照明的灯具。

sentences.c: For example, think of an adjustable desk lamp.
sentences.cn: 例如，想象一盏可调台灯。

sentences.c: "Yes," Alice replied. "I'd like a flexible desk lamp."
sentences.cn: “是的，”爱丽丝回答，“我想研制出一种可弯曲的台灯。”

sentences.c: Adding more light to your work area is easily accomplished by adding a desk lamp.
sentences.cn: 给你的空间更多光线很容易，在桌子上加盏灯就好。

sentences.c: Please give your seats to old people, pregnant women and disable people.
sentences.cn: 请让座给老人、孕妇和行动不便者。

sentences.c: She pointed out that China has nearly 83 million disable people the majority of whom live in the rural area.
sentences.cn: 她指出，中国有近8300万残疾人，其中大部分生活在农村。

sentences.c: This is especially useful to the busy people, the aged and the disable people who can't go to shops in person.
sentences.cn: 这对忙碌的人特或老年人、残疾的不能去商店的人特别有用。

trans.cn: 着装规范：正式或社交上强制规定的着装标准。

sentences.c: Their tables will be set with the good dishes and silver, and the dress code will be Sunday-best.
sentences.cn: 他们的餐桌上将摆满精美的菜肴和银器，他们也会穿上最好的礼服。

sentences.c: If the company does not have a dress code, remember that it's better to overdress than underdress.
sentences.cn: 如果公司没有着装要求，记住穿得太正式比穿得太暴露更好。

sentences.c: The company has a strict dress code—all male employees are expected to wear suits.
sentences.cn: 公司有严格的着装规定—所有男职员都要穿西服。

trans.cn: 同“drop”；睡着；(客)(一一)散去；衰落
减少，下降：指数量或程度变少或减小。
放下，送到：将某人或某物放在指定地点，通常指在途中顺便完成。

sentences.c: "Unlike world leaders," say the summit's organizers, "young people are refusing to let it drop off the plan."
sentences.cn: “与世界领导人不同，”峰会组织者说，“年轻人拒绝把它从计划中撤下。”

sentences.c: Simply drop off your finished books and take those ones that other people left behind.
sentences.cn: 只要把你已经完成的书丢掉，把别人留下的书拿走就行了。

sentences.c: The membership of the club began to drop off.
sentences.cn: 这个俱乐部会员开始减少。

trans.cn: 吸尘器袋：吸尘器中收集灰尘和其他扫帚的部分。

sentences.c: George squatted on the toilet and peeped forth from his lair to watch her emptying the dust bag of her vacuum cleaner into the trash can.
sentences.cn: 乔治蹲在马桶上，从他的窝里探出头来，看着她把吸尘器上的尘袋倒进垃圾桶。

sentences.c: We will send you with the original shoes box and dust bag.
sentences.cn: 我们将赠送原装鞋盒和防尘袋。

sentences.c: Dust bag should be left in the packet channel between the two groups.
sentences.cn: 除尘滤袋应当分组，在两组之间留下通道。

trans.cn: 错误信息：一种计算机或其他设备在执行操作时遇到问题时显示的信息，通常用于帮助用户诊断和解决问题。

sentences.c: Error message: Failed to login.
sentences.cn: 错误信息：登录失败。

sentences.c: Error message: Analyzing failed.
sentences.cn: 错误信息：分析失败。

sentences.c: They get the above error message.
sentences.cn: 他们将得到以上的错误消息。

sentences.c: The Language School wants me to do a bit of exam preparation, but also quite a lot of work in companies and factories, and a couple of children's classes.
sentences.cn: 语言学校想让我做一些考试准备，但也有很多工作是关于公司和工厂，和有几个孩子的班级。

sentences.c: Language Schools New Zealand offers many kinds of English courses including General English, Exam Preparation, Study & Ski and more.
sentences.cn: 新西兰语言学校提供多种英语课程，包括普通英语、备考英语、学习和滑雪等其他课程。

sentences.c: To concentrate in class and listen more efforts should be made before the exam preparation.
sentences.cn: 上课时要集中精力听讲，考试前更应该努力准备。

trans.cn: 快车：指停站很少的火车。

sentences.c: Express trains don't stop at Princeton junction.
sentences.cn: 特快列车不在普林斯顿枢纽站停车。

sentences.c: Men, set out on their way in express trains , but they do not know what they are looking for .
sentences.cn: 人们乘坐特快列车出发上路，但他们不知道自己在寻找什么。

sentences.c: Then it moved away two or three miles, leaving a 11 phosphorescent track, like those volumes of steam that the express trains leave behind.
sentences.cn: 然后它走出两三海里远，后面拖着一条磷光的尾巴，好像列车后面那一团团烟雾般的气体。

trans.cn: 人脸彩绘：在脸上涂上装饰性的颜料。

sentences.c: Because the face of the woman in the under image also appears on canvases Van Gogh is known to have painted, the surface painting must be an authentic self-portrait by Van Gogh.
sentences.cn: 因为下面的女人的脸也出现在梵高画过的画布上，所以这幅凸版印刷一定是梵高的自画像。

sentences.c: Take for example Caduveo face painting.
sentences.cn: 以卡杜·维奥的脸部彩绘为例。

sentences.c: Face Painting Dan: The general name for female characters can be divided into Zhengdan, Huadan, Laodan, Wudan.
sentences.cn: 画脸丹：女性人物的通用名称可分为正旦，老旦，花旦，武旦。

sentences.c: Why was the work of Homer, famous author of ancient Greece, so full of clichés?
sentences.cn: 为什么古希腊著名作家荷马的作品陈词滥调？

sentences.c: A famous author has always been a global microbrand.
sentences.cn: 一位知名作者总是变成一个全球性的微商标。

sentences.c: She jumped at the chance to meet the famous author.
sentences.cn: 她欣然接受了去会见那位名作家的机会。

trans.cn: 化装服：一种根据穿着者的喜好选择的服装，常用于化装舞会等场合。

sentences.c: Guests were told to come in fancy dress.
sentences.cn: 客人们已被告悉应穿着化装舞会服装赴会。

sentences.c: Dale also found international fans for his dressing up too, as each day Carol took photo of her husband in fancy dress and posted it on their blog which became a hit on the Internet.
sentences.cn: 戴尔也因为他的打扮找到了国际粉丝，因为卡罗尔每天都给她丈夫拍他穿着奇装异服的照片，并把照片发布在他们的博客上，这在网络上引起了轰动。

sentences.c: We cannot believe he didn't tell us we could come in fancy dress.
sentences.cn: 我们真不敢相信他没告诉我们可以穿着奇装异服来。

trans.cn: 速食店：指提供快餐的商店。

sentences.c: I'm buying food at a fast food shop.
sentences.cn: 我正在快餐店购买食物。

sentences.c: Buying food at fast food shop.
sentences.cn: 在快餐店购买食物。

sentences.c: As he was in a hurry, he simply got a takeaway from a nearby fast food shop.
sentences.cn: 他行色匆匆，在邻近的快餐店买了一些外卖食物。

trans.cn: 手电筒：一种通常由电池供电的小型便携灯具。
闪光灯：来自摄影灯的短暂而明亮的光线。
闪光信号灯：定期间隔闪烁的明亮灯光，如信号灯。

sentences.c: But when he held his flash light to the house, it was already completely under water.
sentences.cn: 但是，当他举起了闪光灯照房子时，那房子已经完全浸入水中了。

sentences.c: Off to Bydgoszcz. At night, tenting a blanket over his head to hide his flash light beam from the Valley Forge duty officer, Salinger (by now called Jerry) had written his first short stories.
sentences.cn: 晚上，他为了不让瓦莱弗奇学校值班的长官看到自己台灯的亮光，便用一块毯子把自己和台灯都罩了起来，这个时侯，塞林格（人们这会管他叫杰里）已经写了他的第一篇小说。

sentences.c: How do you avoid using flash in low light, you ask?
sentences.cn: 你问，怎样在昏暗环境中避免使用闪光灯？

sentences.c: The earl decided to build a residence in French style in the Russian land.
sentences.cn: 这位伯爵想要在俄罗斯大地上建一座法国风格的公馆。

sentences.c: A visit to Paris should include a day-trip to Versailles where French royalty brought the classical French style to its apex.
sentences.cn: 到巴黎的观光者大都会选出一天去凡尔赛，因为那里呈现了皇室所造就的法国古典文明的顶峰。

sentences.c: This is very much an aperitif wine in the Southern French style and it lends itself to Asian style foods here or just on its own with a beautiful summer sunset.
sentences.cn: 这是具有法国南部风格的开胃葡萄酒，与这里的亚洲食品也相得益彰，如果一边欣赏美丽的夏天日落景色一边饮这种酒也很不错。

trans.cn: 新鲜食品：指未经过加工或保存的食物，通常指新鲜的水果、蔬菜、肉类等易腐食品。

sentences.c: Fresh food is so scarce that prices have rocketed.
sentences.cn: 新鲜食物如此稀缺以致价格飞涨。

sentences.c: Virgo loves fresh food.
sentences.cn: 处女座喜欢新鲜的食物。

sentences.c: The fresh food locker contains tortillas, fresh bread, breakfast rolls, and fresh fruits and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 这个新食品柜装着玉米粉圆饼、鲜面包、早餐卷、新鲜水果和蔬菜。

trans.cn: 前台：建筑物中接待访客的柜台。

sentences.c: In the hotel he explained what had happened to the waiter at the front desk.
sentences.cn: 在酒店里，他向前台的服务员解释了发生的事情。

sentences.c: She wouldn't be very good at talking to people at the front desk.
sentences.cn: 她不太擅长和前台的人交谈。

sentences.c: I think he'll be good with the guests at the front desk.
sentences.cn: 我想他会和前面一桌的客人相处得很好。

trans.cn: 未来职业：指一个人在未来选择或追求的职业道路或职业发展方向。

sentences.c: He has jeopardized his future career.
sentences.cn: 他损害了他的前程。

sentences.c: Her future career prospects look dim.
sentences.cn: 她的前程看来很暗淡。

sentences.c: She found herself in conflict with her parents over her future career.
sentences.cn: 她发现自己在将来择业的问题上与父母存在着分歧。

trans.cn: 进一步培训：指在已经获得一定知识和技能的基础上，通过参加培训课程、学习新的知识和技能，以提高自己的专业水平和能力。

sentences.c: They should take further training.
sentences.cn: 他们应该接受进一步的培训。

sentences.c: I quite agree with you that he needs further training.
sentences.cn: 我完全同意你的意见，他还需要进一步培养。

sentences.c: Do you want to study or receive any further training in Canada?
sentences.cn: 你想在加拿大学习或接受任何进一步的训练吗？

sentences.c: If you're picking up a girl in a club, then high energy is appropriate because your energy will be matching hers.
sentences.cn: 如果你正在追求一个酒吧里的女孩，那么比较适合的就是你的精力也比较充沛，因为你的的精力和她相符合。

sentences.c: "I joined a chess club and lost to an eight-year girl," Sokol told Discovery News.
sentences.cn: “我参加了一个象棋俱乐部，输给了一个8岁的女孩，”Sokol告诉发现新闻。

sentences.c: I am taken with the girl working in the Rain Club.
sentences.cn: 我被那位在俱乐部里工作的女孩迷住了。

trans.cn: 增长机会; 成长机会（growth opportunity的复数）
成长机会：指个人或企业在某个领域有潜力取得进步和发展的机会。

sentences.c: He might feel that leveraging the company at a time when he sees tremendous growth opportunities would be a mistake.
sentences.cn: 他可能感觉到在看到巨大的发展机会时举债经营公司是一个错误。

sentences.c: The emergence of 40Gb/s modules over the next decade will offer new growth opportunities.
sentences.cn: 未来十年，40Gb/s模块的出现将会提供新的机遇。

sentences.c: You'll get more of what really matters - more growth opportunities, more love, more joy, more inner peace.
sentences.cn: 你能得到更多真正重要的东西——更多成长的机会，更多的爱，更多的欢乐以及内心的宁静。

trans.cn: 帮助台：提供电子或计算机问题的协助和信息的部门或人员。

sentences.c: You might try calling the help desk.
sentences.cn: 你可以试着给服务台打个电话。

sentences.c: Some modern vehicles are so complicated these days, but our help desk can sort any problem out.
sentences.cn: 虽然一些现代车辆的技术极为复杂，但我们的服务台可以为您解决任何问题。

sentences.c: They have to tolerate the bad tempers of colleagues frustrated at the number of times they've had to call the help desk for the same issue.
sentences.cn: 他们的同事为就同一问题多次向服务台求助而感到心烦意乱，因此他们不得不忍受其坏脾气。

trans.cn: 赶快：尽快行动或加快速度。
催促：敦促他人加快行动或完成任务。

sentences.c: For Gawd's sake hurry up!
sentences.cn: 看在上帝的份上快点吧！

sentences.c: Oh you're so slow; come on, hurry up!
sentences.cn: 哎哟，你可真慢；加把劲，快点！

sentences.c: I wish the bus would hurry up and come.
sentences.cn: 我希望公共汽车能快点来。

trans.cn: 焚烧车间；焚烧工厂；焚化厂
焚化厂：一种用于处理垃圾和废物的设施，通过高温燃烧将废物转化为灰烬和烟气。

sentences.c: The residents were firmly opposed to the construction of a waste incineration plant in their neighborhood because they were deeply concerned the plant's emission pollution the air.
sentences.cn: 居民坚决反对在附近建立垃圾焚烧厂，因为他们担心工厂排放的气体会污染周围的空气。

sentences.c: The total emissions from incineration were less than the emissions from landfill or composting, although the emissions from power consumption in incineration plant were the most significant.
sentences.cn: 垃圾混合焚烧时电力消耗的碳排放最多，但碳排放总量低于混合堆肥或填埋。

sentences.c: To conclude, the possible remediation technologies for this dye plant are biological remediation, landfill treatment, incineration, MCD, thermal desorption and etc.
sentences.cn: 综上所述，该染料厂的可能修复技术为生物修复、填埋、焚烧、MCD和热脱附等。

trans.cn: 喷气发动机：一种通过向后排放流体喷射来产生动力的发动机，特指一种使用大气中的氧气燃烧燃料并产生向后排放加热空气和废气的飞机发动机。

sentences.c: The aircraft is powered by a jet engine.
sentences.cn: 这架飞机由喷气发动机驱动。

sentences.c: Variable. This variable is defined by the JET engine.
sentences.cn: 该变量是由JET引擎定义的。

sentences.c: If XCache and XDebug are turbochargers, memcached is a jet engine.
sentences.cn: 如果XCache和XDebug是涡轮增压器，那么memcached就是喷气发动机。

sentences.c: So expect to see creatures like leopards, falcons, beautiful flocks of starlings and, brilliantly, monkeys stealing juice bottles.
sentences.cn: 就等着看城市中的奇妙生物吧，比如豹子、猎鹰、大群的漂亮椋鸟，还有，很精彩的猴子偷果汁。

sentences.c: Some bottles of juice are made out of glass.
sentences.cn: 有些用来装果汁的瓶子是用玻璃做的。

sentences.c: Giving small children sweet drinks or bottles of fake juice all day long is nothing less than child abuse.
sentences.cn: 整天给小孩子喝甜饮料或假果汁简直就是虐待儿童。

trans.cn: 保持身体健康：通过定期进行旨在促进身体健康的锻炼来保持身体健康的活动。

sentences.c: I work out regularly to keep fit.
sentences.cn: 我经常做运动以保持健康。

sentences.c: She tries to keep fit by jogging every day.
sentences.cn: 她每天慢跑以保持健康。

sentences.c: I go swimming every day in order to keep fit.
sentences.cn: 我每天游泳以保持健康。

sentences.c: He entered Leningrad State University's law department in 1970.
sentences.cn: 1970年，普京进入列宁格勒州立大学法律系。

sentences.c: How can the law department add the most value to the company's business operations?
sentences.cn: 中国跨国企业法务部如何为中国跨国企业的业务经营创造最大价值？

sentences.c: In 1970, Vladimir Putin became a student of law department at Leningrad State University, earning his degree in 1975.
sentences.cn: 1970年普京进入列宁格勒大学攻读法律系，并于1975年获得学位。

trans.cn: 法律行动：通过法律程序解决争端的过程。

sentences.c: He vowed to take legal action.
sentences.cn: 他发誓要诉诸法律行动。

sentences.c: Your only recourse is legal action.
sentences.cn: 你的唯一依靠就是诉诸法律。

sentences.c: They decided against taking legal action.
sentences.cn: 他们决定不提起诉讼。

trans.cn: 现场音乐：指在现场演出或表演中实时演奏或演唱的音乐。

sentences.c: The club has live music most nights.
sentences.cn: 该俱乐部大多数晚上有现场演奏的音乐。

sentences.c: The Rainbow has not hosted live music since the end of 1981.
sentences.cn: 彩虹乐队自1981年底以来还没有举办过现场音乐会。

sentences.c: The festival will feature pyrotechnics, live music, and sculptures.
sentences.cn: 该节日将有烟火、现场音乐及雕塑表演。

trans.cn: 大声噪音：指高音量或强烈的声音，通常会引起人们的注意或不适。

sentences.c: The dog kept making loud noises.
sentences.cn: 那条狗不停地发出很大的噪音。

sentences.c: Exposure to loud noises can definitely produce a partial or complete loss of hearing, depending on the intensity, duration, and frequency composition of the noise.
sentences.cn: 暴露在巨大的噪音中肯定会造成部分或完全的听力丧失，这取决于噪音的强度、持续时间和频率组成。

sentences.c: I was annoyed by the loud noises in the morning.
sentences.cn: 早上的噪音把我烦死了。

trans.cn: 邮寄名单：一个包含姓名和地址的列表，用于发送邮件，也可以是一个包含姓名和电子邮件地址的列表，用于发送电子邮件。

sentences.c: I am already on your mailing list.
sentences.cn: 我已经列在你的邮寄名单上了。

sentences.c: Join the mailing list.
sentences.cn: 请加入邮件列表。

sentences.c: You can send an E-mail to the mailing list.
sentences.cn: 你可以给我们的邮件列表发邮件。

trans.cn: 海洋植物：生长在海洋中的植物，包括海藻、海草等，对于海洋生态系统具有重要意义。

sentences.c: They found fossils of microscopic marine plants which suggest that the region was once open ocean, not solid ice.
sentences.cn: 他们发现了微型海洋植物的化石，表明该地区曾经是开放的海洋，而不是坚固的冰层。

sentences.c: The reason for this increased cloud cover, it turns out, is the exceptionally large amount of microscopic marine plants.
sentences.cn: 事实证明，云量增加是大量的微型海洋植物导致的。

sentences.c: Within samples collected from the solid substances lying beneath the ice they found fossils of microscopic marine plants which suggest that the region was once open ocean not solid ice.
sentences.cn: 在从冰下的固体物质中收集的样本中，他们发现微型海洋植物的化石，这表明这个区域曾经是开阔的海洋而不是坚硬的冰。

trans.cn: 使命宣言：陈述企业或组织目的或目标的内容。通常用于描述企业或组织的宗旨和价值观，以及其在市场中的定位和目标。

sentences.c: Our mission statement is to be the best design firm in the world.
sentences.cn: 我们的宗旨是成为世界上最好的设计公司。

sentences.c: "If we're successful," their mission statement reads, "we believe this will be one of the most important and widely beneficial scientific advances ever made."
sentences.cn: “如果我们成功了，”他们的任务声明写道，“我们相信这将是有史以来最重要、最有益的科学进步之一。”

sentences.c: Compose a Mission Statement.
sentences.cn: 撰写一篇任务报告。

etymology.d: mission,使命，宗旨，statement,陈述，表达。引申词义宗旨说明。

trans.cn: 肌肉疼痛：肌肉因过度使用、受伤或疾病而引起的疼痛。

sentences.c: Other symptoms include muscle pain, headache, nausea, fatigue, and rash.
sentences.cn: 其他症状包括肌肉疼痛、头痛、恶心、疲劳和皮疹。

sentences.c: Coffee reduces muscle pain.
sentences.cn: 咖啡可减轻肌肉疼痛。

sentences.c: I have severe muscle pain.
sentences.cn: 我的肌肉痛得厉害。

trans.cn: 谈判技巧；谈判技能；谈判能力
谈判技巧：在商业、政治或日常生活中与他人沟通、讨论以达成共识或解决争议的能力和技巧。

sentences.c: For instance, one student took the lead in dealing with a difficult landlord and so demonstrated negotiation skills.
sentences.cn: 例如，一名学生带头与一个难相处的房东交涉，这样就展示了他的谈判技巧。

sentences.c: Strong communication and negotiation skills.
sentences.cn: 较强的沟通和谈判技巧。

sentences.c: This is where your negotiation skills come into play.
sentences.cn: 这就要看您的谈判技巧如何了。

trans.cn: 提供建议：向他人提供自己的意见或建议，帮助他们解决问题或做出决策。

sentences.c: Don't judge or offer advice before you know more about others and the topic.
sentences.cn: 在你对别人和话题了解得更多之前，不要妄下结论或提出建议。

sentences.c: The commission will merely offer advice.
sentences.cn: 委员会仅仅是提供建议。

sentences.c: After I graduated, he continued to offer advice.
sentences.cn: 他后来一直给我提出建议。

trans.cn: 橄榄油：一种从橄榄中提取的浅黄色至黄绿色的非干性油，富含单不饱和脂肪，主要用作沙拉油和烹饪油。

sentences.c: Olive oil and garlic feature prominently in his recipes.
sentences.cn: 橄榄油和大蒜在他的食谱中显得很重要。

sentences.c: Only extra-virgin olive oil will do on recherché dinner tables.
sentences.cn: 只有特纯橄榄油才能上讲究的餐桌。

sentences.c: Its fruit can be made into olive oil.
sentences.cn: 它的果实可以制成橄榄油。

trans.cn: 旅游旺季：游客最多的时间。

sentences.c: Autumn is the tourist peak season in Yunnan Province for it enjoys beautiful scenery at that time.
sentences.cn: 秋季是云南省的旅游旺季，因为那个时候云南省风景很美。

sentences.c: The Vatican draws more than five million people each year, and queues can reach four hours during peak season.
sentences.cn: 梵蒂冈每年游客量超五百万人，在旺季，游客排队所花的时间可达到四个小时。

sentences.c: We need extra help during the peak season.
sentences.cn: 我们在最繁忙的季节需要额外人手。

trans.cn: 同龄人群：一群大致年龄和地位相同的人，尤其是如果他们有相同的兴趣爱好。

sentences.c: They worry that the adolescent peer group has the power to push its members into behavior that is foolish and even dangerous.
sentences.cn: 他们担心青少年同龄群体有能力迫使其成员做出愚蠢甚至危险的行为。

sentences.c: The passive attitude we have to climate change as individuals can be altered by counting us in—and measuring us against—our peer group.
sentences.cn: 作为个体，我们对气候变化的消极态度可以通过把我们自己包括在内并把我们与同龄人进行对比来改变。

sentences.c: She gets on well with her peer group.
sentences.cn: 她和同龄人相处融洽。

trans.cn: 松林：由松树组成的森林，通常具有浓密的树冠和松针覆盖的地面。
